1.1: paulov klhtov apostolov ihsou cristou dia yelhmatov yeou kai swsyenhv o adelfov
1.2: th ekklhsia tou yeou th oush en korinyw hgiasmenoiv en cristw ihsou klhtoiv agioiv sun pasin toiv epikaloumenoiv to onoma tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou en panti topw autwn kai hmwn
1.3: cariv umin kai eirhnh apo yeou patrov hmwn kai kuriou ihsou cristou
1.4: eucaristw tw yew pantote peri umwn epi th cariti tou yeou th doyeish umin en cristw ihsou
1.5: oti en panti eploutisyhte en autw en panti logw kai pash gnwsei
1.6: kaywv to marturion tou cristou ebebaiwyh en umin
1.7: wste umav mh ustereisyai en mhdeni carismati apekdecomenouv thn apokaluqin tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou
1.8: ov kai bebaiwsei umav ewv telouv anegklhtouv en th hmera tou kuriou hmwn ihsou [cristou]
1.9: pistov o yeov di ou eklhyhte eiv koinwnian tou uiou autou ihsou cristou tou kuriou hmwn
1.10: parakalw de umav adelfoi dia tou onomatov tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou ina to auto leghte pantev kai mh h en umin scismata hte de kathrtismenoi en tw autw noi kai en th auth gnwmh
1.11: edhlwyh gar moi peri umwn adelfoi mou upo twn clohv oti eridev en umin eisin
1.12: legw de touto oti ekastov umwn legei egw men eimi paulou egw de apollw egw de khfa egw de cristou
1.13: memeristai o cristov mh paulov estaurwyh uper umwn h eiv to onoma paulou ebaptisyhte
1.14: eucaristw oti oudena umwn ebaptisa ei mh krispon kai gaion
1.15: ina mh tiv eiph oti eiv to emon onoma ebaptisyhte
1.16: ebaptisa de kai ton stefana oikon loipon ouk oida ei tina allon ebaptisa
1.17: ou gar apesteilen me cristov baptizein alla euaggelizesyai ouk en sofia logou ina mh kenwyh o staurov tou cristou
1.18: o logov gar o tou staurou toiv men apollumenoiv mwria estin toiv de swzomenoiv hmin dunamiv yeou estin
1.19: gegraptai gar apolw thn sofian twn sofwn kai thn sunesin twn sunetwn ayethsw
1.20: pou sofov pou grammateuv pou suzhththv tou aiwnov toutou ouci emwranen o yeov thn sofian tou kosmou
1.21: epeidh gar en th sofia tou yeou ouk egnw o kosmov dia thv sofiav ton yeon eudokhsen o yeov dia thv mwriav tou khrugmatov swsai touv pisteuontav
1.22: epeidh kai ioudaioi shmeia aitousin kai ellhnev sofian zhtousin
1.23: hmeiv de khrussomen criston estaurwmenon ioudaioiv men skandalon eynesin de mwrian
1.24: autoiv de toiv klhtoiv ioudaioiv te kai ellhsin criston yeou dunamin kai yeou sofian
1.25: oti to mwron tou yeou sofwteron twn anyrwpwn estin kai to asyenev tou yeou iscuroteron twn anyrwpwn
1.26: blepete gar thn klhsin umwn adelfoi oti ou polloi sofoi kata sarka ou polloi dunatoi ou polloi eugeneiv
1.27: alla ta mwra tou kosmou exelexato o yeov ina kataiscunh touv sofouv kai ta asyenh tou kosmou exelexato o yeov ina kataiscunh ta iscura
1.28: kai ta agenh tou kosmou kai ta exouyenhmena exelexato o yeov [kai] ta mh onta ina ta onta katarghsh
1.29: opwv mh kauchshtai pasa sarx enwpion tou yeou
1.30: ex autou de umeiv este en cristw ihsou ov egenhyh sofia hmin apo yeou dikaiosunh te kai agiasmov kai apolutrwsiv
1.31: ina kaywv gegraptai o kaucwmenov en kuriw kaucasyw

2.1: kagw elywn prov umav adelfoi hlyon ou kay uperochn logou h sofiav kataggellwn umin to musthrion tou yeou
2.2: ou gar ekrina ti eidenai en umin ei mh ihsoun criston kai touton estaurwmenon
2.3: kagw en asyeneia kai en fobw kai en tromw pollw egenomhn prov umav
2.4: kai o logov mou kai to khrugma mou ouk en peiyoiv sofiav logoiv all en apodeixei pneumatov kai dunamewv
2.5: ina h pistiv umwn mh h en sofia anyrwpwn all en dunamei yeou
2.6: sofian de laloumen en toiv teleioiv sofian de ou tou aiwnov toutou oude twn arcontwn tou aiwnov toutou twn katargoumenwn
2.7: alla laloumen yeou sofian en musthriw thn apokekrummenhn hn prowrisen o yeov pro twn aiwnwn eiv doxan hmwn
2.8: hn oudeiv twn arcontwn tou aiwnov toutou egnwken ei gar egnwsan ouk an ton kurion thv doxhv estaurwsan
2.9: alla kaywv gegraptai a ofyalmov ouk eiden kai ouv ouk hkousen kai epi kardian anyrwpou ouk anebh osa htoimasen o yeov toiv agapwsin auton
2.10: hmin gar apekaluqen o yeov dia tou pneumatov to gar pneuma panta erauna kai ta bayh tou yeou
2.11: tiv gar oiden anyrwpwn ta tou anyrwpou ei mh to pneuma tou anyrwpou to en autw outwv kai ta tou yeou oudeiv egnwken ei mh to pneuma tou yeou
2.12: hmeiv de ou to pneuma tou kosmou elabomen alla to pneuma to ek tou yeou ina eidwmen ta upo tou yeou carisyenta hmin
2.13: a kai laloumen ouk en didaktoiv anyrwpinhv sofiav logoiv all en didaktoiv pneumatov pneumatikoiv pneumatika sugkrinontev
2.14: qucikov de anyrwpov ou decetai ta tou pneumatov tou yeou mwria gar autw estin kai ou dunatai gnwnai oti pneumatikwv anakrinetai
2.15: o de pneumatikov anakrinei men panta autov de up oudenov anakrinetai
2.16: tiv gar egnw noun kuriou ov sumbibasei auton hmeiv de noun cristou ecomen

3.1: kagw adelfoi ouk hdunhyhn lalhsai umin wv pneumatikoiv all wv sarkinoiv wv nhpioiv en cristw
3.2: gala umav epotisa ou brwma oupw gar edunasye all oude [eti] nun dunasye
3.3: eti gar sarkikoi este opou gar en umin zhlov kai eriv ouci sarkikoi este kai kata anyrwpon peripateite
3.4: otan gar legh tiv egw men eimi paulou eterov de egw apollw ouk anyrwpoi este
3.5: ti oun estin apollwv ti de estin paulov diakonoi di wn episteusate kai ekastw wv o kuriov edwken
3.6: egw efuteusa apollwv epotisen alla o yeov huxanen
3.7: wste oute o futeuwn estin ti oute o potizwn all o auxanwn yeov
3.8: o futeuwn de kai o potizwn en eisin ekastov de ton idion misyon lhmqetai kata ton idion kopon
3.9: yeou gar esmen sunergoi yeou gewrgion yeou oikodomh este
3.10: kata thn carin tou yeou thn doyeisan moi wv sofov arcitektwn yemelion eyhka allov de epoikodomei ekastov de blepetw pwv epoikodomei
3.11: yemelion gar allon oudeiv dunatai yeinai para ton keimenon ov estin ihsouv cristov
3.12: ei de tiv epoikodomei epi ton yemelion crusion argurion liyouv timiouv xula corton kalamhn
3.13: ekastou to ergon faneron genhsetai h gar hmera dhlwsei oti en puri apokaluptetai kai ekastou to ergon opoion estin to pur auto dokimasei
3.14: ei tinov to ergon menei o epoikodomhsen misyon lhmqetai
3.15: ei tinov to ergon katakahsetai zhmiwyhsetai autov de swyhsetai outwv de wv dia purov
3.16: ouk oidate oti naov yeou este kai to pneuma tou yeou en umin oikei
3.17: ei tiv ton naon tou yeou fyeirei fyerei touton o yeov o gar naov tou yeou agiov estin oitinev este umeiv
3.18: mhdeiv eauton exapatatw ei tiv dokei sofov einai en umin en tw aiwni toutw mwrov genesyw ina genhtai sofov
3.19: h gar sofia tou kosmou toutou mwria para tw yew estin gegraptai gar o drassomenov touv sofouv en th panourgia autwn
3.20: kai palin kuriov ginwskei touv dialogismouv twn sofwn oti eisin mataioi
3.21: wste mhdeiv kaucasyw en anyrwpoiv panta gar umwn estin
3.22: eite paulov eite apollwv eite khfav eite kosmov eite zwh eite yanatov eite enestwta eite mellonta panta umwn
3.23: umeiv de cristou cristov de yeou

4.1: outwv hmav logizesyw anyrwpov wv uphretav cristou kai oikonomouv musthriwn yeou
4.2: wde loipon zhteitai en toiv oikonomoiv ina pistov tiv eureyh
4.3: emoi de eiv elaciston estin ina uf umwn anakriyw h upo anyrwpinhv hmerav all oude emauton anakrinw
4.4: ouden gar emautw sunoida all ouk en toutw dedikaiwmai o de anakrinwn me kuriov estin
4.5: wste mh pro kairou ti krinete ewv an elyh o kuriov ov kai fwtisei ta krupta tou skotouv kai fanerwsei tav boulav twn kardiwn kai tote o epainov genhsetai ekastw apo tou yeou
4.6: tauta de adelfoi meteschmatisa eiv emauton kai apollwn di umav ina en hmin mayhte to mh uper a gegraptai ina mh eiv uper tou enov fusiousye kata tou eterou
4.7: tiv gar se diakrinei ti de eceiv o ouk elabev ei de kai elabev ti kaucasai wv mh labwn
4.8: hdh kekoresmenoi este hdh eplouthsate cwriv hmwn ebasileusate kai ofelon ge ebasileusate ina kai hmeiv umin sumbasileuswmen
4.9: dokw gar o yeov hmav touv apostolouv escatouv apedeixen wv epiyanatiouv oti yeatron egenhyhmen tw kosmw kai aggeloiv kai anyrwpoiv
4.10: hmeiv mwroi dia criston umeiv de fronimoi en cristw hmeiv asyeneiv umeiv de iscuroi umeiv endoxoi hmeiv de atimoi
4.11: acri thv arti wrav kai peinwmen kai diqwmen kai gumniteuomen kai kolafizomeya kai astatoumen
4.12: kai kopiwmen ergazomenoi taiv idiaiv cersin loidoroumenoi eulogoumen diwkomenoi anecomeya
4.13: dusfhmoumenoi parakaloumen wv perikayarmata tou kosmou egenhyhmen pantwn periqhma ewv arti
4.14: ouk entrepwn umav grafw tauta all wv tekna mou agaphta nouyetwn
4.15: ean gar muriouv paidagwgouv echte en cristw all ou pollouv paterav en gar cristw ihsou dia tou euaggeliou egw umav egennhsa
4.16: parakalw oun umav mimhtai mou ginesye
4.17: dia touto epemqa umin timoyeon ov estin mou teknon agaphton kai piston en kuriw ov umav anamnhsei tav odouv mou tav en cristw [ihsou] kaywv pantacou en pash ekklhsia didaskw
4.18: wv mh ercomenou de mou prov umav efusiwyhsan tinev
4.19: eleusomai de tacewv prov umav ean o kuriov yelhsh kai gnwsomai ou ton logon twn pefusiwmenwn alla thn dunamin
4.20: ou gar en logw h basileia tou yeou all en dunamei
4.21: ti yelete en rabdw elyw prov umav h en agaph pneumati te prauthtov

5.1: olwv akouetai en umin porneia kai toiauth porneia htiv oude en toiv eynesin wste gunaika tina tou patrov ecein
5.2: kai umeiv pefusiwmenoi este kai ouci mallon epenyhsate ina aryh ek mesou umwn o to ergon touto praxav
5.3: egw men gar apwn tw swmati parwn de tw pneumati hdh kekrika wv parwn ton outwv touto katergasamenon
5.4: en tw onomati tou kuriou [hmwn] ihsou sunacyentwn umwn kai tou emou pneumatov sun th dunamei tou kuriou hmwn ihsou
5.5: paradounai ton toiouton tw satana eiv oleyron thv sarkov ina to pneuma swyh en th hmera tou kuriou
5.6: ou kalon to kauchma umwn ouk oidate oti mikra zumh olon to furama zumoi
5.7: ekkayarate thn palaian zumhn ina hte neon furama kaywv este azumoi kai gar to pasca hmwn etuyh cristov
5.8: wste eortazwmen mh en zumh palaia mhde en zumh kakiav kai ponhriav all en azumoiv eilikrineiav kai alhyeiav
5.9: egraqa umin en th epistolh mh sunanamignusyai pornoiv
5.10: ou pantwv toiv pornoiv tou kosmou toutou h toiv pleonektaiv kai arpaxin h eidwlolatraiv epei wfeilete ara ek tou kosmou exelyein
5.11: nun de egraqa umin mh sunanamignusyai ean tiv adelfov onomazomenov h pornov h pleonekthv h eidwlolatrhv h loidorov h meyusov h arpax tw toioutw mhde sunesyiein
5.12: ti gar moi touv exw krinein ouci touv esw umeiv krinete
5.13: touv de exw o yeov krinei exarate ton ponhron ex umwn autwn

6.1: tolma tiv umwn pragma ecwn prov ton eteron krinesyai epi twn adikwn kai ouci epi twn agiwn
6.2: h ouk oidate oti oi agioi ton kosmon krinousin kai ei en umin krinetai o kosmov anaxioi este krithriwn elacistwn
6.3: ouk oidate oti aggelouv krinoumen mhtige biwtika
6.4: biwtika men oun krithria ean echte touv exouyenhmenouv en th ekklhsia toutouv kayizete
6.5: prov entrophn umin legw outwv ouk eni en umin oudeiv sofov ov dunhsetai diakrinai ana meson tou adelfou autou
6.6: alla adelfov meta adelfou krinetai kai touto epi apistwn
6.7: hdh men oun olwv htthma umin estin oti krimata ecete mey eautwn dia ti ouci mallon adikeisye dia ti ouci mallon apostereisye
6.8: alla umeiv adikeite kai apostereite kai touto adelfouv
6.9: h ouk oidate oti adikoi yeou basileian ou klhronomhsousin mh planasye oute pornoi oute eidwlolatrai oute moicoi oute malakoi oute arsenokoitai
6.10: oute kleptai oute pleonektai ou meyusoi ou loidoroi ouc arpagev basileian yeou klhronomhsousin
6.11: kai tauta tinev hte alla apelousasye alla hgiasyhte alla edikaiwyhte en tw onomati tou kuriou [hmwn] ihsou cristou kai en tw pneumati tou yeou hmwn
6.12: panta moi exestin all ou panta sumferei panta moi exestin all ouk egw exousiasyhsomai upo tinov
6.13: ta brwmata th koilia kai h koilia toiv brwmasin o de yeov kai tauthn kai tauta katarghsei to de swma ou th porneia alla tw kuriw kai o kuriov tw swmati
6.14: o de yeov kai ton kurion hgeiren kai hmav exegerei dia thv dunamewv autou
6.15: ouk oidate oti ta swmata umwn melh cristou estin arav oun ta melh tou cristou poihsw pornhv melh mh genoito
6.16: h ouk oidate oti o kollwmenov th pornh en swma estin esontai gar fhsin oi duo eiv sarka mian
6.17: o de kollwmenov tw kuriw en pneuma estin
6.18: feugete thn porneian pan amarthma o ean poihsh anyrwpov ektov tou swmatov estin o de porneuwn eiv to idion swma amartanei
6.19: h ouk oidate oti to swma umwn naov tou en umin agiou pneumatov estin ou ecete apo yeou kai ouk este eautwn
6.20: hgorasyhte gar timhv doxasate dh ton yeon en tw swmati umwn

7.1: peri de wn egraqate kalon anyrwpw gunaikov mh aptesyai
7.2: dia de tav porneiav ekastov thn eautou gunaika ecetw kai ekasth ton idion andra ecetw
7.3: th gunaiki o anhr thn ofeilhn apodidotw omoiwv de kai h gunh tw andri
7.4: h gunh tou idiou swmatov ouk exousiazei alla o anhr omoiwv de kai o anhr tou idiou swmatov ouk exousiazei alla h gunh
7.5: mh apostereite allhlouv ei mhti [an] ek sumfwnou prov kairon ina scolashte th proseuch kai palin epi to auto hte ina mh peirazh umav o satanav dia thn akrasian [umwn]
7.6: touto de legw kata suggnwmhn ou kat epitaghn
7.7: yelw de pantav anyrwpouv einai wv kai emauton alla ekastov idion ecei carisma ek yeou o men outwv o de outwv
7.8: legw de toiv agamoiv kai taiv chraiv kalon autoiv ean meinwsin wv kagw
7.9: ei de ouk egkrateuontai gamhsatwsan kreitton gar estin gamein h purousyai
7.10: toiv de gegamhkosin paraggellw ouk egw alla o kuriov gunaika apo androv mh cwrisyhnai
7.11: ean de kai cwrisyh menetw agamov h tw andri katallaghtw kai andra gunaika mh afienai
7.12: toiv de loipoiv legw egw ouc o kuriov ei tiv adelfov gunaika ecei apiston kai auth suneudokei oikein met autou mh afietw authn
7.13: kai gunh htiv ecei andra apiston kai outov suneudokei oikein met authv mh afietw ton andra
7.14: hgiastai gar o anhr o apistov en th gunaiki kai hgiastai h gunh h apistov en tw adelfw epei ara ta tekna umwn akayarta estin nun de agia estin
7.15: ei de o apistov cwrizetai cwrizesyw ou dedoulwtai o adelfov h h adelfh en toiv toioutoiv en de eirhnh keklhken umav o yeov
7.16: ti gar oidav gunai ei ton andra swseiv h ti oidav aner ei thn gunaika swseiv
7.17: ei mh ekastw wv memeriken o kuriov ekaston wv keklhken o yeov outwv peripateitw kai outwv en taiv ekklhsiaiv pasaiv diatassomai
7.18: peritetmhmenov tiv eklhyh mh epispasyw en akrobustia keklhtai tiv mh peritemnesyw
7.19: h peritomh ouden estin kai h akrobustia ouden estin alla thrhsiv entolwn yeou
7.20: ekastov en th klhsei h eklhyh en tauth menetw
7.21: doulov eklhyhv mh soi meletw all ei kai dunasai eleuyerov genesyai mallon crhsai
7.22: o gar en kuriw klhyeiv doulov apeleuyerov kuriou estin omoiwv o eleuyerov klhyeiv doulov estin cristou
7.23: timhv hgorasyhte mh ginesye douloi anyrwpwn
7.24: ekastov en w eklhyh adelfoi en toutw menetw para yew
7.25: peri de twn paryenwn epitaghn kuriou ouk ecw gnwmhn de didwmi wv hlehmenov upo kuriou pistov einai
7.26: nomizw oun touto kalon uparcein dia thn enestwsan anagkhn oti kalon anyrwpw to outwv einai
7.27: dedesai gunaiki mh zhtei lusin lelusai apo gunaikov mh zhtei gunaika
7.28: ean de kai gamhshv ouc hmartev kai ean ghmh [h] paryenov ouc hmarten yliqin de th sarki exousin oi toioutoi egw de umwn feidomai
7.29: touto de fhmi adelfoi o kairov sunestalmenov estin to loipon ina kai oi econtev gunaikav wv mh econtev wsin
7.30: kai oi klaiontev wv mh klaiontev kai oi cairontev wv mh cairontev kai oi agorazontev wv mh katecontev
7.31: kai oi crwmenoi ton kosmon wv mh katacrwmenoi paragei gar to schma tou kosmou toutou
7.32: yelw de umav amerimnouv einai o agamov merimna ta tou kuriou pwv aresh tw kuriw
7.33: o de gamhsav merimna ta tou kosmou pwv aresh th gunaiki
7.34: kai memeristai kai h gunh h agamov kai h paryenov merimna ta tou kuriou ina h agia [kai] tw swmati kai tw pneumati h de gamhsasa merimna ta tou kosmou pwv aresh tw andri
7.35: touto de prov to umwn autwn sumforon legw ouc ina brocon umin epibalw alla prov to euschmon kai euparedron tw kuriw aperispastwv
7.36: ei de tiv aschmonein epi thn paryenon autou nomizei ean h uperakmov kai outwv ofeilei ginesyai o yelei poieitw ouc amartanei gameitwsan
7.37: ov de esthken en th kardia autou edraiov mh ecwn anagkhn exousian de ecei peri tou idiou yelhmatov kai touto kekriken en th idia kardia threin thn eautou paryenon kalwv poihsei
7.38: wste kai o gamizwn thn eautou paryenon kalwv poiei kai o mh gamizwn kreisson poihsei
7.39: gunh dedetai ef oson cronon zh o anhr authv ean de koimhyh o anhr eleuyera estin w yelei gamhyhnai monon en kuriw
7.40: makariwtera de estin ean outwv meinh kata thn emhn gnwmhn dokw gar kagw pneuma yeou ecein

8.1: peri de twn eidwloyutwn oidamen oti pantev gnwsin ecomen h gnwsiv fusioi h de agaph oikodomei
8.2: ei tiv dokei egnwkenai ti oupw egnw kaywv dei gnwnai
8.3: ei de tiv agapa ton yeon outov egnwstai up autou
8.4: peri thv brwsewv oun twn eidwloyutwn oidamen oti ouden eidwlon en kosmw kai oti oudeiv yeov ei mh eiv
8.5: kai gar eiper eisin legomenoi yeoi eite en ouranw eite epi ghv wsper eisin yeoi polloi kai kurioi polloi
8.6: [all] hmin eiv yeov o pathr ex ou ta panta kai hmeiv eiv auton kai eiv kuriov ihsouv cristov di ou ta panta kai hmeiv di autou
8.7: all ouk en pasin h gnwsiv tinev de th sunhyeia ewv arti tou eidwlou wv eidwloyuton esyiousin kai h suneidhsiv autwn asyenhv ousa molunetai
8.8: brwma de hmav ou parasthsei tw yew oute ean mh fagwmen usteroumeya oute ean fagwmen perisseuomen
8.9: blepete de mh pwv h exousia umwn auth proskomma genhtai toiv asyenesin
8.10: ean gar tiv idh [se] ton econta gnwsin en eidwleiw katakeimenon ouci h suneidhsiv autou asyenouv ontov oikodomhyhsetai eiv to ta eidwloyuta esyiein
8.11: apollutai gar o asyenwn en th sh gnwsei o adelfov di on cristov apeyanen
8.12: outwv de amartanontev eiv touv adelfouv kai tuptontev autwn thn suneidhsin asyenousan eiv criston amartanete
8.13: dioper ei brwma skandalizei ton adelfon mou ou mh fagw krea eiv ton aiwna ina mh ton adelfon mou skandalisw

9.1: ouk eimi eleuyerov ouk eimi apostolov ouci ihsoun ton kurion hmwn eoraka ou to ergon mou umeiv este en kuriw
9.2: ei alloiv ouk eimi apostolov alla ge umin eimi h gar sfragiv mou thv apostolhv umeiv este en kuriw
9.3: h emh apologia toiv eme anakrinousin estin auth
9.4: mh ouk ecomen exousian fagein kai pein
9.5: mh ouk ecomen exousian adelfhn gunaika periagein wv kai oi loipoi apostoloi kai oi adelfoi tou kuriou kai khfav
9.6: h monov egw kai barnabav ouk ecomen exousian mh ergazesyai
9.7: tiv strateuetai idioiv oqwnioiv pote tiv futeuei ampelwna kai ton karpon autou ouk esyiei [h] tiv poimainei poimnhn kai ek tou galaktov thv poimnhv ouk esyiei
9.8: mh kata anyrwpon tauta lalw h kai o nomov tauta ou legei
9.9: en gar tw mwusewv nomw gegraptai ou fimwseiv boun alownta mh twn bown melei tw yew
9.10: h di hmav pantwv legei di hmav gar egrafh oti ofeilei ep elpidi o arotriwn arotrian kai o alown ep elpidi tou metecein
9.11: ei hmeiv umin ta pneumatika espeiramen mega ei hmeiv umwn ta sarkika yerisomen
9.12: ei alloi thv umwn exousiav metecousin ou mallon hmeiv all ouk ecrhsameya th exousia tauth alla panta stegomen ina mh tina egkophn dwmen tw euaggeliw tou cristou
9.13: ouk oidate oti oi ta iera ergazomenoi ta ek tou ierou esyiousin oi tw yusiasthriw paredreuontev tw yusiasthriw summerizontai
9.14: outwv kai o kuriov dietaxen toiv to euaggelion kataggellousin ek tou euaggeliou zhn
9.15: egw de ou kecrhmai oudeni toutwn ouk egraqa de tauta ina outwv genhtai en emoi kalon gar moi mallon apoyanein h to kauchma mou oudeiv kenwsei
9.16: ean gar euaggelizwmai ouk estin moi kauchma anagkh gar moi epikeitai ouai gar moi estin ean mh euaggeliswmai
9.17: ei gar ekwn touto prassw misyon ecw ei de akwn oikonomian pepisteumai
9.18: tiv oun mou estin o misyov ina euaggelizomenov adapanon yhsw to euaggelion eiv to mh katacrhsasyai th exousia mou en tw euaggeliw
9.19: eleuyerov gar wn ek pantwn pasin emauton edoulwsa ina touv pleionav kerdhsw
9.20: kai egenomhn toiv ioudaioiv wv ioudaiov ina ioudaiouv kerdhsw toiv upo nomon wv upo nomon mh wn autov upo nomon ina touv upo nomon kerdhsw
9.21: toiv anomoiv wv anomov mh wn anomov yeou all ennomov cristou ina kerdanw touv anomouv
9.22: egenomhn toiv asyenesin asyenhv ina touv asyeneiv kerdhsw toiv pasin gegona panta ina pantwv tinav swsw
9.23: panta de poiw dia to euaggelion ina sugkoinwnov autou genwmai
9.24: ouk oidate oti oi en stadiw trecontev pantev men trecousin eiv de lambanei to brabeion outwv trecete ina katalabhte
9.25: pav de o agwnizomenov panta egkrateuetai ekeinoi men oun ina fyarton stefanon labwsin hmeiv de afyarton
9.26: egw toinun outwv trecw wv ouk adhlwv outwv pukteuw wv ouk aera derwn
9.27: alla upwpiazw mou to swma kai doulagwgw mh pwv alloiv khruxav autov adokimov genwmai

10.1: ou yelw gar umav agnoein adelfoi oti oi paterev hmwn pantev upo thn nefelhn hsan kai pantev dia thv yalasshv dihlyon
10.2: kai pantev eiv ton mwushn ebaptisanto en th nefelh kai en th yalassh
10.3: kai pantev [to auto] pneumatikon brwma efagon
10.4: kai pantev to auto pneumatikon epion poma epinon gar ek pneumatikhv akolouyoushv petrav h petra de hn o cristov
10.5: all ouk en toiv pleiosin autwn hudokhsen o yeov katestrwyhsan gar en th erhmw
10.6: tauta de tupoi hmwn egenhyhsan eiv to mh einai hmav epiyumhtav kakwn kaywv kakeinoi epeyumhsan
10.7: mhde eidwlolatrai ginesye kaywv tinev autwn wsper gegraptai ekayisen o laov fagein kai pein kai anesthsan paizein
10.8: mhde porneuwmen kaywv tinev autwn eporneusan kai epesan mia hmera eikosi treiv ciliadev
10.9: mhde ekpeirazwmen ton kurion kaywv tinev autwn epeirasan kai upo twn ofewn apwllunto
10.10: mhde gogguzete kayaper tinev autwn egoggusan kai apwlonto upo tou oloyreutou
10.11: tauta de tupikwv sunebainen ekeinoiv egrafh de prov nouyesian hmwn eiv ouv ta telh twn aiwnwn kathnthken
10.12: wste o dokwn estanai blepetw mh pesh
10.13: peirasmov umav ouk eilhfen ei mh anyrwpinov pistov de o yeov ov ouk easei umav peirasyhnai uper o dunasye alla poihsei sun tw peirasmw kai thn ekbasin tou dunasyai upenegkein
10.14: dioper agaphtoi mou feugete apo thv eidwlolatriav
10.15: wv fronimoiv legw krinate umeiv o fhmi
10.16: to pothrion thv eulogiav o eulogoumen ouci koinwnia estin tou aimatov tou cristou ton arton on klwmen ouci koinwnia tou swmatov tou cristou estin
10.17: oti eiv artov en swma oi polloi esmen oi gar pantev ek tou enov artou metecomen
10.18: blepete ton israhl kata sarka ouc oi esyiontev tav yusiav koinwnoi tou yusiasthriou eisin
10.19: ti oun fhmi oti eidwloyuton ti estin h oti eidwlon ti estin
10.20: all oti a yuousin [ta eynh] daimonioiv kai ou yew yuousin ou yelw de umav koinwnouv twn daimoniwn ginesyai
10.21: ou dunasye pothrion kuriou pinein kai pothrion daimoniwn ou dunasye trapezhv kuriou metecein kai trapezhv daimoniwn
10.22: h parazhloumen ton kurion mh iscuroteroi autou esmen
10.23: panta exestin all ou panta sumferei panta exestin all ou panta oikodomei
10.24: mhdeiv to eautou zhteitw alla to tou eterou
10.25: pan to en makellw pwloumenon esyiete mhden anakrinontev dia thn suneidhsin
10.26: tou kuriou gar h gh kai to plhrwma authv
10.27: ei tiv kalei umav twn apistwn kai yelete poreuesyai pan to paratiyemenon umin esyiete mhden anakrinontev dia thn suneidhsin
10.28: ean de tiv umin eiph touto ieroyuton estin mh esyiete di ekeinon ton mhnusanta kai thn suneidhsin
10.29: suneidhsin de legw ouci thn eautou alla thn tou eterou ina ti gar h eleuyeria mou krinetai upo allhv suneidhsewv
10.30: ei egw cariti metecw ti blasfhmoumai uper ou egw eucaristw
10.31: eite oun esyiete eite pinete eite ti poieite panta eiv doxan yeou poieite
10.32: aproskopoi kai ioudaioiv ginesye kai ellhsin kai th ekklhsia tou yeou
10.33: kaywv kagw panta pasin areskw mh zhtwn to emautou sumforon alla to twn pollwn ina swywsin

11.1: mimhtai mou ginesye kaywv kagw cristou
11.2: epainw de umav oti panta mou memnhsye kai kaywv paredwka umin tav paradoseiv katecete
11.3: yelw de umav eidenai oti pantov androv h kefalh o cristov estin kefalh de gunaikov o anhr kefalh de tou cristou o yeov
11.4: pav anhr proseucomenov h profhteuwn kata kefalhv ecwn kataiscunei thn kefalhn autou
11.5: pasa de gunh proseucomenh h profhteuousa akatakaluptw th kefalh kataiscunei thn kefalhn authv en gar estin kai to auto th exurhmenh
11.6: ei gar ou katakaluptetai gunh kai keirasyw ei de aiscron gunaiki to keirasyai h xurasyai katakaluptesyw
11.7: anhr men gar ouk ofeilei katakaluptesyai thn kefalhn eikwn kai doxa yeou uparcwn h gunh de doxa androv estin
11.8: ou gar estin anhr ek gunaikov alla gunh ex androv
11.9: kai gar ouk ektisyh anhr dia thn gunaika alla gunh dia ton andra
11.10: dia touto ofeilei h gunh exousian ecein epi thv kefalhv dia touv aggelouv
11.11: plhn oute gunh cwriv androv oute anhr cwriv gunaikov en kuriw
11.12: wsper gar h gunh ek tou androv outwv kai o anhr dia thv gunaikov ta de panta ek tou yeou
11.13: en umin autoiv krinate prepon estin gunaika akatakalupton tw yew proseucesyai
11.14: oude h fusiv auth didaskei umav oti anhr men ean koma atimia autw estin
11.15: gunh de ean koma doxa auth estin oti h komh anti peribolaiou dedotai auth
11.16: ei de tiv dokei filoneikov einai hmeiv toiauthn sunhyeian ouk ecomen oude ai ekklhsiai tou yeou
11.17: touto de paraggellwn ouk epainw oti ouk eiv to kreisson alla eiv to hsson sunercesye
11.18: prwton men gar sunercomenwn umwn en ekklhsia akouw scismata en umin uparcein kai merov ti pisteuw
11.19: dei gar kai aireseiv en umin einai ina [kai] oi dokimoi faneroi genwntai en umin
11.20: sunercomenwn oun umwn epi to auto ouk estin kuriakon deipnon fagein
11.21: ekastov gar to idion deipnon prolambanei en tw fagein kai ov men peina ov de meyuei
11.22: mh gar oikiav ouk ecete eiv to esyiein kai pinein h thv ekklhsiav tou yeou katafroneite kai kataiscunete touv mh econtav ti eipw umin epainesw umav en toutw ouk epainw
11.23: egw gar parelabon apo tou kuriou o kai paredwka umin oti o kuriov ihsouv en th nukti h paredideto elaben arton
11.24: kai eucaristhsav eklasen kai eipen touto mou estin to swma to uper umwn touto poieite eiv thn emhn anamnhsin
11.25: wsautwv kai to pothrion meta to deipnhsai legwn touto to pothrion h kainh diayhkh estin en tw emw aimati touto poieite osakiv ean pinhte eiv thn emhn anamnhsin
11.26: osakiv gar ean esyihte ton arton touton kai to pothrion pinhte ton yanaton tou kuriou kataggellete acriv ou elyh
11.27: wste ov an esyih ton arton h pinh to pothrion tou kuriou anaxiwv enocov estai tou swmatov kai tou aimatov tou kuriou
11.28: dokimazetw de anyrwpov eauton kai outwv ek tou artou esyietw kai ek tou pothriou pinetw
11.29: o gar esyiwn kai pinwn krima eautw esyiei kai pinei mh diakrinwn to swma
11.30: dia touto en umin polloi asyeneiv kai arrwstoi kai koimwntai ikanoi
11.31: ei de eautouv diekrinomen ouk an ekrinomeya
11.32: krinomenoi de upo tou kuriou paideuomeya ina mh sun tw kosmw katakriywmen
11.33: wste adelfoi mou sunercomenoi eiv to fagein allhlouv ekdecesye
11.34: ei tiv peina en oikw esyietw ina mh eiv krima sunerchsye ta de loipa wv an elyw diataxomai

12.1: peri de twn pneumatikwn adelfoi ou yelw umav agnoein
12.2: oidate oti ote eynh hte prov ta eidwla ta afwna wv an hgesye apagomenoi
12.3: dio gnwrizw umin oti oudeiv en pneumati yeou lalwn legei anayema ihsouv kai oudeiv dunatai eipein kuriov ihsouv ei mh en pneumati agiw
12.4: diaireseiv de carismatwn eisin to de auto pneuma
12.5: kai diaireseiv diakoniwn eisin kai o autov kuriov
12.6: kai diaireseiv energhmatwn eisin kai o autov yeov o energwn ta panta en pasin
12.7: ekastw de didotai h fanerwsiv tou pneumatov prov to sumferon
12.8: w men gar dia tou pneumatov didotai logov sofiav allw de logov gnwsewv kata to auto pneuma
12.9: eterw pistiv en tw autw pneumati allw de carismata iamatwn en tw eni pneumati
12.10: allw de energhmata dunamewn allw [de] profhteia allw [de] diakriseiv pneumatwn eterw genh glwsswn allw de ermhneia glwsswn
12.11: panta de tauta energei to en kai to auto pneuma diairoun idia ekastw kaywv bouletai
12.12: kayaper gar to swma en estin kai melh polla ecei panta de ta melh tou swmatov polla onta en estin swma outwv kai o cristov
12.13: kai gar en eni pneumati hmeiv pantev eiv en swma ebaptisyhmen eite ioudaioi eite ellhnev eite douloi eite eleuyeroi kai pantev en pneuma epotisyhmen
12.14: kai gar to swma ouk estin en melov alla polla
12.15: ean eiph o pouv oti ouk eimi ceir ouk eimi ek tou swmatov ou para touto ouk estin ek tou swmatov
12.16: kai ean eiph to ouv oti ouk eimi ofyalmov ouk eimi ek tou swmatov ou para touto ouk estin ek tou swmatov
12.17: ei olon to swma ofyalmov pou h akoh ei olon akoh pou h osfrhsiv
12.18: nun de o yeov eyeto ta melh en ekaston autwn en tw swmati kaywv hyelhsen
12.19: ei de hn [ta] panta en melov pou to swma
12.20: nun de polla melh en de swma
12.21: ou dunatai [de] o ofyalmov eipein th ceiri creian sou ouk ecw h palin h kefalh toiv posin creian umwn ouk ecw
12.22: alla pollw mallon ta dokounta melh tou swmatov asyenestera uparcein anagkaia estin
12.23: kai a dokoumen atimotera einai tou swmatov toutoiv timhn perissoteran peritiyemen kai ta aschmona hmwn euschmosunhn perissoteran ecei
12.24: ta de euschmona hmwn ou creian ecei alla o yeov sunekerasen to swma tw usteroumenw perissoteran douv timhn
12.25: ina mh h scisma en tw swmati alla to auto uper allhlwn merimnwsin ta melh
12.26: kai eite pascei en melov sumpascei panta ta melh eite doxazetai melov sugcairei panta ta melh
12.27: umeiv de este swma cristou kai melh ek merouv
12.28: kai ouv men eyeto o yeov en th ekklhsia prwton apostolouv deuteron profhtav triton didaskalouv epeita dunameiv epeita carismata iamatwn antilhmqeiv kubernhseiv genh glwsswn
12.29: mh pantev apostoloi mh pantev profhtai mh pantev didaskaloi mh pantev dunameiv
12.30: mh pantev carismata ecousin iamatwn mh pantev glwssaiv lalousin mh pantev diermhneuousin
12.31: zhloute de ta carismata ta meizona kai eti kay uperbolhn odon umin deiknumi

13.1: ean taiv glwssaiv twn anyrwpwn lalw kai twn aggelwn agaphn de mh ecw gegona calkov hcwn h kumbalon alalazon
13.2: kan ecw profhteian kai eidw ta musthria panta kai pasan thn gnwsin kan ecw pasan thn pistin wste orh meyistanein agaphn de mh ecw ouyen eimi
13.3: kan qwmisw panta ta uparconta mou kan paradw to swma mou ina kauchswmai agaphn de mh ecw ouden wfeloumai
13.4: h agaph makroyumei crhsteuetai h agaph ou zhloi ou perpereuetai ou fusioutai
13.5: ouk aschmonei ou zhtei ta eauthv ou paroxunetai ou logizetai to kakon
13.6: ou cairei epi th adikia sugcairei de th alhyeia
13.7: panta stegei panta pisteuei panta elpizei panta upomenei
13.8: h agaph oudepote piptei eite de profhteiai katarghyhsontai eite glwssai pausontai eite gnwsiv katarghyhsetai
13.9: ek merouv gar ginwskomen kai ek merouv profhteuomen
13.10: otan de elyh to teleion to ek merouv katarghyhsetai
13.11: ote hmhn nhpiov elaloun wv nhpiov efronoun wv nhpiov elogizomhn wv nhpiov ote gegona anhr kathrghka ta tou nhpiou
13.12: blepomen gar arti di esoptrou en ainigmati tote de proswpon prov proswpon arti ginwskw ek merouv tote de epignwsomai kaywv kai epegnwsyhn
13.13: nuni de menei pistiv elpiv agaph ta tria tauta meizwn de toutwn h agaph

14.1: diwkete thn agaphn zhloute de ta pneumatika mallon de ina profhteuhte
14.2: o gar lalwn glwssh ouk anyrwpoiv lalei alla yew oudeiv gar akouei pneumati de lalei musthria
14.3: o de profhteuwn anyrwpoiv lalei oikodomhn kai paraklhsin kai paramuyian
14.4: o lalwn glwssh eauton oikodomei o de profhteuwn ekklhsian oikodomei
14.5: yelw de pantav umav lalein glwssaiv mallon de ina profhteuhte meizwn de o profhteuwn h o lalwn glwssaiv ektov ei mh diermhneuh ina h ekklhsia oikodomhn labh
14.6: nun de adelfoi ean elyw prov umav glwssaiv lalwn ti umav wfelhsw ean mh umin lalhsw h en apokaluqei h en gnwsei h en profhteia h en didach
14.7: omwv ta aquca fwnhn didonta eite aulov eite kiyara ean diastolhn toiv fyoggoiv mh dw pwv gnwsyhsetai to auloumenon h to kiyarizomenon
14.8: kai gar ean adhlon salpigx fwnhn dw tiv paraskeuasetai eiv polemon
14.9: outwv kai umeiv dia thv glwsshv ean mh eushmon logon dwte pwv gnwsyhsetai to laloumenon esesye gar eiv aera lalountev
14.10: tosauta ei tucoi genh fwnwn eisin en kosmw kai ouden afwnon
14.11: ean oun mh eidw thn dunamin thv fwnhv esomai tw lalounti barbarov kai o lalwn en emoi barbarov
14.12: outwv kai umeiv epei zhlwtai este pneumatwn prov thn oikodomhn thv ekklhsiav zhteite ina perisseuhte
14.13: dio o lalwn glwssh proseucesyw ina diermhneuh
14.14: ean [gar] proseucwmai glwssh to pneuma mou proseucetai o de nouv mou akarpov estin
14.15: ti oun estin proseuxomai tw pneumati proseuxomai de kai tw noi qalw tw pneumati qalw [de] kai tw noi
14.16: epei ean euloghv [en] pneumati o anaplhrwn ton topon tou idiwtou pwv erei to amhn epi th sh eucaristia epeidh ti legeiv ouk oiden
14.17: su men gar kalwv eucaristeiv all o eterov ouk oikodomeitai
14.18: eucaristw tw yew pantwn umwn mallon glwssaiv lalw
14.19: alla en ekklhsia yelw pente logouv tw noi mou lalhsai ina kai allouv kathchsw h muriouv logouv en glwssh
14.20: adelfoi mh paidia ginesye taiv fresin alla th kakia nhpiazete taiv de fresin teleioi ginesye
14.21: en tw nomw gegraptai oti en eteroglwssoiv kai en ceilesin eterwn lalhsw tw law toutw kai oud outwv eisakousontai mou legei kuriov
14.22: wste ai glwssai eiv shmeion eisin ou toiv pisteuousin alla toiv apistoiv h de profhteia ou toiv apistoiv alla toiv pisteuousin
14.23: ean oun sunelyh h ekklhsia olh epi to auto kai pantev lalwsin glwssaiv eiselywsin de idiwtai h apistoi ouk erousin oti mainesye
14.24: ean de pantev profhteuwsin eiselyh de tiv apistov h idiwthv elegcetai upo pantwn anakrinetai upo pantwn
14.25: ta krupta thv kardiav autou fanera ginetai kai outwv peswn epi proswpon proskunhsei tw yew apaggellwn oti ontwv o yeov en umin estin
14.26: ti oun estin adelfoi otan sunerchsye ekastov qalmon ecei didachn ecei apokaluqin ecei glwssan ecei ermhneian ecei panta prov oikodomhn ginesyw
14.27: eite glwssh tiv lalei kata duo h to pleiston treiv kai ana merov kai eiv diermhneuetw
14.28: ean de mh h diermhneuthv sigatw en ekklhsia eautw de laleitw kai tw yew
14.29: profhtai de duo h treiv laleitwsan kai oi alloi diakrinetwsan
14.30: ean de allw apokalufyh kayhmenw o prwtov sigatw
14.31: dunasye gar kay ena pantev profhteuein ina pantev manyanwsin kai pantev parakalwntai
14.33: ou gar estin akatastasiav o yeov alla eirhnhv wv en pasaiv taiv ekklhsiaiv twn agiwn
14.34: ai gunaikev en taiv ekklhsiaiv sigatwsan ou gar epitrepetai autaiv lalein alla upotassesywsan kaywv kai o nomov legei
14.35: ei de ti manyanein yelousin en oikw touv idiouv andrav eperwtatwsan aiscron gar estin gunaiki lalein en ekklhsia
14.36: h af umwn o logov tou yeou exhlyen h eiv umav monouv kathnthsen
14.37: ei tiv dokei profhthv einai h pneumatikov epiginwsketw a grafw umin oti kuriou estin entolh
14.39: wste adelfoi mou zhloute to profhteuein kai to lalein mh kwluete glwssaiv
14.40: panta de euschmonwv kai kata taxin ginesyw

15.1: gnwrizw de umin adelfoi to euaggelion o euhggelisamhn umin o kai parelabete en w kai esthkate
15.2: di ou kai swzesye tini logw euhggelisamhn umin ei katecete ektov ei mh eikh episteusate
15.3: paredwka gar umin en prwtoiv o kai parelabon oti cristov apeyanen uper twn amartiwn hmwn kata tav grafav
15.4: kai oti etafh kai oti eghgertai th hmera th trith kata tav grafav
15.5: kai oti wfyh khfa eita toiv dwdeka
15.6: epeita wfyh epanw pentakosioiv adelfoiv efapax ex wn oi pleionev menousin ewv arti tinev de ekoimhyhsan
15.7: epeita wfyh iakwbw eita toiv apostoloiv pasin
15.8: escaton de pantwn wsperei tw ektrwmati wfyh kamoi
15.9: egw gar eimi o elacistov twn apostolwn ov ouk eimi ikanov kaleisyai apostolov dioti ediwxa thn ekklhsian tou yeou
15.10: cariti de yeou eimi o eimi kai h cariv autou h eiv eme ou kenh egenhyh alla perissoteron autwn pantwn ekopiasa ouk egw de alla h cariv tou yeou sun emoi
15.11: eite oun egw eite ekeinoi outwv khrussomen kai outwv episteusate
15.12: ei de cristov khrussetai oti ek nekrwn eghgertai pwv legousin en umin tinev oti anastasiv nekrwn ouk estin
15.13: ei de anastasiv nekrwn ouk estin oude cristov eghgertai
15.14: ei de cristov ouk eghgertai kenon ara to khrugma hmwn kenh kai h pistiv hmwn
15.15: euriskomeya de kai qeudomarturev tou yeou oti emarturhsamen kata tou yeou oti hgeiren ton criston on ouk hgeiren eiper ara nekroi ouk egeirontai
15.16: ei gar nekroi ouk egeirontai oude cristov eghgertai
15.17: ei de cristov ouk eghgertai mataia h pistiv umwn [estin] eti este en taiv amartiaiv umwn
15.18: ara kai oi koimhyentev en cristw apwlonto
15.19: ei en th zwh tauth en cristw hlpikotev esmen monon eleeinoteroi pantwn anyrwpwn esmen
15.20: nuni de cristov eghgertai ek nekrwn aparch twn kekoimhmenwn
15.21: epeidh gar di anyrwpou yanatov kai di anyrwpou anastasiv nekrwn
15.22: wsper gar en tw adam pantev apoynhskousin outwv kai en tw cristw pantev zwopoihyhsontai
15.23: ekastov de en tw idiw tagmati aparch cristov epeita oi tou cristou en th parousia autou
15.24: eita to telov otan paradidw thn basileian tw yew kai patri otan katarghsh pasan archn kai pasan exousian kai dunamin
15.25: dei gar auton basileuein acriv ou yh pantav touv ecyrouv upo touv podav autou
15.27: panta gar upetaxen upo touv podav autou otan de eiph oti panta upotetaktai dhlon oti ektov tou upotaxantov autw ta panta
15.28: otan de upotagh autw ta panta tote [kai] autov o uiov upotaghsetai tw upotaxanti autw ta panta ina h o yeov panta en pasin
15.29: epei ti poihsousin oi baptizomenoi uper twn nekrwn ei olwv nekroi ouk egeirontai ti kai baptizontai uper autwn
15.30: ti kai hmeiv kinduneuomen pasan wran
15.31: kay hmeran apoynhskw nh thn umeteran kauchsin adelfoi hn ecw en cristw ihsou tw kuriw hmwn
15.32: ei kata anyrwpon eyhriomachsa en efesw ti moi to ofelov ei nekroi ouk egeirontai fagwmen kai piwmen aurion gar apoynhskomen
15.33: mh planasye fyeirousin hyh crhsta omiliai kakai
15.34: eknhqate dikaiwv kai mh amartanete agnwsian gar yeou tinev ecousin prov entrophn umin lalw
15.35: alla erei tiv pwv egeirontai oi nekroi poiw de swmati ercontai
15.36: afrwn su o speireiv ou zwopoieitai ean mh apoyanh
15.37: kai o speireiv ou to swma to genhsomenon speireiv alla gumnon kokkon ei tucoi sitou h tinov twn loipwn
15.38: o de yeov didwsin autw swma kaywv hyelhsen kai ekastw twn spermatwn idion swma
15.39: ou pasa sarx h auth sarx alla allh men anyrwpwn allh de sarx kthnwn allh de sarx pthnwn allh de icyuwn
15.40: kai swmata epourania kai swmata epigeia alla etera men h twn epouraniwn doxa etera de h twn epigeiwn
15.41: allh doxa hliou kai allh doxa selhnhv kai allh doxa asterwn asthr gar asterov diaferei en doxh
15.42: outwv kai h anastasiv twn nekrwn speiretai en fyora egeiretai en afyarsia
15.43: speiretai en atimia egeiretai en doxh speiretai en asyeneia egeiretai en dunamei
15.44: speiretai swma qucikon egeiretai swma pneumatikon ei estin swma qucikon estin kai pneumatikon
15.45: outwv kai gegraptai egeneto o prwtov anyrwpov adam eiv quchn zwsan o escatov adam eiv pneuma zwopoioun
15.46: all ou prwton to pneumatikon alla to qucikon epeita to pneumatikon
15.47: o prwtov anyrwpov ek ghv coikov o deuterov anyrwpov ex ouranou
15.48: oiov o coikov toioutoi kai oi coikoi kai oiov o epouraniov toioutoi kai oi epouranioi
15.49: kai kaywv eforesamen thn eikona tou coikou foreswmen kai thn eikona tou epouraniou
15.50: touto de fhmi adelfoi oti sarx kai aima basileian yeou klhronomhsai ou dunatai oude h fyora thn afyarsian klhronomei
15.51: idou musthrion umin legw pantev ou koimhyhsomeya pantev de allaghsomeya
15.52: en atomw en riph ofyalmou en th escath salpiggi salpisei gar kai oi nekroi egeryhsontai afyartoi kai hmeiv allaghsomeya
15.53: dei gar to fyarton touto endusasyai afyarsian kai to ynhton touto endusasyai ayanasian
15.54: otan de to ynhton touto endushtai [thn] ayanasian tote genhsetai o logov o gegrammenov katepoyh o yanatov eiv nikov
15.55: pou sou yanate to nikov pou sou yanate to kentron
15.56: to de kentron tou yanatou h amartia h de dunamiv thv amartiav o nomov
15.57: tw de yew cariv tw didonti hmin to nikov dia tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou
15.58: wste adelfoi mou agaphtoi edraioi ginesye ametakinhtoi perisseuontev en tw ergw tou kuriou pantote eidotev oti o kopov umwn ouk estin kenov en kuriw

16.1: peri de thv logiav thv eiv touv agiouv wsper dietaxa taiv ekklhsiaiv thv galatiav outwv kai umeiv poihsate
16.2: kata mian sabbatou ekastov umwn par eautw tiyetw yhsaurizwn o ti ean euodwtai ina mh otan elyw tote logiai ginwntai
16.3: otan de paragenwmai ouv ean dokimashte di epistolwn toutouv pemqw apenegkein thn carin umwn eiv ierousalhm
16.4: ean de axion h tou kame poreuesyai sun emoi poreusontai
16.5: eleusomai de prov umav otan makedonian dielyw makedonian gar diercomai
16.6: prov umav de tucon katamenw h paraceimasw ina umeiv me propemqhte ou ean poreuwmai
16.7: ou yelw gar umav arti en parodw idein elpizw gar cronon tina epimeinai prov umav ean o kuriov epitreqh
16.8: epimenw de en efesw ewv thv penthkosthv
16.9: yura gar moi anewgen megalh kai energhv kai antikeimenoi polloi
16.10: ean de elyh timoyeov blepete ina afobwv genhtai prov umav to gar ergon kuriou ergazetai wv egw
16.11: mh tiv oun auton exouyenhsh propemqate de auton en eirhnh ina elyh prov me ekdecomai gar auton meta twn adelfwn
16.12: peri de apollw tou adelfou polla parekalesa auton ina elyh prov umav meta twn adelfwn kai pantwv ouk hn yelhma ina nun elyh eleusetai de otan eukairhsh
16.13: grhgoreite sthkete en th pistei andrizesye krataiousye
16.15: parakalw de umav adelfoi oidate thn oikian stefana oti estin aparch thv acaiav kai eiv diakonian toiv agioiv etaxan eautouv
16.16: ina kai umeiv upotasshsye toiv toioutoiv kai panti tw sunergounti kai kopiwnti
16.17: cairw de epi th parousia stefana kai fortounatou kai acaikou oti to umeteron usterhma outoi aneplhrwsan
16.18: anepausan gar to emon pneuma kai to umwn epiginwskete oun touv toioutouv
16.19: aspazontai umav ai ekklhsiai thv asiav aspazetai umav en kuriw polla akulav kai priska sun th kat oikon autwn ekklhsia
16.20: aspazontai umav oi adelfoi pantev aspasasye allhlouv en filhmati agiw
16.21: o aspasmov th emh ceiri paulou
16.22: ei tiv ou filei ton kurion htw anayema maran aya
16.23: h cariv tou kuriou ihsou mey umwn
16.24: h agaph mou meta pantwn umwn en cristw ihsou

1.1: o hn ap archv o akhkoamen o ewrakamen toiv ofyalmoiv hmwn o eyeasameya kai ai ceirev hmwn eqhlafhsan peri tou logou thv zwhv
1.2: kai h zwh efanerwyh kai ewrakamen kai marturoumen kai apaggellomen umin thn zwhn thn aiwnion htiv hn prov ton patera kai efanerwyh hmin
1.3: o ewrakamen kai akhkoamen apaggellomen kai umin ina kai umeiv koinwnian echte mey hmwn kai h koinwnia de h hmetera meta tou patrov kai meta tou uiou autou ihsou cristou
1.4: kai tauta grafomen hmeiv ina h cara hmwn h peplhrwmenh
1.5: kai estin auth h aggelia hn akhkoamen ap autou kai anaggellomen umin oti o yeov fwv estin kai skotia ouk estin en autw oudemia
1.6: ean eipwmen oti koinwnian ecomen met autou kai en tw skotei peripatwmen qeudomeya kai ou poioumen thn alhyeian
1.7: ean de en tw fwti peripatwmen wv autov estin en tw fwti koinwnian ecomen met allhlwn kai to aima ihsou tou uiou autou kayarizei hmav apo pashv amartiav
1.8: ean eipwmen oti amartian ouk ecomen eautouv planwmen kai h alhyeia ouk estin en hmin
1.9: ean omologwmen tav amartiav hmwn pistov estin kai dikaiov ina afh hmin tav amartiav kai kayarish hmav apo pashv adikiav
1.10: ean eipwmen oti ouc hmarthkamen qeusthn poioumen auton kai o logov autou ouk estin en hmin

2.1: teknia mou tauta grafw umin ina mh amarthte kai ean tiv amarth paraklhton ecomen prov ton patera ihsoun criston dikaion
2.2: kai autov ilasmov estin peri twn amartiwn hmwn ou peri twn hmeterwn de monon alla kai peri olou tou kosmou
2.3: kai en toutw ginwskomen oti egnwkamen auton ean tav entolav autou thrwmen
2.4: o legwn oti egnwka auton kai tav entolav autou mh thrwn qeusthv estin kai en toutw h alhyeia ouk estin
2.5: ov d an thrh autou ton logon alhywv en toutw h agaph tou yeou teteleiwtai en toutw ginwskomen oti en autw esmen
2.6: o legwn en autw menein ofeilei kaywv ekeinov periepathsen kai autov peripatein
2.7: agaphtoi ouk entolhn kainhn grafw umin all entolhn palaian hn eicete ap archv h entolh h palaia estin o logov on hkousate
2.8: palin entolhn kainhn grafw umin o estin alhyev en autw kai en umin oti h skotia paragetai kai to fwv to alhyinon hdh fainei
2.9: o legwn en tw fwti einai kai ton adelfon autou miswn en th skotia estin ewv arti
2.10: o agapwn ton adelfon autou en tw fwti menei kai skandalon en autw ouk estin
2.11: o de miswn ton adelfon autou en th skotia estin kai en th skotia peripatei kai ouk oiden pou upagei oti h skotia etuflwsen touv ofyalmouv autou
2.12: grafw umin teknia oti afewntai umin ai amartiai dia to onoma autou
2.13: grafw umin paterev oti egnwkate ton ap archv grafw umin neaniskoi oti nenikhkate ton ponhron egraqa umin paidia oti egnwkate ton patera
2.14: egraqa umin paterev oti egnwkate ton ap archv egraqa umin neaniskoi oti iscuroi este kai o logov [tou yeou] en umin menei kai nenikhkate ton ponhron
2.15: mh agapate ton kosmon mhde ta en tw kosmw ean tiv agapa ton kosmon ouk estin h agaph tou patrov en autw
2.16: oti pan to en tw kosmw h epiyumia thv sarkov kai h epiyumia twn ofyalmwn kai h alazoneia tou biou ouk estin ek tou patrov alla ek tou kosmou estin
2.17: kai o kosmov paragetai kai h epiyumia [autou] o de poiwn to yelhma tou yeou menei eiv ton aiwna
2.18: paidia escath wra estin kai kaywv hkousate oti anticristov ercetai kai nun anticristoi polloi gegonasin oyen ginwskomen oti escath wra estin
2.19: ex hmwn exhlyan all ouk hsan ex hmwn ei gar ex hmwn hsan memenhkeisan an mey hmwn all ina fanerwywsin oti ouk eisin pantev ex hmwn
2.20: kai umeiv crisma ecete apo tou agiou oidate pantev
2.21: ouk egraqa umin oti ouk oidate thn alhyeian all oti oidate authn kai oti pan qeudov ek thv alhyeiav ouk estin
2.22: tiv estin o qeusthv ei mh o arnoumenov oti ihsouv ouk estin o cristov outov estin o anticristov o arnoumenov ton patera kai ton uion
2.23: pav o arnoumenov ton uion oude ton patera ecei o omologwn ton uion kai ton patera ecei
2.24: umeiv o hkousate ap archv en umin menetw ean en umin meinh o ap archv hkousate kai umeiv en tw uiw kai [en] tw patri meneite
2.25: kai auth estin h epaggelia hn autov ephggeilato hmin thn zwhn thn aiwnion
2.26: tauta egraqa umin peri twn planwntwn umav
2.27: kai umeiv to crisma o elabete ap autou menei en umin kai ou creian ecete ina tiv didaskh umav all wv to autou crisma didaskei umav peri pantwn kai alhyev estin kai ouk estin qeudov kai kaywv edidaxen umav menete en autw
2.28: kai nun teknia menete en autw ina ean fanerwyh scwmen parrhsian kai mh aiscunywmen ap autou en th parousia autou
2.29: ean eidhte oti dikaiov estin ginwskete oti pav o poiwn thn dikaiosunhn ex autou gegennhtai

3.1: idete potaphn agaphn dedwken hmin o pathr ina tekna yeou klhywmen kai esmen dia touto o kosmov ou ginwskei hmav oti ouk egnw auton
3.2: agaphtoi nun tekna yeou esmen kai oupw efanerwyh ti esomeya oidamen oti ean fanerwyh omoioi autw esomeya oti oqomeya auton kaywv estin
3.3: kai pav o ecwn thn elpida tauthn ep autw agnizei eauton kaywv ekeinov agnov estin
3.4: pav o poiwn thn amartian kai thn anomian poiei kai h amartia estin h anomia
3.5: kai oidate oti ekeinov efanerwyh ina tav amartiav arh kai amartia en autw ouk estin
3.6: pav o en autw menwn ouc amartanei pav o amartanwn ouc ewraken auton oude egnwken auton
3.7: teknia mhdeiv planatw umav o poiwn thn dikaiosunhn dikaiov estin kaywv ekeinov dikaiov estin
3.8: o poiwn thn amartian ek tou diabolou estin oti ap archv o diabolov amartanei eiv touto efanerwyh o uiov tou yeou ina lush ta erga tou diabolou
3.9: pav o gegennhmenov ek tou yeou amartian ou poiei oti sperma autou en autw menei kai ou dunatai amartanein oti ek tou yeou gegennhtai
3.10: en toutw fanera estin ta tekna tou yeou kai ta tekna tou diabolou pav o mh poiwn dikaiosunhn ouk estin ek tou yeou kai o mh agapwn ton adelfon autou
3.11: oti auth estin h aggelia hn hkousate ap archv ina agapwmen allhlouv
3.12: ou kaywv kain ek tou ponhrou hn kai esfaxen ton adelfon autou kai carin tinov esfaxen auton oti ta erga autou ponhra hn ta de tou adelfou autou dikaia
3.13: mh yaumazete adelfoi ei misei umav o kosmov
3.14: hmeiv oidamen oti metabebhkamen ek tou yanatou eiv thn zwhn oti agapwmen touv adelfouv o mh agapwn menei en tw yanatw
3.15: pav o miswn ton adelfon autou anyrwpoktonov estin kai oidate oti pav anyrwpoktonov ouk ecei zwhn aiwnion en autw menousan
3.16: en toutw egnwkamen thn agaphn oti ekeinov uper hmwn thn quchn autou eyhken kai hmeiv ofeilomen uper twn adelfwn tav qucav yeinai
3.17: ov d an ech ton bion tou kosmou kai yewrh ton adelfon autou creian econta kai kleish ta splagcna autou ap autou pwv h agaph tou yeou menei en autw
3.18: teknia mh agapwmen logw mhde th glwssh alla en ergw kai alhyeia
3.19: en toutw gnwsomeya oti ek thv alhyeiav esmen kai emprosyen autou peisomen thn kardian hmwn
3.20: oti ean kataginwskh hmwn h kardia oti meizwn estin o yeov thv kardiav hmwn kai ginwskei panta
3.21: agaphtoi ean h kardia mh kataginwskh parrhsian ecomen prov ton yeon
3.22: kai o an aitwmen lambanomen ap autou oti tav entolav autou throumen kai ta aresta enwpion autou poioumen
3.23: kai auth estin h entolh autou ina pisteuswmen tw onomati tou uiou autou ihsou cristou kai agapwmen allhlouv kaywv edwken entolhn hmin
3.24: kai o thrwn tav entolav autou en autw menei kai autov en autw kai en toutw ginwskomen oti menei en hmin ek tou pneumatov ou hmin edwken

4.1: agaphtoi mh panti pneumati pisteuete alla dokimazete ta pneumata ei ek tou yeou estin oti polloi qeudoprofhtai exelhluyasin eiv ton kosmon
4.2: en toutw ginwskete to pneuma tou yeou pan pneuma o omologei ihsoun criston en sarki elhluyota ek tou yeou estin
4.3: kai pan pneuma o mh omologei ton ihsoun ek tou yeou ouk estin kai touto estin to tou anticristou o akhkoate oti ercetai kai nun en tw kosmw estin hdh
4.4: umeiv ek tou yeou este teknia kai nenikhkate autouv oti meizwn estin o en umin h o en tw kosmw
4.5: autoi ek tou kosmou eisin dia touto ek tou kosmou lalousin kai o kosmov autwn akouei
4.6: hmeiv ek tou yeou esmen o ginwskwn ton yeon akouei hmwn ov ouk estin ek tou yeou ouk akouei hmwn ek toutou ginwskomen to pneuma thv alhyeiav kai to pneuma thv planhv
4.7: agaphtoi agapwmen allhlouv oti h agaph ek tou yeou estin kai pav o agapwn ek tou yeou gegennhtai kai ginwskei ton yeon
4.8: o mh agapwn ouk egnw ton yeon oti o yeov agaph estin
4.9: en toutw efanerwyh h agaph tou yeou en hmin oti ton uion autou ton monogenh apestalken o yeov eiv ton kosmon ina zhswmen di autou
4.10: en toutw estin h agaph ouc oti hmeiv hgaphkamen ton yeon all oti autov hgaphsen hmav kai apesteilen ton uion autou ilasmon peri twn amartiwn hmwn
4.11: agaphtoi ei outwv o yeov hgaphsen hmav kai hmeiv ofeilomen allhlouv agapan
4.12: yeon oudeiv pwpote teyeatai ean agapwmen allhlouv o yeov en hmin menei kai h agaph autou teteleiwmenh en hmin estin
4.13: en toutw ginwskomen oti en autw menomen kai autov en hmin oti ek tou pneumatov autou dedwken hmin
4.14: kai hmeiv teyeameya kai marturoumen oti o pathr apestalken ton uion swthra tou kosmou
4.15: ov ean omologhsh oti ihsouv [cristov] estin o uiov tou yeou o yeov en autw menei kai autov en tw yew
4.16: kai hmeiv egnwkamen kai pepisteukamen thn agaphn hn ecei o yeov en hmin o yeov agaph estin kai o menwn en th agaph en tw yew menei kai o yeov en autw [menei]
4.17: en toutw teteleiwtai h agaph mey hmwn ina parrhsian ecwmen en th hmera thv krisewv oti kaywv ekeinov estin kai hmeiv esmen en tw kosmw toutw
4.18: fobov ouk estin en th agaph all h teleia agaph exw ballei ton fobon oti o fobov kolasin ecei o de foboumenov ou teteleiwtai en th agaph
4.19: hmeiv agapwmen oti autov prwtov hgaphsen hmav
4.20: ean tiv eiph oti agapw ton yeon kai ton adelfon autou mish qeusthv estin o gar mh agapwn ton adelfon autou on ewraken ton yeon on ouc ewraken ou dunatai agapan
4.21: kai tauthn thn entolhn ecomen ap autou ina o agapwn ton yeon agapa kai ton adelfon autou

5.1: pav o pisteuwn oti ihsouv estin o cristov ek tou yeou gegennhtai kai pav o agapwn ton gennhsanta agapa ton gegennhmenon ex autou
5.2: en toutw ginwskomen oti agapwmen ta tekna tou yeou otan ton yeon agapwmen kai tav entolav autou poiwmen
5.3: auth gar estin h agaph tou yeou ina tav entolav autou thrwmen kai ai entolai autou bareiai ouk eisin
5.4: oti pan to gegennhmenon ek tou yeou nika ton kosmon kai auth estin h nikh h nikhsasa ton kosmon h pistiv hmwn
5.5: tiv estin [de] o nikwn ton kosmon ei mh o pisteuwn oti ihsouv estin o uiov tou yeou
5.6: outov estin o elywn di udatov kai aimatov ihsouv cristov ouk en tw udati monon all en tw udati kai en tw aimati kai to pneuma estin to marturoun oti to pneuma estin h alhyeia
5.8: to pneuma kai to udwr kai to aima kai oi treiv eiv to en eisin
5.9: ei thn marturian twn anyrwpwn lambanomen h marturia tou yeou meizwn estin oti auth estin h marturia tou yeou oti memarturhken peri tou uiou autou
5.10: o pisteuwn eiv ton uion tou yeou ecei thn marturian en autw o mh pisteuwn tw yew qeusthn pepoihken auton oti ou pepisteuken eiv thn marturian hn memarturhken o yeov peri tou uiou autou
5.11: kai auth estin h marturia oti zwhn aiwnion edwken o yeov hmin kai auth h zwh en tw uiw autou estin
5.12: o ecwn ton uion ecei thn zwhn o mh ecwn ton uion tou yeou thn zwhn ouk ecei
5.13: tauta egraqa umin ina eidhte oti zwhn ecete aiwnion toiv pisteuousin eiv to onoma tou uiou tou yeou
5.14: kai auth estin h parrhsia hn ecomen prov auton oti ean ti aitwmeya kata to yelhma autou akouei hmwn
5.15: kai ean oidamen oti akouei hmwn o ean aitwmeya oidamen oti ecomen ta aithmata a hthkamen ap autou
5.16: ean tiv idh ton adelfon autou amartanonta amartian mh prov yanaton aithsei kai dwsei autw zwhn toiv amartanousin mh prov yanaton estin amartia prov yanaton ou peri ekeinhv legw ina erwthsh
5.17: pasa adikia amartia estin kai estin amartia ou prov yanaton
5.18: oidamen oti pav o gegennhmenov ek tou yeou ouc amartanei all o gennhyeiv ek tou yeou threi auton kai o ponhrov ouc aptetai autou
5.19: oidamen oti ek tou yeou esmen kai o kosmov olov en tw ponhrw keitai
5.20: oidamen de oti o uiov tou yeou hkei kai dedwken hmin dianoian ina ginwskomen ton alhyinon kai esmen en tw alhyinw en tw uiw autou ihsou cristw outov estin o alhyinov yeov kai zwh aiwniov
5.21: teknia fulaxate eauta apo twn eidwlwn

1.1: petrov apostolov ihsou cristou eklektoiv parepidhmoiv diasporav pontou galatiav kappadokiav asiav kai biyuniav
1.2: kata prognwsin yeou patrov en agiasmw pneumatov eiv upakohn kai rantismon aimatov ihsou cristou cariv umin kai eirhnh plhyunyeih
1.3: euloghtov o yeov kai pathr tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou o kata to polu autou eleov anagennhsav hmav eiv elpida zwsan di anastasewv ihsou cristou ek nekrwn
1.4: eiv klhronomian afyarton kai amianton kai amaranton tethrhmenhn en ouranoiv eiv umav
1.5: touv en dunamei yeou frouroumenouv dia pistewv eiv swthrian etoimhn apokalufyhnai en kairw escatw
1.6: en w agalliasye oligon arti ei deon luphyentev en poikiloiv peirasmoiv
1.7: ina to dokimion umwn thv pistewv polutimoteron crusiou tou apollumenou dia purov de dokimazomenou eureyh eiv epainon kai doxan kai timhn en apokaluqei ihsou cristou
1.8: on ouk idontev agapate eiv on arti mh orwntev pisteuontev de agalliate cara aneklalhtw kai dedoxasmenh
1.9: komizomenoi to telov thv pistewv swthrian qucwn
1.10: peri hv swthriav exezhthsan kai exhraunhsan profhtai oi peri thv eiv umav caritov profhteusantev
1.11: eraunwntev eiv tina h poion kairon edhlou to en autoiv pneuma cristou promarturomenon ta eiv criston payhmata kai tav meta tauta doxav
1.12: oiv apekalufyh oti ouc eautoiv umin de dihkonoun auta a nun anhggelh umin dia twn euaggelisamenwn umav pneumati agiw apostalenti ap ouranou eiv a epiyumousin aggeloi parakuqai
1.13: dio anazwsamenoi tav osfuav thv dianoiav umwn nhfontev teleiwv elpisate epi thn feromenhn umin carin en apokaluqei ihsou cristou
1.14: wv tekna upakohv mh suschmatizomenoi taiv proteron en th agnoia umwn epiyumiaiv
1.15: alla kata ton kalesanta umav agion kai autoi agioi en pash anastrofh genhyhte
1.16: dioti gegraptai [oti] agioi esesye oti egw agiov
1.17: kai ei patera epikaleisye ton aproswpolhmptwv krinonta kata to ekastou ergon en fobw ton thv paroikiav umwn cronon anastrafhte
1.18: eidotev oti ou fyartoiv arguriw h crusiw elutrwyhte ek thv mataiav umwn anastrofhv patroparadotou
1.19: alla timiw aimati wv amnou amwmou kai aspilou cristou
1.20: proegnwsmenou men pro katabolhv kosmou fanerwyentov de ep escatou twn cronwn di umav
1.21: touv di autou pistouv eiv yeon ton egeiranta auton ek nekrwn kai doxan autw donta wste thn pistin umwn kai elpida einai eiv yeon
1.22: tav qucav umwn hgnikotev en th upakoh thv alhyeiav eiv filadelfian anupokriton ek kardiav allhlouv agaphsate ektenwv
1.23: anagegennhmenoi ouk ek sporav fyarthv alla afyartou dia logou zwntov yeou kai menontov
1.24: dioti pasa sarx wv cortov kai pasa doxa authv wv anyov cortou exhranyh o cortov kai to anyov exepesen
1.25: to de rhma kuriou menei eiv ton aiwna touto de estin to rhma to euaggelisyen eiv umav

2.1: apoyemenoi oun pasan kakian kai panta dolon kai upokrisin kai fyonouv kai pasav katalaliav
2.2: wv artigennhta brefh to logikon adolon gala epipoyhsate ina en autw auxhyhte eiv swthrian
2.3: ei egeusasye oti crhstov o kuriov
2.4: prov on prosercomenoi liyon zwnta upo anyrwpwn men apodedokimasmenon para de yew eklekton entimon
2.5: kai autoi wv liyoi zwntev oikodomeisye oikov pneumatikov eiv ierateuma agion anenegkai pneumatikav yusiav euprosdektouv yew dia ihsou cristou
2.6: dioti periecei en grafh idou tiyhmi en siwn liyon eklekton akrogwniaion entimon kai o pisteuwn ep autw ou mh kataiscunyh
2.7: umin oun h timh toiv pisteuousin apistousin de liyov on apedokimasan oi oikodomountev outov egenhyh eiv kefalhn gwniav
2.8: kai liyov proskommatov kai petra skandalou oi proskoptousin tw logw apeiyountev eiv o kai eteyhsan
2.9: umeiv de genov eklekton basileion ierateuma eynov agion laov eiv peripoihsin opwv tav aretav exaggeilhte tou ek skotouv umav kalesantov eiv to yaumaston autou fwv
2.10: oi pote ou laov nun de laov yeou oi ouk hlehmenoi nun de elehyentev
2.11: agaphtoi parakalw wv paroikouv kai parepidhmouv apecesyai twn sarkikwn epiyumiwn aitinev strateuontai kata thv quchv
2.12: thn anastrofhn umwn en toiv eynesin econtev kalhn ina en w katalalousin umwn wv kakopoiwn ek twn kalwn ergwn epopteuontev doxaswsin ton yeon en hmera episkophv
2.13: upotaghte pash anyrwpinh ktisei dia ton kurion eite basilei wv upereconti
2.14: eite hgemosin wv di autou pempomenoiv eiv ekdikhsin kakopoiwn epainon de agayopoiwn
2.15: oti outwv estin to yelhma tou yeou agayopoiountav fimoin thn twn afronwn anyrwpwn agnwsian
2.16: wv eleuyeroi kai mh wv epikalumma econtev thv kakiav thn eleuyerian all wv yeou douloi
2.17: pantav timhsate thn adelfothta agapate ton yeon fobeisye ton basilea timate
2.18: oi oiketai upotassomenoi en panti fobw toiv despotaiv ou monon toiv agayoiv kai epieikesin alla kai toiv skolioiv
2.19: touto gar cariv ei dia suneidhsin yeou upoferei tiv lupav pascwn adikwv
2.20: poion gar kleov ei amartanontev kai kolafizomenoi upomeneite all ei agayopoiountev kai pascontev upomeneite touto cariv para yew
2.21: eiv touto gar eklhyhte oti kai cristov epayen uper umwn umin upolimpanwn upogrammon ina epakolouyhshte toiv icnesin autou
2.22: ov amartian ouk epoihsen oude eureyh dolov en tw stomati autou
2.23: ov loidoroumenov ouk anteloidorei pascwn ouk hpeilei paredidou de tw krinonti dikaiwv
2.24: ov tav amartiav hmwn autov anhnegken en tw swmati autou epi to xulon ina taiv amartiaiv apogenomenoi th dikaiosunh zhswmen ou tw mwlwpi iayhte
2.25: hte gar wv probata planwmenoi alla epestrafhte nun epi ton poimena kai episkopon twn qucwn umwn

3.1: omoiwv gunaikev upotassomenai toiv idioiv andrasin ina ei tinev apeiyousin tw logw dia thv twn gunaikwn anastrofhv aneu logou kerdhyhsontai
3.2: epopteusantev thn en fobw agnhn anastrofhn umwn
3.3: wn estw ouc o exwyen emplokhv tricwn kai periyesewv crusiwn h endusewv imatiwn kosmov
3.4: all o kruptov thv kardiav anyrwpov en tw afyartw tou hsuciou kai praewv pneumatov o estin enwpion tou yeou polutelev
3.5: outwv gar pote kai ai agiai gunaikev ai elpizousai eiv yeon ekosmoun eautav upotassomenai toiv idioiv andrasin
3.6: wv sarra uphkouen tw abraam kurion auton kalousa hv egenhyhte tekna agayopoiousai kai mh foboumenai mhdemian ptohsin
3.7: oi andrev omoiwv sunoikountev kata gnwsin wv asyenesterw skeuei tw gunaikeiw aponemontev timhn wv kai sugklhronomoi caritov zwhv eiv to mh egkoptesyai tav proseucav umwn
3.8: to de telov pantev omofronev sumpayeiv filadelfoi eusplagcnoi tapeinofronev
3.9: mh apodidontev kakon anti kakou h loidorian anti loidoriav tounantion de eulogountev oti eiv touto eklhyhte ina eulogian klhronomhshte
3.10: o gar yelwn zwhn agapan kai idein hmerav agayav pausatw thn glwssan apo kakou kai ceilh tou mh lalhsai dolon
3.11: ekklinatw de apo kakou kai poihsatw agayon zhthsatw eirhnhn kai diwxatw authn
3.12: oti ofyalmoi kuriou epi dikaiouv kai wta autou eiv dehsin autwn proswpon de kuriou epi poiountav kaka
3.13: kai tiv o kakwswn umav ean tou agayou zhlwtai genhsye
3.14: all ei kai pascoite dia dikaiosunhn makarioi ton de fobon autwn mh fobhyhte mhde taracyhte
3.15: kurion de ton criston agiasate en taiv kardiaiv umwn etoimoi aei prov apologian panti tw aitounti umav logon peri thv en umin elpidov alla meta prauthtov kai fobou
3.16: suneidhsin econtev agayhn ina en w katalaleisye kataiscunywsin oi ephreazontev umwn thn agayhn en cristw anastrofhn
3.17: kreitton gar agayopoiountav ei yeloi to yelhma tou yeou pascein h kakopoiountav
3.18: oti kai cristov apax peri amartiwn apeyanen dikaiov uper adikwn ina umav prosagagh tw yew yanatwyeiv men sarki zwopoihyeiv de pneumati
3.19: en w kai toiv en fulakh pneumasin poreuyeiv ekhruxen
3.20: apeiyhsasin pote ote apexedeceto h tou yeou makroyumia en hmeraiv nwe kataskeuazomenhv kibwtou eiv hn oligoi tout estin oktw qucai dieswyhsan di udatov
3.21: o kai umav antitupon nun swzei baptisma ou sarkov apoyesiv rupou alla suneidhsewv agayhv eperwthma eiv yeon di anastasewv ihsou cristou
3.22: ov estin en dexia yeou poreuyeiv eiv ouranon upotagentwn autw aggelwn kai exousiwn kai dunamewn

4.1: cristou oun payontov sarki kai umeiv thn authn ennoian oplisasye oti o paywn sarki pepautai amartiaiv
4.2: eiv to mhketi anyrwpwn epiyumiaiv alla yelhmati yeou ton epiloipon en sarki biwsai cronon
4.3: arketov gar o parelhluywv cronov to boulhma twn eynwn kateirgasyai peporeumenouv en aselgeiaiv epiyumiaiv oinoflugiaiv kwmoiv potoiv kai ayemitoiv eidwlolatriaiv
4.4: en w xenizontai mh suntrecontwn umwn eiv thn authn thv aswtiav anacusin blasfhmountev
4.5: oi apodwsousin logon tw etoimwv krinonti zwntav kai nekrouv
4.6: eiv touto gar kai nekroiv euhggelisyh ina kriywsin men kata anyrwpouv sarki zwsin de kata yeon pneumati
4.7: pantwn de to telov hggiken swfronhsate oun kai nhqate eiv proseucav
4.8: pro pantwn thn eiv eautouv agaphn ektenh econtev oti agaph kaluptei plhyov amartiwn
4.9: filoxenoi eiv allhlouv aneu goggusmou
4.10: ekastov kaywv elaben carisma eiv eautouv auto diakonountev wv kaloi oikonomoi poikilhv caritov yeou
4.11: ei tiv lalei wv logia yeou ei tiv diakonei wv ex iscuov hv corhgei o yeov ina en pasin doxazhtai o yeov dia ihsou cristou w estin h doxa kai to kratov eiv touv aiwnav twn aiwnwn amhn
4.12: agaphtoi mh xenizesye th en umin purwsei prov peirasmon umin ginomenh wv xenou umin sumbainontov
4.13: alla kayo koinwneite toiv tou cristou payhmasin cairete ina kai en th apokaluqei thv doxhv autou carhte agalliwmenoi
4.14: ei oneidizesye en onomati cristou makarioi oti to thv doxhv kai to tou yeou pneuma ef umav anapauetai
4.15: mh gar tiv umwn pascetw wv foneuv h klepthv h kakopoiov h wv allotriepiskopov
4.16: ei de wv cristianov mh aiscunesyw doxazetw de ton yeon en tw onomati toutw
4.17: oti [o] kairov tou arxasyai to krima apo tou oikou tou yeou ei de prwton af hmwn ti to telov twn apeiyountwn tw tou yeou euaggeliw
4.18: kai ei o dikaiov moliv swzetai o [de] asebhv kai amartwlov pou faneitai
4.19: wste kai oi pascontev kata to yelhma tou yeou pistw ktisth paratiyesywsan tav qucav en agayopoiia

5.1: presbuterouv oun en umin parakalw o sumpresbuterov kai martuv twn tou cristou payhmatwn o kai thv melloushv apokaluptesyai doxhv koinwnov
5.2: poimanate to en umin poimnion tou yeou mh anagkastwv alla ekousiwv mhde aiscrokerdwv alla proyumwv
5.3: mhd wv katakurieuontev twn klhrwn alla tupoi ginomenoi tou poimniou
5.4: kai fanerwyentov tou arcipoimenov komieisye ton amarantinon thv doxhv stefanon
5.5: omoiwv newteroi upotaghte presbuteroiv pantev de allhloiv thn tapeinofrosunhn egkombwsasye oti [o] yeov uperhfanoiv antitassetai tapeinoiv de didwsin carin
5.6: tapeinwyhte oun upo thn krataian ceira tou yeou ina umav uqwsh en kairw
5.7: pasan thn merimnan umwn epiriqantev ep auton oti autw melei peri umwn
5.8: nhqate grhgorhsate o antidikov umwn diabolov wv lewn wruomenov peripatei zhtwn katapiein
5.9: w antisthte stereoi th pistei eidotev ta auta twn payhmatwn th en tw kosmw umwn adelfothti epiteleisyai
5.10: o de yeov pashv caritov o kalesav umav eiv thn aiwnion autou doxan en cristw oligon payontav autov katartisei sthrixei syenwsei
5.11: autw to kratov eiv touv aiwnav amhn
5.12: dia silouanou umin tou pistou adelfou wv logizomai di oligwn egraqa parakalwn kai epimarturwn tauthn einai alhyh carin tou yeou eiv hn sthte
5.13: aspazetai umav h en babulwni suneklekth kai markov o uiov mou
5.14: aspasasye allhlouv en filhmati agaphv eirhnh umin pasin toiv en cristw

1.1: paulov kai silouanov kai timoyeov th ekklhsia yessalonikewn en yew patri kai kuriw ihsou cristw cariv umin kai eirhnh
1.2: eucaristoumen tw yew pantote peri pantwn umwn mneian poioumenoi epi twn proseucwn hmwn
1.3: adialeiptwv mnhmoneuontev umwn tou ergou thv pistewv kai tou kopou thv agaphv kai thv upomonhv thv elpidov tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou emprosyen tou yeou kai patrov hmwn
1.4: eidotev adelfoi hgaphmenoi upo [tou] yeou thn ekloghn umwn
1.5: oti to euaggelion hmwn ouk egenhyh eiv umav en logw monon alla kai en dunamei kai en pneumati agiw kai plhroforia pollh kaywv oidate oioi egenhyhmen umin di umav
1.6: kai umeiv mimhtai hmwn egenhyhte kai tou kuriou dexamenoi ton logon en yliqei pollh meta carav pneumatov agiou
1.7: wste genesyai umav tupon pasin toiv pisteuousin en th makedonia kai en th acaia
1.8: af umwn gar exhchtai o logov tou kuriou ou monon en th makedonia kai acaia all en panti topw h pistiv umwn h prov ton yeon exelhluyen wste mh creian ecein hmav lalein ti
1.9: autoi gar peri hmwn apaggellousin opoian eisodon escomen prov umav kai pwv epestreqate prov ton yeon apo twn eidwlwn douleuein yew zwnti kai alhyinw
1.10: kai anamenein ton uion autou ek twn ouranwn on hgeiren ek [twn] nekrwn ihsoun ton ruomenon hmav ek thv orghv thv ercomenhv

2.1: autoi gar oidate adelfoi thn eisodon hmwn thn prov umav oti ou kenh gegonen
2.2: alla propayontev kai ubrisyentev kaywv oidate en filippoiv eparrhsiasameya en tw yew hmwn lalhsai prov umav to euaggelion tou yeou en pollw agwni
2.3: h gar paraklhsiv hmwn ouk ek planhv oude ex akayarsiav oude en dolw
2.4: alla kaywv dedokimasmeya upo tou yeou pisteuyhnai to euaggelion outwv laloumen ouc wv anyrwpoiv areskontev alla yew tw dokimazonti tav kardiav hmwn
2.5: oute gar pote en logw kolakeiav egenhyhmen kaywv oidate oute profasei pleonexiav yeov martuv
2.6: oute zhtountev ex anyrwpwn doxan oute af umwn oute ap allwn [2:7] dunamenoi en barei einai wv cristou apostoloi
2.7: alla egenhyhmen nhpioi en mesw umwn wv ean trofov yalph ta eauthv tekna
2.8: outwv omeiromenoi umwn hudokoumen metadounai umin ou monon to euaggelion tou yeou alla kai tav eautwn qucav dioti agaphtoi hmin egenhyhte
2.9: mnhmoneuete gar adelfoi ton kopon hmwn kai ton mocyon nuktov kai hmerav ergazomenoi prov to mh epibarhsai tina umwn ekhruxamen eiv umav to euaggelion tou yeou
2.10: umeiv marturev kai o yeov wv osiwv kai dikaiwv kai amemptwv umin toiv pisteuousin egenhyhmen
2.11: kayaper oidate wv ena ekaston umwn wv pathr tekna eautou [2:12] parakalountev umav kai paramuyoumenoi
2.12: kai marturomenoi eiv to peripatein umav axiwv tou yeou tou kalountov umav eiv thn eautou basileian kai doxan
2.13: kai dia touto kai hmeiv eucaristoumen tw yew adialeiptwv oti paralabontev logon akohv par hmwn tou yeou edexasye ou logon anyrwpwn alla kaywv alhywv estin logon yeou ov kai energeitai en umin toiv pisteuousin
2.14: umeiv gar mimhtai egenhyhte adelfoi twn ekklhsiwn tou yeou twn ouswn en th ioudaia en cristw ihsou oti ta auta epayete kai umeiv upo twn idiwn sumfuletwn kaywv kai autoi upo twn ioudaiwn
2.15: twn kai ton kurion apokteinantwn ihsoun kai touv profhtav kai hmav ekdiwxantwn kai yew mh areskontwn kai pasin anyrwpoiv enantiwn
2.16: kwluontwn hmav toiv eynesin lalhsai ina swywsin eiv to anaplhrwsai autwn tav amartiav pantote efyasen de ep autouv h orgh eiv telov
2.17: hmeiv de adelfoi aporfanisyentev af umwn prov kairon wrav proswpw ou kardia perissoterwv espoudasamen to proswpon umwn idein en pollh epiyumia
2.18: dioti hyelhsamen elyein prov umav egw men paulov kai apax kai div kai enekoqen hmav o satanav
2.19: tiv gar hmwn elpiv h cara h stefanov kauchsewv h ouci kai umeiv emprosyen tou kuriou hmwn ihsou en th autou parousia
2.20: umeiv gar este h doxa hmwn kai h cara

3.1: dio mhketi stegontev hudokhsamen kataleifyhnai en ayhnaiv monoi
3.2: kai epemqamen timoyeon ton adelfon hmwn kai diakonon tou yeou en tw euaggeliw tou cristou eiv to sthrixai umav kai parakalesai uper thv pistewv umwn
3.3: to mhdena sainesyai en taiv yliqesin tautaiv autoi gar oidate oti eiv touto keimeya
3.4: kai gar ote prov umav hmen proelegomen umin oti mellomen ylibesyai kaywv kai egeneto kai oidate
3.5: dia touto kagw mhketi stegwn epemqa eiv to gnwnai thn pistin umwn mh pwv epeirasen umav o peirazwn kai eiv kenon genhtai o kopov hmwn
3.6: arti de elyontov timoyeou prov hmav af umwn kai euaggelisamenou hmin thn pistin kai thn agaphn umwn kai oti ecete mneian hmwn agayhn pantote epipoyountev hmav idein kayaper kai hmeiv umav
3.7: dia touto pareklhyhmen adelfoi ef umin epi pash th anagkh kai yliqei hmwn dia thv umwn pistewv
3.8: oti nun zwmen ean umeiv sthkete en kuriw
3.9: tina gar eucaristian dunameya tw yew antapodounai peri umwn epi pash th cara h cairomen di umav emprosyen tou yeou hmwn
3.10: nuktov kai hmerav uper ekperissou deomenoi eiv to idein umwn to proswpon kai katartisai ta usterhmata thv pistewv umwn
3.11: autov de o yeov kai pathr hmwn kai o kuriov hmwn ihsouv kateuyunai thn odon hmwn prov umav
3.12: umav de o kuriov pleonasai kai perisseusai th agaph eiv allhlouv kai eiv pantav kayaper kai hmeiv eiv umav
3.13: eiv to sthrixai umwn tav kardiav amemptouv en agiwsunh emprosyen tou yeou kai patrov hmwn en th parousia tou kuriou hmwn ihsou meta pantwn twn agiwn autou

4.1: loipon adelfoi erwtwmen umav kai parakaloumen en kuriw ihsou [ina] kaywv parelabete par hmwn to pwv dei umav peripatein kai areskein yew kaywv kai peripateite ina perisseuhte mallon
4.2: oidate gar tinav paraggeliav edwkamen umin dia tou kuriou ihsou
4.3: touto gar estin yelhma tou yeou o agiasmov umwn apecesyai umav apo thv porneiav
4.4: eidenai ekaston umwn to eautou skeuov ktasyai en agiasmw kai timh
4.5: mh en payei epiyumiav kayaper kai ta eynh ta mh eidota ton yeon
4.6: to mh uperbainein kai pleonektein en tw pragmati ton adelfon autou dioti ekdikov kuriov peri pantwn toutwn kaywv kai proeipamen umin kai diemarturameya
4.7: ou gar ekalesen hmav o yeov epi akayarsia all en agiasmw
4.8: toigaroun o ayetwn ouk anyrwpon ayetei alla ton yeon ton didonta to pneuma autou to agion eiv umav
4.9: peri de thv filadelfiav ou creian ecete grafein umin autoi gar umeiv yeodidaktoi este eiv to agapan allhlouv
4.10: kai gar poieite auto eiv pantav touv adelfouv [touv] en olh th makedonia parakaloumen de umav adelfoi perisseuein mallon
4.11: kai filotimeisyai hsucazein kai prassein ta idia kai ergazesyai taiv cersin umwn kaywv umin parhggeilamen
4.12: ina peripathte euschmonwv prov touv exw kai mhdenov creian echte
4.13: ou yelomen de umav agnoein adelfoi peri twn koimwmenwn ina mh luphsye kaywv kai oi loipoi oi mh econtev elpida
4.14: ei gar pisteuomen oti ihsouv apeyanen kai anesth outwv kai o yeov touv koimhyentav dia tou ihsou axei sun autw
4.15: touto gar umin legomen en logw kuriou oti hmeiv oi zwntev oi perileipomenoi eiv thn parousian tou kuriou ou mh fyaswmen touv koimhyentav
4.16: oti autov o kuriov en keleusmati en fwnh arcaggelou kai en salpiggi yeou katabhsetai ap ouranou kai oi nekroi en cristw anasthsontai prwton
4.17: epeita hmeiv oi zwntev oi perileipomenoi ama sun autoiv arpaghsomeya en nefelaiv eiv apanthsin tou kuriou eiv aera kai outwv pantote sun kuriw esomeya
4.18: wste parakaleite allhlouv en toiv logoiv toutoiv

5.1: peri de twn cronwn kai twn kairwn adelfoi ou creian ecete umin grafesyai
5.2: autoi gar akribwv oidate oti hmera kuriou wv klepthv en nukti outwv ercetai
5.3: otan legwsin eirhnh kai asfaleia tote aifnidiov autoiv epistatai oleyrov wsper h wdin th en gastri ecoush kai ou mh ekfugwsin
5.4: umeiv de adelfoi ouk este en skotei ina h hmera umav wv kleptav katalabh
5.5: pantev gar umeiv uioi fwtov este kai uioi hmerav ouk esmen nuktov oude skotouv
5.6: ara oun mh kayeudwmen wv oi loipoi alla grhgorwmen kai nhfwmen
5.7: oi gar kayeudontev nuktov kayeudousin kai oi meyuskomenoi nuktov meyuousin
5.8: hmeiv de hmerav ontev nhfwmen endusamenoi ywraka pistewv kai agaphv kai perikefalaian elpida swthriav
5.9: oti ouk eyeto hmav o yeov eiv orghn alla eiv peripoihsin swthriav dia tou kuriou hmwn ihsou [cristou]
5.10: tou apoyanontov peri hmwn ina eite grhgorwmen eite kayeudwmen ama sun autw zhswmen
5.11: dio parakaleite allhlouv kai oikodomeite eiv ton ena kaywv kai poieite
5.12: erwtwmen de umav adelfoi eidenai touv kopiwntav en umin kai proistamenouv umwn en kuriw kai nouyetountav umav
5.13: kai hgeisyai autouv uper ekperissou en agaph dia to ergon autwn eirhneuete en eautoiv
5.14: parakaloumen de umav adelfoi nouyeteite touv ataktouv paramuyeisye touv oligoqucouv antecesye twn asyenwn makroyumeite prov pantav
5.15: orate mh tiv kakon anti kakou tini apodw alla pantote to agayon diwkete eiv allhlouv kai eiv pantav
5.18: en panti eucaristeite touto gar yelhma yeou en cristw ihsou eiv umav
5.23: autov de o yeov thv eirhnhv agiasai umav oloteleiv kai oloklhron umwn to pneuma kai h quch kai to swma amemptwv en th parousia tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou thrhyeih
5.24: pistov o kalwn umav ov kai poihsei
5.26: aspasasye touv adelfouv pantav en filhmati agiw
5.27: enorkizw umav ton kurion anagnwsyhnai thn epistolhn pasin toiv adelfoiv
5.28: h cariv tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou mey umwn

1.1: paulov apostolov cristou ihsou kat epitaghn yeou swthrov hmwn kai cristou ihsou thv elpidov hmwn
1.2: timoyew gnhsiw teknw en pistei cariv eleov eirhnh apo yeou patrov kai cristou ihsou tou kuriou hmwn
1.3: kaywv parekalesa se prosmeinai en efesw poreuomenov eiv makedonian ina paraggeilhv tisin mh eterodidaskalein
1.4: mhde prosecein muyoiv kai genealogiaiv aperantoiv aitinev ekzhthseiv parecousin mallon h oikonomian yeou thn en pistei
1.5: to de telov thv paraggeliav estin agaph ek kayarav kardiav kai suneidhsewv agayhv kai pistewv anupokritou
1.6: wn tinev astochsantev exetraphsan eiv mataiologian
1.7: yelontev einai nomodidaskaloi mh noountev mhte a legousin mhte peri tinwn diabebaiountai
1.8: oidamen de oti kalov o nomov ean tiv autw nomimwv crhtai
1.9: eidwv touto oti dikaiw nomov ou keitai anomoiv de kai anupotaktoiv asebesin kai amartwloiv anosioiv kai bebhloiv patrolwaiv kai mhtrolwaiv androfonoiv
1.10: pornoiv arsenokoitaiv andrapodistaiv qeustaiv epiorkoiv kai ei ti eteron th ugiainoush didaskalia antikeitai
1.11: kata to euaggelion thv doxhv tou makariou yeou o episteuyhn egw
1.12: carin ecw tw endunamwsanti me cristw ihsou tw kuriw hmwn oti piston me hghsato yemenov eiv diakonian
1.13: to proteron onta blasfhmon kai diwkthn kai ubristhn alla hlehyhn oti agnown epoihsa en apistia
1.14: uperepleonasen de h cariv tou kuriou hmwn meta pistewv kai agaphv thv en cristw ihsou
1.15: pistov o logov kai pashv apodochv axiov oti cristov ihsouv hlyen eiv ton kosmon amartwlouv swsai wn prwtov eimi egw
1.16: alla dia touto hlehyhn ina en emoi prwtw endeixhtai cristov ihsouv thn apasan makroyumian prov upotupwsin twn mellontwn pisteuein ep autw eiv zwhn aiwnion
1.17: tw de basilei twn aiwnwn afyartw aoratw monw yew timh kai doxa eiv touv aiwnav twn aiwnwn amhn
1.18: tauthn thn paraggelian paratiyemai soi teknon timoyee kata tav proagousav epi se profhteiav ina strateuh en autaiv thn kalhn strateian
1.19: ecwn pistin kai agayhn suneidhsin hn tinev apwsamenoi peri thn pistin enauaghsan
1.20: wn estin umenaiov kai alexandrov ouv paredwka tw satana ina paideuywsin mh blasfhmein

2.1: parakalw oun prwton pantwn poieisyai dehseiv proseucav enteuxeiv eucaristiav uper pantwn anyrwpwn
2.2: uper basilewn kai pantwn twn en uperoch ontwn ina hremon kai hsucion bion diagwmen en pash eusebeia kai semnothti
2.3: touto kalon kai apodekton enwpion tou swthrov hmwn yeou
2.4: ov pantav anyrwpouv yelei swyhnai kai eiv epignwsin alhyeiav elyein
2.5: eiv gar yeov eiv kai mesithv yeou kai anyrwpwn anyrwpov cristov ihsouv
2.6: o douv eauton antilutron uper pantwn to marturion kairoiv idioiv
2.7: eiv o eteyhn egw khrux kai apostolov alhyeian legw ou qeudomai didaskalov eynwn en pistei kai alhyeia
2.8: boulomai oun proseucesyai touv andrav en panti topw epairontav osiouv ceirav cwriv orghv kai dialogismwn
2.9: wsautwv gunaikav en katastolh kosmiw meta aidouv kai swfrosunhv kosmein eautav mh en plegmasin kai crusiw h margaritaiv h imatismw polutelei
2.10: all o prepei gunaixin epaggellomenaiv yeosebeian di ergwn agaywn
2.11: gunh en hsucia manyanetw en pash upotagh
2.12: didaskein de gunaiki ouk epitrepw oude auyentein androv all einai en hsucia
2.13: adam gar prwtov eplasyh eita eua
2.14: kai adam ouk hpathyh h de gunh exapathyeisa en parabasei gegonen
2.15: swyhsetai de dia thv teknogoniav ean meinwsin en pistei kai agaph kai agiasmw meta swfrosunhv

3.1: pistov o logov ei tiv episkophv oregetai kalou ergou epiyumei
3.2: dei oun ton episkopon anepilhmpton einai miav gunaikov andra nhfalion swfrona kosmion filoxenon didaktikon
3.3: mh paroinon mh plhkthn alla epieikh amacon afilarguron
3.4: tou idiou oikou kalwv proistamenon tekna econta en upotagh meta pashv semnothtov
3.5: ei de tiv tou idiou oikou prosthnai ouk oiden pwv ekklhsiav yeou epimelhsetai
3.6: mh neofuton ina mh tufwyeiv eiv krima empesh tou diabolou
3.7: dei de kai marturian kalhn ecein apo twn exwyen ina mh eiv oneidismon empesh kai pagida tou diabolou
3.8: diakonouv wsautwv semnouv mh dilogouv mh oinw pollw prosecontav mh aiscrokerdeiv
3.9: econtav to musthrion thv pistewv en kayara suneidhsei
3.10: kai outoi de dokimazesywsan prwton eita diakoneitwsan anegklhtoi ontev
3.11: gunaikav wsautwv semnav mh diabolouv nhfaliouv pistav en pasin
3.12: diakonoi estwsan miav gunaikov andrev teknwn kalwv proistamenoi kai twn idiwn oikwn
3.13: oi gar kalwv diakonhsantev baymon eautoiv kalon peripoiountai kai pollhn parrhsian en pistei th en cristw ihsou
3.14: tauta soi grafw elpizwn elyein [prov se] en tacei
3.15: ean de bradunw ina eidhv pwv dei en oikw yeou anastrefesyai htiv estin ekklhsia yeou zwntov stulov kai edraiwma thv alhyeiav
3.16: kai omologoumenwv mega estin to thv eusebeiav musthrion ov efanerwyh en sarki edikaiwyh en pneumati wfyh aggeloiv ekhrucyh en eynesin episteuyh en kosmw anelhmfyh en doxh

4.1: to de pneuma rhtwv legei oti en usteroiv kairoiv aposthsontai tinev thv pistewv prosecontev pneumasin planoiv kai didaskaliaiv daimoniwn
4.2: en upokrisei qeudologwn kekausthriasmenwn thn idian suneidhsin
4.3: kwluontwn gamein apecesyai brwmatwn a o yeov ektisen eiv metalhmqin meta eucaristiav toiv pistoiv kai epegnwkosin thn alhyeian
4.4: oti pan ktisma yeou kalon kai ouden apoblhton meta eucaristiav lambanomenon
4.5: agiazetai gar dia logou yeou kai enteuxewv
