10.33: touto men oneidismoiv te kai yliqesin yeatrizomenoi touto de koinwnoi twn outwv anastrefomenwn genhyentev
10.34: kai gar toiv desmioiv sunepayhsate kai thn arpaghn twn uparcontwn umwn meta carav prosedexasye ginwskontev ecein eautouv kreissona uparxin kai menousan
10.35: mh apobalhte oun thn parrhsian umwn htiv ecei megalhn misyapodosian
10.36: upomonhv gar ecete creian ina to yelhma tou yeou poihsantev komishsye thn epaggelian
10.37: eti gar mikron oson oson o ercomenov hxei kai ou cronisei
10.38: o de dikaiov [mou] ek pistewv zhsetai kai ean uposteilhtai ouk eudokei h quch mou en autw
10.39: hmeiv de ouk esmen upostolhv eiv apwleian alla pistewv eiv peripoihsin quchv

11.1: estin de pistiv elpizomenwn upostasiv pragmatwn elegcov ou blepomenwn
11.2: en tauth gar emarturhyhsan oi presbuteroi
11.3: pistei nooumen kathrtisyai touv aiwnav rhmati yeou eiv to mh ek fainomenwn to blepomenon gegonenai
11.4: pistei pleiona yusian abel para kain proshnegken tw yew di hv emarturhyh einai dikaiov marturountov epi toiv dwroiv autou tou yeou kai di authv apoyanwn eti lalei
11.5: pistei enwc meteteyh tou mh idein yanaton kai ouc hurisketo dioti meteyhken auton o yeov pro gar thv metayesewv memarturhtai euaresthkenai tw yew
11.6: cwriv de pistewv adunaton euaresthsai pisteusai gar dei ton prosercomenon [tw] yew oti estin kai toiv ekzhtousin auton misyapodothv ginetai
11.7: pistei crhmatisyeiv nwe peri twn mhdepw blepomenwn eulabhyeiv kateskeuasen kibwton eiv swthrian tou oikou autou di hv katekrinen ton kosmon kai thv kata pistin dikaiosunhv egeneto klhronomov
11.8: pistei kaloumenov abraam uphkousen exelyein eiv topon on hmellen lambanein eiv klhronomian kai exhlyen mh epistamenov pou ercetai
11.9: pistei parwkhsen eiv ghn thv epaggeliav wv allotrian en skhnaiv katoikhsav meta isaak kai iakwb twn sugklhronomwn thv epaggeliav thv authv
11.10: exedeceto gar thn touv yemeliouv ecousan polin hv tecnithv kai dhmiourgov o yeov
11.11: pistei kai auth sarra dunamin eiv katabolhn spermatov elaben kai para kairon hlikiav epei piston hghsato ton epaggeilamenon
11.12: dio kai af enov egennhyhsan kai tauta nenekrwmenou kaywv ta astra tou ouranou tw plhyei kai wv h ammov h para to ceilov thv yalasshv h anariymhtov
11.13: kata pistin apeyanon outoi pantev mh komisamenoi tav epaggeliav alla porrwyen autav idontev kai aspasamenoi kai omologhsantev oti xenoi kai parepidhmoi eisin epi thv ghv
11.14: oi gar toiauta legontev emfanizousin oti patrida epizhtousin
11.15: kai ei men ekeinhv emnhmoneuon af hv exebhsan eicon an kairon anakamqai
11.16: nun de kreittonov oregontai tout estin epouraniou dio ouk epaiscunetai autouv o yeov yeov epikaleisyai autwn htoimasen gar autoiv polin
11.17: pistei prosenhnocen abraam ton isaak peirazomenov kai ton monogenh proseferen o tav epaggeliav anadexamenov
11.18: prov on elalhyh oti en isaak klhyhsetai soi sperma
11.19: logisamenov oti kai ek nekrwn egeirein dunatov o yeov oyen auton kai en parabolh ekomisato
11.20: pistei kai peri mellontwn euloghsen isaak ton iakwb kai ton hsau
11.21: pistei iakwb apoynhskwn ekaston twn uiwn iwshf euloghsen kai prosekunhsen epi to akron thv rabdou autou
11.22: pistei iwshf teleutwn peri thv exodou twn uiwn israhl emnhmoneusen kai peri twn ostewn autou eneteilato
11.23: pistei mwushv gennhyeiv ekrubh trimhnon upo twn paterwn autou dioti eidon asteion to paidion kai ouk efobhyhsan to diatagma tou basilewv
11.24: pistei mwushv megav genomenov hrnhsato legesyai uiov yugatrov faraw
11.25: mallon elomenov sugkakouceisyai tw law tou yeou h proskairon ecein amartiav apolausin
11.26: meizona plouton hghsamenov twn aiguptou yhsaurwn ton oneidismon tou cristou apeblepen gar eiv thn misyapodosian
11.27: pistei katelipen aigupton mh fobhyeiv ton yumon tou basilewv ton gar aoraton wv orwn ekarterhsen
11.28: pistei pepoihken to pasca kai thn proscusin tou aimatov ina mh o oloyreuwn ta prwtotoka yigh autwn
11.29: pistei diebhsan thn eruyran yalassan wv dia xhrav ghv hv peiran labontev oi aiguptioi katepoyhsan
11.30: pistei ta teich iericw epesan kuklwyenta epi epta hmerav
11.31: pistei raab h pornh ou sunapwleto toiv apeiyhsasin dexamenh touv kataskopouv met eirhnhv
11.32: kai ti eti legw epileiqei me gar dihgoumenon o cronov peri gedewn barak samqwn iefyae dauid te kai samouhl kai twn profhtwn
11.33: oi dia pistewv kathgwnisanto basileiav hrgasanto dikaiosunhn epetucon epaggeliwn efraxan stomata leontwn
11.34: esbesan dunamin purov efugon stomata macairhv edunamwyhsan apo asyeneiav egenhyhsan iscuroi en polemw parembolav eklinan allotriwn
11.35: elabon gunaikev ex anastasewv touv nekrouv autwn alloi de etumpanisyhsan ou prosdexamenoi thn apolutrwsin ina kreittonov anastasewv tucwsin
11.36: eteroi de empaigmwn kai mastigwn peiran elabon eti de desmwn kai fulakhv
11.37: eliyasyhsan epeirasyhsan eprisyhsan en fonw macairhv apeyanon perihlyon en mhlwtaiv en aigeioiv dermasin usteroumenoi ylibomenoi kakoucoumenoi
11.38: wn ouk hn axiov o kosmov epi erhmiaiv planwmenoi kai oresin kai sphlaioiv kai taiv opaiv thv ghv
11.39: kai outoi pantev marturhyentev dia thv pistewv ouk ekomisanto thn epaggelian
11.40: tou yeou peri hmwn kreitton ti probleqamenou ina mh cwriv hmwn teleiwywsin

12.1: toigaroun kai hmeiv tosouton econtev perikeimenon hmin nefov marturwn ogkon apoyemenoi panta kai thn euperistaton amartian di upomonhv trecwmen ton prokeimenon hmin agwna
12.2: aforwntev eiv ton thv pistewv archgon kai teleiwthn ihsoun ov anti thv prokeimenhv autw carav upemeinen stauron aiscunhv katafronhsav en dexia te tou yronou tou yeou kekayiken
12.3: analogisasye gar ton toiauthn upomemenhkota upo twn amartwlwn eiv eautouv antilogian ina mh kamhte taiv qucaiv umwn ekluomenoi
12.4: oupw mecriv aimatov antikatesthte prov thn amartian antagwnizomenoi
12.5: kai eklelhsye thv paraklhsewv htiv umin wv uioiv dialegetai uie mou mh oligwrei paideiav kuriou mhde ekluou up autou elegcomenov
12.6: on gar agapa kuriov paideuei mastigoi de panta uion on paradecetai
12.7: eiv paideian upomenete wv uioiv umin prosferetai o yeov tiv gar uiov on ou paideuei pathr
12.8: ei de cwriv este paideiav hv metocoi gegonasin pantev ara noyoi kai ouc uioi este
12.9: eita touv men thv sarkov hmwn paterav eicomen paideutav kai enetrepomeya ou polu mallon upotaghsomeya tw patri twn pneumatwn kai zhsomen
12.10: oi men gar prov oligav hmerav kata to dokoun autoiv epaideuon o de epi to sumferon eiv to metalabein thv agiothtov autou
12.11: pasa men paideia prov men to paron ou dokei carav einai alla luphv usteron de karpon eirhnikon toiv di authv gegumnasmenoiv apodidwsin dikaiosunhv
12.12: dio tav pareimenav ceirav kai ta paralelumena gonata anorywsate
12.13: kai trociav oryav poieite toiv posin umwn ina mh to cwlon ektraph iayh de mallon
12.14: eirhnhn diwkete meta pantwn kai ton agiasmon ou cwriv oudeiv oqetai ton kurion
12.15: episkopountev mh tiv usterwn apo thv caritov tou yeou mh tiv riza pikriav anw fuousa enoclh kai di authv mianywsin oi polloi
12.16: mh tiv pornov h bebhlov wv hsau ov anti brwsewv miav apedeto ta prwtotokia eautou
12.17: iste gar oti kai metepeita yelwn klhronomhsai thn eulogian apedokimasyh metanoiav gar topon ouc euren kaiper meta dakruwn ekzhthsav authn
12.18: ou gar proselhluyate qhlafwmenw kai kekaumenw puri kai gnofw kai zofw kai yuellh
12.19: kai salpiggov hcw kai fwnh rhmatwn hv oi akousantev parhthsanto prosteyhnai autoiv logon
12.20: ouk eferon gar to diastellomenon kan yhrion yigh tou orouv liyobolhyhsetai
12.21: kai outwv foberon hn to fantazomenon mwushv eipen ekfobov eimi kai entromov
12.22: alla proselhluyate siwn orei kai polei yeou zwntov ierousalhm epouraniw kai muriasin aggelwn
12.23: panhgurei kai ekklhsia prwtotokwn apogegrammenwn en ouranoiv kai krith yew pantwn kai pneumasin dikaiwn teteleiwmenwn
12.24: kai diayhkhv neav mesith ihsou kai aimati rantismou kreitton lalounti para ton abel
12.25: blepete mh paraithshsye ton lalounta ei gar ekeinoi ouk exefugon epi ghv paraithsamenoi ton crhmatizonta polu mallon hmeiv oi ton ap ouranwn apostrefomenoi
12.26: ou h fwnh thn ghn esaleusen tote nun de ephggeltai legwn eti apax egw seisw ou monon thn ghn alla kai ton ouranon
12.27: to de eti apax dhloi [thn] twn saleuomenwn metayesin wv pepoihmenwn ina meinh ta mh saleuomena
12.28: dio basileian asaleuton paralambanontev ecwmen carin di hv latreuwmen euarestwv tw yew meta eulabeiav kai deouv
12.29: kai gar o yeov hmwn pur katanaliskon

13.2: thv filoxeniav mh epilanyanesye dia tauthv gar elayon tinev xenisantev aggelouv
13.3: mimnhskesye twn desmiwn wv sundedemenoi twn kakoucoumenwn wv kai autoi ontev en swmati
13.4: timiov o gamov en pasin kai h koith amiantov pornouv gar kai moicouv krinei o yeov
13.5: afilargurov o tropov arkoumenoi toiv parousin autov gar eirhken ou mh se anw oud ou mh se egkatalipw
13.6: wste yarrountav hmav legein kuriov emoi bohyov ou fobhyhsomai ti poihsei moi anyrwpov
13.7: mnhmoneuete twn hgoumenwn umwn oitinev elalhsan umin ton logon tou yeou wn anayewrountev thn ekbasin thv anastrofhv mimeisye thn pistin
13.8: ihsouv cristov ecyev kai shmeron o autov kai eiv touv aiwnav
13.9: didacaiv poikilaiv kai xenaiv mh paraferesye kalon gar cariti bebaiousyai thn kardian ou brwmasin en oiv ouk wfelhyhsan oi peripatountev
13.10: ecomen yusiasthrion ex ou fagein ouk ecousin [exousian] oi th skhnh latreuontev
13.11: wn gar eisferetai zwwn to aima peri amartiav eiv ta agia dia tou arcierewv toutwn ta swmata katakaietai exw thv parembolhv
13.12: dio kai ihsouv ina agiash dia tou idiou aimatov ton laon exw thv pulhv epayen
13.13: toinun exercwmeya prov auton exw thv parembolhv ton oneidismon autou ferontev
13.14: ou gar ecomen wde menousan polin alla thn mellousan epizhtoumen
13.15: di autou anaferwmen yusian ainesewv dia pantov tw yew tout estin karpon ceilewn omologountwn tw onomati autou
13.16: thv de eupoiiav kai koinwniav mh epilanyanesye toiautaiv gar yusiaiv euaresteitai o yeov
13.17: peiyesye toiv hgoumenoiv umwn kai upeikete autoi gar agrupnousin uper twn qucwn umwn wv logon apodwsontev ina meta carav touto poiwsin kai mh stenazontev alusitelev gar umin touto
13.18: proseucesye peri hmwn peiyomeya gar oti kalhn suneidhsin ecomen en pasin kalwv yelontev anastrefesyai
13.19: perissoterwv de parakalw touto poihsai ina taceion apokatastayw umin
13.20: o de yeov thv eirhnhv o anagagwn ek nekrwn ton poimena twn probatwn ton megan en aimati diayhkhv aiwniou ton kurion hmwn ihsoun
13.21: katartisai umav en panti agayw eiv to poihsai to yelhma autou poiwn en hmin to euareston enwpion autou dia ihsou cristou w h doxa eiv touv aiwnav twn aiwnwn amhn
13.22: parakalw de umav adelfoi anecesye tou logou thv paraklhsewv kai gar dia bracewn epesteila umin
13.23: ginwskete ton adelfon hmwn timoyeon apolelumenon mey ou ean taceion erchtai oqomai umav
13.24: aspasasye pantav touv hgoumenouv umwn kai pantav touv agiouv aspazontai umav oi apo thv italiav

1.1: iakwbov yeou kai kuriou ihsou cristou doulov taiv dwdeka fulaiv taiv en th diaspora cairein
1.2: pasan caran hghsasye adelfoi mou otan peirasmoiv peripeshte poikiloiv
1.3: ginwskontev oti to dokimion umwn thv pistewv katergazetai upomonhn
1.4: h de upomonh ergon teleion ecetw ina hte teleioi kai oloklhroi en mhdeni leipomenoi
1.5: ei de tiv umwn leipetai sofiav aiteitw para tou didontov yeou pasin aplwv kai mh oneidizontov kai doyhsetai autw
1.6: aiteitw de en pistei mhden diakrinomenov o gar diakrinomenov eoiken kludwni yalasshv anemizomenw kai ripizomenw
1.7: mh gar oiesyw o anyrwpov ekeinov oti lhmqetai ti para tou kuriou
1.8: anhr diqucov akatastatov en pasaiv taiv odoiv autou
1.9: kaucasyw de [o] adelfov o tapeinov en tw uqei autou
1.10: o de plousiov en th tapeinwsei autou oti wv anyov cortou pareleusetai
1.11: aneteilen gar o hliov sun tw kauswni kai exhranen ton corton kai to anyov autou exepesen kai h euprepeia tou proswpou autou apwleto outwv kai o plousiov en taiv poreiaiv autou maranyhsetai
1.12: makariov anhr ov upomenei peirasmon oti dokimov genomenov lhmqetai ton stefanon thv zwhv on ephggeilato toiv agapwsin auton
1.13: mhdeiv peirazomenov legetw oti apo yeou peirazomai o gar yeov apeirastov estin kakwn peirazei de autov oudena
1.14: ekastov de peirazetai upo thv idiav epiyumiav exelkomenov kai deleazomenov
1.15: eita h epiyumia sullabousa tiktei amartian h de amartia apotelesyeisa apokuei yanaton
1.16: mh planasye adelfoi mou agaphtoi
1.17: pasa dosiv agayh kai pan dwrhma teleion anwyen estin katabainon apo tou patrov twn fwtwn par w ouk eni parallagh h trophv aposkiasma
1.18: boulhyeiv apekuhsen hmav logw alhyeiav eiv to einai hmav aparchn tina twn autou ktismatwn
1.19: iste adelfoi mou agaphtoi estw de pav anyrwpov tacuv eiv to akousai braduv eiv to lalhsai braduv eiv orghn
1.20: orgh gar androv dikaiosunhn yeou ouk ergazetai
1.21: dio apoyemenoi pasan ruparian kai perisseian kakiav en prauthti dexasye ton emfuton logon ton dunamenon swsai tav qucav umwn
1.22: ginesye de poihtai logou kai mh akroatai monon paralogizomenoi eautouv
1.23: oti ei tiv akroathv logou estin kai ou poihthv outov eoiken andri katanoounti to proswpon thv genesewv autou en esoptrw
1.24: katenohsen gar eauton kai apelhluyen kai euyewv epelayeto opoiov hn
1.25: o de parakuqav eiv nomon teleion ton thv eleuyeriav kai parameinav ouk akroathv epilhsmonhv genomenov alla poihthv ergou outov makariov en th poihsei autou estai
1.26: ei tiv dokei yrhskov einai mh calinagwgwn glwssan eautou alla apatwn kardian eautou toutou mataiov h yrhskeia
1.27: yrhskeia kayara kai amiantov para tw yew kai patri auth estin episkeptesyai orfanouv kai chrav en th yliqei autwn aspilon eauton threin apo tou kosmou

2.1: adelfoi mou mh en proswpolhmqiaiv ecete thn pistin tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou thv doxhv
2.2: ean gar eiselyh eiv sunagwghn umwn anhr crusodaktuliov en esyhti lampra eiselyh de kai ptwcov en rupara esyhti
2.3: epibleqhte de epi ton forounta thn esyhta thn lampran kai eiphte su kayou wde kalwv kai tw ptwcw eiphte su sthyi h kayou ekei upo to upopodion mou
2.4: ou diekriyhte en eautoiv kai egenesye kritai dialogismwn ponhrwn
2.5: akousate adelfoi mou agaphtoi ouc o yeov exelexato touv ptwcouv tw kosmw plousiouv en pistei kai klhronomouv thv basileiav hv ephggeilato toiv agapwsin auton
2.6: umeiv de htimasate ton ptwcon ouc oi plousioi katadunasteuousin umwn kai autoi elkousin umav eiv krithria
2.7: ouk autoi blasfhmousin to kalon onoma to epiklhyen ef umav
2.8: ei mentoi nomon teleite basilikon kata thn grafhn agaphseiv ton plhsion sou wv seauton kalwv poieite
2.9: ei de proswpolhmpteite amartian ergazesye elegcomenoi upo tou nomou wv parabatai
2.10: ostiv gar olon ton nomon thrhsh ptaish de en eni gegonen pantwn enocov
2.11: o gar eipwn mh moiceushv eipen kai mh foneushv ei de ou moiceueiv foneueiv de gegonav parabathv nomou
2.12: outwv laleite kai outwv poieite wv dia nomou eleuyeriav mellontev krinesyai
2.13: h gar krisiv aneleov tw mh poihsanti eleov katakaucatai eleov krisewv
2.14: ti ofelov adelfoi mou ean pistin legh tiv ecein erga de mh ech mh dunatai h pistiv swsai auton
2.15: ean adelfov h adelfh gumnoi uparcwsin kai leipomenoi thv efhmerou trofhv
2.16: eiph de tiv autoiv ex umwn upagete en eirhnh yermainesye kai cortazesye mh dwte de autoiv ta epithdeia tou swmatov ti ofelov
2.17: outwv kai h pistiv ean mh ech erga nekra estin kay eauthn
2.18: all erei tiv su pistin eceiv kagw erga ecw deixon moi thn pistin sou cwriv twn ergwn kagw soi deixw ek twn ergwn mou thn pistin
2.19: su pisteueiv oti eiv yeov estin kalwv poieiv kai ta daimonia pisteuousin kai frissousin
2.20: yeleiv de gnwnai w anyrwpe kene oti h pistiv cwriv twn ergwn argh estin
2.21: abraam o pathr hmwn ouk ex ergwn edikaiwyh anenegkav isaak ton uion autou epi to yusiasthrion
2.22: blepeiv oti h pistiv sunhrgei toiv ergoiv autou kai ek twn ergwn h pistiv eteleiwyh
2.23: kai eplhrwyh h grafh h legousa episteusen de abraam tw yew kai elogisyh autw eiv dikaiosunhn kai filov yeou eklhyh
2.24: orate oti ex ergwn dikaioutai anyrwpov kai ouk ek pistewv monon
2.25: omoiwv de kai raab h pornh ouk ex ergwn edikaiwyh upodexamenh touv aggelouv kai etera odw ekbalousa
2.26: wsper to swma cwriv pneumatov nekron estin outwv kai h pistiv cwriv ergwn nekra estin

3.1: mh polloi didaskaloi ginesye adelfoi mou eidotev oti meizon krima lhmqomeya
3.2: polla gar ptaiomen apantev ei tiv en logw ou ptaiei outov teleiov anhr dunatov calinagwghsai kai olon to swma
3.3: ei de twn ippwn touv calinouv eiv ta stomata ballomen eiv to peiyesyai autouv hmin kai olon to swma autwn metagomen
3.4: idou kai ta ploia thlikauta onta kai upo anemwn sklhrwn elaunomena metagetai upo elacistou phdaliou opou h ormh tou euyunontov bouletai
3.5: outwv kai h glwssa mikron melov estin kai megala aucei idou hlikon pur hlikhn ulhn anaptei
3.6: kai h glwssa pur o kosmov thv adikiav h glwssa kayistatai en toiv melesin hmwn h spilousa olon to swma kai flogizousa ton trocon thv genesewv kai flogizomenh upo thv geennhv
3.7: pasa gar fusiv yhriwn te kai peteinwn erpetwn te kai enaliwn damazetai kai dedamastai th fusei th anyrwpinh
3.8: thn de glwssan oudeiv damasai dunatai anyrwpwn akatastaton kakon mesth iou yanathforou
3.9: en auth eulogoumen ton kurion kai patera kai en auth katarwmeya touv anyrwpouv touv kay omoiwsin yeou gegonotav
3.10: ek tou autou stomatov exercetai eulogia kai katara ou crh adelfoi mou tauta outwv ginesyai
3.11: mhti h phgh ek thv authv ophv bruei to gluku kai to pikron
3.12: mh dunatai adelfoi mou sukh elaiav poihsai h ampelov suka oute alukon gluku poihsai udwr
3.13: tiv sofov kai episthmwn en umin deixatw ek thv kalhv anastrofhv ta erga autou en prauthti sofiav
3.14: ei de zhlon pikron ecete kai eriyeian en th kardia umwn mh katakaucasye kai qeudesye kata thv alhyeiav
3.15: ouk estin auth h sofia anwyen katercomenh alla epigeiov qucikh daimoniwdhv
3.16: opou gar zhlov kai eriyeia ekei akatastasia kai pan faulon pragma
3.17: h de anwyen sofia prwton men agnh estin epeita eirhnikh epieikhv eupeiyhv mesth eleouv kai karpwn agaywn adiakritov anupokritov
3.18: karpov de dikaiosunhv en eirhnh speiretai toiv poiousin eirhnhn

4.1: poyen polemoi kai poyen macai en umin ouk enteuyen ek twn hdonwn umwn twn strateuomenwn en toiv melesin umwn
4.2: epiyumeite kai ouk ecete foneuete kai zhloute kai ou dunasye epitucein macesye kai polemeite ouk ecete dia to mh aiteisyai umav
4.3: aiteite kai ou lambanete dioti kakwv aiteisye ina en taiv hdonaiv umwn dapanhshte
4.4: moicalidev ouk oidate oti h filia tou kosmou ecyra tou yeou estin ov ean oun boulhyh filov einai tou kosmou ecyrov tou yeou kayistatai
4.5: h dokeite oti kenwv h grafh legei prov fyonon epipoyei to pneuma o katwkisen en hmin
4.6: meizona de didwsin carin dio legei o yeov uperhfanoiv antitassetai tapeinoiv de didwsin carin
4.7: upotaghte oun tw yew antisthte de tw diabolw kai feuxetai af umwn
4.8: eggisate tw yew kai eggisei umin kayarisate ceirav amartwloi kai agnisate kardiav diqucoi
4.9: talaipwrhsate kai penyhsate kai klausate o gelwv umwn eiv penyov metatraphtw kai h cara eiv kathfeian
4.10: tapeinwyhte enwpion kuriou kai uqwsei umav
4.11: mh katalaleite allhlwn adelfoi o katalalwn adelfou h krinwn ton adelfon autou katalalei nomou kai krinei nomon ei de nomon krineiv ouk ei poihthv nomou alla krithv
4.12: eiv estin nomoyethv kai krithv o dunamenov swsai kai apolesai su de tiv ei o krinwn ton plhsion
4.13: age nun oi legontev shmeron h aurion poreusomeya eiv thnde thn polin kai poihsomen ekei eniauton kai emporeusomeya kai kerdhsomen
4.14: oitinev ouk epistasye thv aurion poia h zwh umwn atmiv gar este prov oligon fainomenh epeita kai afanizomenh
4.15: anti tou legein umav ean o kuriov yelh kai zhsomen kai poihsomen touto h ekeino
4.16: nun de kaucasye en taiv alazoneiaiv umwn pasa kauchsiv toiauth ponhra estin
4.17: eidoti oun kalon poiein kai mh poiounti amartia autw estin

5.1: age nun oi plousioi klausate ololuzontev epi taiv talaipwriaiv umwn taiv epercomenaiv
5.2: o ploutov umwn seshpen kai ta imatia umwn shtobrwta gegonen
5.3: o crusov umwn kai o argurov katiwtai kai o iov autwn eiv marturion umin estai kai fagetai tav sarkav umwn wv pur eyhsaurisate en escataiv hmeraiv
5.4: idou o misyov twn ergatwn twn amhsantwn tav cwrav umwn o afusterhmenov af umwn krazei kai ai boai twn yerisantwn eiv ta wta kuriou sabawy eiselhluyan
5.5: etrufhsate epi thv ghv kai espatalhsate eyreqate tav kardiav umwn en hmera sfaghv
5.6: katedikasate efoneusate ton dikaion ouk antitassetai umin
5.7: makroyumhsate oun adelfoi ewv thv parousiav tou kuriou idou o gewrgov ekdecetai ton timion karpon thv ghv makroyumwn ep autw ewv labh proimon kai oqimon
5.8: makroyumhsate kai umeiv sthrixate tav kardiav umwn oti h parousia tou kuriou hggiken
5.9: mh stenazete adelfoi kat allhlwn ina mh kriyhte idou o krithv pro twn yurwn esthken
5.10: upodeigma labete adelfoi thv kakopayiav kai thv makroyumiav touv profhtav oi elalhsan en tw onomati kuriou
5.11: idou makarizomen touv upomeinantav thn upomonhn iwb hkousate kai to telov kuriou eidete oti polusplagcnov estin o kuriov kai oiktirmwn
5.12: pro pantwn de adelfoi mou mh omnuete mhte ton ouranon mhte thn ghn mhte allon tina orkon htw de umwn to nai nai kai to ou ou ina mh upo krisin peshte
5.13: kakopayei tiv en umin proseucesyw euyumei tiv qalletw
5.14: asyenei tiv en umin proskalesasyw touv presbuterouv thv ekklhsiav kai proseuxasywsan ep auton aleiqantev elaiw en tw onomati [tou kuriou]
5.15: kai h euch thv pistewv swsei ton kamnonta kai egerei auton o kuriov kan amartiav h pepoihkwv afeyhsetai autw
5.16: exomologeisye oun allhloiv tav amartiav kai proseucesye uper allhlwn opwv iayhte polu iscuei dehsiv dikaiou energoumenh
5.17: hliav anyrwpov hn omoiopayhv hmin kai proseuch proshuxato tou mh brexai kai ouk ebrexen epi thv ghv eniautouv treiv kai mhnav ex
5.18: kai palin proshuxato kai o ouranov ueton edwken kai h gh eblasthsen ton karpon authv
5.19: adelfoi mou ean tiv en umin planhyh apo thv alhyeiav kai epistreqh tiv auton
5.20: ginwskete oti o epistreqav amartwlon ek planhv odou autou swsei quchn autou ek yanatou kai kaluqei plhyov amartiwn

1.1: en arch hn o logov kai o logov hn prov ton yeon kai yeov hn o logov
1.2: outov hn en arch prov ton yeon
1.3: panta di autou egeneto kai cwriv autou egeneto oude en o gegonen
1.4: en autw zwh hn kai h zwh hn to fwv twn anyrwpwn
1.5: kai to fwv en th skotia fainei kai h skotia auto ou katelaben
1.6: egeneto anyrwpov apestalmenov para yeou onoma autw iwannhv
1.7: outov hlyen eiv marturian ina marturhsh peri tou fwtov ina pantev pisteuswsin di autou
1.8: ouk hn ekeinov to fwv all ina marturhsh peri tou fwtov
1.9: hn to fwv to alhyinon o fwtizei panta anyrwpon ercomenon eiv ton kosmon
1.10: en tw kosmw hn kai o kosmov di autou egeneto kai o kosmov auton ouk egnw
1.11: eiv ta idia hlyen kai oi idioi auton ou parelabon
1.12: osoi de elabon auton edwken autoiv exousian tekna yeou genesyai toiv pisteuousin eiv to onoma autou
1.13: oi ouk ex aimatwn oude ek yelhmatov sarkov oude ek yelhmatov androv all ek yeou egennhyhsan
1.14: kai o logov sarx egeneto kai eskhnwsen en hmin kai eyeasameya thn doxan autou doxan wv monogenouv para patrov plhrhv caritov kai alhyeiav
1.15: iwannhv marturei peri autou kai kekragen legwn outov hn o eipwn o opisw mou ercomenov emprosyen mou gegonen oti prwtov mou hn
1.16: oti ek tou plhrwmatov autou hmeiv pantev elabomen kai carin anti caritov
1.17: oti o nomov dia mwusewv edoyh h cariv kai h alhyeia dia ihsou cristou egeneto
1.18: yeon oudeiv ewraken pwpote monogenhv yeov o wn eiv ton kolpon tou patrov ekeinov exhghsato
1.19: kai auth estin h marturia tou iwannou ote apesteilan prov auton oi ioudaioi ex ierosolumwn iereiv kai leuitav ina erwthswsin auton su tiv ei
1.20: kai wmologhsen kai ouk hrnhsato kai wmologhsen oti egw ouk eimi o cristov
1.21: kai hrwthsan auton ti oun [su] hliav ei kai legei ouk eimi o profhthv ei su kai apekriyh ou
1.22: eipan oun autw tiv ei ina apokrisin dwmen toiv pemqasin hmav ti legeiv peri seautou
1.23: efh egw fwnh bowntov en th erhmw euyunate thn odon kuriou kaywv eipen hsaiav o profhthv
1.24: kai apestalmenoi hsan ek twn farisaiwn
1.25: kai hrwthsan auton kai eipan autw ti oun baptizeiv ei su ouk ei o cristov oude hliav oude o profhthv
1.26: apekriyh autoiv o iwannhv legwn egw baptizw en udati mesov umwn sthkei on umeiv ouk oidate
1.27: opisw mou ercomenov ou ouk eimi [egw] axiov ina lusw autou ton imanta tou upodhmatov
1.28: tauta en bhyania egeneto peran tou iordanou opou hn o iwannhv baptizwn
1.29: th epaurion blepei ton ihsoun ercomenon prov auton kai legei ide o amnov tou yeou o airwn thn amartian tou kosmou
1.30: outov estin uper ou egw eipon opisw mou ercetai anhr ov emprosyen mou gegonen oti prwtov mou hn
1.31: kagw ouk hdein auton all ina fanerwyh tw israhl dia touto hlyon egw en udati baptizwn
1.32: kai emarturhsen iwannhv legwn oti teyeamai to pneuma katabainon wv peristeran ex ouranou kai emeinen ep auton
1.33: kagw ouk hdein auton all o pemqav me baptizein en udati ekeinov moi eipen ef on an idhv to pneuma katabainon kai menon ep auton outov estin o baptizwn en pneumati agiw
1.34: kagw ewraka kai memarturhka oti outov estin o uiov tou yeou
1.35: th epaurion palin isthkei iwannhv kai ek twn mayhtwn autou duo
1.36: kai embleqav tw ihsou peripatounti legei ide o amnov tou yeou
1.37: kai hkousan oi duo mayhtai autou lalountov kai hkolouyhsan tw ihsou
1.38: strafeiv de o ihsouv kai yeasamenov autouv akolouyountav legei autoiv ti zhteite oi de eipan autw rabbi o legetai meyermhneuomenon didaskale pou meneiv
1.39: legei autoiv ercesye kai oqesye hlyan oun kai eidan pou menei kai par autw emeinan thn hmeran ekeinhn wra hn wv dekath
1.40: hn andreav o adelfov simwnov petrou eiv ek twn duo twn akousantwn para iwannou kai akolouyhsantwn autw
1.41: euriskei outov prwton ton adelfon ton idion simwna kai legei autw eurhkamen ton messian o estin meyermhneuomenon cristov
1.42: hgagen auton prov ton ihsoun embleqav autw o ihsouv eipen su ei simwn o uiov iwannou su klhyhsh khfav o ermhneuetai petrov
1.43: th epaurion hyelhsen exelyein eiv thn galilaian kai euriskei filippon kai legei autw o ihsouv akolouyei moi
1.44: hn de o filippov apo bhysaida ek thv polewv andreou kai petrou
1.45: euriskei filippov ton nayanahl kai legei autw on egraqen mwushv en tw nomw kai oi profhtai eurhkamen ihsoun uion tou iwshf ton apo nazaret
1.46: kai eipen autw nayanahl ek nazaret dunatai ti agayon einai legei autw o filippov ercou kai ide
1.47: eiden ihsouv ton nayanahl ercomenon prov auton kai legei peri autou ide alhywv israhlithv en w dolov ouk estin
1.48: legei autw nayanahl poyen me ginwskeiv apekriyh ihsouv kai eipen autw pro tou se filippon fwnhsai onta upo thn sukhn eidon se
1.49: apekriyh autw nayanahl rabbi su ei o uiov tou yeou su basileuv ei tou israhl
1.50: apekriyh ihsouv kai eipen autw oti eipon soi oti eidon se upokatw thv sukhv pisteueiv meizw toutwn oqh
1.51: kai legei autw amhn amhn legw umin oqesye ton ouranon anewgota kai touv aggelouv tou yeou anabainontav kai katabainontav epi ton uion tou anyrwpou

2.1: kai th hmera th trith gamov egeneto en kana thv galilaiav kai hn h mhthr tou ihsou ekei
2.2: eklhyh de kai o ihsouv kai oi mayhtai autou eiv ton gamon
2.3: kai usterhsantov oinou legei h mhthr tou ihsou prov auton oinon ouk ecousin
2.4: kai legei auth o ihsouv ti emoi kai soi gunai oupw hkei h wra mou
2.5: legei h mhthr autou toiv diakonoiv o ti an legh umin poihsate
2.6: hsan de ekei liyinai udriai ex kata ton kayarismon twn ioudaiwn keimenai cwrousai ana metrhtav duo h treiv
2.7: legei autoiv o ihsouv gemisate tav udriav udatov kai egemisan autav ewv anw
2.8: kai legei autoiv antlhsate nun kai ferete tw arcitriklinw oi de hnegkan
2.9: wv de egeusato o arcitriklinov to udwr oinon gegenhmenon kai ouk hdei poyen estin oi de diakonoi hdeisan oi hntlhkotev to udwr fwnei ton numfion o arcitriklinov
2.10: kai legei autw pav anyrwpov prwton ton kalon oinon tiyhsin kai otan meyusywsin ton elassw su tethrhkav ton kalon oinon ewv arti
2.11: tauthn epoihsen archn twn shmeiwn o ihsouv en kana thv galilaiav kai efanerwsen thn doxan autou kai episteusan eiv auton oi mayhtai autou
2.12: meta touto katebh eiv kafarnaoum autov kai h mhthr autou kai oi adelfoi kai oi mayhtai autou kai ekei emeinan ou pollav hmerav
2.13: kai egguv hn to pasca twn ioudaiwn kai anebh eiv ierosoluma o ihsouv
2.14: kai euren en tw ierw touv pwlountav boav kai probata kai peristerav kai touv kermatistav kayhmenouv
2.15: kai poihsav fragellion ek scoiniwn pantav exebalen ek tou ierou ta te probata kai touv boav kai twn kollubistwn execeen ta kermata kai tav trapezav anetreqen
2.16: kai toiv tav peristerav pwlousin eipen arate tauta enteuyen mh poieite ton oikon tou patrov mou oikon emporiou
2.17: emnhsyhsan oi mayhtai autou oti gegrammenon estin o zhlov tou oikou sou katafagetai me
2.18: apekriyhsan oun oi ioudaioi kai eipan autw ti shmeion deiknueiv hmin oti tauta poieiv
2.19: apekriyh ihsouv kai eipen autoiv lusate ton naon touton kai [en] trisin hmeraiv egerw auton
2.20: eipan oun oi ioudaioi tesserakonta kai ex etesin oikodomhyh o naov outov kai su en trisin hmeraiv egereiv auton
2.21: ekeinov de elegen peri tou naou tou swmatov autou
2.22: ote oun hgeryh ek nekrwn emnhsyhsan oi mayhtai autou oti touto elegen kai episteusan th grafh kai tw logw on eipen o ihsouv
2.23: wv de hn en toiv ierosolumoiv en tw pasca en th eorth polloi episteusan eiv to onoma autou yewrountev autou ta shmeia a epoiei
2.24: autov de ihsouv ouk episteuen auton autoiv dia to auton ginwskein pantav
2.25: kai oti ou creian eicen ina tiv marturhsh peri tou anyrwpou autov gar eginwsken ti hn en tw anyrwpw

3.1: hn de anyrwpov ek twn farisaiwn nikodhmov onoma autw arcwn twn ioudaiwn
3.2: outov hlyen prov auton nuktov kai eipen autw rabbi oidamen oti apo yeou elhluyav didaskalov oudeiv gar dunatai tauta ta shmeia poiein a su poieiv ean mh h o yeov met autou
3.3: apekriyh ihsouv kai eipen autw amhn amhn legw soi ean mh tiv gennhyh anwyen ou dunatai idein thn basileian tou yeou
3.4: legei prov auton [o] nikodhmov pwv dunatai anyrwpov gennhyhnai gerwn wn mh dunatai eiv thn koilian thv mhtrov autou deuteron eiselyein kai gennhyhnai
3.5: apekriyh [o] ihsouv amhn amhn legw soi ean mh tiv gennhyh ex udatov kai pneumatov ou dunatai eiselyein eiv thn basileian tou yeou
3.6: to gegennhmenon ek thv sarkov sarx estin kai to gegennhmenon ek tou pneumatov pneuma estin
3.7: mh yaumashv oti eipon soi dei umav gennhyhnai anwyen
3.8: to pneuma opou yelei pnei kai thn fwnhn autou akoueiv all ouk oidav poyen ercetai kai pou upagei outwv estin pav o gegennhmenov ek tou pneumatov
3.9: apekriyh nikodhmov kai eipen autw pwv dunatai tauta genesyai
3.10: apekriyh ihsouv kai eipen autw su ei o didaskalov tou israhl kai tauta ou ginwskeiv
3.11: amhn amhn legw soi oti o oidamen laloumen kai o ewrakamen marturoumen kai thn marturian hmwn ou lambanete
3.12: ei ta epigeia eipon umin kai ou pisteuete pwv ean eipw umin ta epourania pisteusete
3.13: kai oudeiv anabebhken eiv ton ouranon ei mh o ek tou ouranou katabav o uiov tou anyrwpou
3.14: kai kaywv mwushv uqwsen ton ofin en th erhmw outwv uqwyhnai dei ton uion tou anyrwpou
3.15: ina pav o pisteuwn en autw ech zwhn aiwnion
3.16: outwv gar hgaphsen o yeov ton kosmon wste ton uion ton monogenh edwken ina pav o pisteuwn eiv auton mh apolhtai alla ech zwhn aiwnion
3.17: ou gar apesteilen o yeov ton uion eiv ton kosmon ina krinh ton kosmon all ina swyh o kosmov di autou

3.19: auth de estin h krisiv oti to fwv elhluyen eiv ton kosmon kai hgaphsan oi anyrwpoi mallon to skotov h to fwv hn gar autwn ponhra ta erga

3.31: o anwyen ercomenov epanw pantwn estin o wn ek thv ghv ek thv ghv estin kai ek thv ghv lalei o ek tou ouranou ercomenov epanw pantwn estin

4.1: wv oun egnw o kuriov oti hkousan oi farisaioi oti ihsouv pleionav mayhtav poiei kai baptizei [h] iwannhv

4.7: ercetai gunh ek thv samariav antlhsai udwr legei auth o ihsouv dov moi pein

4.9: legei oun autw h gunh h samareitiv pwv su ioudaiov wn par emou pein aiteiv gunaikov samareitidov oushv [ou gar sugcrwntai ioudaioi samareitaiv]

4.11: legei autw kurie oute antlhma eceiv kai to frear estin bayu poyen oun eceiv to udwr to zwn
4.12: mh su meizwn ei tou patrov hmwn iakwb ov edwken hmin to frear kai autov ex autou epien kai oi uioi autou kai ta yremmata autou
4.13: apekriyh ihsouv kai eipen auth pav o pinwn ek tou udatov toutou diqhsei palin
4.14: ov d an pih ek tou udatov ou egw dwsw autw ou mh diqhsei eiv ton aiwna alla to udwr o dwsw autw genhsetai en autw phgh udatov allomenou eiv zwhn aiwnion
4.15: legei prov auton h gunh kurie dov moi touto to udwr ina mh diqw mhde diercwmai enyade antlein
4.16: legei auth upage fwnhson sou ton andra kai elye enyade
4.17: apekriyh h gunh kai eipen [autw] ouk ecw andra legei auth o ihsouv kalwv eipev oti andra ouk ecw
4.18: pente gar andrav escev kai nun on eceiv ouk estin sou anhr touto alhyev eirhkav
4.19: legei autw h gunh kurie yewrw oti profhthv ei su
4.20: oi paterev hmwn en tw orei toutw prosekunhsan kai umeiv legete oti en ierosolumoiv estin o topov opou proskunein dei

4.24: pneuma o yeov kai touv proskunountav auton en pneumati kai alhyeia dei proskunein
4.25: legei autw h gunh oida oti messiav ercetai o legomenov cristov otan elyh ekeinov anaggelei hmin apanta

4.27: kai epi toutw hlyan oi mayhtai autou kai eyaumazon oti meta gunaikov elalei oudeiv mentoi eipen ti zhteiv h ti laleiv met authv
4.28: afhken oun thn udrian authv h gunh kai aphlyen eiv thn polin kai legei toiv anyrwpoiv
4.29: deute idete anyrwpon ov eipen moi panta a epoihsa mhti outov estin o cristov
4.30: exhlyon ek thv polewv kai hrconto prov auton
4.31: en tw metaxu hrwtwn auton oi mayhtai legontev rabbi fage
4.32: o de eipen autoiv egw brwsin ecw fagein hn umeiv ouk oidate
4.33: elegon oun oi mayhtai prov allhlouv mh tiv hnegken autw fagein
4.34: legei autoiv o ihsouv emon brwma estin ina poihsw to yelhma tou pemqantov me kai teleiwsw autou to ergon
4.35: ouc umeiv legete oti eti tetramhnov estin kai o yerismov ercetai idou legw umin eparate touv ofyalmouv umwn kai yeasasye tav cwrav oti leukai eisin prov yerismon hdh
4.36: o yerizwn misyon lambanei kai sunagei karpon eiv zwhn aiwnion ina o speirwn omou cairh kai o yerizwn

4.44: autov gar ihsouv emarturhsen oti profhthv en th idia patridi timhn ouk ecei

4.49: legei prov auton o basilikov kurie katabhyi prin apoyanein to paidion mou

5.1: meta tauta hn eorth twn ioudaiwn kai anebh ihsouv eiv ierosoluma

5.30: ou dunamai egw poiein ap emautou ouden kaywv akouw krinw kai h krisiv h emh dikaia estin oti ou zhtw to yelhma to emon alla to yelhma tou pemqantov me

11.1: hn de tiv asyenwn lazarov apo bhyaniav ek thv kwmhv mariav kai maryav thv adelfhv authv

11.15: kai cairw di umav ina pisteushte oti ouk hmhn ekei alla agwmen prov auton

11.24: legei autw h marya oida oti anasthsetai en th anastasei en th escath hmera

13.1: pro de thv eorthv tou pasca eidwv o ihsouv oti hlyen autou h wra ina metabh ek tou kosmou toutou prov ton patera agaphsav touv idiouv touv en tw kosmw eiv telov hgaphsen autouv

13.31: ote oun exhlyen legei ihsouv nun edoxasyh o uiov tou anyrwpou kai o yeov edoxasyh en autw
13.32: kai o yeov doxasei auton en autw kai euyuv doxasei auton
13.33: teknia eti mikron mey umwn eimi zhthsete me kai kaywv eipon toiv ioudaioiv oti opou egw upagw umeiv ou dunasye elyein kai umin legw arti
13.34: entolhn kainhn didwmi umin ina agapate allhlouv kaywv hgaphsa umav ina kai umeiv agapate allhlouv
13.35: en toutw gnwsontai pantev oti emoi mayhtai este ean agaphn echte en allhloiv
13.36: legei autw simwn petrov kurie pou upageiv apekriyh ihsouv opou upagw ou dunasai moi nun akolouyhsai akolouyhseiv de usteron
13.37: legei autw [o] petrov kurie dia ti ou dunamai soi akolouyein arti thn quchn mou uper sou yhsw
13.38: apokrinetai ihsouv thn quchn sou uper emou yhseiv amhn amhn legw soi ou mh alektwr fwnhsh ewv ou arnhsh me triv

14.1: mh tarassesyw umwn h kardia pisteuete eiv ton yeon kai eiv eme pisteuete
14.2: en th oikia tou patrov mou monai pollai eisin ei de mh eipon an umin oti poreuomai etoimasai topon umin
14.3: kai ean poreuyw kai etoimasw topon umin palin ercomai kai paralhmqomai umav prov emauton ina opou eimi egw kai umeiv hte
14.4: kai opou egw upagw oidate thn odon
14.5: legei autw ywmav kurie ouk oidamen pou upageiv pwv oidamen thn odon
14.6: legei autw ihsouv egw eimi h odov kai h alhyeia kai h zwh oudeiv ercetai prov ton patera ei mh di emou
14.7: ei egnwkeite me kai ton patera mou an hdeite ap arti ginwskete auton kai ewrakate
14.8: legei autw filippov kurie deixon hmin ton patera kai arkei hmin
14.9: legei autw [o] ihsouv tosouton cronon mey umwn eimi kai ouk egnwkav me filippe o ewrakwv eme ewraken ton patera pwv su legeiv deixon hmin ton patera
14.10: ou pisteueiv oti egw en tw patri kai o pathr en emoi estin ta rhmata a egw legw umin ap emautou ou lalw o de pathr en emoi menwn poiei ta erga autou
14.11: pisteuete moi oti egw en tw patri kai o pathr en emoi ei de mh dia ta erga auta pisteuete
14.12: amhn amhn legw umin o pisteuwn eiv eme ta erga a egw poiw kakeinov poihsei kai meizona toutwn poihsei oti egw prov ton patera poreuomai
14.13: kai o ti an aithshte en tw onomati mou touto poihsw ina doxasyh o pathr en tw uiw
14.14: ean ti aithshte [me] en tw onomati mou touto poihsw
14.15: ean agapate me tav entolav tav emav thrhsete
14.16: kagw erwthsw ton patera kai allon paraklhton dwsei umin ina h mey umwn eiv ton aiwna
14.17: to pneuma thv alhyeiav o o kosmov ou dunatai labein oti ou yewrei auto oude ginwskei umeiv ginwskete auto oti par umin menei kai en umin estin
14.18: ouk afhsw umav orfanouv ercomai prov umav
14.19: eti mikron kai o kosmov me ouketi yewrei umeiv de yewreite me oti egw zw kai umeiv zhsete
14.20: en ekeinh th hmera umeiv gnwsesye oti egw en tw patri mou kai umeiv en emoi kagw en umin
14.21: o ecwn tav entolav mou kai thrwn autav ekeinov estin o agapwn me o de agapwn me agaphyhsetai upo tou patrov mou kagw agaphsw auton kai emfanisw autw emauton
14.22: legei autw ioudav ouc o iskariwthv kurie ti gegonen oti hmin melleiv emfanizein seauton kai ouci tw kosmw
14.23: apekriyh ihsouv kai eipen autw ean tiv agapa me ton logon mou thrhsei kai o pathr mou agaphsei auton kai prov auton eleusomeya kai monhn par autw poihsomeya
14.24: o mh agapwn me touv logouv mou ou threi kai o logov on akouete ouk estin emov alla tou pemqantov me patrov
14.25: tauta lelalhka umin par umin menwn
14.26: o de paraklhtov to pneuma to agion o pemqei o pathr en tw onomati mou ekeinov umav didaxei panta kai upomnhsei umav panta a eipon umin egw
14.27: eirhnhn afihmi umin eirhnhn thn emhn didwmi umin ou kaywv o kosmov didwsin egw didwmi umin mh tarassesyw umwn h kardia mhde deiliatw
14.28: hkousate oti egw eipon umin upagw kai ercomai prov umav ei hgapate me ecarhte an oti poreuomai prov ton patera oti o pathr meizwn mou estin
14.29: kai nun eirhka umin prin genesyai ina otan genhtai pisteushte
14.30: ouketi polla lalhsw mey umwn ercetai gar o tou kosmou arcwn kai en emoi ouk ecei ouden
14.31: all ina gnw o kosmov oti agapw ton patera kai kaywv entolhn edwken moi o pathr outwv poiw egeiresye agwmen enteuyen

15.1: egw eimi h ampelov h alhyinh kai o pathr mou o gewrgov estin
15.2: pan klhma en emoi mh feron karpon airei auto kai pan to karpon feron kayairei auto ina karpon pleiona ferh
15.3: hdh umeiv kayaroi este dia ton logon on lelalhka umin
15.4: meinate en emoi kagw en umin kaywv to klhma ou dunatai karpon ferein af eautou ean mh menh en th ampelw outwv oude umeiv ean mh en emoi menhte
15.5: egw eimi h ampelov umeiv ta klhmata o menwn en emoi kagw en autw outov ferei karpon polun oti cwriv emou ou dunasye poiein ouden
15.6: ean mh tiv menh en emoi eblhyh exw wv to klhma kai exhranyh kai sunagousin auta kai eiv to pur ballousin kai kaietai
15.7: ean meinhte en emoi kai ta rhmata mou en umin meinh o ean yelhte aithsasye kai genhsetai umin
15.8: en toutw edoxasyh o pathr mou ina karpon polun ferhte kai genhsye emoi mayhtai
15.9: kaywv hgaphsen me o pathr kagw umav hgaphsa meinate en th agaph th emh
15.10: ean tav entolav mou thrhshte meneite en th agaph mou kaywv egw tou patrov tav entolav tethrhka kai menw autou en th agaph
15.11: tauta lelalhka umin ina h cara h emh en umin h kai h cara umwn plhrwyh
15.12: auth estin h entolh h emh ina agapate allhlouv kaywv hgaphsa umav
15.13: meizona tauthv agaphn oudeiv ecei ina tiv thn quchn autou yh uper twn filwn autou
15.14: umeiv filoi mou este ean poihte o egw entellomai umin
15.15: ouketi legw umav doulouv oti o doulov ouk oiden ti poiei autou o kuriov umav de eirhka filouv oti panta a hkousa para tou patrov mou egnwrisa umin
15.16: ouc umeiv me exelexasye all egw exelexamhn umav kai eyhka umav ina umeiv upaghte kai karpon ferhte kai o karpov umwn menh ina o ti an aithshte ton patera en tw onomati mou dw umin
15.17: tauta entellomai umin ina agapate allhlouv
15.18: ei o kosmov umav misei ginwskete oti eme prwton umwn memishken
15.19: ei ek tou kosmou hte o kosmov an to idion efilei oti de ek tou kosmou ouk este all egw exelexamhn umav ek tou kosmou dia touto misei umav o kosmov
15.20: mnhmoneuete tou logou ou egw eipon umin ouk estin doulov meizwn tou kuriou autou ei eme ediwxan kai umav diwxousin ei ton logon mou ethrhsan kai ton umeteron thrhsousin
15.21: alla tauta panta poihsousin eiv umav dia to onoma mou oti ouk oidasin ton pemqanta me
15.22: ei mh hlyon kai elalhsa autoiv amartian ouk eicosan nun de profasin ouk ecousin peri thv amartiav autwn
15.23: o eme miswn kai ton patera mou misei
15.24: ei ta erga mh epoihsa en autoiv a oudeiv allov epoihsen amartian ouk eicosan nun de kai ewrakasin kai memishkasin kai eme kai ton patera mou
15.25: all ina plhrwyh o logov o en tw nomw autwn gegrammenov oti emishsan me dwrean
15.26: otan elyh o paraklhtov on egw pemqw umin para tou patrov to pneuma thv alhyeiav o para tou patrov ekporeuetai ekeinov marturhsei peri emou
15.27: kai umeiv de martureite oti ap archv met emou este

16.1: tauta lelalhka umin ina mh skandalisyhte
16.2: aposunagwgouv poihsousin umav all ercetai wra ina pav o apokteinav [umav] doxh latreian prosferein tw yew
16.3: kai tauta poihsousin oti ouk egnwsan ton patera oude eme
16.4: alla tauta lelalhka umin ina otan elyh h wra autwn mnhmoneuhte autwn oti egw eipon umin tauta de umin ex archv ouk eipon oti mey umwn hmhn
16.5: nun de upagw prov ton pemqanta me kai oudeiv ex umwn erwta me pou upageiv
16.6: all oti tauta lelalhka umin h luph peplhrwken umwn thn kardian
16.7: all egw thn alhyeian legw umin sumferei umin ina egw apelyw ean gar mh apelyw o paraklhtov ou mh elyh prov umav ean de poreuyw pemqw auton prov umav
16.8: kai elywn ekeinov elegxei ton kosmon peri amartiav kai peri dikaiosunhv kai peri krisewv
16.9: peri amartiav men oti ou pisteuousin eiv eme
16.10: peri dikaiosunhv de oti prov ton patera upagw kai ouketi yewreite me
16.11: peri de krisewv oti o arcwn tou kosmou toutou kekritai
16.12: eti polla ecw umin legein all ou dunasye bastazein arti
16.13: otan de elyh ekeinov to pneuma thv alhyeiav odhghsei umav eiv thn alhyeian pasan ou gar lalhsei af eautou all osa akouei lalhsei kai ta ercomena anaggelei umin
16.14: ekeinov eme doxasei oti ek tou emou lhmqetai kai anaggelei umin
16.15: panta osa ecei o pathr ema estin dia touto eipon oti ek tou emou lambanei kai anaggelei umin
16.16: mikron kai ouketi yewreite me kai palin mikron kai oqesye me
16.17: eipan oun ek twn mayhtwn autou prov allhlouv ti estin touto o legei hmin mikron kai ou yewreite me kai palin mikron kai oqesye me kai oti upagw prov ton patera
16.18: elegon oun ti estin touto o legei mikron ouk oidamen [ti lalei]
16.19: egnw ihsouv oti hyelon auton erwtan kai eipen autoiv peri toutou zhteite met allhlwn oti eipon mikron kai ou yewreite me kai palin mikron kai oqesye me
16.20: amhn amhn legw umin oti klausete kai yrhnhsete umeiv o de kosmov carhsetai umeiv luphyhsesye all h luph umwn eiv caran genhsetai
16.21: h gunh otan tikth luphn ecei oti hlyen h wra authv otan de gennhsh to paidion ouketi mnhmoneuei thv yliqewv dia thn caran oti egennhyh anyrwpov eiv ton kosmon
16.22: kai umeiv oun nun men luphn ecete palin de oqomai umav kai carhsetai umwn h kardia kai thn caran umwn oudeiv arei af umwn
16.23: kai en ekeinh th hmera eme ouk erwthsete ouden amhn amhn legw umin an ti aithshte ton patera dwsei umin en tw onomati mou
16.24: ewv arti ouk hthsate ouden en tw onomati mou aiteite kai lhmqesye ina h cara umwn h peplhrwmenh
16.25: tauta en paroimiaiv lelalhka umin ercetai wra ote ouketi en paroimiaiv lalhsw umin alla parrhsia peri tou patrov apaggelw umin
16.26: en ekeinh th hmera en tw onomati mou aithsesye kai ou legw umin oti egw erwthsw ton patera peri umwn
16.27: autov gar o pathr filei umav oti umeiv eme pefilhkate kai pepisteukate oti egw para tou patrov exhlyon
16.28: exhlyon ek tou patrov kai elhluya eiv ton kosmon palin afihmi ton kosmon kai poreuomai prov ton patera
16.29: legousin oi mayhtai autou ide nun en parrhsia laleiv kai paroimian oudemian legeiv
16.30: nun oidamen oti oidav panta kai ou creian eceiv ina tiv se erwta en toutw pisteuomen oti apo yeou exhlyev
16.32: idou ercetai wra kai elhluyen ina skorpisyhte ekastov eiv ta idia kame monon afhte kai ouk eimi monov oti o pathr met emou estin
16.33: tauta lelalhka umin ina en emoi eirhnhn echte en tw kosmw yliqin ecete alla yarseite egw nenikhka ton kosmon

17.1: tauta elalhsen ihsouv kai eparav touv ofyalmouv autou eiv ton ouranon eipen pater elhluyen h wra doxason sou ton uion ina o uiov doxash se
17.2: kaywv edwkav autw exousian pashv sarkov ina pan o dedwkav autw dwsei autoiv zwhn aiwnion
17.3: auth de estin h aiwniov zwh ina ginwskwsin se ton monon alhyinon yeon kai on apesteilav ihsoun criston
17.4: egw se edoxasa epi thv ghv to ergon teleiwsav o dedwkav moi ina poihsw
17.5: kai nun doxason me su pater para seautw th doxh h eicon pro tou ton kosmon einai para soi
17.6: efanerwsa sou to onoma toiv anyrwpoiv ouv edwkav moi ek tou kosmou soi hsan kamoi autouv edwkav kai ton logon sou tethrhkan
17.7: nun egnwkan oti panta osa edwkav moi para sou eisin
17.8: oti ta rhmata a edwkav moi dedwka autoiv kai autoi elabon kai egnwsan alhywv oti para sou exhlyon kai episteusan oti su me apesteilav
17.9: egw peri autwn erwtw ou peri tou kosmou erwtw alla peri wn dedwkav moi oti soi eisin
17.10: kai ta ema panta sa estin kai ta sa ema kai dedoxasmai en autoiv
17.11: kai ouketi eimi en tw kosmw kai autoi en tw kosmw eisin kagw prov se ercomai pater agie thrhson autouv en tw onomati sou w dedwkav moi ina wsin en kaywv hmeiv
17.12: ote hmhn met autwn egw ethroun autouv en tw onomati sou w dedwkav moi kai efulaxa kai oudeiv ex autwn apwleto ei mh o uiov thv apwleiav ina h grafh plhrwyh
17.13: nun de prov se ercomai kai tauta lalw en tw kosmw ina ecwsin thn caran thn emhn peplhrwmenhn en eautoiv
17.14: egw dedwka autoiv ton logon sou kai o kosmov emishsen autouv oti ouk eisin ek tou kosmou kaywv egw ouk eimi ek tou kosmou
17.15: ouk erwtw ina arhv autouv ek tou kosmou all ina thrhshv autouv ek tou ponhrou
17.16: ek tou kosmou ouk eisin kaywv egw ouk eimi ek tou kosmou
17.17: agiason autouv en th alhyeia o logov o sov alhyeia estin
17.18: kaywv eme apesteilav eiv ton kosmon kagw apesteila autouv eiv ton kosmon
17.19: kai uper autwn [egw] agiazw emauton ina wsin kai autoi hgiasmenoi en alhyeia
17.20: ou peri toutwn de erwtw monon alla kai peri twn pisteuontwn dia tou logou autwn eiv eme
17.21: ina pantev en wsin kaywv su pathr en emoi kagw en soi ina kai autoi en hmin wsin ina o kosmov pisteuh oti su me apesteilav
17.22: kagw thn doxan hn dedwkav moi dedwka autoiv ina wsin en kaywv hmeiv en
17.23: egw en autoiv kai su en emoi ina wsin teteleiwmenoi eiv en ina ginwskh o kosmov oti su me apesteilav kai hgaphsav autouv kaywv eme hgaphsav
17.24: pathr o dedwkav moi yelw ina opou eimi egw kakeinoi wsin met emou ina yewrwsin thn doxan thn emhn hn dedwkav moi oti hgaphsav me pro katabolhv kosmou
17.25: pathr dikaie kai o kosmov se ouk egnw egw de se egnwn kai outoi egnwsan oti su me apesteilav
17.26: kai egnwrisa autoiv to onoma sou kai gnwrisw ina h agaph hn hgaphsav me en autoiv h kagw en autoiv

18.1: tauta eipwn ihsouv exhlyen sun toiv mayhtaiv autou peran tou ceimarrou twn kedrwn opou hn khpov eiv on eishlyen autov kai oi mayhtai autou
18.2: hdei de kai ioudav o paradidouv auton ton topon oti pollakiv sunhcyh ihsouv ekei meta twn mayhtwn autou
18.3: o oun ioudav labwn thn speiran kai ek twn arcierewn kai [ek] twn farisaiwn uphretav ercetai ekei meta fanwn kai lampadwn kai oplwn
18.4: ihsouv oun eidwv panta ta ercomena ep auton exhlyen kai legei autoiv tina zhteite
18.5: apekriyhsan autw ihsoun ton nazwraion legei autoiv egw eimi isthkei de kai ioudav o paradidouv auton met autwn
18.6: wv oun eipen autoiv egw eimi aphlyan eiv ta opisw kai epesan camai
18.7: palin oun ephrwthsen autouv tina zhteite oi de eipan ihsoun ton nazwraion
18.8: apekriyh ihsouv eipon umin oti egw eimi ei oun eme zhteite afete toutouv upagein
18.9: ina plhrwyh o logov on eipen oti ouv dedwkav moi ouk apwlesa ex autwn oudena
18.10: simwn oun petrov ecwn macairan eilkusen authn kai epaisen ton tou arcierewv doulon kai apekoqen autou to wtarion to dexion hn de onoma tw doulw malcov
18.11: eipen oun o ihsouv tw petrw bale thn macairan eiv thn yhkhn to pothrion o dedwken moi o pathr ou mh piw auto
18.12: h oun speira kai o ciliarcov kai oi uphretai twn ioudaiwn sunelabon ton ihsoun kai edhsan auton
18.13: kai hgagon prov annan prwton hn gar penyerov tou kaiafa ov hn arciereuv tou eniautou ekeinou
18.14: hn de kaiafav o sumbouleusav toiv ioudaioiv oti sumferei ena anyrwpon apoyanein uper tou laou
18.15: hkolouyei de tw ihsou simwn petrov kai allov mayhthv o de mayhthv ekeinov hn gnwstov tw arcierei kai suneishlyen tw ihsou eiv thn aulhn tou arcierewv
18.16: o de petrov isthkei prov th yura exw exhlyen oun o mayhthv o allov o gnwstov tou arcierewv kai eipen th yurwrw kai eishgagen ton petron
18.17: legei oun tw petrw h paidiskh h yurwrov mh kai su ek twn mayhtwn ei tou anyrwpou toutou legei ekeinov ouk eimi
18.18: isthkeisan de oi douloi kai oi uphretai anyrakian pepoihkotev oti qucov hn kai eyermainonto hn de kai o petrov met autwn estwv kai yermainomenov
18.19: o oun arciereuv hrwthsen ton ihsoun peri twn mayhtwn autou kai peri thv didachv autou
18.20: apekriyh autw ihsouv egw parrhsia lelalhka tw kosmw egw pantote edidaxa en sunagwgh kai en tw ierw opou pantev oi ioudaioi sunercontai kai en kruptw elalhsa ouden
18.21: ti me erwtav erwthson touv akhkootav ti elalhsa autoiv ide outoi oidasin a eipon egw
18.22: tauta de autou eipontov eiv paresthkwv twn uphretwn edwken rapisma tw ihsou eipwn outwv apokrinh tw arcierei
18.23: apekriyh autw ihsouv ei kakwv elalhsa marturhson peri tou kakou ei de kalwv ti me dereiv
18.24: apesteilen oun auton o annav dedemenon prov kaiafan ton arcierea
18.25: hn de simwn petrov estwv kai yermainomenov eipon oun autw mh kai su ek twn mayhtwn autou ei hrnhsato ekeinov kai eipen ouk eimi
18.26: legei eiv ek twn doulwn tou arcierewv suggenhv wn ou apekoqen petrov to wtion ouk egw se eidon en tw khpw met autou
18.27: palin oun hrnhsato petrov kai euyewv alektwr efwnhsen
18.28: agousin oun ton ihsoun apo tou kaiafa eiv to praitwrion hn de prwi kai autoi ouk eishlyon eiv to praitwrion ina mh mianywsin alla fagwsin to pasca
18.29: exhlyen oun o pilatov exw prov autouv kai fhsin tina kathgorian ferete tou anyrwpou toutou
18.30: apekriyhsan kai eipan autw ei mh hn outov kakon poiwn ouk an soi paredwkamen auton
18.31: eipen oun autoiv pilatov labete auton umeiv kai kata ton nomon umwn krinate auton eipon autw oi ioudaioi hmin ouk exestin apokteinai oudena
18.32: ina o logov tou ihsou plhrwyh on eipen shmainwn poiw yanatw hmellen apoynhskein
18.33: eishlyen oun palin eiv to praitwrion o pilatov kai efwnhsen ton ihsoun kai eipen autw su ei o basileuv twn ioudaiwn
18.34: apekriyh ihsouv apo seautou su touto legeiv h alloi eipon soi peri emou
18.35: apekriyh o pilatov mhti egw ioudaiov eimi to eynov to son kai oi arciereiv paredwkan se emoi ti epoihsav
18.36: apekriyh ihsouv h basileia h emh ouk estin ek tou kosmou toutou ei ek tou kosmou toutou hn h basileia h emh oi uphretai oi emoi hgwnizonto an ina mh paradoyw toiv ioudaioiv nun de h basileia h emh ouk estin enteuyen
18.37: eipen oun autw o pilatov oukoun basileuv ei su apekriyh [o] ihsouv su legeiv oti basileuv eimi egw eiv touto gegennhmai kai eiv touto elhluya eiv ton kosmon ina marturhsw th alhyeia pav o wn ek thv alhyeiav akouei mou thv fwnhv
18.38: legei autw o pilatov ti estin alhyeia kai touto eipwn palin exhlyen prov touv ioudaiouv kai legei autoiv egw oudemian euriskw en autw aitian
18.39: estin de sunhyeia umin ina ena apolusw umin [en] tw pasca boulesye oun apolusw umin ton basilea twn ioudaiwn
18.40: ekraugasan oun palin legontev mh touton alla ton barabban hn de o barabbav lhsthv

19.1: tote oun elaben o pilatov ton ihsoun kai emastigwsen
19.2: kai oi stratiwtai plexantev stefanon ex akanywn epeyhkan autou th kefalh kai imation porfuroun periebalon auton kai hrconto prov auton
19.3: kai elegon caire o basileuv twn ioudaiwn kai edidosan autw rapismata
19.4: kai exhlyen palin exw o pilatov kai legei autoiv ide agw umin auton exw ina gnwte oti oudemian aitian euriskw en autw
19.5: exhlyen oun [o] ihsouv exw forwn ton akanyinon stefanon kai to porfuroun imation kai legei autoiv idou o anyrwpov
19.6: ote oun eidon auton oi arciereiv kai oi uphretai ekraugasan legontev staurwson staurwson legei autoiv o pilatov labete auton umeiv kai staurwsate egw gar ouc euriskw en autw aitian
19.7: apekriyhsan autw oi ioudaioi hmeiv nomon ecomen kai kata ton nomon ofeilei apoyanein oti uion yeou eauton epoihsen
19.8: ote oun hkousen o pilatov touton ton logon mallon efobhyh
19.9: kai eishlyen eiv to praitwrion palin kai legei tw ihsou poyen ei su o de ihsouv apokrisin ouk edwken autw
19.10: legei oun autw o pilatov emoi ou laleiv ouk oidav oti exousian ecw apolusai se kai exousian ecw staurwsai se
19.11: apekriyh autw ihsouv ouk eicev exousian kat emou oudemian ei mh hn dedomenon soi anwyen dia touto o paradouv me soi meizona amartian ecei
19.12: ek toutou o pilatov ezhtei apolusai auton oi de ioudaioi ekraugasan legontev ean touton apolushv ouk ei filov tou kaisarov pav o basilea eauton poiwn antilegei tw kaisari
19.13: o oun pilatov akousav twn logwn toutwn hgagen exw ton ihsoun kai ekayisen epi bhmatov eiv topon legomenon liyostrwton ebraisti de gabbaya
19.14: hn de paraskeuh tou pasca wra hn wv ekth kai legei toiv ioudaioiv ide o basileuv umwn
19.15: ekraugasan oun ekeinoi aron aron staurwson auton legei autoiv o pilatov ton basilea umwn staurwsw apekriyhsan oi arciereiv ouk ecomen basilea ei mh kaisara
19.16: tote oun paredwken auton autoiv ina staurwyh parelabon oun ton ihsoun
19.17: kai bastazwn autw ton stauron exhlyen eiv ton legomenon kraniou topon o legetai ebraisti golgoya
19.18: opou auton estaurwsan kai met autou allouv duo enteuyen kai enteuyen meson de ton ihsoun
19.19: egraqen de kai titlon o pilatov kai eyhken epi tou staurou hn de gegrammenon ihsouv o nazwraiov o basileuv twn ioudaiwn
19.20: touton oun ton titlon polloi anegnwsan twn ioudaiwn oti egguv hn o topov thv polewv opou estaurwyh o ihsouv kai hn gegrammenon ebraisti rwmaisti ellhnisti
19.21: elegon oun tw pilatw oi arciereiv twn ioudaiwn mh grafe o basileuv twn ioudaiwn all oti ekeinov eipen basileuv twn ioudaiwn eimi
19.22: apekriyh o pilatov o gegrafa gegrafa
19.23: oi oun stratiwtai ote estaurwsan ton ihsoun elabon ta imatia autou kai epoihsan tessara merh ekastw stratiwth merov kai ton citwna hn de o citwn arafov ek twn anwyen ufantov di olou
19.24: eipan oun prov allhlouv mh sciswmen auton alla lacwmen peri autou tinov estai ina h grafh plhrwyh diemerisanto ta imatia mou eautoiv kai epi ton imatismon mou ebalon klhron oi men oun stratiwtai tauta epoihsan
19.25: isthkeisan de para tw staurw tou ihsou h mhthr autou kai h adelfh thv mhtrov autou maria h tou klwpa kai maria h magdalhnh
19.26: ihsouv oun idwn thn mhtera kai ton mayhthn parestwta on hgapa legei th mhtri gunai ide o uiov sou
19.27: eita legei tw mayhth ide h mhthr sou kai ap ekeinhv thv wrav elaben o mayhthv authn eiv ta idia
19.28: meta touto eidwv o ihsouv oti hdh panta tetelestai ina teleiwyh h grafh legei diqw
19.29: skeuov ekeito oxouv meston spoggon oun meston tou oxouv usswpw periyentev proshnegkan autou tw stomati
19.30: ote oun elaben to oxov [o] ihsouv eipen tetelestai kai klinav thn kefalhn paredwken to pneuma
19.31: oi oun ioudaioi epei paraskeuh hn ina mh meinh epi tou staurou ta swmata en tw sabbatw hn gar megalh h hmera ekeinou tou sabbatou hrwthsan ton pilaton ina kateagwsin autwn ta skelh kai arywsin
19.32: hlyon oun oi stratiwtai kai tou men prwtou kateaxan ta skelh kai tou allou tou sustaurwyentov autw
19.33: epi de ton ihsoun elyontev wv eidon hdh auton teynhkota ou kateaxan autou ta skelh
19.34: all eiv twn stratiwtwn logch autou thn pleuran enuxen kai exhlyen euyuv aima kai udwr
19.35: kai o ewrakwv memarturhken kai alhyinh autou estin h marturia kai ekeinov oiden oti alhyh legei ina kai umeiv pisteuhte
19.36: egeneto gar tauta ina h grafh plhrwyh ostoun ou suntribhsetai autou
19.37: kai palin etera grafh legei oqontai eiv on exekenthsan
19.38: meta de tauta hrwthsen ton pilaton iwshf apo arimayaiav wn mayhthv [tou] ihsou kekrummenov de dia ton fobon twn ioudaiwn ina arh to swma tou ihsou kai epetreqen o pilatov hlyen oun kai hren to swma autou
19.39: hlyen de kai nikodhmov o elywn prov auton nuktov to prwton ferwn eligma smurnhv kai alohv wv litrav ekaton
19.40: elabon oun to swma tou ihsou kai edhsan auto oyonioiv meta twn arwmatwn kaywv eyov estin toiv ioudaioiv entafiazein
19.41: hn de en tw topw opou estaurwyh khpov kai en tw khpw mnhmeion kainon en w oudepw oudeiv hn teyeimenov
19.42: ekei oun dia thn paraskeuhn twn ioudaiwn oti egguv hn to mnhmeion eyhkan ton ihsoun

20.1: th de mia twn sabbatwn maria h magdalhnh ercetai prwi skotiav eti oushv eiv to mnhmeion kai blepei ton liyon hrmenon ek tou mnhmeiou
20.2: trecei oun kai ercetai prov simwna petron kai prov ton allon mayhthn on efilei o ihsouv kai legei autoiv hran ton kurion ek tou mnhmeiou kai ouk oidamen pou eyhkan auton
20.3: exhlyen oun o petrov kai o allov mayhthv kai hrconto eiv to mnhmeion
20.4: etrecon de oi duo omou kai o allov mayhthv proedramen taceion tou petrou kai hlyen prwtov eiv to mnhmeion
20.5: kai parakuqav blepei keimena ta oyonia ou mentoi eishlyen
20.6: ercetai oun kai simwn petrov akolouywn autw kai eishlyen eiv to mnhmeion kai yewrei ta oyonia keimena
20.7: kai to soudarion o hn epi thv kefalhv autou ou meta twn oyoniwn keimenon alla cwriv entetuligmenon eiv ena topon
20.8: tote oun eishlyen kai o allov mayhthv o elywn prwtov eiv to mnhmeion kai eiden kai episteusen
20.9: oudepw gar hdeisan thn grafhn oti dei auton ek nekrwn anasthnai
20.10: aphlyon oun palin prov autouv oi mayhtai
20.11: maria de isthkei prov tw mnhmeiw exw klaiousa wv oun eklaien parekuqen eiv to mnhmeion
20.12: kai yewrei duo aggelouv en leukoiv kayezomenouv ena prov th kefalh kai ena prov toiv posin opou ekeito to swma tou ihsou
20.13: kai legousin auth ekeinoi gunai ti klaieiv legei autoiv oti hran ton kurion mou kai ouk oida pou eyhkan auton
20.14: tauta eipousa estrafh eiv ta opisw kai yewrei ton ihsoun estwta kai ouk hdei oti ihsouv estin
20.15: legei auth ihsouv gunai ti klaieiv tina zhteiv ekeinh dokousa oti o khpourov estin legei autw kurie ei su ebastasav auton eipe moi pou eyhkav auton kagw auton arw
20.16: legei auth ihsouv mariam strafeisa ekeinh legei autw ebraisti rabbouni o legetai didaskale
20.17: legei auth ihsouv mh mou aptou oupw gar anabebhka prov ton patera poreuou de prov touv adelfouv mou kai eipe autoiv anabainw prov ton patera mou kai patera umwn kai yeon mou kai yeon umwn
20.18: ercetai mariam h magdalhnh aggellousa toiv mayhtaiv oti ewraka ton kurion kai tauta eipen auth
20.19: oushv oun oqiav th hmera ekeinh th mia sabbatwn kai twn yurwn kekleismenwn opou hsan oi mayhtai dia ton fobon twn ioudaiwn hlyen o ihsouv kai esth eiv to meson kai legei autoiv eirhnh umin
20.20: kai touto eipwn edeixen kai tav ceirav kai thn pleuran autoiv ecarhsan oun oi mayhtai idontev ton kurion
20.21: eipen oun autoiv [o ihsouv] palin eirhnh umin kaywv apestalken me o pathr kagw pempw umav
20.22: kai touto eipwn enefushsen kai legei autoiv labete pneuma agion
20.23: an tinwn afhte tav amartiav afewntai autoiv an tinwn krathte kekrathntai
20.24: ywmav de eiv ek twn dwdeka o legomenov didumov ouk hn met autwn ote hlyen ihsouv
20.25: elegon oun autw oi alloi mayhtai ewrakamen ton kurion o de eipen autoiv ean mh idw en taiv cersin autou ton tupon twn hlwn kai balw ton daktulon mou eiv ton tupon twn hlwn kai balw mou thn ceira eiv thn pleuran autou ou mh pisteusw
20.26: kai mey hmerav oktw palin hsan esw oi mayhtai autou kai ywmav met autwn ercetai o ihsouv twn yurwn kekleismenwn kai esth eiv to meson kai eipen eirhnh umin
20.27: eita legei tw ywma fere ton daktulon sou wde kai ide tav ceirav mou kai fere thn ceira sou kai bale eiv thn pleuran mou kai mh ginou apistov alla pistov
20.28: apekriyh ywmav kai eipen autw o kuriov mou kai o yeov mou
20.29: legei autw [o] ihsouv oti ewrakav me pepisteukav makarioi oi mh idontev kai pisteusantev
20.30: polla men oun kai alla shmeia epoihsen o ihsouv enwpion twn mayhtwn a ouk estin gegrammena en tw bibliw toutw
20.31: tauta de gegraptai ina pisteuhte oti ihsouv estin o cristov o uiov tou yeou kai ina pisteuontev zwhn echte en tw onomati autou

21.1: meta tauta efanerwsen eauton palin ihsouv toiv mayhtaiv epi thv yalasshv thv tiberiadov efanerwsen de outwv
21.2: hsan omou simwn petrov kai ywmav o legomenov didumov kai nayanahl o apo kana thv galilaiav kai oi tou zebedaiou kai alloi ek twn mayhtwn autou duo
21.3: legei autoiv simwn petrov upagw alieuein legousin autw ercomeya kai hmeiv sun soi exhlyan kai enebhsan eiv to ploion kai en ekeinh th nukti epiasan ouden
21.4: prwiav de hdh ginomenhv esth ihsouv eiv ton aigialon ou mentoi hdeisan oi mayhtai oti ihsouv estin
21.5: legei oun autoiv ihsouv paidia mh ti prosfagion ecete apekriyhsan autw ou
21.6: o de eipen autoiv balete eiv ta dexia merh tou ploiou to diktuon kai eurhsete ebalon oun kai ouketi auto elkusai iscuon apo tou plhyouv twn icyuwn
21.7: legei oun o mayhthv ekeinov on hgapa o ihsouv tw petrw o kuriov estin simwn oun petrov akousav oti o kuriov estin ton ependuthn diezwsato hn gar gumnov kai ebalen eauton eiv thn yalassan
21.8: oi de alloi mayhtai tw ploiariw hlyon ou gar hsan makran apo thv ghv alla wv apo phcwn diakosiwn surontev to diktuon twn icyuwn
21.9: wv oun apebhsan eiv thn ghn blepousin anyrakian keimenhn kai oqarion epikeimenon kai arton
21.10: legei autoiv [o] ihsouv enegkate apo twn oqariwn wn epiasate nun
21.11: anebh oun simwn petrov kai eilkusen to diktuon eiv thn ghn meston icyuwn megalwn ekaton penthkonta triwn kai tosoutwn ontwn ouk escisyh to diktuon
21.12: legei autoiv [o] ihsouv deute aristhsate oudeiv etolma twn mayhtwn exetasai auton su tiv ei eidotev oti o kuriov estin
21.13: ercetai ihsouv kai lambanei ton arton kai didwsin autoiv kai to oqarion omoiwv
21.14: touto hdh triton efanerwyh ihsouv toiv mayhtaiv egeryeiv ek nekrwn
21.15: ote oun hristhsan legei tw simwni petrw o ihsouv simwn iwannou agapav me pleon toutwn legei autw nai kurie su oidav oti filw se legei autw boske ta arnia mou
21.16: legei autw palin deuteron simwn iwannou agapav me legei autw nai kurie su oidav oti filw se legei autw poimaine ta probatia mou
21.17: legei autw to triton simwn iwannou fileiv me eluphyh o petrov oti eipen autw to triton fileiv me kai eipen autw kurie panta su oidav su ginwskeiv oti filw se legei autw ihsouv boske ta probatia mou
21.18: amhn amhn legw soi ote hv newterov ezwnnuev seauton kai periepateiv opou hyelev otan de ghrashv ekteneiv tav ceirav sou kai allov zwsei se kai oisei opou ou yeleiv
21.19: touto de eipen shmainwn poiw yanatw doxasei ton yeon kai touto eipwn legei autw akolouyei moi
21.20: epistrafeiv o petrov blepei ton mayhthn on hgapa o ihsouv akolouyounta ov kai anepesen en tw deipnw epi to sthyov autou kai eipen kurie tiv estin o paradidouv se
21.21: touton oun idwn o petrov legei tw ihsou kurie outov de ti
21.22: legei autw o ihsouv ean auton yelw menein ewv ercomai ti prov se su moi akolouyei
21.23: exhlyen oun outov o logov eiv touv adelfouv oti o mayhthv ekeinov ouk apoynhskei ouk eipen de autw o ihsouv oti ouk apoynhskei all ean auton yelw menein ewv ercomai ti prov se
21.24: outov estin o mayhthv o marturwn peri toutwn kai o graqav tauta kai oidamen oti alhyhv autou h marturia estin
21.25: estin de kai alla polla a epoihsen o ihsouv atina ean grafhtai kay en oud auton oimai ton kosmon cwrhsein ta grafomena biblia

1.1: ioudav ihsou cristou doulov adelfov de iakwbou toiv en yew patri hgaphmenoiv kai ihsou cristw tethrhmenoiv klhtoiv
1.2: eleov umin kai eirhnh kai agaph plhyunyeih
1.3: agaphtoi pasan spoudhn poioumenov grafein umin peri thv koinhv hmwn swthriav anagkhn escon graqai umin parakalwn epagwnizesyai th apax paradoyeish toiv agioiv pistei
1.4: pareiseduhsan gar tinev anyrwpoi oi palai progegrammenoi eiv touto to krima asebeiv thn tou yeou hmwn carita metatiyentev eiv aselgeian kai ton monon despothn kai kurion hmwn ihsoun criston arnoumenoi
1.5: upomnhsai de umav boulomai eidotav apax panta oti kuriov laon ek ghv aiguptou swsav to deuteron touv mh pisteusantav apwlesen
1.6: aggelouv te touv mh thrhsantav thn eautwn archn alla apolipontav to idion oikhthrion eiv krisin megalhv hmerav desmoiv aidioiv upo zofon tethrhken
1.7: wv sodoma kai gomorra kai ai peri autav poleiv ton omoion tropon toutoiv ekporneusasai kai apelyousai opisw sarkov eterav prokeintai deigma purov aiwniou dikhn upecousai
1.8: omoiwv mentoi kai outoi enupniazomenoi sarka men miainousin kuriothta de ayetousin doxav de blasfhmousin
1.9: o de micahl o arcaggelov ote tw diabolw diakrinomenov dielegeto peri tou mwusewv swmatov ouk etolmhsen krisin epenegkein blasfhmiav alla eipen epitimhsai soi kuriov
1.10: outoi de osa men ouk oidasin blasfhmousin osa de fusikwv wv ta aloga zwa epistantai en toutoiv fyeirontai
1.11: ouai autoiv oti th odw tou kain eporeuyhsan kai th planh tou balaam misyou execuyhsan kai th antilogia tou kore apwlonto
1.12: outoi eisin oi en taiv agapaiv umwn spiladev suneuwcoumenoi afobwv eautouv poimainontev nefelai anudroi upo anemwn paraferomenai dendra fyinopwrina akarpa div apoyanonta ekrizwyenta
1.13: kumata agria yalasshv epafrizonta tav eautwn aiscunav asterev planhtai oiv o zofov tou skotouv eiv aiwna tethrhtai
1.14: proefhteusen de kai toutoiv ebdomov apo adam enwc legwn idou hlyen kuriov en agiaiv muriasin autou
1.15: poihsai krisin kata pantwn kai elegxai pantav touv asebeiv peri pantwn twn ergwn asebeiav autwn wn hsebhsan kai peri pantwn twn sklhrwn wn elalhsan kat autou amartwloi asebeiv
1.16: outoi eisin goggustai memqimoiroi kata tav epiyumiav autwn poreuomenoi kai to stoma autwn lalei uperogka yaumazontev proswpa wfeleiav carin
1.17: umeiv de agaphtoi mnhsyhte twn rhmatwn twn proeirhmenwn upo twn apostolwn tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou
1.18: oti elegon umin ep escatou cronou esontai empaiktai kata tav eautwn epiyumiav poreuomenoi twn asebeiwn
1.19: outoi eisin oi apodiorizontev qucikoi pneuma mh econtev
1.20: umeiv de agaphtoi epoikodomountev eautouv th agiwtath umwn pistei en pneumati agiw proseucomenoi
1.21: eautouv en agaph yeou thrhsate prosdecomenoi to eleov tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou eiv zwhn aiwnion
1.22: kai ouv men eleate diakrinomenouv swzete ek purov arpazontev
1.23: ouv de eleate en fobw misountev kai ton apo thv sarkov espilwmenon citwna
1.24: tw de dunamenw fulaxai umav aptaistouv kai sthsai katenwpion thv doxhv autou amwmouv en agalliasei
1.25: monw yew swthri hmwn dia ihsou cristou tou kuriou hmwn doxa megalwsunh kratov kai exousia pro pantov tou aiwnov kai nun kai eiv pantav touv aiwnav amhn

1.1: epeidhper polloi epeceirhsan anataxasyai dihghsin peri twn peplhroforhmenwn en hmin pragmatwn
1.2: kaywv paredosan hmin oi ap archv autoptai kai uphretai genomenoi tou logou
1.3: edoxen kamoi parhkolouyhkoti anwyen pasin akribwv kayexhv soi graqai kratiste yeofile
1.4: ina epignwv peri wn kathchyhv logwn thn asfaleian
1.5: egeneto en taiv hmeraiv hrwdou basilewv thv ioudaiav iereuv tiv onomati zacariav ex efhmeriav abia kai gunh autw ek twn yugaterwn aarwn kai to onoma authv elisabet
1.6: hsan de dikaioi amfoteroi enantion tou yeou poreuomenoi en pasaiv taiv entolaiv kai dikaiwmasin tou kuriou amemptoi
1.7: kai ouk hn autoiv teknon kayoti hn [h] elisabet steira kai amfoteroi probebhkotev en taiv hmeraiv autwn hsan
1.8: egeneto de en tw ierateuein auton en th taxei thv efhmeriav autou enanti tou yeou
1.9: kata to eyov thv ierateiav elacen tou yumiasai eiselywn eiv ton naon tou kuriou
1.10: kai pan to plhyov hn tou laou proseucomenon exw th wra tou yumiamatov
1.11: wfyh de autw aggelov kuriou estwv ek dexiwn tou yusiasthriou tou yumiamatov
1.12: kai etaracyh zacariav idwn kai fobov epepesen ep auton
1.13: eipen de prov auton o aggelov mh fobou zacaria dioti eishkousyh h dehsiv sou kai h gunh sou elisabet gennhsei uion soi kai kaleseiv to onoma autou iwannhn
1.14: kai estai cara soi kai agalliasiv kai polloi epi th genesei autou carhsontai
1.15: estai gar megav enwpion kuriou kai oinon kai sikera ou mh pih kai pneumatov agiou plhsyhsetai eti ek koiliav mhtrov autou
1.16: kai pollouv twn uiwn israhl epistreqei epi kurion ton yeon autwn
1.17: kai autov proeleusetai enwpion autou en pneumati kai dunamei hliou epistreqai kardiav paterwn epi tekna kai apeiyeiv en fronhsei dikaiwn etoimasai kuriw laon kateskeuasmenon
1.18: kai eipen zacariav prov ton aggelon kata ti gnwsomai touto egw gar eimi presbuthv kai h gunh mou probebhkuia en taiv hmeraiv authv
1.19: kai apokriyeiv o aggelov eipen autw egw eimi gabrihl o paresthkwv enwpion tou yeou kai apestalhn lalhsai prov se kai euaggelisasyai soi tauta
1.20: kai idou esh siwpwn kai mh dunamenov lalhsai acri hv hmerav genhtai tauta any wn ouk episteusav toiv logoiv mou oitinev plhrwyhsontai eiv ton kairon autwn
1.21: kai hn o laov prosdokwn ton zacarian kai eyaumazon en tw cronizein en tw naw auton
1.22: exelywn de ouk edunato lalhsai autoiv kai epegnwsan oti optasian ewraken en tw naw kai autov hn dianeuwn autoiv kai diemenen kwfov
1.23: kai egeneto wv eplhsyhsan ai hmerai thv leitourgiav autou aphlyen eiv ton oikon autou
1.24: meta de tautav tav hmerav sunelaben elisabet h gunh autou kai periekruben eauthn mhnav pente legousa
1.25: oti outwv moi pepoihken kuriov en hmeraiv aiv epeiden afelein oneidov mou en anyrwpoiv
1.26: en de tw mhni tw ektw apestalh o aggelov gabrihl apo tou yeou eiv polin thv galilaiav h onoma nazaret
1.27: prov paryenon emnhsteumenhn andri w onoma iwshf ex oikou dauid kai to onoma thv paryenou mariam
1.28: kai eiselywn prov authn eipen caire kecaritwmenh o kuriov meta sou
1.29: h de epi tw logw dietaracyh kai dielogizeto potapov eih o aspasmov outov
1.30: kai eipen o aggelov auth mh fobou mariam eurev gar carin para tw yew
1.31: kai idou sullhmqh en gastri kai texh uion kai kaleseiv to onoma autou ihsoun
1.32: outov estai megav kai uiov uqistou klhyhsetai kai dwsei autw kuriov o yeov ton yronon dauid tou patrov autou
1.33: kai basileusei epi ton oikon iakwb eiv touv aiwnav kai thv basileiav autou ouk estai telov
1.34: eipen de mariam prov ton aggelon pwv estai touto epei andra ou ginwskw
1.35: kai apokriyeiv o aggelov eipen auth pneuma agion epeleusetai epi se kai dunamiv uqistou episkiasei soi dio kai to gennwmenon agion klhyhsetai uiov yeou
1.36: kai idou elisabet h suggeniv sou kai auth suneilhfen uion en ghrei authv kai outov mhn ektov estin auth th kaloumenh steira
1.37: oti ouk adunathsei para tou yeou pan rhma
1.38: eipen de mariam idou h doulh kuriou genoito moi kata to rhma sou kai aphlyen ap authv o aggelov
1.39: anastasa de mariam en taiv hmeraiv tautaiv eporeuyh eiv thn orinhn meta spoudhv eiv polin iouda
1.40: kai eishlyen eiv ton oikon zacariou kai hspasato thn elisabet
1.41: kai egeneto wv hkousen ton aspasmon thv mariav h elisabet eskirthsen to brefov en th koilia authv kai eplhsyh pneumatov agiou h elisabet
1.42: kai anefwnhsen kraugh megalh kai eipen euloghmenh su en gunaixin kai euloghmenov o karpov thv koiliav sou
1.43: kai poyen moi touto ina elyh h mhthr tou kuriou mou prov eme
1.44: idou gar wv egeneto h fwnh tou aspasmou sou eiv ta wta mou eskirthsen en agalliasei to brefov en th koilia mou
1.45: kai makaria h pisteusasa oti estai teleiwsiv toiv lelalhmenoiv auth para kuriou
1.46: kai eipen mariam megalunei h quch mou ton kurion
1.47: kai hgalliasen to pneuma mou epi tw yew tw swthri mou
1.48: oti epebleqen epi thn tapeinwsin thv doulhv autou idou gar apo tou nun makariousin me pasai ai geneai
1.49: oti epoihsen moi megala o dunatov kai agion to onoma autou
1.50: kai to eleov autou eiv geneav kai geneav toiv foboumenoiv auton
1.51: epoihsen kratov en bracioni autou dieskorpisen uperhfanouv dianoia kardiav autwn
1.52: kayeilen dunastav apo yronwn kai uqwsen tapeinouv
1.53: peinwntav eneplhsen agaywn kai ploutountav exapesteilen kenouv
1.54: antelabeto israhl paidov autou mnhsyhnai eleouv
1.55: kaywv elalhsen prov touv paterav hmwn tw abraam kai tw spermati autou eiv ton aiwna
1.56: emeinen de mariam sun auth wv mhnav treiv kai upestreqen eiv ton oikon authv
1.57: th de elisabet eplhsyh o cronov tou tekein authn kai egennhsen uion
1.58: kai hkousan oi perioikoi kai oi suggeneiv authv oti emegalunen kuriov to eleov autou met authv kai sunecairon auth
1.59: kai egeneto en th hmera th ogdoh hlyan peritemein to paidion kai ekaloun auto epi tw onomati tou patrov autou zacarian
1.60: kai apokriyeisa h mhthr autou eipen ouci alla klhyhsetai iwannhv
1.61: kai eipan prov authn oti oudeiv estin ek thv suggeneiav sou ov kaleitai tw onomati toutw
1.62: eneneuon de tw patri autou to ti an yeloi kaleisyai auto
1.63: kai aithsav pinakidion egraqen legwn iwannhv estin onoma autou kai eyaumasan pantev
1.64: anewcyh de to stoma autou paracrhma kai h glwssa autou kai elalei eulogwn ton yeon
1.65: kai egeneto epi pantav fobov touv perioikountav autouv kai en olh th orinh thv ioudaiav dielaleito panta ta rhmata tauta
1.66: kai eyento pantev oi akousantev en th kardia autwn legontev ti ara to paidion touto estai kai gar ceir kuriou hn met autou
1.67: kai zacariav o pathr autou eplhsyh pneumatov agiou kai eprofhteusen legwn
1.68: euloghtov kuriov o yeov tou israhl oti epeskeqato kai epoihsen lutrwsin tw law autou
1.69: kai hgeiren kerav swthriav hmin en oikw dauid paidov autou
1.70: kaywv elalhsen dia stomatov twn agiwn ap aiwnov profhtwn autou
1.71: swthrian ex ecyrwn hmwn kai ek ceirov pantwn twn misountwn hmav
1.72: poihsai eleov meta twn paterwn hmwn kai mnhsyhnai diayhkhv agiav autou
1.73: orkon on wmosen prov abraam ton patera hmwn tou dounai hmin
1.74: afobwv ek ceirov ecyrwn rusyentav latreuein autw
1.75: en osiothti kai dikaiosunh enwpion autou pasaiv taiv hmeraiv hmwn
1.76: kai su de paidion profhthv uqistou klhyhsh proporeush gar enwpion kuriou etoimasai odouv autou
1.77: tou dounai gnwsin swthriav tw law autou en afesei amartiwn autwn
1.78: dia splagcna eleouv yeou hmwn en oiv episkeqetai hmav anatolh ex uqouv
1.79: epifanai toiv en skotei kai skia yanatou kayhmenoiv tou kateuyunai touv podav hmwn eiv odon eirhnhv
1.80: to de paidion huxanen kai ekrataiouto pneumati kai hn en taiv erhmoiv ewv hmerav anadeixewv autou prov ton israhl

2.1: egeneto de en taiv hmeraiv ekeinaiv exhlyen dogma para kaisarov augoustou apografesyai pasan thn oikoumenhn
2.2: auth apografh prwth egeneto hgemoneuontov thv suriav kurhniou
2.3: kai eporeuonto pantev apografesyai ekastov eiv thn eautou polin
2.4: anebh de kai iwshf apo thv galilaiav ek polewv nazaret eiv thn ioudaian eiv polin dauid htiv kaleitai bhyleem dia to einai auton ex oikou kai patriav dauid
2.5: apograqasyai sun mariam th emnhsteumenh autw oush egkuw
2.6: egeneto de en tw einai autouv ekei eplhsyhsan ai hmerai tou tekein authn
2.7: kai eteken ton uion authv ton prwtotokon kai esparganwsen auton kai aneklinen auton en fatnh dioti ouk hn autoiv topov en tw katalumati
2.8: kai poimenev hsan en th cwra th auth agraulountev kai fulassontev fulakav thv nuktov epi thn poimnhn autwn
2.9: kai aggelov kuriou epesth autoiv kai doxa kuriou perielamqen autouv kai efobhyhsan fobon megan
2.10: kai eipen autoiv o aggelov mh fobeisye idou gar euaggelizomai umin caran megalhn htiv estai panti tw law
2.11: oti etecyh umin shmeron swthr ov estin cristov kuriov en polei dauid
2.12: kai touto umin shmeion eurhsete brefov esparganwmenon kai keimenon en fatnh
2.13: kai exaifnhv egeneto sun tw aggelw plhyov stratiav ouraniou ainountwn ton yeon kai legontwn
2.14: doxa en uqistoiv yew kai epi ghv eirhnh en anyrwpoiv eudokiav
2.15: kai egeneto wv aphlyon ap autwn eiv ton ouranon oi aggeloi oi poimenev elaloun prov allhlouv dielywmen dh ewv bhyleem kai idwmen to rhma touto to gegonov o o kuriov egnwrisen hmin
2.16: kai hlyan speusantev kai aneuran thn te mariam kai ton iwshf kai to brefov keimenon en th fatnh
2.17: idontev de egnwrisan peri tou rhmatov tou lalhyentov autoiv peri tou paidiou toutou
2.18: kai pantev oi akousantev eyaumasan peri twn lalhyentwn upo twn poimenwn prov autouv
2.19: h de maria panta sunethrei ta rhmata tauta sumballousa en th kardia authv
2.20: kai upestreqan oi poimenev doxazontev kai ainountev ton yeon epi pasin oiv hkousan kai eidon kaywv elalhyh prov autouv
2.21: kai ote eplhsyhsan hmerai oktw tou peritemein auton kai eklhyh to onoma autou ihsouv to klhyen upo tou aggelou pro tou sullhmfyhnai auton en th koilia
2.22: kai ote eplhsyhsan ai hmerai tou kayarismou autwn kata ton nomon mwusewv anhgagon auton eiv ierosoluma parasthsai tw kuriw
2.23: kaywv gegraptai en nomw kuriou oti pan arsen dianoigon mhtran agion tw kuriw klhyhsetai
2.24: kai tou dounai yusian kata to eirhmenon en tw nomw kuriou zeugov trugonwn h duo nossouv peristerwn
2.25: kai idou anyrwpov hn en ierousalhm w onoma sumewn kai o anyrwpov outov dikaiov kai eulabhv prosdecomenov paraklhsin tou israhl kai pneuma hn agion ep auton
2.26: kai hn autw kecrhmatismenon upo tou pneumatov tou agiou mh idein yanaton prin [h] an idh ton criston kuriou
2.27: kai hlyen en tw pneumati eiv to ieron kai en tw eisagagein touv goneiv to paidion ihsoun tou poihsai autouv kata to eiyismenon tou nomou peri autou
2.28: kai autov edexato auto eiv tav agkalav kai euloghsen ton yeon kai eipen
2.29: nun apolueiv ton doulon sou despota kata to rhma sou en eirhnh
2.30: oti eidon oi ofyalmoi mou to swthrion sou
2.31: o htoimasav kata proswpon pantwn twn lawn
2.32: fwv eiv apokaluqin eynwn kai doxan laou sou israhl
2.33: kai hn o pathr autou kai h mhthr yaumazontev epi toiv laloumenoiv peri autou
2.34: kai euloghsen autouv sumewn kai eipen prov mariam thn mhtera autou idou outov keitai eiv ptwsin kai anastasin pollwn en tw israhl kai eiv shmeion antilegomenon
2.35: kai sou authv thn quchn dieleusetai romfaia opwv an apokalufywsin ek pollwn kardiwn dialogismoi
2.36: kai hn anna profhtiv yugathr fanouhl ek fulhv ashr auth probebhkuia en hmeraiv pollaiv zhsasa meta androv eth epta apo thv paryeniav authv
2.37: kai auth chra ewv etwn ogdohkonta tessarwn h ouk afistato tou ierou nhsteiaiv kai dehsesin latreuousa nukta kai hmeran
2.38: kai auth th wra epistasa anywmologeito tw yew kai elalei peri autou pasin toiv prosdecomenoiv lutrwsin ierousalhm
2.39: kai wv etelesan panta ta kata ton nomon kuriou epestreqan eiv thn galilaian eiv polin eautwn nazaret
2.40: to de paidion huxanen kai ekrataiouto plhroumenon sofia kai cariv yeou hn ep auto
2.41: kai eporeuonto oi goneiv autou kat etov eiv ierousalhm th eorth tou pasca
2.42: kai ote egeneto etwn dwdeka anabainontwn autwn kata to eyov thv eorthv
2.43: kai teleiwsantwn tav hmerav en tw upostrefein autouv upemeinen ihsouv o paiv en ierousalhm kai ouk egnwsan oi goneiv autou
2.44: nomisantev de auton einai en th sunodia hlyon hmerav odon kai anezhtoun auton en toiv suggeneusin kai toiv gnwstoiv
