2.45: kai mh eurontev upestreqan eiv ierousalhm anazhtountev auton
2.46: kai egeneto meta hmerav treiv euron auton en tw ierw kayezomenon en mesw twn didaskalwn kai akouonta autwn kai eperwtwnta autouv
2.47: existanto de pantev oi akouontev autou epi th sunesei kai taiv apokrisesin autou
2.48: kai idontev auton exeplaghsan kai eipen prov auton h mhthr autou teknon ti epoihsav hmin outwv idou o pathr sou kagw odunwmenoi zhtoumen se
2.49: kai eipen prov autouv ti oti ezhteite me ouk hdeite oti en toiv tou patrov mou dei einai me
2.50: kai autoi ou sunhkan to rhma o elalhsen autoiv
2.51: kai katebh met autwn kai hlyen eiv nazaret kai hn upotassomenov autoiv kai h mhthr autou diethrei panta ta rhmata en th kardia authv
2.52: kai ihsouv proekopten th sofia kai hlikia kai cariti para yew kai anyrwpoiv

3.1: en etei de pentekaidekatw thv hgemoniav tiberiou kaisarov hgemoneuontov pontiou pilatou thv ioudaiav kai tetraarcountov thv galilaiav hrwdou filippou de tou adelfou autou tetraarcountov thv itouraiav kai tracwnitidov cwrav kai lusaniou thv abilhnhv tetraarcountov
3.2: epi arcierewv anna kai kaiafa egeneto rhma yeou epi iwannhn ton zacariou uion en th erhmw
3.3: kai hlyen eiv pasan pericwron tou iordanou khrusswn baptisma metanoiav eiv afesin amartiwn
3.4: wv gegraptai en biblw logwn hsaiou tou profhtou fwnh bowntov en th erhmw etoimasate thn odon kuriou euyeiav poieite tav tribouv autou
3.5: pasa faragx plhrwyhsetai kai pan orov kai bounov tapeinwyhsetai kai estai ta skolia eiv euyeiav kai ai traceiai eiv odouv leiav
3.6: kai oqetai pasa sarx to swthrion tou yeou
3.7: elegen oun toiv ekporeuomenoiv ocloiv baptisyhnai up autou gennhmata ecidnwn tiv upedeixen umin fugein apo thv melloushv orghv
3.8: poihsate oun karpouv axiouv thv metanoiav kai mh arxhsye legein en eautoiv patera ecomen ton abraam legw gar umin oti dunatai o yeov ek twn liywn toutwn egeirai tekna tw abraam
3.9: hdh de kai h axinh prov thn rizan twn dendrwn keitai pan oun dendron mh poioun karpon [kalon] ekkoptetai kai eiv pur balletai
3.10: kai ephrwtwn auton oi ocloi legontev ti oun poihswmen
3.11: apokriyeiv de elegen autoiv o ecwn duo citwnav metadotw tw mh econti kai o ecwn brwmata omoiwv poieitw
3.12: hlyon de kai telwnai baptisyhnai kai eipan prov auton didaskale ti poihswmen
3.13: o de eipen prov autouv mhden pleon para to diatetagmenon umin prassete
3.14: ephrwtwn de auton kai strateuomenoi legontev ti poihswmen kai hmeiv kai eipen autoiv mhdena diaseishte mhde sukofanthshte kai arkeisye toiv oqwnioiv umwn
3.15: prosdokwntov de tou laou kai dialogizomenwn pantwn en taiv kardiaiv autwn peri tou iwannou mhpote autov eih o cristov
3.16: apekrinato legwn pasin o iwannhv egw men udati baptizw umav ercetai de o iscuroterov mou ou ouk eimi ikanov lusai ton imanta twn upodhmatwn autou autov umav baptisei en pneumati agiw kai puri
3.17: ou to ptuon en th ceiri autou diakayarai thn alwna autou kai sunagagein ton siton eiv thn apoyhkhn autou to de acuron katakausei puri asbestw
3.18: polla men oun kai etera parakalwn euhggelizeto ton laon
3.19: o de hrwdhv o tetraarchv elegcomenov up autou peri hrwdiadov thv gunaikov tou adelfou autou kai peri pantwn wn epoihsen ponhrwn o hrwdhv
3.20: proseyhken kai touto epi pasin katekleisen ton iwannhn en fulakh
3.21: egeneto de en tw baptisyhnai apanta ton laon kai ihsou baptisyentov kai proseucomenou anewcyhnai ton ouranon
3.22: kai katabhnai to pneuma to agion swmatikw eidei wv peristeran ep auton kai fwnhn ex ouranou genesyai su ei o uiov mou o agaphtov en soi eudokhsa
3.23: kai autov hn ihsouv arcomenov wsei etwn triakonta wn uiov wv enomizeto iwshf tou hli
3.24: tou mayyat tou leui tou melci tou iannai tou iwshf
3.25: tou mattayiou tou amwv tou naoum tou esli tou naggai
3.26: tou maay tou mattayiou tou semein tou iwshc tou iwda
3.27: tou iwanan tou rhsa tou zorobabel tou salayihl tou nhri
3.28: tou melci tou addi tou kwsam tou elmadam tou hr
3.29: tou ihsou tou eliezer tou iwrim tou mayyat tou leui
3.30: tou sumewn tou iouda tou iwshf tou iwnam tou eliakim
3.31: tou melea tou menna tou mattaya tou nayam tou dauid
3.32: tou iessai tou iwbhl tou boov tou sala tou naasswn
3.33: tou admein tou arnei tou esrwm tou farev tou iouda
3.34: tou iakwb tou isaak tou abraam tou yara tou nacwr
3.35: tou serouc tou ragau tou falek tou eber tou sala
3.36: tou kainam tou arfaxad tou shm tou nwe tou lamec
3.37: tou mayousala tou enwc tou iaret tou malelehl tou kainam
3.38: tou enwv tou shy tou adam tou yeou

4.1: ihsouv de plhrhv pneumatov agiou upestreqen apo tou iordanou kai hgeto en tw pneumati en th erhmw
4.2: hmerav tesserakonta peirazomenov upo tou diabolou kai ouk efagen ouden en taiv hmeraiv ekeinaiv kai suntelesyeiswn autwn epeinasen
4.3: eipen de autw o diabolov ei uiov ei tou yeou eipe tw liyw toutw ina genhtai artov
4.4: kai apekriyh prov auton o ihsouv gegraptai oti ouk ep artw monw zhsetai o anyrwpov
4.5: kai anagagwn auton edeixen autw pasav tav basileiav thv oikoumenhv en stigmh cronou
4.6: kai eipen autw o diabolov soi dwsw thn exousian tauthn apasan kai thn doxan autwn oti emoi paradedotai kai w an yelw didwmi authn
4.7: su oun ean proskunhshv enwpion emou estai sou pasa
4.8: kai apokriyeiv o ihsouv eipen autw gegraptai kurion ton yeon sou proskunhseiv kai autw monw latreuseiv
4.9: hgagen de auton eiv ierousalhm kai esthsen epi to pterugion tou ierou kai eipen [autw] ei uiov ei tou yeou bale seauton enteuyen katw
4.10: gegraptai gar oti toiv aggeloiv autou enteleitai peri sou tou diafulaxai se
4.11: kai oti epi ceirwn arousin se mhpote proskoqhv prov liyon ton poda sou
4.12: kai apokriyeiv eipen autw o ihsouv oti eirhtai ouk ekpeiraseiv kurion ton yeon sou
4.13: kai suntelesav panta peirasmon o diabolov apesth ap autou acri kairou
4.14: kai upestreqen o ihsouv en th dunamei tou pneumatov eiv thn galilaian kai fhmh exhlyen kay olhv thv pericwrou peri autou
4.15: kai autov edidasken en taiv sunagwgaiv autwn doxazomenov upo pantwn
4.16: kai hlyen eiv nazara ou hn teyrammenov kai eishlyen kata to eiwyov autw en th hmera twn sabbatwn eiv thn sunagwghn kai anesth anagnwnai
4.17: kai epedoyh autw biblion tou profhtou hsaiou kai anoixav to biblion euren [ton] topon ou hn gegrammenon
4.18: pneuma kuriou ep eme ou eineken ecrisen me euaggelisasyai ptwcoiv apestalken me khruxai aicmalwtoiv afesin kai tufloiv anableqin aposteilai teyrausmenouv en afesei
4.20: kai ptuxav to biblion apodouv tw uphreth ekayisen kai pantwn oi ofyalmoi en th sunagwgh hsan atenizontev autw
4.21: hrxato de legein prov autouv oti shmeron peplhrwtai h grafh auth en toiv wsin umwn
4.22: kai pantev emarturoun autw kai eyaumazon epi toiv logoiv thv caritov toiv ekporeuomenoiv ek tou stomatov autou kai elegon ouci uiov estin iwshf outov
4.23: kai eipen prov autouv pantwv ereite moi thn parabolhn tauthn iatre yerapeuson seauton osa hkousamen genomena eiv thn kafarnaoum poihson kai wde en th patridi sou
4.24: eipen de amhn legw umin oti oudeiv profhthv dektov estin en th patridi autou
4.25: ep alhyeiav de legw umin pollai chrai hsan en taiv hmeraiv hliou en tw israhl ote ekleisyh o ouranov eth tria kai mhnav ex wv egeneto limov megav epi pasan thn ghn
4.26: kai prov oudemian autwn epemfyh hliav ei mh eiv sarepta thv sidwniav prov gunaika chran
4.27: kai polloi leproi hsan en tw israhl epi elisaiou tou profhtou kai oudeiv autwn ekayarisyh ei mh naiman o surov
4.28: kai eplhsyhsan pantev yumou en th sunagwgh akouontev tauta
4.29: kai anastantev exebalon auton exw thv polewv kai hgagon auton ewv ofruov tou orouv ef ou h poliv wkodomhto autwn wste katakrhmnisai auton
4.30: autov de dielywn dia mesou autwn eporeueto
4.31: kai kathlyen eiv kafarnaoum polin thv galilaiav kai hn didaskwn autouv en toiv sabbasin
4.32: kai exeplhssonto epi th didach autou oti en exousia hn o logov autou
4.33: kai en th sunagwgh hn anyrwpov ecwn pneuma daimoniou akayartou kai anekraxen fwnh megalh
4.34: ea ti hmin kai soi ihsou nazarhne hlyev apolesai hmav oida se tiv ei o agiov tou yeou
4.35: kai epetimhsen autw o ihsouv legwn fimwyhti kai exelye ap autou kai riqan auton to daimonion eiv to meson exhlyen ap autou mhden blaqan auton
4.36: kai egeneto yambov epi pantav kai sunelaloun prov allhlouv legontev tiv o logov outov oti en exousia kai dunamei epitassei toiv akayartoiv pneumasin kai exercontai
4.37: kai exeporeueto hcov peri autou eiv panta topon thv pericwrou
4.38: anastav de apo thv sunagwghv eishlyen eiv thn oikian simwnov penyera de tou simwnov hn sunecomenh puretw megalw kai hrwthsan auton peri authv
4.39: kai epistav epanw authv epetimhsen tw puretw kai afhken authn paracrhma de anastasa dihkonei autoiv
4.40: dunontov de tou hliou apantev osoi eicon asyenountav nosoiv poikilaiv hgagon autouv prov auton o de eni ekastw autwn tav ceirav epitiyeiv eyerapeuen autouv
4.41: exhrceto de kai daimonia apo pollwn krazonta kai legonta oti su ei o uiov tou yeou kai epitimwn ouk eia auta lalein oti hdeisan ton criston auton einai
4.42: genomenhv de hmerav exelywn eporeuyh eiv erhmon topon kai oi ocloi epezhtoun auton kai hlyon ewv autou kai kateicon auton tou mh poreuesyai ap autwn
4.43: o de eipen prov autouv oti kai taiv eteraiv polesin euaggelisasyai me dei thn basileian tou yeou oti epi touto apestalhn
4.44: kai hn khrusswn eiv tav sunagwgav thv ioudaiav

5.1: egeneto de en tw ton oclon epikeisyai autw kai akouein ton logon tou yeou kai autov hn estwv para thn limnhn gennhsaret
5.2: kai eiden ploia duo estwta para thn limnhn oi de alieiv ap autwn apobantev eplunon ta diktua
5.3: embav de eiv en twn ploiwn o hn simwnov hrwthsen auton apo thv ghv epanagagein oligon kayisav de ek tou ploiou edidasken touv oclouv
5.4: wv de epausato lalwn eipen prov ton simwna epanagage eiv to bayov kai calasate ta diktua umwn eiv agran
5.5: kai apokriyeiv simwn eipen epistata di olhv nuktov kopiasantev ouden elabomen epi de tw rhmati sou calasw ta diktua
5.6: kai touto poihsantev sunekleisan plhyov icyuwn polu dierrhsseto de ta diktua autwn
5.7: kai kateneusan toiv metocoiv en tw eterw ploiw tou elyontav sullabesyai autoiv kai hlyan kai eplhsan amfotera ta ploia wste buyizesyai auta
5.8: idwn de simwn petrov prosepesen toiv gonasin ihsou legwn exelye ap emou oti anhr amartwlov eimi kurie
5.9: yambov gar periescen auton kai pantav touv sun autw epi th agra twn icyuwn wn sunelabon
5.10: omoiwv de kai iakwbon kai iwannhn uiouv zebedaiou oi hsan koinwnoi tw simwni kai eipen prov ton simwna ihsouv mh fobou apo tou nun anyrwpouv esh zwgrwn
5.11: kai katagagontev ta ploia epi thn ghn afentev panta hkolouyhsan autw
5.12: kai egeneto en tw einai auton en mia twn polewn kai idou anhr plhrhv leprav idwn de ton ihsoun peswn epi proswpon edehyh autou legwn kurie ean yelhv dunasai me kayarisai
5.13: kai ekteinav thn ceira hqato autou legwn yelw kayarisyhti kai euyewv h lepra aphlyen ap autou
5.14: kai autov parhggeilen autw mhdeni eipein alla apelywn deixon seauton tw ierei kai prosenegke peri tou kayarismou sou kaywv prosetaxen mwushv eiv marturion autoiv
5.15: dihrceto de mallon o logov peri autou kai sunhrconto ocloi polloi akouein kai yerapeuesyai apo twn asyeneiwn autwn
5.16: autov de hn upocwrwn en taiv erhmoiv kai proseucomenov
5.17: kai egeneto en mia twn hmerwn kai autov hn didaskwn kai hsan kayhmenoi farisaioi kai nomodidaskaloi oi hsan elhluyotev ek pashv kwmhv thv galilaiav kai ioudaiav kai ierousalhm kai dunamiv kuriou hn eiv to iasyai auton
5.18: kai idou andrev ferontev epi klinhv anyrwpon ov hn paralelumenov kai ezhtoun auton eisenegkein kai yeinai [auton] enwpion autou
5.19: kai mh eurontev poiav eisenegkwsin auton dia ton oclon anabantev epi to dwma dia twn keramwn kayhkan auton sun tw klinidiw eiv to meson emprosyen tou ihsou
5.20: kai idwn thn pistin autwn eipen anyrwpe afewntai soi ai amartiai sou
5.21: kai hrxanto dialogizesyai oi grammateiv kai oi farisaioi legontev tiv estin outov ov lalei blasfhmiav tiv dunatai amartiav afeinai ei mh monov o yeov
5.22: epignouv de o ihsouv touv dialogismouv autwn apokriyeiv eipen prov autouv ti dialogizesye en taiv kardiaiv umwn
5.23: ti estin eukopwteron eipein afewntai soi ai amartiai sou h eipein egeire kai peripatei
5.24: ina de eidhte oti o uiov tou anyrwpou exousian ecei epi thv ghv afienai amartiav eipen tw paralelumenw soi legw egeire kai arav to klinidion sou poreuou eiv ton oikon sou
5.25: kai paracrhma anastav enwpion autwn arav ef o katekeito aphlyen eiv ton oikon autou doxazwn ton yeon
5.26: kai ekstasiv elaben apantav kai edoxazon ton yeon kai eplhsyhsan fobou legontev oti eidamen paradoxa shmeron
5.27: kai meta tauta exhlyen kai eyeasato telwnhn onomati leuin kayhmenon epi to telwnion kai eipen autw akolouyei moi
5.28: kai katalipwn panta anastav hkolouyei autw
5.29: kai epoihsen dochn megalhn leuiv autw en th oikia autou kai hn oclov poluv telwnwn kai allwn oi hsan met autwn katakeimenoi
5.30: kai egogguzon oi farisaioi kai oi grammateiv autwn prov touv mayhtav autou legontev dia ti meta twn telwnwn kai amartwlwn esyiete kai pinete
5.31: kai apokriyeiv [o] ihsouv eipen prov autouv ou creian ecousin oi ugiainontev iatrou alla oi kakwv econtev
5.32: ouk elhluya kalesai dikaiouv alla amartwlouv eiv metanoian
5.33: oi de eipan prov auton oi mayhtai iwannou nhsteuousin pukna kai dehseiv poiountai omoiwv kai oi twn farisaiwn oi de soi esyiousin kai pinousin
5.34: o de ihsouv eipen prov autouv mh dunasye touv uiouv tou numfwnov en w o numfiov met autwn estin poihsai nhsteusai
5.35: eleusontai de hmerai kai otan aparyh ap autwn o numfiov tote nhsteusousin en ekeinaiv taiv hmeraiv
5.36: elegen de kai parabolhn prov autouv oti oudeiv epiblhma apo imatiou kainou scisav epiballei epi imation palaion ei de mhge kai to kainon scisei kai tw palaiw ou sumfwnhsei to epiblhma to apo tou kainou
5.37: kai oudeiv ballei oinon neon eiv askouv palaiouv ei de mhge rhxei o oinov o neov touv askouv kai autov ekcuyhsetai kai oi askoi apolountai
5.38: alla oinon neon eiv askouv kainouv blhteon
5.39: [oudeiv piwn palaion yelei neon legei gar o palaiov crhstov estin]

6.1: egeneto de en sabbatw diaporeuesyai auton dia sporimwn kai etillon oi mayhtai autou kai hsyion touv stacuav qwcontev taiv cersin
6.2: tinev de twn farisaiwn eipan ti poieite o ouk exestin toiv sabbasin
6.3: kai apokriyeiv prov autouv eipen [o] ihsouv oude touto anegnwte o epoihsen dauid ote epeinasen autov kai oi met autou
6.4: [wv] eishlyen eiv ton oikon tou yeou kai touv artouv thv proyesewv labwn efagen kai edwken toiv met autou ouv ouk exestin fagein ei mh monouv touv iereiv
6.5: kai elegen autoiv kuriov estin tou sabbatou o uiov tou anyrwpou
6.6: egeneto de en eterw sabbatw eiselyein auton eiv thn sunagwghn kai didaskein kai hn anyrwpov ekei kai h ceir autou h dexia hn xhra
6.7: parethrounto de auton oi grammateiv kai oi farisaioi ei en tw sabbatw yerapeuei ina eurwsin kathgorein autou
6.8: autov de hdei touv dialogismouv autwn eipen de tw andri tw xhran econti thn ceira egeire kai sthyi eiv to meson kai anastav esth
6.9: eipen de [o] ihsouv prov autouv eperwtw umav ei exestin tw sabbatw agayopoihsai h kakopoihsai quchn swsai h apolesai
6.10: kai peribleqamenov pantav autouv eipen autw ekteinon thn ceira sou o de epoihsen kai apekatestayh h ceir autou
6.11: autoi de eplhsyhsan anoiav kai dielaloun prov allhlouv ti an poihsaien tw ihsou
6.12: egeneto de en taiv hmeraiv tautaiv exelyein auton eiv to orov proseuxasyai kai hn dianuktereuwn en th proseuch tou yeou
6.13: kai ote egeneto hmera prosefwnhsen touv mayhtav autou kai eklexamenov ap autwn dwdeka ouv kai apostolouv wnomasen
6.14: simwna on kai wnomasen petron kai andrean ton adelfon autou kai iakwbon kai iwannhn kai filippon kai baryolomaion
6.15: kai mayyaion kai ywman [kai] iakwbon alfaiou kai simwna ton kaloumenon zhlwthn
6.16: kai ioudan iakwbou kai ioudan iskariwy ov egeneto prodothv
6.17: kai katabav met autwn esth epi topou pedinou kai oclov poluv mayhtwn autou kai plhyov polu tou laou apo pashv thv ioudaiav kai ierousalhm kai thv paraliou turou kai sidwnov [6:18] oi hlyan akousai autou kai iayhnai apo twn noswn autwn
6.18: kai oi enocloumenoi apo pneumatwn akayartwn eyerapeuonto
6.19: kai pav o oclov ezhtoun aptesyai autou oti dunamiv par autou exhrceto kai iato pantav
6.20: kai autov eparav touv ofyalmouv autou eiv touv mayhtav autou elegen makarioi oi ptwcoi oti umetera estin h basileia tou yeou
6.21: makarioi oi peinwntev nun oti cortasyhsesye makarioi oi klaiontev nun oti gelasete
6.22: makarioi este otan mishswsin umav oi anyrwpoi kai otan aforiswsin umav kai oneidiswsin kai ekbalwsin to onoma umwn wv ponhron eneka tou uiou tou anyrwpou
6.23: carhte en ekeinh th hmera kai skirthsate idou gar o misyov umwn poluv en tw ouranw kata ta auta gar epoioun toiv profhtaiv oi paterev autwn
6.24: plhn ouai umin toiv plousioiv oti apecete thn paraklhsin umwn
6.25: ouai umin oi empeplhsmenoi nun oti peinasete ouai oi gelwntev nun oti penyhsete kai klausete
6.26: ouai otan kalwv umav eipwsin pantev oi anyrwpoi kata ta auta gar epoioun toiv qeudoprofhtaiv oi paterev autwn
6.27: alla umin legw toiv akouousin agapate touv ecyrouv umwn kalwv poieite toiv misousin umav
6.28: eulogeite touv katarwmenouv umav proseucesye peri twn ephreazontwn umav
6.29: tw tuptonti se epi thn siagona parece kai thn allhn kai apo tou airontov sou to imation kai ton citwna mh kwlushv
6.30: panti aitounti se didou kai apo tou airontov ta sa mh apaitei
6.31: kai kaywv yelete ina poiwsin umin oi anyrwpoi poieite autoiv omoiwv
6.32: kai ei agapate touv agapwntav umav poia umin cariv estin kai gar oi amartwloi touv agapwntav autouv agapwsin
6.33: kai [gar] ean agayopoihte touv agayopoiountav umav poia umin cariv estin kai oi amartwloi to auto poiousin
6.34: kai ean danishte par wn elpizete labein poia umin cariv [estin] kai amartwloi amartwloiv danizousin ina apolabwsin ta isa
6.35: plhn agapate touv ecyrouv umwn kai agayopoieite kai danizete mhden apelpizontev kai estai o misyov umwn poluv kai esesye uioi uqistou oti autov crhstov estin epi touv acaristouv kai ponhrouv
6.36: ginesye oiktirmonev kaywv o pathr umwn oiktirmwn estin
6.37: kai mh krinete kai ou mh kriyhte kai mh katadikazete kai ou mh katadikasyhte apoluete kai apoluyhsesye
6.38: didote kai doyhsetai umin metron kalon pepiesmenon sesaleumenon uperekcunnomenon dwsousin eiv ton kolpon umwn w gar metrw metreite antimetrhyhsetai umin
6.39: eipen de kai parabolhn autoiv mhti dunatai tuflov tuflon odhgein ouci amfoteroi eiv boyunon empesountai
6.40: ouk estin mayhthv uper ton didaskalon kathrtismenov de pav estai wv o didaskalov autou
6.41: ti de blepeiv to karfov to en tw ofyalmw tou adelfou sou thn de dokon thn en tw idiw ofyalmw ou katanoeiv
6.42: pwv dunasai legein tw adelfw sou adelfe afev ekbalw to karfov to en tw ofyalmw sou autov thn en tw ofyalmw sou dokon ou blepwn upokrita ekbale prwton thn dokon ek tou ofyalmou sou kai tote diableqeiv to karfov to en tw ofyalmw tou adelfou sou ekbalein
6.43: ou gar estin dendron kalon poioun karpon sapron oude palin dendron sapron poioun karpon kalon
6.44: ekaston gar dendron ek tou idiou karpou ginwsketai ou gar ex akanywn sullegousin suka oude ek batou stafulhn trugwsin
6.45: o agayov anyrwpov ek tou agayou yhsaurou thv kardiav proferei to agayon kai o ponhrov ek tou ponhrou proferei to ponhron ek gar perisseumatov kardiav lalei to stoma autou
6.46: ti de me kaleite kurie kurie kai ou poieite a legw
6.47: pav o ercomenov prov me kai akouwn mou twn logwn kai poiwn autouv upodeixw umin tini estin omoiov
6.48: omoiov estin anyrwpw oikodomounti oikian ov eskaqen kai ebayunen kai eyhken yemelion epi thn petran plhmmurhv de genomenhv proserhxen o potamov th oikia ekeinh kai ouk iscusen saleusai authn dia to kalwv oikodomhsyai authn
6.49: o de akousav kai mh poihsav omoiov estin anyrwpw oikodomhsanti oikian epi thn ghn cwriv yemeliou h proserhxen o potamov kai euyuv sunepesen kai egeneto to rhgma thv oikiav ekeinhv mega

7.1: epeidh eplhrwsen panta ta rhmata autou eiv tav akoav tou laou eishlyen eiv kafarnaoum
7.2: ekatontarcou de tinov doulov kakwv ecwn hmellen teleutan ov hn autw entimov
7.3: akousav de peri tou ihsou apesteilen prov auton presbuterouv twn ioudaiwn erwtwn auton opwv elywn diaswsh ton doulon autou
7.4: oi de paragenomenoi prov ton ihsoun parekaloun auton spoudaiwv legontev oti axiov estin w parexh touto
7.5: agapa gar to eynov hmwn kai thn sunagwghn autov wkodomhsen hmin
7.6: o de ihsouv eporeueto sun autoiv hdh de autou ou makran apecontov apo thv oikiav epemqen filouv o ekatontarchv legwn autw kurie mh skullou ou gar ikanov eimi ina upo thn steghn mou eiselyhv
7.7: dio oude emauton hxiwsa prov se elyein alla eipe logw kai iayhtw o paiv mou
7.8: kai gar egw anyrwpov eimi upo exousian tassomenov ecwn up emauton stratiwtav kai legw toutw poreuyhti kai poreuetai kai allw ercou kai ercetai kai tw doulw mou poihson touto kai poiei
7.9: akousav de tauta o ihsouv eyaumasen auton kai strafeiv tw akolouyounti autw oclw eipen legw umin oude en tw israhl tosauthn pistin euron
7.10: kai upostreqantev eiv ton oikon oi pemfyentev euron ton doulon ugiainonta
7.11: kai egeneto en tw exhv eporeuyh eiv polin kaloumenhn nain kai suneporeuonto autw oi mayhtai autou kai oclov poluv
7.12: wv de hggisen th pulh thv polewv kai idou exekomizeto teynhkwv monogenhv uiov th mhtri autou kai auth hn chra kai oclov thv polewv ikanov hn sun auth
7.13: kai idwn authn o kuriov esplagcnisyh ep auth kai eipen auth mh klaie
7.14: kai proselywn hqato thv sorou oi de bastazontev esthsan kai eipen neaniske soi legw egeryhti
7.15: kai anekayisen o nekrov kai hrxato lalein kai edwken auton th mhtri autou
7.16: elaben de fobov pantav kai edoxazon ton yeon legontev oti profhthv megav hgeryh en hmin kai oti epeskeqato o yeov ton laon autou
7.17: kai exhlyen o logov outov en olh th ioudaia peri autou kai pash th pericwrw
7.18: kai aphggeilan iwannh oi mayhtai autou peri pantwn toutwn
7.19: kai proskalesamenov duo tinav twn mayhtwn autou o iwannhv epemqen prov ton kurion legwn su ei o ercomenov h eteron prosdokwmen
7.20: paragenomenoi de prov auton oi andrev eipan iwannhv o baptisthv apesteilen hmav prov se legwn su ei o ercomenov h allon prosdokwmen
7.21: en ekeinh th wra eyerapeusen pollouv apo noswn kai mastigwn kai pneumatwn ponhrwn kai tufloiv polloiv ecarisato blepein
7.22: kai apokriyeiv eipen autoiv poreuyentev apaggeilate iwannh a eidete kai hkousate tufloi anablepousin cwloi peripatousin leproi kayarizontai kai kwfoi akouousin nekroi egeirontai ptwcoi euaggelizontai
7.23: kai makariov estin ov ean mh skandalisyh en emoi
7.24: apelyontwn de twn aggelwn iwannou hrxato legein prov touv oclouv peri iwannou ti exhlyate eiv thn erhmon yeasasyai kalamon upo anemou saleuomenon
7.25: alla ti exhlyate idein anyrwpon en malakoiv imatioiv hmfiesmenon idou oi en imatismw endoxw kai trufh uparcontev en toiv basileioiv eisin
7.26: alla ti exhlyate idein profhthn nai legw umin kai perissoteron profhtou
7.27: outov estin peri ou gegraptai idou apostellw ton aggelon mou pro proswpou sou ov kataskeuasei thn odon sou emprosyen sou
7.28: legw umin meizwn en gennhtoiv gunaikwn iwannou oudeiv estin o de mikroterov en th basileia tou yeou meizwn autou estin
7.29: kai pav o laov akousav kai oi telwnai edikaiwsan ton yeon baptisyentev to baptisma iwannou
7.30: oi de farisaioi kai oi nomikoi thn boulhn tou yeou hyethsan eiv eautouv mh baptisyentev up autou
7.31: tini oun omoiwsw touv anyrwpouv thv geneav tauthv kai tini eisin omoioi
7.32: omoioi eisin paidioiv toiv en agora kayhmenoiv kai prosfwnousin allhloiv a legei hulhsamen umin kai ouk wrchsasye eyrhnhsamen kai ouk eklausate
7.33: elhluyen gar iwannhv o baptisthv mh esywn arton mhte pinwn oinon kai legete daimonion ecei
7.34: elhluyen o uiov tou anyrwpou esywn kai pinwn kai legete idou anyrwpov fagov kai oinopothv filov telwnwn kai amartwlwn
7.35: kai edikaiwyh h sofia apo pantwn twn teknwn authv
7.36: hrwta de tiv auton twn farisaiwn ina fagh met autou kai eiselywn eiv ton oikon tou farisaiou katekliyh
7.37: kai idou gunh htiv hn en th polei amartwlov kai epignousa oti katakeitai en th oikia tou farisaiou komisasa alabastron murou
7.38: kai stasa opisw para touv podav autou klaiousa toiv dakrusin hrxato brecein touv podav autou kai taiv yrixin thv kefalhv authv exemassen kai katefilei touv podav autou kai hleifen tw murw
7.39: idwn de o farisaiov o kalesav auton eipen en eautw legwn outov ei hn [o] profhthv eginwsken an tiv kai potaph h gunh htiv aptetai autou oti amartwlov estin
7.40: kai apokriyeiv o ihsouv eipen prov auton simwn ecw soi ti eipein o de didaskale eipe fhsin
7.41: duo creofeiletai hsan danisth tini o eiv wfeilen dhnaria pentakosia o de eterov penthkonta
7.42: mh econtwn autwn apodounai amfoteroiv ecarisato tiv oun autwn pleion agaphsei auton
7.43: apokriyeiv simwn eipen upolambanw oti w to pleion ecarisato o de eipen autw orywv ekrinav
7.44: kai strafeiv prov thn gunaika tw simwni efh blepeiv tauthn thn gunaika eishlyon sou eiv thn oikian udwr moi epi podav ouk edwkav auth de toiv dakrusin ebrexen mou touv podav kai taiv yrixin authv exemaxen
7.45: filhma moi ouk edwkav auth de af hv eishlyon ou dielipen katafilousa mou touv podav
7.46: elaiw thn kefalhn mou ouk hleiqav auth de murw hleiqen touv podav mou
7.47: ou carin legw soi afewntai ai amartiai authv ai pollai oti hgaphsen polu w de oligon afietai oligon agapa
7.48: eipen de auth afewntai sou ai amartiai
7.49: kai hrxanto oi sunanakeimenoi legein en eautoiv tiv outov estin ov kai amartiav afihsin
7.50: eipen de prov thn gunaika h pistiv sou seswken se poreuou eiv eirhnhn

8.1: kai egeneto en tw kayexhv kai autov diwdeuen kata polin kai kwmhn khrusswn kai euaggelizomenov thn basileian tou yeou kai oi dwdeka sun autw
8.2: kai gunaikev tinev ai hsan teyerapeumenai apo pneumatwn ponhrwn kai asyeneiwn maria h kaloumenh magdalhnh af hv daimonia epta exelhluyei
8.3: kai iwanna gunh couza epitropou hrwdou kai sousanna kai eterai pollai aitinev dihkonoun autoiv ek twn uparcontwn autaiv
8.4: suniontov de oclou pollou kai twn kata polin epiporeuomenwn prov auton eipen dia parabolhv
8.5: exhlyen o speirwn tou speirai ton sporon autou kai en tw speirein auton o men epesen para thn odon kai katepathyh kai ta peteina tou ouranou katefagen auto
8.6: kai eteron katepesen epi thn petran kai fuen exhranyh dia to mh ecein ikmada
8.7: kai eteron epesen en mesw twn akanywn kai sumfueisai ai akanyai apepnixan auto
8.8: kai eteron epesen eiv thn ghn thn agayhn kai fuen epoihsen karpon ekatontaplasiona tauta legwn efwnei o ecwn wta akouein akouetw
8.9: ephrwtwn de auton oi mayhtai autou tiv auth eih h parabolh
8.10: o de eipen umin dedotai gnwnai ta musthria thv basileiav tou yeou toiv de loipoiv en parabolaiv ina blepontev mh blepwsin kai akouontev mh suniwsin
8.11: estin de auth h parabolh o sporov estin o logov tou yeou
8.12: oi de para thn odon eisin oi akousantev eita ercetai o diabolov kai airei ton logon apo thv kardiav autwn ina mh pisteusantev swywsin
8.13: oi de epi thv petrav oi otan akouswsin meta carav decontai ton logon kai outoi rizan ouk ecousin oi prov kairon pisteuousin kai en kairw peirasmou afistantai
8.14: to de eiv tav akanyav peson outoi eisin oi akousantev kai upo merimnwn kai ploutou kai hdonwn tou biou poreuomenoi sumpnigontai kai ou telesforousin
8.15: to de en th kalh gh outoi eisin oitinev en kardia kalh kai agayh akousantev ton logon katecousin kai karpoforousin en upomonh
8.16: oudeiv de lucnon aqav kaluptei auton skeuei h upokatw klinhv tiyhsin all epi lucniav tiyhsin ina oi eisporeuomenoi blepwsin to fwv
8.17: ou gar estin krupton o ou faneron genhsetai oude apokrufon o ou mh gnwsyh kai eiv faneron elyh
8.18: blepete oun pwv akouete ov an gar ech doyhsetai autw kai ov an mh ech kai o dokei ecein aryhsetai ap autou
8.19: paregeneto de prov auton h mhthr kai oi adelfoi autou kai ouk hdunanto suntucein autw dia ton oclon
8.20: aphggelh de autw h mhthr sou kai oi adelfoi sou esthkasin exw idein yelontev se
8.21: o de apokriyeiv eipen prov autouv mhthr mou kai adelfoi mou outoi eisin oi ton logon tou yeou akouontev kai poiountev
8.22: egeneto de en mia twn hmerwn kai autov enebh eiv ploion kai oi mayhtai autou kai eipen prov autouv dielywmen eiv to peran thv limnhv kai anhcyhsan
8.23: pleontwn de autwn afupnwsen kai katebh lailaq anemou eiv thn limnhn kai suneplhrounto kai ekinduneuon
8.24: proselyontev de dihgeiran auton legontev epistata epistata apollumeya o de diegeryeiv epetimhsen tw anemw kai tw kludwni tou udatov kai epausanto kai egeneto galhnh
8.25: eipen de autoiv pou h pistiv umwn fobhyentev de eyaumasan legontev prov allhlouv tiv ara outov estin oti kai toiv anemoiv epitassei kai tw udati kai upakouousin autw
8.26: kai katepleusan eiv thn cwran twn gerashnwn htiv estin antipera thv galilaiav
8.27: exelyonti de autw epi thn ghn uphnthsen anhr tiv ek thv polewv ecwn daimonia kai cronw ikanw ouk enedusato imation kai en oikia ouk emenen all en toiv mnhmasin
8.28: idwn de ton ihsoun anakraxav prosepesen autw kai fwnh megalh eipen ti emoi kai soi ihsou uie [tou yeou] tou uqistou deomai sou mh me basanishv
8.29: parhggellen gar tw pneumati tw akayartw exelyein apo tou anyrwpou polloiv gar cronoiv sunhrpakei auton kai edesmeueto alusesin kai pedaiv fulassomenov kai diarrhsswn ta desma hlauneto apo tou daimoniou eiv tav erhmouv
8.30: ephrwthsen de auton o ihsouv ti soi onoma estin o de eipen legiwn oti eishlyen daimonia polla eiv auton
8.31: kai parekaloun auton ina mh epitaxh autoiv eiv thn abusson apelyein
8.32: hn de ekei agelh coirwn ikanwn boskomenh en tw orei kai parekalesan auton ina epitreqh autoiv eiv ekeinouv eiselyein kai epetreqen autoiv
8.33: exelyonta de ta daimonia apo tou anyrwpou eishlyon eiv touv coirouv kai wrmhsen h agelh kata tou krhmnou eiv thn limnhn kai apepnigh
8.34: idontev de oi boskontev to gegonov efugon kai aphggeilan eiv thn polin kai eiv touv agrouv
8.35: exhlyon de idein to gegonov kai hlyan prov ton ihsoun kai euran kayhmenon ton anyrwpon af ou ta daimonia exhlyen imatismenon kai swfronounta para touv podav [tou] ihsou kai efobhyhsan
8.36: aphggeilan de autoiv oi idontev pwv eswyh o daimonisyeiv
8.37: kai hrwthsen auton apan to plhyov thv pericwrou twn gerashnwn apelyein ap autwn oti fobw megalw suneiconto autov de embav eiv ploion upestreqen
8.38: edeito de autou o anhr af ou exelhluyei ta daimonia einai sun autw apelusen de auton legwn
8.39: upostrefe eiv ton oikon sou kai dihgou osa soi epoihsen o yeov kai aphlyen kay olhn thn polin khrusswn osa epoihsen autw o ihsouv
8.40: en de tw upostrefein ton ihsoun apedexato auton o oclov hsan gar pantev prosdokwntev auton
8.41: kai idou hlyen anhr w onoma iairov kai outov arcwn thv sunagwghv uphrcen kai peswn para touv podav ihsou parekalei auton eiselyein eiv ton oikon autou
8.42: oti yugathr monogenhv hn autw wv etwn dwdeka kai auth apeynhsken en de tw upagein auton oi ocloi sunepnigon auton
8.43: kai gunh ousa en rusei aimatov apo etwn dwdeka htiv ouk iscusen ap oudenov yerapeuyhnai
8.44: proselyousa opisyen hqato tou kraspedou tou imatiou autou kai paracrhma esth h rusiv tou aimatov authv
8.45: kai eipen o ihsouv tiv o aqamenov mou arnoumenwn de pantwn eipen o petrov epistata oi ocloi sunecousin se kai apoylibousin
8.46: o de ihsouv eipen hqato mou tiv egw gar egnwn dunamin exelhluyuian ap emou
8.47: idousa de h gunh oti ouk elayen tremousa hlyen kai prospesousa autw di hn aitian hqato autou aphggeilen enwpion pantov tou laou kai wv iayh paracrhma
8.48: o de eipen auth yugathr h pistiv sou seswken se poreuou eiv eirhnhn
8.49: eti autou lalountov ercetai tiv para tou arcisunagwgou legwn oti teynhken h yugathr sou mhketi skulle ton didaskalon
8.50: o de ihsouv akousav apekriyh autw mh fobou monon pisteuson kai swyhsetai
8.51: elywn de eiv thn oikian ouk afhken eiselyein tina sun autw ei mh petron kai iwannhn kai iakwbon kai ton patera thv paidov kai thn mhtera
8.52: eklaion de pantev kai ekoptonto authn o de eipen mh klaiete ou gar apeyanen alla kayeudei
8.53: kai kategelwn autou eidotev oti apeyanen
8.54: autov de krathsav thv ceirov authv efwnhsen legwn h paiv egeire
8.55: kai epestreqen to pneuma authv kai anesth paracrhma kai dietaxen auth doyhnai fagein
8.56: kai exesthsan oi goneiv authv o de parhggeilen autoiv mhdeni eipein to gegonov

9.1: sugkalesamenov de touv dwdeka edwken autoiv dunamin kai exousian epi panta ta daimonia kai nosouv yerapeuein
9.2: kai apesteilen autouv khrussein thn basileian tou yeou kai iasyai
9.3: kai eipen prov autouv mhden airete eiv thn odon mhte rabdon mhte phran mhte arton mhte argurion mhte duo citwnav ecein
9.4: kai eiv hn an oikian eiselyhte ekei menete kai ekeiyen exercesye
9.5: kai osoi an mh decwntai umav exercomenoi apo thv polewv ekeinhv ton koniorton apo twn podwn umwn apotinassete eiv marturion ep autouv
9.6: exercomenoi de dihrconto kata tav kwmav euaggelizomenoi kai yerapeuontev pantacou
9.7: hkousen de hrwdhv o tetraarchv ta ginomena panta kai dihporei dia to legesyai upo tinwn oti iwannhv hgeryh ek nekrwn
9.8: upo tinwn de oti hliav efanh allwn de oti profhthv tiv twn arcaiwn anesth
9.9: eipen de [o] hrwdhv iwannhn egw apekefalisa tiv de estin outov peri ou akouw toiauta kai ezhtei idein auton
9.10: kai upostreqantev oi apostoloi dihghsanto autw osa epoihsan kai paralabwn autouv upecwrhsen kat idian eiv polin kaloumenhn bhysaida
9.11: oi de ocloi gnontev hkolouyhsan autw kai apodexamenov autouv elalei autoiv peri thv basileiav tou yeou kai touv creian econtav yerapeiav iato
9.12: h de hmera hrxato klinein proselyontev de oi dwdeka eipan autw apoluson ton oclon ina poreuyentev eiv tav kuklw kwmav kai agrouv kataluswsin kai eurwsin episitismon oti wde en erhmw topw esmen
9.13: eipen de prov autouv dote autoiv fagein umeiv oi de eipan ouk eisin hmin pleion h artoi pente kai icyuev duo ei mhti poreuyentev hmeiv agoraswmen eiv panta ton laon touton brwmata
9.14: hsan gar wsei andrev pentakiscilioi eipen de prov touv mayhtav autou kataklinate autouv klisiav wsei ana penthkonta
9.15: kai epoihsan outwv kai kateklinan apantav
9.16: labwn de touv pente artouv kai touv duo icyuav anableqav eiv ton ouranon euloghsen autouv kai kateklasen kai edidou toiv mayhtaiv parayeinai tw oclw
9.17: kai efagon kai ecortasyhsan pantev kai hryh to perisseusan autoiv klasmatwn kofinoi dwdeka
9.18: kai egeneto en tw einai auton proseucomenon kata monav sunhsan autw oi mayhtai kai ephrwthsen autouv legwn tina me oi ocloi legousin einai
9.19: oi de apokriyentev eipan iwannhn ton baptisthn alloi de hlian alloi de oti profhthv tiv twn arcaiwn anesth
9.20: eipen de autoiv umeiv de tina me legete einai petrov de apokriyeiv eipen ton criston tou yeou
9.21: o de epitimhsav autoiv parhggeilen mhdeni legein touto
9.22: eipwn oti dei ton uion tou anyrwpou polla payein kai apodokimasyhnai apo twn presbuterwn kai arcierewn kai grammatewn kai apoktanyhnai kai th trith hmera egeryhnai
9.23: elegen de prov pantav ei tiv yelei opisw mou ercesyai arnhsasyw eauton kai aratw ton stauron autou kay hmeran kai akolouyeitw moi
9.24: ov gar an yelh thn quchn autou swsai apolesei authn ov d an apolesh thn quchn autou eneken emou outov swsei authn
9.25: ti gar wfeleitai anyrwpov kerdhsav ton kosmon olon eauton de apolesav h zhmiwyeiv
9.26: ov gar an epaiscunyh me kai touv emouv logouv touton o uiov tou anyrwpou epaiscunyhsetai otan elyh en th doxh autou kai tou patrov kai twn agiwn aggelwn
9.27: legw de umin alhywv eisin tinev twn autou esthkotwn oi ou mh geuswntai yanatou ewv an idwsin thn basileian tou yeou
9.28: egeneto de meta touv logouv toutouv wsei hmerai oktw paralabwn petron kai iwannhn kai iakwbon anebh eiv to orov proseuxasyai
9.29: kai egeneto en tw proseucesyai auton to eidov tou proswpou autou eteron kai o imatismov autou leukov exastraptwn
9.30: kai idou andrev duo sunelaloun autw oitinev hsan mwushv kai hliav
9.31: oi ofyentev en doxh elegon thn exodon autou hn hmellen plhroun en ierousalhm
9.32: o de petrov kai oi sun autw hsan bebarhmenoi upnw diagrhgorhsantev de eidan thn doxan autou kai touv duo andrav touv sunestwtav autw
9.33: kai egeneto en tw diacwrizesyai autouv ap autou eipen o petrov prov ton ihsoun epistata kalon estin hmav wde einai kai poihswmen skhnav treiv mian soi kai mian mwusei kai mian hlia mh eidwv o legei
9.34: tauta de autou legontov egeneto nefelh kai epeskiazen autouv efobhyhsan de en tw eiselyein autouv eiv thn nefelhn
9.35: kai fwnh egeneto ek thv nefelhv legousa outov estin o uiov mou o eklelegmenov autou akouete
9.36: kai en tw genesyai thn fwnhn eureyh ihsouv monov kai autoi esighsan kai oudeni aphggeilan en ekeinaiv taiv hmeraiv ouden wn ewrakan
9.37: egeneto de th exhv hmera katelyontwn autwn apo tou orouv sunhnthsen autw oclov poluv
9.38: kai idou anhr apo tou oclou ebohsen legwn didaskale deomai sou epibleqai epi ton uion mou oti monogenhv moi estin
9.39: kai idou pneuma lambanei auton kai exaifnhv krazei kai sparassei auton meta afrou kai moliv apocwrei ap autou suntribon auton
9.40: kai edehyhn twn mayhtwn sou ina ekbalwsin auto kai ouk hdunhyhsan
9.41: apokriyeiv de o ihsouv eipen w genea apistov kai diestrammenh ewv pote esomai prov umav kai anexomai umwn prosagage wde ton uion sou
9.42: eti de prosercomenou autou errhxen auton to daimonion kai sunesparaxen epetimhsen de o ihsouv tw pneumati tw akayartw kai iasato ton paida kai apedwken auton tw patri autou
9.43: exeplhssonto de pantev epi th megaleiothti tou yeou pantwn de yaumazontwn epi pasin oiv epoiei eipen prov touv mayhtav autou
9.44: yesye umeiv eiv ta wta umwn touv logouv toutouv o gar uiov tou anyrwpou mellei paradidosyai eiv ceirav anyrwpwn
9.45: oi de hgnooun to rhma touto kai hn parakekalummenon ap autwn ina mh aisywntai auto kai efobounto erwthsai auton peri tou rhmatov toutou
9.46: eishlyen de dialogismov en autoiv to tiv an eih meizwn autwn
9.47: o de ihsouv eidwv ton dialogismon thv kardiav autwn epilabomenov paidion esthsen auto par eautw
9.48: kai eipen autoiv ov an dexhtai touto to paidion epi tw onomati mou eme decetai kai ov an eme dexhtai decetai ton aposteilanta me o gar mikroterov en pasin umin uparcwn outov estin megav
9.49: apokriyeiv de iwannhv eipen epistata eidamen tina en tw onomati sou ekballonta daimonia kai ekwluomen auton oti ouk akolouyei mey hmwn
9.50: eipen de prov auton ihsouv mh kwluete ov gar ouk estin kay umwn uper umwn estin
9.51: egeneto de en tw sumplhrousyai tav hmerav thv analhmqewv autou kai autov to proswpon esthrisen tou poreuesyai eiv ierousalhm
9.52: kai apesteilen aggelouv pro proswpou autou kai poreuyentev eishlyon eiv kwmhn samareitwn wv etoimasai autw
9.53: kai ouk edexanto auton oti to proswpon autou hn poreuomenon eiv ierousalhm
9.54: idontev de oi mayhtai iakwbov kai iwannhv eipan kurie yeleiv eipwmen pur katabhnai apo tou ouranou kai analwsai autouv
9.57: kai poreuomenwn autwn en th odw eipen tiv prov auton akolouyhsw soi opou ean aperch
9.58: kai eipen autw [o] ihsouv ai alwpekev fwleouv ecousin kai ta peteina tou ouranou kataskhnwseiv o de uiov tou anyrwpou ouk ecei pou thn kefalhn klinh
9.59: eipen de prov eteron akolouyei moi o de eipen epitreqon moi prwton apelyonti yaqai ton patera mou
9.60: eipen de autw afev touv nekrouv yaqai touv eautwn nekrouv su de apelywn diaggelle thn basileian tou yeou
9.61: eipen de kai eterov akolouyhsw soi kurie prwton de epitreqon moi apotaxasyai toiv eiv ton oikon mou
9.62: eipen de [prov auton] o ihsouv oudeiv epibalwn thn ceira ep arotron kai blepwn eiv ta opisw euyetov estin th basileia tou yeou

10.1: meta de tauta anedeixen o kuriov eterouv ebdomhkonta [duo] kai apesteilen autouv ana duo [duo] pro proswpou autou eiv pasan polin kai topon ou hmellen autov ercesyai
10.2: elegen de prov autouv o men yerismov poluv oi de ergatai oligoi dehyhte oun tou kuriou tou yerismou opwv ergatav ekbalh eiv ton yerismon autou
10.3: upagete idou apostellw umav wv arnav en mesw lukwn
10.4: mh bastazete ballantion mh phran mh upodhmata kai mhdena kata thn odon aspashsye
10.5: eiv hn d an eiselyhte oikian prwton legete eirhnh tw oikw toutw
10.6: kai ean ekei h uiov eirhnhv epanapahsetai ep auton h eirhnh umwn ei de mhge ef umav anakamqei
10.7: en auth de th oikia menete esyontev kai pinontev ta par autwn axiov gar o ergathv tou misyou autou mh metabainete ex oikiav eiv oikian
10.8: kai eiv hn an polin eiserchsye kai decwntai umav esyiete ta paratiyemena umin
10.9: kai yerapeuete touv en auth asyeneiv kai legete autoiv hggiken ef umav h basileia tou yeou
10.10: eiv hn d an polin eiselyhte kai mh decwntai umav exelyontev eiv tav plateiav authv eipate
10.11: kai ton koniorton ton kollhyenta hmin ek thv polewv umwn eiv touv podav apomassomeya umin plhn touto ginwskete oti hggiken h basileia tou yeou
10.12: legw umin oti sodomoiv en th hmera ekeinh anektoteron estai h th polei ekeinh
10.13: ouai soi corazin ouai soi bhysaida oti ei en turw kai sidwni egenhyhsan ai dunameiv ai genomenai en umin palai an en sakkw kai spodw kayhmenoi metenohsan
10.14: plhn turw kai sidwni anektoteron estai en th krisei h umin
10.15: kai su kafarnaoum mh ewv ouranou uqwyhsh ewv tou adou katabhsh
10.16: o akouwn umwn emou akouei kai o ayetwn umav eme ayetei o de eme ayetwn ayetei ton aposteilanta me
10.17: upestreqan de oi ebdomhkonta [duo] meta carav legontev kurie kai ta daimonia upotassetai hmin en tw onomati sou
10.18: eipen de autoiv eyewroun ton satanan wv astraphn ek tou ouranou pesonta
10.19: idou dedwka umin thn exousian tou patein epanw ofewn kai skorpiwn kai epi pasan thn dunamin tou ecyrou kai ouden umav ou mh adikhsei
10.20: plhn en toutw mh cairete oti ta pneumata umin upotassetai cairete de oti ta onomata umwn eggegraptai en toiv ouranoiv
10.21: en auth th wra hgalliasato tw pneumati tw agiw kai eipen exomologoumai soi pater kurie tou ouranou kai thv ghv oti apekruqav tauta apo sofwn kai sunetwn kai apekaluqav auta nhpioiv nai o pathr oti outwv eudokia egeneto emprosyen sou
10.22: panta moi paredoyh upo tou patrov mou kai oudeiv ginwskei tiv estin o uiov ei mh o pathr kai tiv estin o pathr ei mh o uiov kai w an boulhtai o uiov apokaluqai
10.23: kai strafeiv prov touv mayhtav kat idian eipen makarioi oi ofyalmoi oi blepontev a blepete
10.24: legw gar umin oti polloi profhtai kai basileiv hyelhsan idein a umeiv blepete kai ouk eidan kai akousai a akouete kai ouk hkousan
10.25: kai idou nomikov tiv anesth ekpeirazwn auton legwn didaskale ti poihsav zwhn aiwnion klhronomhsw
10.26: o de eipen prov auton en tw nomw ti gegraptai pwv anaginwskeiv
10.27: o de apokriyeiv eipen agaphseiv kurion ton yeon sou ex olhv kardiav sou kai en olh th quch sou kai en olh th iscui sou kai en olh th dianoia sou kai ton plhsion sou wv seauton
10.28: eipen de autw orywv apekriyhv touto poiei kai zhsh
10.29: o de yelwn dikaiwsai eauton eipen prov ton ihsoun kai tiv estin mou plhsion
10.30: upolabwn o ihsouv eipen anyrwpov tiv katebainen apo ierousalhm eiv iericw kai lhstaiv periepesen oi kai ekdusantev auton kai plhgav epiyentev aphlyon afentev hmiyanh
10.31: kata sugkurian de iereuv tiv katebainen [en] th odw ekeinh kai idwn auton antiparhlyen
10.32: omoiwv de kai leuithv kata ton topon elywn kai idwn antiparhlyen
10.33: samareithv de tiv odeuwn hlyen kat auton kai idwn esplagcnisyh
10.34: kai proselywn katedhsen ta traumata autou epicewn elaion kai oinon epibibasav de auton epi to idion kthnov hgagen auton eiv pandoceion kai epemelhyh autou
10.35: kai epi thn aurion ekbalwn duo dhnaria edwken tw pandocei kai eipen epimelhyhti autou kai o ti an prosdapanhshv egw en tw epanercesyai me apodwsw soi
10.36: tiv toutwn twn triwn plhsion dokei soi gegonenai tou empesontov eiv touv lhstav
10.37: o de eipen o poihsav to eleov met autou eipen de autw [o] ihsouv poreuou kai su poiei omoiwv
10.38: en de tw poreuesyai autouv autov eishlyen eiv kwmhn tina gunh de tiv onomati marya upedexato auton eiv thn oikian
10.39: kai thde hn adelfh kaloumenh mariam [h] kai parakayesyeisa prov touv podav tou kuriou hkouen ton logon autou
10.40: h de marya periespato peri pollhn diakonian epistasa de eipen kurie ou melei soi oti h adelfh mou monhn me kateleipen diakonein eipon oun auth ina moi sunantilabhtai
10.41: apokriyeiv de eipen auth o kuriov marya marya merimnav kai yorubazh peri polla
10.42: oligwn de estin creia h enov mariam gar thn agayhn merida exelexato htiv ouk afaireyhsetai authv

11.1: kai egeneto en tw einai auton en topw tini proseucomenon wv epausato eipen tiv twn mayhtwn autou prov auton kurie didaxon hmav proseucesyai kaywv kai iwannhv edidaxen touv mayhtav autou
11.2: eipen de autoiv otan proseuchsye legete pater agiasyhtw to onoma sou elyatw h basileia sou
11.3: ton arton hmwn ton epiousion didou hmin to kay hmeran
11.4: kai afev hmin tav amartiav hmwn kai gar autoi afiomen panti ofeilonti hmin kai mh eisenegkhv hmav eiv peirasmon
11.5: kai eipen prov autouv tiv ex umwn exei filon kai poreusetai prov auton mesonuktiou kai eiph autw file crhson moi treiv artouv
11.6: epeidh filov mou paregeneto ex odou prov me kai ouk ecw o parayhsw autw
11.7: kakeinov eswyen apokriyeiv eiph mh moi kopouv parece hdh h yura kekleistai kai ta paidia mou met emou eiv thn koithn eisin ou dunamai anastav dounai soi
11.8: legw umin ei kai ou dwsei autw anastav dia to einai filon autou dia ge thn anaideian autou egeryeiv dwsei autw oswn crhzei
11.9: kagw umin legw aiteite kai doyhsetai umin zhteite kai eurhsete krouete kai anoighsetai umin
11.10: pav gar o aitwn lambanei kai o zhtwn euriskei kai tw krouonti anoighsetai
11.11: tina de ex umwn ton patera aithsei o uiov icyun mh anti icyuov ofin autw epidwsei
11.12: h kai aithsei won epidwsei autw skorpion
11.13: ei oun umeiv ponhroi uparcontev oidate domata agaya didonai toiv teknoiv umwn posw mallon o pathr [o] ex ouranou dwsei pneuma agion toiv aitousin auton
11.14: kai hn ekballwn daimonion kwfon egeneto de tou daimoniou exelyontov elalhsen o kwfov kai eyaumasan oi ocloi
11.15: tinev de ex autwn eipan en beezeboul tw arconti twn daimoniwn ekballei ta daimonia
11.16: eteroi de peirazontev shmeion ex ouranou ezhtoun par autou
11.17: autov de eidwv autwn ta dianohmata eipen autoiv pasa basileia ef eauthn diamerisyeisa erhmoutai kai oikov epi oikon piptei
11.18: ei de kai o satanav ef eauton diemerisyh pwv stayhsetai h basileia autou oti legete en beezeboul ekballein me ta daimonia
11.19: ei de egw en beezeboul ekballw ta daimonia oi uioi umwn en tini ekballousin dia touto autoi umwn kritai esontai
11.20: ei de en daktulw yeou [egw] ekballw ta daimonia ara efyasen ef umav h basileia tou yeou
11.21: otan o iscurov kaywplismenov fulassh thn eautou aulhn en eirhnh estin ta uparconta autou
11.22: epan de iscuroterov autou epelywn nikhsh auton thn panoplian autou airei ef h epepoiyei kai ta skula autou diadidwsin
11.23: o mh wn met emou kat emou estin kai o mh sunagwn met emou skorpizei
11.24: otan to akayarton pneuma exelyh apo tou anyrwpou diercetai di anudrwn topwn zhtoun anapausin kai mh euriskon [tote] legei upostreqw eiv ton oikon mou oyen exhlyon
11.25: kai elyon euriskei [scolazonta] sesarwmenon kai kekosmhmenon
11.26: tote poreuetai kai paralambanei etera pneumata ponhrotera eautou epta kai eiselyonta katoikei ekei kai ginetai ta escata tou anyrwpou ekeinou ceirona twn prwtwn
11.27: egeneto de en tw legein auton tauta eparasa tiv fwnhn gunh ek tou oclou eipen autw makaria h koilia h bastasasa se kai mastoi ouv eyhlasav
11.28: autov de eipen menoun makarioi oi akouontev ton logon tou yeou kai fulassontev
11.29: twn de oclwn epayroizomenwn hrxato legein h genea auth genea ponhra estin shmeion zhtei kai shmeion ou doyhsetai auth ei mh to shmeion iwna
11.30: kaywv gar egeneto [o] iwnav toiv nineuitaiv shmeion outwv estai kai o uiov tou anyrwpou th genea tauth
11.31: basilissa notou egeryhsetai en th krisei meta twn andrwn thv geneav tauthv kai katakrinei autouv oti hlyen ek twn peratwn thv ghv akousai thn sofian solomwnov kai idou pleion solomwnov wde
11.32: andrev nineuitai anasthsontai en th krisei meta thv geneav tauthv kai katakrinousin authn oti metenohsan eiv to khrugma iwna kai idou pleion iwna wde
11.33: oudeiv lucnon aqav eiv krupthn tiyhsin oude upo ton modion all epi thn lucnian ina oi eisporeuomenoi to fwv blepwsin
11.34: o lucnov tou swmatov estin o ofyalmov sou otan o ofyalmov sou aplouv h kai olon to swma sou fwteinon estin epan de ponhrov h kai to swma sou skoteinon
11.35: skopei oun mh to fwv to en soi skotov estin
11.36: ei oun to swma sou olon fwteinon mh econ merov ti skoteinon estai fwteinon olon wv otan o lucnov th astraph fwtizh se
11.37: en de tw lalhsai erwta auton farisaiov opwv aristhsh par autw eiselywn de anepesen
11.38: o de farisaiov idwn eyaumasen oti ou prwton ebaptisyh pro tou aristou
11.39: eipen de o kuriov prov auton nun umeiv oi farisaioi to exwyen tou pothriou kai tou pinakov kayarizete to de eswyen umwn gemei arpaghv kai ponhriav
11.40: afronev ouc o poihsav to exwyen kai to eswyen epoihsen
11.41: plhn ta enonta dote elehmosunhn kai idou panta kayara umin estin
11.42: alla ouai umin toiv farisaioiv oti apodekatoute to hduosmon kai to phganon kai pan lacanon kai parercesye thn krisin kai thn agaphn tou yeou tauta de edei poihsai kakeina mh pareinai
11.43: ouai umin toiv farisaioiv oti agapate thn prwtokayedrian en taiv sunagwgaiv kai touv aspasmouv en taiv agoraiv
11.44: ouai umin oti este wv ta mnhmeia ta adhla kai oi anyrwpoi oi peripatountev epanw ouk oidasin
11.45: apokriyeiv de tiv twn nomikwn legei autw didaskale tauta legwn kai hmav ubrizeiv
11.46: o de eipen kai umin toiv nomikoiv ouai oti fortizete touv anyrwpouv fortia dusbastakta kai autoi eni twn daktulwn umwn ou prosqauete toiv fortioiv
11.47: ouai umin oti oikodomeite ta mnhmeia twn profhtwn oi de paterev umwn apekteinan autouv
11.48: ara marturev este kai suneudokeite toiv ergoiv twn paterwn umwn oti autoi men apekteinan autouv umeiv de oikodomeite
11.49: dia touto kai h sofia tou yeou eipen apostelw eiv autouv profhtav kai apostolouv kai ex autwn apoktenousin kai diwxousin
11.50: ina ekzhthyh to aima pantwn twn profhtwn to ekkecumenon apo katabolhv kosmou apo thv geneav tauthv
11.51: apo aimatov abel ewv aimatov zacariou tou apolomenou metaxu tou yusiasthriou kai tou oikou nai legw umin ekzhthyhsetai apo thv geneav tauthv
11.52: ouai umin toiv nomikoiv oti hrate thn kleida thv gnwsewv autoi ouk eishlyate kai touv eisercomenouv ekwlusate
11.53: kakeiyen exelyontov autou hrxanto oi grammateiv kai oi farisaioi deinwv enecein kai apostomatizein auton peri pleionwn
11.54: enedreuontev auton yhreusai ti ek tou stomatov autou

12.1: en oiv episunacyeiswn twn muriadwn tou oclou wste katapatein allhlouv hrxato legein prov touv mayhtav autou prwton prosecete eautoiv apo thv zumhv htiv estin upokrisiv twn farisaiwn
12.2: ouden de sugkekalummenon estin o ouk apokalufyhsetai kai krupton o ou gnwsyhsetai
12.3: any wn osa en th skotia eipate en tw fwti akousyhsetai kai o prov to ouv elalhsate en toiv tameioiv khrucyhsetai epi twn dwmatwn
12.4: legw de umin toiv filoiv mou mh fobhyhte apo twn apokteinontwn to swma kai meta tauta mh econtwn perissoteron ti poihsai
12.5: upodeixw de umin tina fobhyhte fobhyhte ton meta to apokteinai econta exousian embalein eiv thn geennan nai legw umin touton fobhyhte
12.6: ouci pente strouyia pwlountai assariwn duo kai en ex autwn ouk estin epilelhsmenon enwpion tou yeou
12.7: alla kai ai tricev thv kefalhv umwn pasai hriymhntai mh fobeisye pollwn strouyiwn diaferete
12.8: legw de umin pav ov an omologhsei en emoi emprosyen twn anyrwpwn kai o uiov tou anyrwpou omologhsei en autw emprosyen twn aggelwn tou yeou
12.9: o de arnhsamenov me enwpion twn anyrwpwn aparnhyhsetai enwpion twn aggelwn tou yeou
12.10: kai pav ov erei logon eiv ton uion tou anyrwpou afeyhsetai autw tw de eiv to agion pneuma blasfhmhsanti ouk afeyhsetai
12.11: otan de eisferwsin umav epi tav sunagwgav kai tav arcav kai tav exousiav mh merimnhshte pwv [h ti] apologhshsye h ti eiphte
12.12: to gar agion pneuma didaxei umav en auth th wra a dei eipein
12.13: eipen de tiv ek tou oclou autw didaskale eipe tw adelfw mou merisasyai met emou thn klhronomian
12.14: o de eipen autw anyrwpe tiv me katesthsen krithn h meristhn ef umav
12.15: eipen de prov autouv orate kai fulassesye apo pashv pleonexiav oti ouk en tw perisseuein tini h zwh autou estin ek twn uparcontwn autw
12.16: eipen de parabolhn prov autouv legwn anyrwpou tinov plousiou euforhsen h cwra
12.17: kai dielogizeto en autw legwn ti poihsw oti ouk ecw pou sunaxw touv karpouv mou
12.18: kai eipen touto poihsw kayelw mou tav apoyhkav kai meizonav oikodomhsw kai sunaxw ekei panta ton siton kai ta agaya mou
12.19: kai erw th quch mou quch eceiv polla agaya [keimena eiv eth polla anapauou fage pie] eufrainou
12.20: eipen de autw o yeov afrwn tauth th nukti thn quchn sou aitousin apo sou a de htoimasav tini estai
12.21: [outwv o yhsaurizwn autw kai mh eiv yeon ploutwn]
12.22: eipen de prov touv mayhtav [autou] dia touto legw umin mh merimnate th quch ti faghte mhde tw swmati [umwn] ti endushsye
12.23: h gar quch pleion estin thv trofhv kai to swma tou endumatov
12.24: katanohsate touv korakav oti ou speirousin oude yerizousin oiv ouk estin tameion oude apoyhkh kai o yeov trefei autouv posw mallon umeiv diaferete twn peteinwn
12.25: tiv de ex umwn merimnwn dunatai epi thn hlikian autou prosyeinai phcun
12.26: ei oun oude elaciston dunasye ti peri twn loipwn merimnate
12.27: katanohsate ta krina pwv auxanei ou kopia oude nhyei legw de umin oude solomwn en pash th doxh autou periebaleto wv en toutwn
12.28: ei de en agrw ton corton onta shmeron kai aurion eiv klibanon ballomenon o yeov outwv amfiezei posw mallon umav oligopistoi
12.29: kai umeiv mh zhteite ti faghte kai ti pihte kai mh metewrizesye
12.30: tauta gar panta ta eynh tou kosmou epizhtousin umwn de o pathr oiden oti crhzete toutwn
12.31: plhn zhteite thn basileian autou kai tauta prosteyhsetai umin
12.32: mh fobou to mikron poimnion oti eudokhsen o pathr umwn dounai umin thn basileian
12.33: pwlhsate ta uparconta umwn kai dote elehmosunhn poihsate eautoiv ballantia mh palaioumena yhsauron anekleipton en toiv ouranoiv opou klepthv ouk eggizei oude shv diafyeirei
12.34: opou gar estin o yhsaurov umwn ekei kai h kardia umwn estai
12.35: estwsan umwn ai osfuev periezwsmenai kai oi lucnoi kaiomenoi
12.36: kai umeiv omoioi anyrwpoiv prosdecomenoiv ton kurion eautwn pote analush ek twn gamwn ina elyontov kai krousantov euyewv anoixwsin autw
12.37: makarioi oi douloi ekeinoi ouv elywn o kuriov eurhsei grhgorountav amhn legw umin oti perizwsetai kai anaklinei autouv kai parelywn diakonhsei autoiv
12.38: kan en th deutera kan en th trith fulakh elyh kai eurh outwv makarioi eisin ekeinoi
12.39: touto de ginwskete oti ei hdei o oikodespothv poia wra o klepthv ercetai egrhgorhsen an kai ouk afhken diorucyhnai ton oikon autou
12.40: kai umeiv ginesye etoimoi oti h wra ou dokeite o uiov tou anyrwpou ercetai
12.41: eipen de o petrov kurie prov hmav thn parabolhn tauthn legeiv h kai prov pantav
12.42: kai eipen o kuriov tiv ara estin o pistov oikonomov o fronimov on katasthsei o kuriov epi thv yerapeiav autou tou didonai en kairw [to] sitometrion
12.43: makariov o doulov ekeinov on elywn o kuriov autou eurhsei poiounta outwv
12.44: alhywv legw umin oti epi pasin toiv uparcousin autou katasthsei auton
12.45: ean de eiph o doulov ekeinov en th kardia autou cronizei o kuriov mou ercesyai kai arxhtai tuptein touv paidav kai tav paidiskav esyiein te kai pinein kai meyuskesyai
12.46: hxei o kuriov tou doulou ekeinou en hmera h ou prosdoka kai en wra h ou ginwskei kai dicotomhsei auton kai to merov autou meta twn apistwn yhsei
12.47: ekeinov de o doulov o gnouv to yelhma tou kuriou autou kai mh etoimasav h poihsav prov to yelhma autou darhsetai pollav
12.48: o de mh gnouv poihsav de axia plhgwn darhsetai oligav panti de w edoyh polu polu zhthyhsetai par autou kai w pareyento polu perissoteron aithsousin auton
12.49: pur hlyon balein epi thn ghn kai ti yelw ei hdh anhfyh
12.50: baptisma de ecw baptisyhnai kai pwv sunecomai ewv otou telesyh
12.51: dokeite oti eirhnhn paregenomhn dounai en th gh ouci legw umin all h diamerismon
12.52: esontai gar apo tou nun pente en eni oikw diamemerismenoi treiv epi dusin kai duo epi trisin
12.53: diamerisyhsontai pathr epi uiw kai uiov epi patri mhthr epi yugatera kai yugathr epi thn mhtera penyera epi thn numfhn authv kai numfh epi thn penyeran
12.54: elegen de kai toiv ocloiv otan idhte nefelhn anatellousan epi dusmwn euyewv legete oti ombrov ercetai kai ginetai outwv
12.55: kai otan noton pneonta legete oti kauswn estai kai ginetai
12.56: upokritai to proswpon thv ghv kai tou ouranou oidate dokimazein ton kairon de touton pwv ouk oidate dokimazein
12.57: ti de kai af eautwn ou krinete to dikaion
12.58: wv gar upageiv meta tou antidikou sou ep arconta en th odw dov ergasian aphllacyai [ap] autou mhpote katasurh se prov ton krithn kai o krithv se paradwsei tw praktori kai o praktwr se balei eiv fulakhn
12.59: legw soi ou mh exelyhv ekeiyen ewv kai to escaton lepton apodwv

13.1: parhsan de tinev en autw tw kairw apaggellontev autw peri twn galilaiwn wn to aima pilatov emixen meta twn yusiwn autwn
13.2: kai apokriyeiv eipen autoiv dokeite oti oi galilaioi outoi amartwloi para pantav touv galilaiouv egenonto oti tauta peponyasin
13.3: ouci legw umin all ean mh metanohte pantev omoiwv apoleisye
13.4: h ekeinoi oi deka oktw ef ouv epesen o purgov en tw silwam kai apekteinen autouv dokeite oti autoi ofeiletai egenonto para pantav touv anyrwpouv touv katoikountav ierousalhm
13.5: ouci legw umin all ean mh metanohshte pantev wsautwv apoleisye
13.6: elegen de tauthn thn parabolhn sukhn eicen tiv pefuteumenhn en tw ampelwni autou kai hlyen zhtwn karpon en auth kai ouc euren
13.7: eipen de prov ton ampelourgon idou tria eth af ou ercomai zhtwn karpon en th sukh tauth kai ouc euriskw ekkoqon authn ina ti kai thn ghn katargei
13.8: o de apokriyeiv legei autw kurie afev authn kai touto to etov ewv otou skaqw peri authn kai balw kopria
13.9: kan men poihsh karpon eiv to mellon ei de mhge ekkoqeiv authn
13.10: hn de didaskwn en mia twn sunagwgwn en toiv sabbasin
13.11: kai idou gunh pneuma ecousa asyeneiav eth deka oktw kai hn sugkuptousa kai mh dunamenh anakuqai eiv to pantelev
13.12: idwn de authn o ihsouv prosefwnhsen kai eipen auth gunai apolelusai thv asyeneiav sou
13.13: kai epeyhken auth tav ceirav kai paracrhma anwrywyh kai edoxazen ton yeon
13.14: apokriyeiv de o arcisunagwgov aganaktwn oti tw sabbatw eyerapeusen o ihsouv elegen tw oclw oti ex hmerai eisin en aiv dei ergazesyai en autaiv oun ercomenoi yerapeuesye kai mh th hmera tou sabbatou
13.15: apekriyh de autw o kuriov kai eipen upokritai ekastov umwn tw sabbatw ou luei ton boun autou h ton onon apo thv fatnhv kai apagwn potizei
13.16: tauthn de yugatera abraam ousan hn edhsen o satanav idou deka kai oktw eth ouk edei luyhnai apo tou desmou toutou th hmera tou sabbatou
13.17: kai tauta legontov autou kathscunonto pantev oi antikeimenoi autw kai pav o oclov ecairen epi pasin toiv endoxoiv toiv ginomenoiv up autou
13.18: elegen oun tini omoia estin h basileia tou yeou kai tini omoiwsw authn
13.19: omoia estin kokkw sinapewv on labwn anyrwpov ebalen eiv khpon eautou kai huxhsen kai egeneto eiv dendron kai ta peteina tou ouranou kateskhnwsen en toiv kladoiv autou
13.20: kai palin eipen tini omoiwsw thn basileian tou yeou
13.21: omoia estin zumh hn labousa gunh ekruqen eiv aleurou sata tria ewv ou ezumwyh olon
13.22: kai dieporeueto kata poleiv kai kwmav didaskwn kai poreian poioumenov eiv ierosoluma
13.23: eipen de tiv autw kurie ei oligoi oi swzomenoi o de eipen prov autouv
13.24: agwnizesye eiselyein dia thv stenhv yurav oti polloi legw umin zhthsousin eiselyein kai ouk iscusousin
13.25: af ou an egeryh o oikodespothv kai apokleish thn yuran kai arxhsye exw estanai kai krouein thn yuran legontev kurie anoixon hmin kai apokriyeiv erei umin ouk oida umav poyen este
13.26: tote arxesye legein efagomen enwpion sou kai epiomen kai en taiv plateiaiv hmwn edidaxav
13.27: kai erei legwn umin ouk oida poyen este aposthte ap emou pantev ergatai adikiav
13.28: ekei estai o klauymov kai o brugmov twn odontwn otan oqhsye abraam kai isaak kai iakwb kai pantav touv profhtav en th basileia tou yeou umav de ekballomenouv exw
13.29: kai hxousin apo anatolwn kai dusmwn kai apo borra kai notou kai anakliyhsontai en th basileia tou yeou
13.30: kai idou eisin escatoi oi esontai prwtoi kai eisin prwtoi oi esontai escatoi
13.31: en auth th wra proshlyan tinev farisaioi legontev autw exelye kai poreuou enteuyen oti hrwdhv yelei se apokteinai
13.32: kai eipen autoiv poreuyentev eipate th alwpeki tauth idou ekballw daimonia kai iaseiv apotelw shmeron kai aurion kai th trith teleioumai
13.33: plhn dei me shmeron kai aurion kai th ecomenh poreuesyai oti ouk endecetai profhthn apolesyai exw ierousalhm
13.34: ierousalhm ierousalhm h apokteinousa touv profhtav kai liyobolousa touv apestalmenouv prov authn posakiv hyelhsa episunaxai ta tekna sou on tropon orniv thn eauthv nossian upo tav pterugav kai ouk hyelhsate
13.35: idou afietai umin o oikov umwn legw [de] umin ou mh idhte me ewv eiphte euloghmenov o ercomenov en onomati kuriou

14.1: kai egeneto en tw elyein auton eiv oikon tinov twn arcontwn [twn] farisaiwn sabbatw fagein arton kai autoi hsan parathroumenoi auton
14.2: kai idou anyrwpov tiv hn udrwpikov emprosyen autou
14.3: kai apokriyeiv o ihsouv eipen prov touv nomikouv kai farisaiouv legwn exestin tw sabbatw yerapeusai h ou
14.4: oi de hsucasan kai epilabomenov iasato auton kai apelusen
14.5: kai prov autouv eipen tinov umwn uiov h bouv eiv frear peseitai kai ouk euyewv anaspasei auton en hmera tou sabbatou
14.6: kai ouk iscusan antapokriyhnai prov tauta
14.7: elegen de prov touv keklhmenouv parabolhn epecwn pwv tav prwtoklisiav exelegonto legwn prov autouv
14.8: otan klhyhv upo tinov eiv gamouv mh katakliyhv eiv thn prwtoklisian mhpote entimoterov sou h keklhmenov up autou
14.9: kai elywn o se kai auton kalesav erei soi dov toutw topon kai tote arxh meta aiscunhv ton escaton topon katecein
14.10: all otan klhyhv poreuyeiv anapese eiv ton escaton topon ina otan elyh o keklhkwv se erei soi file prosanabhyi anwteron tote estai soi doxa enwpion pantwn twn sunanakeimenwn soi
14.11: oti pav o uqwn eauton tapeinwyhsetai kai o tapeinwn eauton uqwyhsetai
14.12: elegen de kai tw keklhkoti auton otan poihv ariston h deipnon mh fwnei touv filouv sou mhde touv adelfouv sou mhde touv suggeneiv sou mhde geitonav plousiouv mhpote kai autoi antikaleswsin se kai genhtai antapodoma soi
14.13: all otan dochn poihv kalei ptwcouv anapeirouv cwlouv tuflouv
14.14: kai makariov esh oti ouk ecousin antapodounai soi antapodoyhsetai gar soi en th anastasei twn dikaiwn
14.15: akousav de tiv twn sunanakeimenwn tauta eipen autw makariov ostiv fagetai arton en th basileia tou yeou
14.16: o de eipen autw anyrwpov tiv epoiei deipnon mega kai ekalesen pollouv
14.17: kai apesteilen ton doulon autou th wra tou deipnou eipein toiv keklhmenoiv ercesye oti hdh etoima estin
14.18: kai hrxanto apo miav pantev paraiteisyai o prwtov eipen autw agron hgorasa kai ecw anagkhn exelywn idein auton erwtw se ece me parhthmenon
14.19: kai eterov eipen zeugh bown hgorasa pente kai poreuomai dokimasai auta erwtw se ece me parhthmenon
14.20: kai eterov eipen gunaika eghma kai dia touto ou dunamai elyein
14.21: kai paragenomenov o doulov aphggeilen tw kuriw autou tauta tote orgisyeiv o oikodespothv eipen tw doulw autou exelye tacewv eiv tav plateiav kai rumav thv polewv kai touv ptwcouv kai anapeirouv kai tuflouv kai cwlouv eisagage wde
14.22: kai eipen o doulov kurie gegonen o epetaxav kai eti topov estin
14.23: kai eipen o kuriov prov ton doulon exelye eiv tav odouv kai fragmouv kai anagkason eiselyein ina gemisyh mou o oikov
14.24: legw gar umin oti oudeiv twn andrwn ekeinwn twn keklhmenwn geusetai mou tou deipnou
14.25: suneporeuonto de autw ocloi polloi kai strafeiv eipen prov autouv
14.26: ei tiv ercetai prov me kai ou misei ton patera eautou kai thn mhtera kai thn gunaika kai ta tekna kai touv adelfouv kai tav adelfav eti te kai thn quchn eautou ou dunatai einai mou mayhthv
14.27: ostiv ou bastazei ton stauron eautou kai ercetai opisw mou ou dunatai einai mou mayhthv
14.28: tiv gar ex umwn yelwn purgon oikodomhsai ouci prwton kayisav qhfizei thn dapanhn ei ecei eiv apartismon
14.29: ina mhpote yentov autou yemelion kai mh iscuontov ektelesai pantev oi yewrountev arxwntai autw empaizein
14.30: legontev oti outov o anyrwpov hrxato oikodomein kai ouk iscusen ektelesai
14.31: h tiv basileuv poreuomenov eterw basilei sumbalein eiv polemon ouci kayisav prwton bouleusetai ei dunatov estin en deka ciliasin upanthsai tw meta eikosi ciliadwn ercomenw ep auton
14.32: ei de mhge eti autou porrw ontov presbeian aposteilav erwta prov eirhnhn
14.33: outwv oun pav ex umwn ov ouk apotassetai pasin toiv eautou uparcousin ou dunatai einai mou mayhthv
14.34: kalon oun to alav ean de kai to alav mwranyh en tini artuyhsetai
14.35: oute eiv ghn oute eiv koprian euyeton estin exw ballousin auto o ecwn wta akouein akouetw

15.1: hsan de autw eggizontev pantev oi telwnai kai oi amartwloi akouein autou
15.2: kai diegogguzon oi te farisaioi kai oi grammateiv legontev oti outov amartwlouv prosdecetai kai sunesyiei autoiv
15.3: eipen de prov autouv thn parabolhn tauthn legwn
15.4: tiv anyrwpov ex umwn ecwn ekaton probata kai apolesav ex autwn en ou kataleipei ta enenhkonta ennea en th erhmw kai poreuetai epi to apolwlov ewv eurh auto
15.5: kai eurwn epitiyhsin epi touv wmouv autou cairwn
15.6: kai elywn eiv ton oikon sugkalei touv filouv kai touv geitonav legwn autoiv sugcarhte moi oti euron to probaton mou to apolwlov
15.7: legw umin oti outwv cara en tw ouranw estai epi eni amartwlw metanoounti h epi enenhkonta ennea dikaioiv oitinev ou creian ecousin metanoiav
15.8: h tiv gunh dracmav ecousa deka ean apolesh dracmhn mian ouci aptei lucnon kai saroi thn oikian kai zhtei epimelwv ewv ou eurh
15.9: kai eurousa sugkalei tav filav kai geitonav legousa sugcarhte moi oti euron thn dracmhn hn apwlesa
15.10: outwv legw umin ginetai cara enwpion twn aggelwn tou yeou epi eni amartwlw metanoounti
15.11: eipen de anyrwpov tiv eicen duo uiouv
15.12: kai eipen o newterov autwn tw patri pater dov moi to epiballon merov thv ousiav o de dieilen autoiv ton bion
15.13: kai met ou pollav hmerav sunagagwn panta o newterov uiov apedhmhsen eiv cwran makran kai ekei dieskorpisen thn ousian autou zwn aswtwv
15.14: dapanhsantov de autou panta egeneto limov iscura kata thn cwran ekeinhn kai autov hrxato ustereisyai
15.15: kai poreuyeiv ekollhyh eni twn politwn thv cwrav ekeinhv kai epemqen auton eiv touv agrouv autou boskein coirouv
15.16: kai epeyumei cortasyhnai ek twn keratiwn wn hsyion oi coiroi kai oudeiv edidou autw
15.17: eiv eauton de elywn efh posoi misyioi tou patrov mou perisseuontai artwn egw de limw wde apollumai
15.18: anastav poreusomai prov ton patera mou kai erw autw pater hmarton eiv ton ouranon kai enwpion sou
15.19: ouketi eimi axiov klhyhnai uiov sou poihson me wv ena twn misyiwn sou
15.20: kai anastav hlyen prov ton patera eautou eti de autou makran apecontov eiden auton o pathr autou kai esplagcnisyh kai dramwn epepesen epi ton trachlon autou kai katefilhsen auton
15.21: eipen de o uiov autw pater hmarton eiv ton ouranon kai enwpion sou ouketi eimi axiov klhyhnai uiov sou [poihson me wv ena twn misyiwn sou]
15.22: eipen de o pathr prov touv doulouv autou tacu exenegkate stolhn thn prwthn kai endusate auton kai dote daktulion eiv thn ceira autou kai upodhmata eiv touv podav
15.23: kai ferete ton moscon ton siteuton yusate kai fagontev eufranywmen
15.24: oti outov o uiov mou nekrov hn kai anezhsen hn apolwlwv kai eureyh kai hrxanto eufrainesyai
15.25: hn de o uiov autou o presbuterov en agrw kai wv ercomenov hggisen th oikia hkousen sumfwniav kai corwn
15.26: kai proskalesamenov ena twn paidwn epunyaneto ti an eih tauta
15.27: o de eipen autw oti o adelfov sou hkei kai eyusen o pathr sou ton moscon ton siteuton oti ugiainonta auton apelaben
15.28: wrgisyh de kai ouk hyelen eiselyein o de pathr autou exelywn parekalei auton
15.29: o de apokriyeiv eipen tw patri autou idou tosauta eth douleuw soi kai oudepote entolhn sou parhlyon kai emoi oudepote edwkav erifon ina meta twn filwn mou eufranyw
15.30: ote de o uiov sou outov o katafagwn sou ton bion meta pornwn hlyen eyusav autw ton siteuton moscon
15.31: o de eipen autw teknon su pantote met emou ei kai panta ta ema sa estin
15.32: eufranyhnai de kai carhnai edei oti o adelfov sou outov nekrov hn kai ezhsen kai apolwlwv kai eureyh

16.1: elegen de kai prov touv mayhtav anyrwpov tiv hn plousiov ov eicen oikonomon kai outov dieblhyh autw wv diaskorpizwn ta uparconta autou
16.2: kai fwnhsav auton eipen autw ti touto akouw peri sou apodov ton logon thv oikonomiav sou ou gar dunh eti oikonomein
16.3: eipen de en eautw o oikonomov ti poihsw oti o kuriov mou afaireitai thn oikonomian ap emou skaptein ouk iscuw epaitein aiscunomai
16.4: egnwn ti poihsw ina otan metastayw ek thv oikonomiav dexwntai me eiv touv oikouv eautwn
16.5: kai proskalesamenov ena ekaston twn creofeiletwn tou kuriou eautou elegen tw prwtw poson ofeileiv tw kuriw mou
16.6: o de eipen ekaton batouv elaiou o de eipen autw dexai sou ta grammata kai kayisav tacewv graqon penthkonta
16.7: epeita eterw eipen su de poson ofeileiv o de eipen ekaton korouv sitou legei autw dexai sou ta grammata kai graqon ogdohkonta
16.8: kai ephnesen o kuriov ton oikonomon thv adikiav oti fronimwv epoihsen oti oi uioi tou aiwnov toutou fronimwteroi uper touv uiouv tou fwtov eiv thn genean thn eautwn eisin
16.9: kai egw umin legw eautoiv poihsate filouv ek tou mamwna thv adikiav ina otan ekliph dexwntai umav eiv tav aiwniouv skhnav
16.10: o pistov en elacistw kai en pollw pistov estin kai o en elacistw adikov kai en pollw adikov estin
16.11: ei oun en tw adikw mamwna pistoi ouk egenesye to alhyinon tiv umin pisteusei
16.12: kai ei en tw allotriw pistoi ouk egenesye to hmeteron tiv dwsei umin
16.13: oudeiv oikethv dunatai dusin kurioiv douleuein h gar ton ena mishsei kai ton eteron agaphsei h enov anyexetai kai tou eterou katafronhsei ou dunasye yew douleuein kai mamwna
16.14: hkouon de tauta panta oi farisaioi filarguroi uparcontev kai exemukthrizon auton
16.15: kai eipen autoiv umeiv este oi dikaiountev eautouv enwpion twn anyrwpwn o de yeov ginwskei tav kardiav umwn oti to en anyrwpoiv uqhlon bdelugma enwpion tou yeou
16.16: o nomov kai oi profhtai mecri iwannou apo tote h basileia tou yeou euaggelizetai kai pav eiv authn biazetai
16.17: eukopwteron de estin ton ouranon kai thn ghn parelyein h tou nomou mian keraian pesein
16.18: pav o apoluwn thn gunaika autou kai gamwn eteran moiceuei kai o apolelumenhn apo androv gamwn moiceuei
16.19: anyrwpov de tiv hn plousiov kai enedidusketo porfuran kai busson eufrainomenov kay hmeran lamprwv
16.20: ptwcov de tiv onomati lazarov ebeblhto prov ton pulwna autou eilkwmenov
16.21: kai epiyumwn cortasyhnai apo twn piptontwn apo thv trapezhv tou plousiou alla kai oi kunev ercomenoi epeleicon ta elkh autou
16.22: egeneto de apoyanein ton ptwcon kai apenecyhnai auton upo twn aggelwn eiv ton kolpon abraam apeyanen de kai o plousiov kai etafh
16.23: kai en tw adh eparav touv ofyalmouv autou uparcwn en basanoiv ora abraam apo makroyen kai lazaron en toiv kolpoiv autou
16.24: kai autov fwnhsav eipen pater abraam elehson me kai pemqon lazaron ina baqh to akron tou daktulou autou udatov kai kataquxh thn glwssan mou oti odunwmai en th flogi tauth
16.25: eipen de abraam teknon mnhsyhti oti apelabev ta agaya sou en th zwh sou kai lazarov omoiwv ta kaka nun de wde parakaleitai su de odunasai
16.26: kai en pasin toutoiv metaxu hmwn kai umwn casma mega esthriktai opwv oi yelontev diabhnai enyen prov umav mh dunwntai mhde ekeiyen prov hmav diaperwsin
16.27: eipen de erwtw se oun pater ina pemqhv auton eiv ton oikon tou patrov mou
16.28: ecw gar pente adelfouv opwv diamarturhtai autoiv ina mh kai autoi elywsin eiv ton topon touton thv basanou
16.29: legei de abraam ecousin mwusea kai touv profhtav akousatwsan autwn
16.30: o de eipen ouci pater abraam all ean tiv apo nekrwn poreuyh prov autouv metanohsousin
16.31: eipen de autw ei mwusewv kai twn profhtwn ouk akouousin oud ean tiv ek nekrwn anasth peisyhsontai

17.1: eipen de prov touv mayhtav autou anendekton estin tou ta skandala mh elyein plhn ouai di ou ercetai
17.2: lusitelei autw ei liyov mulikov perikeitai peri ton trachlon autou kai erriptai eiv thn yalassan h ina skandalish twn mikrwn toutwn ena
17.3: prosecete eautoiv ean amarth o adelfov sou epitimhson autw kai ean metanohsh afev autw
17.4: kai ean eptakiv thv hmerav amarthsh eiv se kai eptakiv epistreqh prov se legwn metanow afhseiv autw
17.5: kai eipan oi apostoloi tw kuriw prosyev hmin pistin
17.6: eipen de o kuriov ei ecete pistin wv kokkon sinapewv elegete an th sukaminw [tauth] ekrizwyhti kai futeuyhti en th yalassh kai uphkousen an umin
17.7: tiv de ex umwn doulon ecwn arotriwnta h poimainonta ov eiselyonti ek tou agrou erei autw euyewv parelywn anapese
17.8: all ouci erei autw etoimason ti deipnhsw kai perizwsamenov diakonei moi ewv fagw kai piw kai meta tauta fagesai kai piesai su
17.9: mh ecei carin tw doulw oti epoihsen ta diatacyenta
17.10: outwv kai umeiv otan poihshte panta ta diatacyenta umin legete oti douloi acreioi esmen o wfeilomen poihsai pepoihkamen
17.11: kai egeneto en tw poreuesyai eiv ierousalhm kai autov dihrceto dia meson samariav kai galilaiav
17.12: kai eisercomenou autou eiv tina kwmhn aphnthsan deka leproi andrev oi anesthsan porrwyen
17.13: kai autoi hran fwnhn legontev ihsou epistata elehson hmav
17.14: kai idwn eipen autoiv poreuyentev epideixate eautouv toiv iereusin kai egeneto en tw upagein autouv ekayarisyhsan
17.15: eiv de ex autwn idwn oti iayh upestreqen meta fwnhv megalhv doxazwn ton yeon
17.16: kai epesen epi proswpon para touv podav autou eucaristwn autw kai autov hn samareithv
17.17: apokriyeiv de o ihsouv eipen ouc oi deka ekayarisyhsan oi [de] ennea pou
17.18: ouc eureyhsan upostreqantev dounai doxan tw yew ei mh o allogenhv outov
17.19: kai eipen autw anastav poreuou h pistiv sou seswken se
17.20: eperwthyeiv de upo twn farisaiwn pote ercetai h basileia tou yeou apekriyh autoiv kai eipen ouk ercetai h basileia tou yeou meta parathrhsewv
17.21: oude erousin idou wde h ekei idou gar h basileia tou yeou entov umwn estin
17.22: eipen de prov touv mayhtav eleusontai hmerai ote epiyumhsete mian twn hmerwn tou uiou tou anyrwpou idein kai ouk oqesye
17.23: kai erousin umin idou ekei h idou wde mh [apelyhte mhde] diwxhte
17.24: wsper gar h astraph astraptousa ek thv upo ton ouranon eiv thn up ouranon lampei outwv estai o uiov tou anyrwpou
17.25: prwton de dei auton polla payein kai apodokimasyhnai apo thv geneav tauthv
17.26: kai kaywv egeneto en taiv hmeraiv nwe outwv estai kai en taiv hmeraiv tou uiou tou anyrwpou
17.27: hsyion epinon egamoun egamizonto acri hv hmerav eishlyen nwe eiv thn kibwton kai hlyen o kataklusmov kai apwlesen pantav
17.28: omoiwv kaywv egeneto en taiv hmeraiv lwt hsyion epinon hgorazon epwloun efuteuon wkodomoun
17.29: h de hmera exhlyen lwt apo sodomwn ebrexen pur kai yeion ap ouranou kai apwlesen pantav
17.30: kata ta auta estai h hmera o uiov tou anyrwpou apokaluptetai
17.31: en ekeinh th hmera ov estai epi tou dwmatov kai ta skeuh autou en th oikia mh katabatw arai auta kai o en agrw omoiwv mh epistreqatw eiv ta opisw
17.33: ov ean zhthsh thn quchn autou peripoihsasyai apolesei authn ov d an apolesei zwogonhsei authn
17.34: legw umin tauth th nukti esontai duo epi klinhv [miav] o eiv paralhmfyhsetai kai o eterov afeyhsetai
17.35: esontai duo alhyousai epi to auto h mia paralhmfyhsetai h de etera afeyhsetai 17:36
17.37: kai apokriyentev legousin autw pou kurie o de eipen autoiv opou to swma ekei kai oi aetoi episunacyhsontai

18.1: elegen de parabolhn autoiv prov to dein pantote proseucesyai autouv kai mh enkakein
18.2: legwn krithv tiv hn en tini polei ton yeon mh foboumenov kai anyrwpon mh entrepomenov
18.3: chra de hn en th polei ekeinh kai hrceto prov auton legousa ekdikhson me apo tou antidikou mou
18.4: kai ouk hyelen epi cronon meta tauta de eipen en eautw ei kai ton yeon ou foboumai oude anyrwpon entrepomai
18.5: dia ge to parecein moi kopon thn chran tauthn ekdikhsw authn ina mh eiv telov ercomenh upwpiazh me
18.6: eipen de o kuriov akousate ti o krithv thv adikiav legei
18.7: o de yeov ou mh poihsh thn ekdikhsin twn eklektwn autou twn bowntwn autw hmerav kai nuktov kai makroyumei ep autoiv
18.8: legw umin oti poihsei thn ekdikhsin autwn en tacei plhn o uiov tou anyrwpou elywn ara eurhsei thn pistin epi thv ghv
18.9: eipen de kai prov tinav touv pepoiyotav ef eautoiv oti eisin dikaioi kai exouyenountav touv loipouv thn parabolhn tauthn
18.10: anyrwpoi duo anebhsan eiv to ieron proseuxasyai eiv farisaiov kai o eterov telwnhv
18.11: o farisaiov stayeiv tauta prov eauton proshuceto o yeov eucaristw soi oti ouk eimi wsper oi loipoi twn anyrwpwn arpagev adikoi moicoi h kai wv outov o telwnhv
18.12: nhsteuw div tou sabbatou apodekateuw panta osa ktwmai
18.13: o de telwnhv makroyen estwv ouk hyelen oude touv ofyalmouv eparai eiv ton ouranon all etupten to sthyov eautou legwn o yeov ilasyhti moi tw amartwlw
18.14: legw umin katebh outov dedikaiwmenov eiv ton oikon autou par ekeinon oti pav o uqwn eauton tapeinwyhsetai o de tapeinwn eauton uqwyhsetai
18.15: proseferon de autw kai ta brefh ina autwn apthtai idontev de oi mayhtai epetimwn autoiv
18.16: o de ihsouv prosekalesato [auta] legwn afete ta paidia ercesyai prov me kai mh kwluete auta twn gar toioutwn estin h basileia tou yeou
18.17: amhn legw umin ov an mh dexhtai thn basileian tou yeou wv paidion ou mh eiselyh eiv authn
18.18: kai ephrwthsen tiv auton arcwn legwn didaskale agaye ti poihsav zwhn aiwnion klhronomhsw
18.19: eipen de autw o ihsouv ti me legeiv agayon oudeiv agayov ei mh eiv [o] yeov
18.20: tav entolav oidav mh moiceushv mh foneushv mh kleqhv mh qeudomarturhshv tima ton patera sou kai thn mhtera
18.21: o de eipen tauta panta efulaxa ek neothtov
18.22: akousav de o ihsouv eipen autw eti en soi leipei panta osa eceiv pwlhson kai diadov ptwcoiv kai exeiv yhsauron en [toiv] ouranoiv kai deuro akolouyei moi
18.23: o de akousav tauta perilupov egenhyh hn gar plousiov sfodra
18.24: idwn de auton [o] ihsouv eipen pwv duskolwv oi ta crhmata econtev eiv thn basileian tou yeou eisporeuontai
18.25: eukopwteron gar estin kamhlon dia trhmatov belonhv eiselyein h plousion eiv thn basileian tou yeou eiselyein
18.26: eipan de oi akousantev kai tiv dunatai swyhnai
18.27: o de eipen ta adunata para anyrwpoiv dunata para tw yew estin
18.28: eipen de o petrov idou hmeiv afentev ta idia hkolouyhsamen soi
18.29: o de eipen autoiv amhn legw umin oti oudeiv estin ov afhken oikian h gunaika h adelfouv h goneiv h tekna eineken thv basileiav tou yeou
18.30: ov ouci mh labh pollaplasiona en tw kairw toutw kai en tw aiwni tw ercomenw zwhn aiwnion
18.31: paralabwn de touv dwdeka eipen prov autouv idou anabainomen eiv ierousalhm kai telesyhsetai panta ta gegrammena dia twn profhtwn tw uiw tou anyrwpou
18.32: paradoyhsetai gar toiv eynesin kai empaicyhsetai kai ubrisyhsetai kai emptusyhsetai
18.33: kai mastigwsantev apoktenousin auton kai th hmera th trith anasthsetai
18.34: kai autoi ouden toutwn sunhkan kai hn to rhma touto kekrummenon ap autwn kai ouk eginwskon ta legomena
18.35: egeneto de en tw eggizein auton eiv iericw tuflov tiv ekayhto para thn odon epaitwn
18.36: akousav de oclou diaporeuomenou epunyaneto ti eih touto
18.37: aphggeilan de autw oti ihsouv o nazwraiov parercetai
18.38: kai ebohsen legwn ihsou uie dauid elehson me
18.39: kai oi proagontev epetimwn autw ina sighsh autov de pollw mallon ekrazen uie dauid elehson me
18.40: stayeiv de ihsouv ekeleusen auton acyhnai prov auton eggisantov de autou ephrwthsen auton
18.41: ti soi yeleiv poihsw o de eipen kurie ina anableqw
18.42: kai o ihsouv eipen autw anableqon h pistiv sou seswken se
18.43: kai paracrhma anebleqen kai hkolouyei autw doxazwn ton yeon kai pav o laov idwn edwken ainon tw yew
