19.2: kai idou anhr onomati kaloumenov zakcaiov kai autov hn arcitelwnhv kai autov plousiov
19.3: kai ezhtei idein ton ihsoun tiv estin kai ouk hdunato apo tou oclou oti th hlikia mikrov hn
19.4: kai prodramwn eiv to emprosyen anebh epi sukomorean ina idh auton oti ekeinhv hmellen diercesyai
19.5: kai wv hlyen epi ton topon anableqav [o] ihsouv eipen prov auton zakcaie speusav katabhyi shmeron gar en tw oikw sou dei me meinai
19.6: kai speusav katebh kai upedexato auton cairwn
19.7: kai idontev pantev diegogguzon legontev oti para amartwlw andri eishlyen katalusai
19.8: stayeiv de zakcaiov eipen prov ton kurion idou ta hmisia mou twn uparcontwn kurie [toiv] ptwcoiv didwmi kai ei tinov ti esukofanthsa apodidwmi tetraploun
19.9: eipen de prov auton [o] ihsouv oti shmeron swthria tw oikw toutw egeneto kayoti kai autov uiov abraam [estin]
19.10: hlyen gar o uiov tou anyrwpou zhthsai kai swsai to apolwlov
19.11: akouontwn de autwn tauta prosyeiv eipen parabolhn dia to egguv einai ierousalhm auton kai dokein autouv oti paracrhma mellei h basileia tou yeou anafainesyai
19.12: eipen oun anyrwpov tiv eugenhv eporeuyh eiv cwran makran labein eautw basileian kai upostreqai
19.13: kalesav de deka doulouv eautou edwken autoiv deka mnav kai eipen prov autouv pragmateusasyai en w ercomai
19.14: oi de politai autou emisoun auton kai apesteilan presbeian opisw autou legontev ou yelomen touton basileusai ef hmav
19.15: kai egeneto en tw epanelyein auton labonta thn basileian kai eipen fwnhyhnai autw touv doulouv toutouv oiv dedwkei to argurion ina gnoi ti diepragmateusanto
19.16: paregeneto de o prwtov legwn kurie h mna sou deka proshrgasato mnav
19.17: kai eipen autw euge agaye doule oti en elacistw pistov egenou isyi exousian ecwn epanw deka polewn
19.18: kai hlyen o deuterov legwn h mna sou kurie epoihsen pente mnav
19.19: eipen de kai toutw kai su epanw ginou pente polewn
19.20: kai o eterov hlyen legwn kurie idou h mna sou hn eicon apokeimenhn en soudariw
19.21: efoboumhn gar se oti anyrwpov austhrov ei aireiv o ouk eyhkav kai yerizeiv o ouk espeirav
19.22: legei autw ek tou stomatov sou krinw se ponhre doule hdeiv oti egw anyrwpov austhrov eimi airwn o ouk eyhka kai yerizwn o ouk espeira
19.23: kai dia ti ouk edwkav mou to argurion epi trapezan kagw elywn sun tokw an auto epraxa
19.24: kai toiv parestwsin eipen arate ap autou thn mnan kai dote tw tav deka mnav econti
19.25: kai eipan autw kurie ecei deka mnav
19.26: legw umin oti panti tw econti doyhsetai apo de tou mh econtov kai o ecei aryhsetai
19.27: plhn touv ecyrouv mou toutouv touv mh yelhsantav me basileusai ep autouv agagete wde kai katasfaxate autouv emprosyen mou
19.28: kai eipwn tauta eporeueto emprosyen anabainwn eiv ierosoluma
19.29: kai egeneto wv hggisen eiv bhyfagh kai bhyania prov to orov to kaloumenon elaiwn apesteilen duo twn mayhtwn
19.30: legwn upagete eiv thn katenanti kwmhn en h eisporeuomenoi eurhsete pwlon dedemenon ef on oudeiv pwpote anyrwpwn ekayisen kai lusantev auton agagete
19.31: kai ean tiv umav erwta dia ti luete outwv ereite oti o kuriov autou creian ecei
19.32: apelyontev de oi apestalmenoi euron kaywv eipen autoiv
19.33: luontwn de autwn ton pwlon eipan oi kurioi autou prov autouv ti luete ton pwlon
19.34: oi de eipan oti o kuriov autou creian ecei
19.35: kai hgagon auton prov ton ihsoun kai epiriqantev autwn ta imatia epi ton pwlon epebibasan ton ihsoun
19.36: poreuomenou de autou upestrwnnuon ta imatia eautwn en th odw
19.37: eggizontov de autou hdh prov th katabasei tou orouv twn elaiwn hrxanto apan to plhyov twn mayhtwn cairontev ainein ton yeon fwnh megalh peri paswn wn eidon dunamewn
19.38: legontev euloghmenov o ercomenov o basileuv en onomati kuriou en ouranw eirhnh kai doxa en uqistoiv
19.39: kai tinev twn farisaiwn apo tou oclou eipan prov auton didaskale epitimhson toiv mayhtaiv sou
19.40: kai apokriyeiv eipen legw umin ean outoi siwphsousin oi liyoi kraxousin
19.41: kai wv hggisen idwn thn polin eklausen ep authn
19.42: legwn oti ei egnwv en th hmera tauth kai su ta prov eirhnhn nun de ekrubh apo ofyalmwn sou
19.43: oti hxousin hmerai epi se kai parembalousin oi ecyroi sou caraka soi kai perikuklwsousin se kai sunexousin se pantoyen
19.44: kai edafiousin se kai ta tekna sou en soi kai ouk afhsousin liyon epi liyon en soi any wn ouk egnwv ton kairon thv episkophv sou
19.45: kai eiselywn eiv to ieron hrxato ekballein touv pwlountav
19.46: legwn autoiv gegraptai kai estai o oikov mou oikov proseuchv umeiv de auton epoihsate sphlaion lhstwn
19.47: kai hn didaskwn to kay hmeran en tw ierw oi de arciereiv kai oi grammateiv ezhtoun auton apolesai kai oi prwtoi tou laou
19.48: kai ouc huriskon to ti poihswsin o laov gar apav exekremeto autou akouwn

20.1: kai egeneto en mia twn hmerwn didaskontov autou ton laon en tw ierw kai euaggelizomenou epesthsan oi arciereiv kai oi grammateiv sun toiv presbuteroiv
20.2: kai eipan legontev prov auton eipon hmin en poia exousia tauta poieiv h tiv estin o douv soi thn exousian tauthn
20.3: apokriyeiv de eipen prov autouv erwthsw umav kagw logon kai eipate moi
20.4: to baptisma iwannou ex ouranou hn h ex anyrwpwn
20.5: oi de sunelogisanto prov eautouv legontev oti ean eipwmen ex ouranou erei dia ti ouk episteusate autw
20.6: ean de eipwmen ex anyrwpwn o laov apav kataliyasei hmav pepeismenov gar estin iwannhn profhthn einai
20.8: kai o ihsouv eipen autoiv oude egw legw umin en poia exousia tauta poiw
20.9: hrxato de prov ton laon legein thn parabolhn tauthn anyrwpov efuteusen ampelwna kai exedeto auton gewrgoiv kai apedhmhsen cronouv ikanouv
20.10: kai kairw apesteilen prov touv gewrgouv doulon ina apo tou karpou tou ampelwnov dwsousin autw oi de gewrgoi exapesteilan auton deirantev kenon
20.11: kai proseyeto eteron pemqai doulon oi de kakeinon deirantev kai atimasantev exapesteilan kenon
20.12: kai proseyeto triton pemqai oi de kai touton traumatisantev exebalon
20.13: eipen de o kuriov tou ampelwnov ti poihsw pemqw ton uion mou ton agaphton iswv touton entraphsontai
20.14: idontev de auton oi gewrgoi dielogizonto prov allhlouv legontev outov estin o klhronomov apokteinwmen auton ina hmwn genhtai h klhronomia
20.15: kai ekbalontev auton exw tou ampelwnov apekteinan ti oun poihsei autoiv o kuriov tou ampelwnov
20.16: eleusetai kai apolesei touv gewrgouv toutouv kai dwsei ton ampelwna alloiv akousantev de eipan mh genoito
20.17: o de embleqav autoiv eipen ti oun estin to gegrammenon touto liyon on apedokimasan oi oikodomountev outov egenhyh eiv kefalhn gwniav
20.18: pav o peswn ep ekeinon ton liyon sunylasyhsetai ef on d an pesh likmhsei auton
20.19: kai ezhthsan oi grammateiv kai oi arciereiv epibalein ep auton tav ceirav en auth th wra kai efobhyhsan ton laon egnwsan gar oti prov autouv eipen thn parabolhn tauthn
20.20: kai parathrhsantev apesteilan egkayetouv upokrinomenouv eautouv dikaiouv einai ina epilabwntai autou logou wste paradounai auton th arch kai th exousia tou hgemonov
20.21: kai ephrwthsan auton legontev didaskale oidamen oti orywv legeiv kai didaskeiv kai ou lambaneiv proswpon all ep alhyeiav thn odon tou yeou didaskeiv
20.22: exestin hmav kaisari foron dounai h ou
20.23: katanohsav de autwn thn panourgian eipen prov autouv
20.24: deixate moi dhnarion tinov ecei eikona kai epigrafhn oi de eipan kaisarov
20.25: o de eipen prov autouv toinun apodote ta kaisarov kaisari kai ta tou yeou tw yew
20.26: kai ouk iscusan epilabesyai tou rhmatov enantion tou laou kai yaumasantev epi th apokrisei autou esighsan
20.27: proselyontev de tinev twn saddoukaiwn oi legontev anastasin mh einai ephrwthsan auton
20.28: legontev didaskale mwushv egraqen hmin ean tinov adelfov apoyanh ecwn gunaika kai outov ateknov h ina labh o adelfov autou thn gunaika kai exanasthsh sperma tw adelfw autou
20.29: epta oun adelfoi hsan kai o prwtov labwn gunaika apeyanen ateknov
20.30: kai o deuterov kai o tritov elaben authn
20.31: wsautwv de kai oi epta ou katelipon tekna kai apeyanon
20.33: h gunh oun en th anastasei tinov autwn ginetai gunh oi gar epta escon authn gunaika
20.34: kai eipen autoiv o ihsouv oi uioi tou aiwnov toutou gamousin kai gamiskontai
20.35: oi de kataxiwyentev tou aiwnov ekeinou tucein kai thv anastasewv thv ek nekrwn oute gamousin oute gamizontai
20.36: oude gar apoyanein eti dunantai isaggeloi gar eisin kai uioi eisin yeou thv anastasewv uioi ontev
20.37: oti de egeirontai oi nekroi kai mwushv emhnusen epi thv batou wv legei kurion ton yeon abraam kai yeon isaak kai yeon iakwb
20.38: yeov de ouk estin nekrwn alla zwntwn pantev gar autw zwsin
20.39: apokriyentev de tinev twn grammatewn eipan didaskale kalwv eipav
20.40: ouketi gar etolmwn eperwtan auton ouden
20.41: eipen de prov autouv pwv legousin ton criston einai dauid uion
20.42: autov gar dauid legei en biblw qalmwn eipen kuriov tw kuriw mou kayou ek dexiwn mou
20.43: ewv an yw touv ecyrouv sou upopodion twn podwn sou
20.44: dauid oun auton kurion kalei kai pwv autou uiov estin
20.45: akouontov de pantov tou laou eipen toiv mayhtaiv
20.46: prosecete apo twn grammatewn twn yelontwn peripatein en stolaiv kai filountwn aspasmouv en taiv agoraiv kai prwtokayedriav en taiv sunagwgaiv kai prwtoklisiav en toiv deipnoiv
20.47: oi katesyiousin tav oikiav twn chrwn kai profasei makra proseucontai outoi lhmqontai perissoteron krima

21.1: anableqav de eiden touv ballontav eiv to gazofulakion ta dwra autwn plousiouv
21.2: eiden de tina chran penicran ballousan ekei lepta duo
21.3: kai eipen alhywv legw umin oti h chra auth h ptwch pleion pantwn ebalen
21.4: pantev gar outoi ek tou perisseuontov autoiv ebalon eiv ta dwra auth de ek tou usterhmatov authv panta ton bion on eicen ebalen
21.5: kai tinwn legontwn peri tou ierou oti liyoiv kaloiv kai anayhmasin kekosmhtai eipen
21.6: tauta a yewreite eleusontai hmerai en aiv ouk afeyhsetai liyov epi liyw wde ov ou kataluyhsetai
21.7: ephrwthsan de auton legontev didaskale pote oun tauta estai kai ti to shmeion otan mellh tauta ginesyai
21.8: o de eipen blepete mh planhyhte polloi gar eleusontai epi tw onomati mou legontev egw eimi kai o kairov hggiken mh poreuyhte opisw autwn
21.9: otan de akoushte polemouv kai akatastasiav mh ptohyhte dei gar tauta genesyai prwton all ouk euyewv to telov
21.10: tote elegen autoiv egeryhsetai eynov ep eynov kai basileia epi basileian
21.11: seismoi te megaloi kai kata topouv loimoi kai limoi esontai fobhyra te kai ap ouranou shmeia megala estai
21.12: pro de toutwn pantwn epibalousin ef umav tav ceirav autwn kai diwxousin paradidontev eiv tav sunagwgav kai fulakav apagomenouv epi basileiv kai hgemonav eneken tou onomatov mou
21.14: yete oun en taiv kardiaiv umwn mh promeletan apologhyhnai
21.15: egw gar dwsw umin stoma kai sofian h ou dunhsontai antisthnai h anteipein apantev oi antikeimenoi umin
21.16: paradoyhsesye de kai upo gonewn kai adelfwn kai suggenwn kai filwn kai yanatwsousin ex umwn
21.17: kai esesye misoumenoi upo pantwn dia to onoma mou
21.18: kai yrix ek thv kefalhv umwn ou mh apolhtai
21.19: en th upomonh umwn kthsesye tav qucav umwn
21.20: otan de idhte kukloumenhn upo stratopedwn ierousalhm tote gnwte oti hggiken h erhmwsiv authv
21.21: tote oi en th ioudaia feugetwsan eiv ta orh kai oi en mesw authv ekcwreitwsan kai oi en taiv cwraiv mh eisercesywsan eiv authn
21.22: oti hmerai ekdikhsewv autai eisin tou plhsyhnai panta ta gegrammena
21.23: ouai taiv en gastri ecousaiv kai taiv yhlazousaiv en ekeinaiv taiv hmeraiv estai gar anagkh megalh epi thv ghv kai orgh tw law toutw
21.24: kai pesountai stomati macairhv kai aicmalwtisyhsontai eiv ta eynh panta kai ierousalhm estai patoumenh upo eynwn acriv ou plhrwywsin [kai esontai] kairoi eynwn
21.25: kai esontai shmeia en hliw kai selhnh kai astroiv kai epi thv ghv sunoch eynwn en aporia hcouv yalasshv kai salou
21.26: apoqucontwn anyrwpwn apo fobou kai prosdokiav twn epercomenwn th oikoumenh ai gar dunameiv twn ouranwn saleuyhsontai
21.27: kai tote oqontai ton uion tou anyrwpou ercomenon en nefelh meta dunamewv kai doxhv pollhv
21.28: arcomenwn de toutwn ginesyai anakuqate kai eparate tav kefalav umwn dioti eggizei h apolutrwsiv umwn
21.29: kai eipen parabolhn autoiv idete thn sukhn kai panta ta dendra
21.30: otan probalwsin hdh blepontev af eautwn ginwskete oti hdh egguv to yerov estin
21.31: outwv kai umeiv otan idhte tauta ginomena ginwskete oti egguv estin h basileia tou yeou
21.32: amhn legw umin oti ou mh parelyh h genea auth ewv [an] panta genhtai
21.33: o ouranov kai h gh pareleusontai oi de logoi mou ou mh pareleusontai
21.34: prosecete de eautoiv mhpote barhywsin ai kardiai umwn en krepalh kai meyh kai merimnaiv biwtikaiv kai episth ef umav efnidiov h hmera ekeinh
21.35: wv pagiv epeiseleusetai gar epi pantav touv kayhmenouv epi proswpon pashv thv ghv
21.36: agrupneite de en panti kairw deomenoi ina katiscushte ekfugein tauta panta ta mellonta ginesyai kai stayhnai emprosyen tou uiou tou anyrwpou
21.37: hn de tav hmerav en tw ierw didaskwn tav de nuktav exercomenov hulizeto eiv to orov to kaloumenon elaiwn
21.38: kai pav o laov wryrizen prov auton en tw ierw akouein autou

22.1: hggizen de h eorth twn azumwn h legomenh pasca
22.2: kai ezhtoun oi arciereiv kai oi grammateiv to pwv anelwsin auton efobounto gar ton laon
22.3: eishlyen de satanav eiv ioudan ton kaloumenon iskariwthn onta ek tou ariymou twn dwdeka
22.4: kai apelywn sunelalhsen toiv arciereusin kai strathgoiv to pwv autoiv paradw auton
22.5: kai ecarhsan kai suneyento autw argurion dounai
22.6: kai exwmologhsen kai ezhtei eukairian tou paradounai auton ater oclou autoiv
22.7: hlyen de h hmera twn azumwn h edei yuesyai to pasca
22.8: kai apesteilen petron kai iwannhn eipwn poreuyentev etoimasate hmin to pasca ina fagwmen
22.9: oi de eipan autw pou yeleiv etoimaswmen
22.10: o de eipen autoiv idou eiselyontwn umwn eiv thn polin sunanthsei umin anyrwpov keramion udatov bastazwn akolouyhsate autw eiv thn oikian eiv hn eisporeuetai
22.11: kai ereite tw oikodespoth thv oikiav legei soi o didaskalov pou estin to kataluma opou to pasca meta twn mayhtwn mou fagw
22.12: kakeinov umin deixei anagaion mega estrwmenon ekei etoimasate
22.13: apelyontev de euron kaywv eirhkei autoiv kai htoimasan to pasca
22.14: kai ote egeneto h wra anepesen kai oi apostoloi sun autw
22.15: kai eipen prov autouv epiyumia epeyumhsa touto to pasca fagein mey umwn pro tou me payein
22.16: legw gar umin oti ou mh fagw auto ewv otou plhrwyh en th basileia tou yeou
22.17: kai dexamenov pothrion eucaristhsav eipen labete touto kai diamerisate eiv eautouv
22.18: legw gar umin ou mh piw apo tou nun apo tou genhmatov thv ampelou ewv ou h basileia tou yeou elyh
22.19: kai labwn arton eucaristhsav eklasen kai edwken autoiv legwn touto estin to swma mou [[to uper umwn didomenon touto poieite eiv thn emhn anamnhsin
22.20: kai to pothrion wsautwv meta to deipnhsai legwn touto to pothrion h kainh diayhkh en tw aimati mou to uper umwn ekcunnomenon]]
22.21: plhn idou h ceir tou paradidontov me met emou epi thv trapezhv
22.22: oti o uiov men tou anyrwpou kata to wrismenon poreuetai plhn ouai tw anyrwpw ekeinw di ou paradidotai
22.23: kai autoi hrxanto suzhtein prov eautouv to tiv ara eih ex autwn o touto mellwn prassein
22.24: egeneto de kai filoneikia en autoiv to tiv autwn dokei einai meizwn
22.25: o de eipen autoiv oi basileiv twn eynwn kurieuousin autwn kai oi exousiazontev autwn euergetai kalountai
22.26: umeiv de ouc outwv all o meizwn en umin ginesyw wv o newterov kai o hgoumenov wv o diakonwn
22.27: tiv gar meizwn o anakeimenov h o diakonwn ouci o anakeimenov egw de en mesw umwn eimi wv o diakonwn
22.28: umeiv de este oi diamemenhkotev met emou en toiv peirasmoiv mou
22.29: kagw diatiyemai umin kaywv dieyeto moi o pathr mou basileian
22.30: ina esyhte kai pinhte epi thv trapezhv mou en th basileia mou kai kayhsye epi yronwn tav dwdeka fulav krinontev tou israhl
22.31: simwn simwn idou o satanav exhthsato umav tou siniasai wv ton siton
22.32: egw de edehyhn peri sou ina mh ekliph h pistiv sou kai su pote epistreqav sthrison touv adelfouv sou
22.33: o de eipen autw kurie meta sou etoimov eimi kai eiv fulakhn kai eiv yanaton poreuesyai
22.34: o de eipen legw soi petre ou fwnhsei shmeron alektwr ewv triv me aparnhsh eidenai
22.35: kai eipen autoiv ote apesteila umav ater ballantiou kai phrav kai upodhmatwn mh tinov usterhsate oi de eipan ouyenov
22.36: eipen de autoiv alla nun o ecwn ballantion aratw omoiwv kai phran kai o mh ecwn pwlhsatw to imation autou kai agorasatw macairan
22.37: legw gar umin oti touto to gegrammenon dei telesyhnai en emoi to kai meta anomwn elogisyh kai gar to peri emou telov ecei
22.38: oi de eipan kurie idou macairai wde duo o de eipen autoiv ikanon estin
22.39: kai exelywn eporeuyh kata to eyov eiv to orov twn elaiwn hkolouyhsan de autw [kai] oi mayhtai
22.40: genomenov de epi tou topou eipen autoiv proseucesye mh eiselyein eiv peirasmon
22.41: kai autov apespasyh ap autwn wsei liyou bolhn kai yeiv ta gonata proshuceto
22.42: legwn pater ei boulei parenegke touto to pothrion ap emou plhn mh to yelhma mou alla to son ginesyw
22.43: [[wfyh de autw aggelov apo tou ouranou eniscuwn auton
22.44: kai genomenov en agwnia ektenesteron proshuceto kai egeneto o idrwv autou wsei yromboi aimatov katabainontev epi thn ghn]]
22.45: kai anastav apo thv proseuchv elywn prov touv mayhtav euren koimwmenouv autouv apo thv luphv
22.46: kai eipen autoiv ti kayeudete anastantev proseucesye ina mh eiselyhte eiv peirasmon
22.47: eti autou lalountov idou oclov kai o legomenov ioudav eiv twn dwdeka prohrceto autouv kai hggisen tw ihsou filhsai auton
22.48: ihsouv de eipen autw iouda filhmati ton uion tou anyrwpou paradidwv
22.49: idontev de oi peri auton to esomenon eipan kurie ei pataxomen en macairh
22.50: kai epataxen eiv tiv ex autwn tou arcierewv ton doulon kai afeilen to ouv autou to dexion
22.51: apokriyeiv de [o] ihsouv eipen eate ewv toutou kai aqamenov tou wtiou iasato auton
22.52: eipen de ihsouv prov touv paragenomenouv ep auton arciereiv kai strathgouv tou ierou kai presbuterouv wv epi lhsthn exhlyate meta macairwn kai xulwn
22.53: kay hmeran ontov mou mey umwn en tw ierw ouk exeteinate tav ceirav ep eme all auth estin umwn h wra kai h exousia tou skotouv
22.54: sullabontev de auton hgagon kai eishgagon eiv thn oikian tou arcierewv o de petrov hkolouyei makroyen
22.55: periaqantwn de pur en mesw thv aulhv kai sugkayisantwn ekayhto o petrov mesov autwn
22.56: idousa de auton paidiskh tiv kayhmenon prov to fwv kai atenisasa autw eipen kai outov sun autw hn
22.57: o de hrnhsato legwn ouk oida auton gunai
22.58: kai meta bracu eterov idwn auton efh kai su ex autwn ei o de petrov efh anyrwpe ouk eimi
22.59: kai diastashv wsei wrav miav allov tiv diiscurizeto legwn ep alhyeiav kai outov met autou hn kai gar galilaiov estin
22.60: eipen de o petrov anyrwpe ouk oida o legeiv kai paracrhma eti lalountov autou efwnhsen alektwr
22.61: kai strafeiv o kuriov enebleqen tw petrw kai upemnhsyh o petrov tou rhmatov tou kuriou wv eipen autw oti prin alektora fwnhsai shmeron aparnhsh me triv
22.63: kai oi andrev oi sunecontev auton enepaizon autw derontev
22.64: kai perikaluqantev auton ephrwtwn legontev profhteuson tiv estin o paisav se
22.65: kai etera polla blasfhmountev elegon eiv auton
22.66: kai wv egeneto hmera sunhcyh to presbuterion tou laou arciereiv te kai grammateiv kai aphgagon auton eiv to sunedrion autwn legontev
22.67: ei su ei o cristov eipon hmin eipen de autoiv ean umin eipw ou mh pisteushte
22.68: ean de erwthsw ou mh apokriyhte
22.69: apo tou nun de estai o uiov tou anyrwpou kayhmenov ek dexiwn thv dunamewv tou yeou
22.70: eipan de pantev su oun ei o uiov tou yeou o de prov autouv efh umeiv legete oti egw eimi
22.71: oi de eipan ti eti ecomen marturiav creian autoi gar hkousamen apo tou stomatov autou

23.1: kai anastan apan to plhyov autwn hgagon auton epi ton pilaton
23.2: hrxanto de kathgorein autou legontev touton euramen diastrefonta to eynov hmwn kai kwluonta forouv kaisari didonai kai legonta auton criston basilea einai
23.3: o de pilatov hrwthsen auton legwn su ei o basileuv twn ioudaiwn o de apokriyeiv autw efh su legeiv
23.4: o de pilatov eipen prov touv arciereiv kai touv oclouv ouden euriskw aition en tw anyrwpw toutw
23.5: oi de episcuon legontev oti anaseiei ton laon didaskwn kay olhv thv ioudaiav kai arxamenov apo thv galilaiav ewv wde
23.6: pilatov de akousav ephrwthsen ei [o] anyrwpov galilaiov estin
23.7: kai epignouv oti ek thv exousiav hrwdou estin anepemqen auton prov hrwdhn onta kai auton en ierosolumoiv en tautaiv taiv hmeraiv
23.8: o de hrwdhv idwn ton ihsoun ecarh lian hn gar ex ikanwn cronwn yelwn idein auton dia to akouein peri autou kai hlpizen ti shmeion idein up autou ginomenon
23.9: ephrwta de auton en logoiv ikanoiv autov de ouden apekrinato autw
23.10: isthkeisan de oi arciereiv kai oi grammateiv eutonwv kathgorountev autou
23.11: exouyenhsav de auton o hrwdhv sun toiv strateumasin autou kai empaixav peribalwn esyhta lampran anepemqen auton tw pilatw
23.12: egenonto de filoi o te hrwdhv kai o pilatov en auth th hmera met allhlwn prouphrcon gar en ecyra ontev prov autouv
23.13: pilatov de sugkalesamenov touv arciereiv kai touv arcontav kai ton laon
23.14: eipen prov autouv proshnegkate moi ton anyrwpon touton wv apostrefonta ton laon kai idou egw enwpion umwn anakrinav ouyen euron en tw anyrwpw toutw aition wn kathgoreite kat autou
23.15: all oude hrwdhv anepemqen gar auton prov hmav kai idou ouden axion yanatou estin pepragmenon autw
23.18: anekragon de pamplhyei legontev aire touton apoluson de hmin ton barabban
23.19: ostiv hn dia stasin tina genomenhn en th polei kai fonon blhyeiv en th fulakh
23.20: palin de o pilatov prosefwnhsen autoiv yelwn apolusai ton ihsoun
23.21: oi de epefwnoun legontev staurou staurou auton
23.22: o de triton eipen prov autouv ti gar kakon epoihsen outov ouden aition yanatou euron en autw paideusav oun auton apolusw
23.23: oi de epekeinto fwnaiv megalaiv aitoumenoi auton staurwyhnai kai katiscuon ai fwnai autwn
23.24: kai pilatov epekrinen genesyai to aithma autwn
23.25: apelusen de ton dia stasin kai fonon beblhmenon eiv fulakhn on htounto ton de ihsoun paredwken tw yelhmati autwn
23.26: kai wv aphgagon auton epilabomenoi simwna tina kurhnaion ercomenon ap agrou epeyhkan autw ton stauron ferein opisyen tou ihsou
23.27: hkolouyei de autw polu plhyov tou laou kai gunaikwn ai ekoptonto kai eyrhnoun auton
23.28: strafeiv de prov autav ihsouv eipen yugaterev ierousalhm mh klaiete ep eme plhn ef eautav klaiete kai epi ta tekna umwn
23.29: oti idou ercontai hmerai en aiv erousin makariai ai steirai kai ai koiliai ai ouk egennhsan kai mastoi oi ouk eyreqan

3.25: kai ean oikia ef eauthn merisyh ou dunhsetai h oikia ekeinh sthnai

3.27: all ou dunatai oudeiv eiv thn oikian tou iscurou eiselywn ta skeuh autou diarpasai ean mh prwton ton iscuron dhsh kai tote thn oikian autou diarpasei
3.28: amhn legw umin oti panta afeyhsetai toiv uioiv twn anyrwpwn ta amarthmata kai ai blasfhmiai osa ean blasfhmhswsin
3.29: ov d an blasfhmhsh eiv to pneuma to agion ouk ecei afesin eiv ton aiwna alla enocov estin aiwniou amarthmatov
3.31: kai ercontai h mhthr autou kai oi adelfoi autou kai exw sthkontev apesteilan prov auton kalountev auton
3.32: kai ekayhto peri auton oclov kai legousin autw idou h mhthr sou kai oi adelfoi sou exw zhtousin se
3.33: kai apokriyeiv autoiv legei tiv estin h mhthr mou kai oi adelfoi
3.34: kai peribleqamenov touv peri auton kuklw kayhmenouv legei ide h mhthr mou kai oi adelfoi mou
3.35: ov an poihsh to yelhma tou yeou outov adelfov mou kai adelfh kai mhthr estin

4.1: kai palin hrxato didaskein para thn yalassan kai sunagetai prov auton oclov pleistov wste auton eiv ploion embanta kayhsyai en th yalassh kai pav o oclov prov thn yalassan epi thv ghv hsan
4.2: kai edidasken autouv en parabolaiv polla kai elegen autoiv en th didach autou
4.3: akouete idou exhlyen o speirwn speirai
4.4: kai egeneto en tw speirein o men epesen para thn odon kai hlyen ta peteina kai katefagen auto
4.5: kai allo epesen epi to petrwdev [kai] opou ouk eicen ghn pollhn kai euyuv exaneteilen dia to mh ecein bayov ghv
4.6: kai ote aneteilen o hliov ekaumatisyh kai dia to mh ecein rizan exhranyh
4.7: kai allo epesen eiv tav akanyav kai anebhsan ai akanyai kai sunepnixan auto kai karpon ouk edwken
4.8: kai alla epesen eiv thn ghn thn kalhn kai edidou karpon anabainonta kai auxanomena kai eferen eiv triakonta kai en exhkonta kai en ekaton
4.9: kai elegen ov ecei wta akouein akouetw
4.10: kai ote egeneto kata monav hrwtwn auton oi peri auton sun toiv dwdeka tav parabolav
4.11: kai elegen autoiv umin to musthrion dedotai thv basileiav tou yeou ekeinoiv de toiv exw en parabolaiv ta panta ginetai
4.12: ina blepontev blepwsin kai mh idwsin kai akouontev akouwsin kai mh suniwsin mhpote epistreqwsin kai afeyh autoiv
4.13: kai legei autoiv ouk oidate thn parabolhn tauthn kai pwv pasav tav parabolav gnwsesye
4.15: outoi de eisin oi para thn odon opou speiretai o logov kai otan akouswsin euyuv ercetai o satanav kai airei ton logon ton esparmenon eiv autouv
4.16: kai outoi eisin omoiwv oi epi ta petrwdh speiromenoi oi otan akouswsin ton logon euyuv meta carav lambanousin auton
4.17: kai ouk ecousin rizan en eautoiv alla proskairoi eisin eita genomenhv yliqewv h diwgmou dia ton logon euyuv skandalizontai
4.18: kai alloi eisin oi eiv tav akanyav speiromenoi outoi eisin oi ton logon akousantev
4.19: kai ai merimnai tou aiwnov kai h apath tou ploutou kai ai peri ta loipa epiyumiai eisporeuomenai sumpnigousin ton logon kai akarpov ginetai
4.20: kai ekeinoi eisin oi epi thn ghn thn kalhn sparentev oitinev akouousin ton logon kai paradecontai kai karpoforousin en triakonta kai [en] exhkonta kai [en] ekaton
4.21: kai elegen autoiv oti mhti ercetai o lucnov ina upo ton modion teyh h upo thn klinhn ouc ina epi thn lucnian teyh
4.22: ou gar estin krupton ean mh ina fanerwyh oude egeneto apokrufon all ina elyh eiv faneron
4.23: ei tiv ecei wta akouein akouetw
4.24: kai elegen autoiv blepete ti akouete en w metrw metreite metrhyhsetai umin kai prosteyhsetai umin
4.25: ov gar ecei doyhsetai autw kai ov ouk ecei kai o ecei aryhsetai ap autou
4.26: kai elegen outwv estin h basileia tou yeou wv anyrwpov balh ton sporon epi thv ghv
4.27: kai kayeudh kai egeirhtai nukta kai hmeran kai o sporov blasta kai mhkunhtai wv ouk oiden autov
4.28: automath h gh karpoforei prwton corton eiten stacun eiten plhrh siton en tw stacui
4.29: otan de paradoi o karpov euyuv apostellei to drepanon oti paresthken o yerismov
4.30: kai elegen pwv omoiwswmen thn basileian tou yeou h en tini authn parabolh ywmen
4.31: wv kokkw sinapewv ov otan sparh epi thv ghv mikroteron on pantwn twn spermatwn twn epi thv ghv
4.32: kai otan sparh anabainei kai ginetai meizon pantwn twn lacanwn kai poiei kladouv megalouv wste dunasyai upo thn skian autou ta peteina tou ouranou kataskhnoin
4.33: kai toiautaiv parabolaiv pollaiv elalei autoiv ton logon kaywv hdunanto akouein
4.34: cwriv de parabolhv ouk elalei autoiv kat idian de toiv idioiv mayhtaiv epeluen panta
4.35: kai legei autoiv en ekeinh th hmera oqiav genomenhv dielywmen eiv to peran
4.36: kai afentev ton oclon paralambanousin auton wv hn en tw ploiw kai alla ploia hn met autou
4.37: kai ginetai lailaq megalh anemou kai ta kumata epeballen eiv to ploion wste hdh gemizesyai to ploion
4.38: kai autov hn en th prumnh epi to proskefalaion kayeudwn kai egeirousin auton kai legousin autw didaskale ou melei soi oti apollumeya
4.39: kai diegeryeiv epetimhsen tw anemw kai eipen th yalassh siwpa pefimwso kai ekopasen o anemov kai egeneto galhnh megalh
4.40: kai eipen autoiv ti deiloi este oupw ecete pistin
4.41: kai efobhyhsan fobon megan kai elegon prov allhlouv tiv ara outov estin oti kai o anemov kai h yalassa upakouei autw

5.1: kai hlyon eiv to peran thv yalasshv eiv thn cwran twn gerashnwn
5.2: kai exelyontov autou ek tou ploiou [euyuv] uphnthsen autw ek twn mnhmeiwn anyrwpov en pneumati akayartw
5.3: ov thn katoikhsin eicen en toiv mnhmasin kai oude alusei ouketi oudeiv edunato auton dhsai
5.4: dia to auton pollakiv pedaiv kai alusesin dedesyai kai diespasyai up autou tav aluseiv kai tav pedav suntetrifyai kai oudeiv iscuen auton damasai
5.5: kai dia pantov nuktov kai hmerav en toiv mnhmasin kai en toiv oresin hn krazwn kai katakoptwn eauton liyoiv
5.6: kai idwn ton ihsoun apo makroyen edramen kai prosekunhsen auton
5.7: kai kraxav fwnh megalh legei ti emoi kai soi ihsou uie tou yeou tou uqistou orkizw se ton yeon mh me basanishv
5.8: elegen gar autw exelye to pneuma to akayarton ek tou anyrwpou
5.9: kai ephrwta auton ti onoma soi kai legei autw legiwn onoma moi oti polloi esmen
5.10: kai parekalei auton polla ina mh auta aposteilh exw thv cwrav
5.11: hn de ekei prov tw orei agelh coirwn megalh boskomenh
5.12: kai parekalesan auton legontev pemqon hmav eiv touv coirouv ina eiv autouv eiselywmen
5.13: kai epetreqen autoiv kai exelyonta ta pneumata ta akayarta eishlyon eiv touv coirouv kai wrmhsen h agelh kata tou krhmnou eiv thn yalassan wv discilioi kai epnigonto en th yalassh
5.14: kai oi boskontev autouv efugon kai aphggeilan eiv thn polin kai eiv touv agrouv kai hlyon idein ti estin to gegonov
5.15: kai ercontai prov ton ihsoun kai yewrousin ton daimonizomenon kayhmenon imatismenon kai swfronounta ton eschkota ton legiwna kai efobhyhsan
5.16: kai dihghsanto autoiv oi idontev pwv egeneto tw daimonizomenw kai peri twn coirwn
5.17: kai hrxanto parakalein auton apelyein apo twn oriwn autwn
5.18: kai embainontov autou eiv to ploion parekalei auton o daimonisyeiv ina met autou h
5.19: kai ouk afhken auton alla legei autw upage eiv ton oikon sou prov touv souv kai apaggeilon autoiv osa o kuriov soi pepoihken kai hlehsen se
5.20: kai aphlyen kai hrxato khrussein en th dekapolei osa epoihsen autw o ihsouv kai pantev eyaumazon
5.21: kai diaperasantov tou ihsou en tw ploiw palin eiv to peran sunhcyh oclov poluv ep auton kai hn para thn yalassan
5.22: kai ercetai eiv twn arcisunagwgwn onomati iairov kai idwn auton piptei prov touv podav autou
5.23: kai parakalei auton polla legwn oti to yugatrion mou escatwv ecei ina elywn epiyhv tav ceirav auth ina swyh kai zhsh
5.24: kai aphlyen met autou kai hkolouyei autw oclov poluv kai suneylibon auton
5.25: kai gunh ousa en rusei aimatov dwdeka eth
5.26: kai polla payousa upo pollwn iatrwn kai dapanhsasa ta par authv panta kai mhden wfelhyeisa alla mallon eiv to ceiron elyousa
5.27: akousasa ta peri tou ihsou elyousa en tw oclw opisyen hqato tou imatiou autou
5.28: elegen gar oti ean aqwmai kan twn imatiwn autou swyhsomai
5.29: kai euyuv exhranyh h phgh tou aimatov authv kai egnw tw swmati oti iatai apo thv mastigov
5.30: kai euyuv o ihsouv epignouv en eautw thn ex autou dunamin exelyousan epistrafeiv en tw oclw elegen tiv mou hqato twn imatiwn
5.31: kai elegon autw oi mayhtai autou blepeiv ton oclon sunylibonta se kai legeiv tiv mou hqato
5.32: kai perieblepeto idein thn touto poihsasan
5.33: h de gunh fobhyeisa kai tremousa eiduia o gegonen auth hlyen kai prosepesen autw kai eipen autw pasan thn alhyeian
5.34: o de eipen auth yugathr h pistiv sou seswken se upage eiv eirhnhn kai isyi ugihv apo thv mastigov sou
5.35: eti autou lalountov ercontai apo tou arcisunagwgou legontev oti h yugathr sou apeyanen ti eti skulleiv ton didaskalon
5.36: o de ihsouv parakousav ton logon laloumenon legei tw arcisunagwgw mh fobou monon pisteue
5.37: kai ouk afhken oudena met autou sunakolouyhsai ei mh ton petron kai iakwbon kai iwannhn ton adelfon iakwbou
5.38: kai ercontai eiv ton oikon tou arcisunagwgou kai yewrei yorubon kai klaiontav kai alalazontav polla
5.39: kai eiselywn legei autoiv ti yorubeisye kai klaiete to paidion ouk apeyanen alla kayeudei
5.40: kai kategelwn autou autov de ekbalwn pantav paralambanei ton patera tou paidiou kai thn mhtera kai touv met autou kai eisporeuetai opou hn to paidion
5.41: kai krathsav thv ceirov tou paidiou legei auth taliya koum o estin meyermhneuomenon to korasion soi legw egeire
5.42: kai euyuv anesth to korasion kai periepatei hn gar etwn dwdeka kai exesthsan euyuv ekstasei megalh
5.43: kai diesteilato autoiv polla ina mhdeiv gnoi touto kai eipen doyhnai auth fagein

6.1: kai exhlyen ekeiyen kai ercetai eiv thn patrida autou kai akolouyousin autw oi mayhtai autou
6.2: kai genomenou sabbatou hrxato didaskein en th sunagwgh kai oi polloi akouontev exeplhssonto legontev poyen toutw tauta kai tiv h sofia h doyeisa toutw kai ai dunameiv toiautai dia twn ceirwn autou ginomenai
6.3: ouc outov estin o tektwn o uiov thv mariav kai adelfov iakwbou kai iwshtov kai iouda kai simwnov kai ouk eisin ai adelfai autou wde prov hmav kai eskandalizonto en autw
6.4: kai elegen autoiv o ihsouv oti ouk estin profhthv atimov ei mh en th patridi autou kai en toiv suggeneusin autou kai en th oikia autou
6.5: kai ouk edunato ekei poihsai oudemian dunamin ei mh oligoiv arrwstoiv epiyeiv tav ceirav eyerapeusen
6.6: kai eyaumasen dia thn apistian autwn kai perihgen tav kwmav kuklw didaskwn
6.7: kai proskaleitai touv dwdeka kai hrxato autouv apostellein duo duo kai edidou autoiv exousian twn pneumatwn twn akayartwn
6.8: kai parhggeilen autoiv ina mhden airwsin eiv odon ei mh rabdon monon mh arton mh phran mh eiv thn zwnhn calkon
6.9: alla upodedemenouv sandalia kai mh endusasyai duo citwnav
6.10: kai elegen autoiv opou ean eiselyhte eiv oikian ekei menete ewv an exelyhte ekeiyen
6.11: kai ov an topov mh dexhtai umav mhde akouswsin umwn ekporeuomenoi ekeiyen ektinaxate ton coun ton upokatw twn podwn umwn eiv marturion autoiv
6.13: kai daimonia polla exeballon kai hleifon elaiw pollouv arrwstouv kai eyerapeuon
6.14: kai hkousen o basileuv hrwdhv faneron gar egeneto to onoma autou kai elegon oti iwannhv o baptizwn eghgertai ek nekrwn kai dia touto energousin ai dunameiv en autw
6.15: alloi de elegon oti hliav estin alloi de elegon oti profhthv wv eiv twn profhtwn
6.16: akousav de o hrwdhv elegen on egw apekefalisa iwannhn outov hgeryh
6.17: autov gar o hrwdhv aposteilav ekrathsen ton iwannhn kai edhsen auton en fulakh dia hrwdiada thn gunaika filippou tou adelfou autou oti authn egamhsen
6.18: elegen gar o iwannhv tw hrwdh oti ouk exestin soi ecein thn gunaika tou adelfou sou
6.19: h de hrwdiav eneicen autw kai hyelen auton apokteinai kai ouk hdunato
6.20: o gar hrwdhv efobeito ton iwannhn eidwv auton andra dikaion kai agion kai sunethrei auton kai akousav autou polla hporei kai hdewv autou hkouen
6.21: kai genomenhv hmerav eukairou ote hrwdhv toiv genesioiv autou deipnon epoihsen toiv megistasin autou kai toiv ciliarcoiv kai toiv prwtoiv thv galilaiav
6.22: kai eiselyoushv thv yugatrov autou hrwdiadov kai orchsamenhv hresen tw hrwdh kai toiv sunanakeimenoiv o de basileuv eipen tw korasiw aithson me o ean yelhv kai dwsw soi
6.23: kai wmosen auth o ti ean me aithshv dwsw soi ewv hmisouv thv basileiav mou
6.24: kai exelyousa eipen th mhtri authv ti aithswmai h de eipen thn kefalhn iwannou tou baptizontov
6.25: kai eiselyousa euyuv meta spoudhv prov ton basilea hthsato legousa yelw ina exauthv dwv moi epi pinaki thn kefalhn iwannou tou baptistou
6.26: kai perilupov genomenov o basileuv dia touv orkouv kai touv anakeimenouv ouk hyelhsen ayethsai authn
6.27: kai euyuv aposteilav o basileuv spekoulatora epetaxen enegkai thn kefalhn autou
6.28: kai apelywn apekefalisen auton en th fulakh [6:28] kai hnegken thn kefalhn autou epi pinaki kai edwken authn tw korasiw kai to korasion edwken authn th mhtri authv
6.29: kai akousantev oi mayhtai autou hlyan kai hran to ptwma autou kai eyhkan auto en mnhmeiw
6.30: kai sunagontai oi apostoloi prov ton ihsoun kai aphggeilan autw panta osa epoihsan kai osa edidaxan
6.31: kai legei autoiv deute umeiv autoi kat idian eiv erhmon topon kai anapausasye oligon hsan gar oi ercomenoi kai oi upagontev polloi kai oude fagein eukairoun
6.32: kai aphlyon en tw ploiw eiv erhmon topon kat idian
6.33: kai eidan autouv upagontav kai egnwsan polloi kai pezh apo paswn twn polewn sunedramon ekei kai prohlyon autouv
6.34: kai exelywn eiden polun oclon kai esplagcnisyh ep autouv oti hsan wv probata mh econta poimena kai hrxato didaskein autouv polla
6.35: kai hdh wrav pollhv genomenhv proselyontev autw oi mayhtai autou elegon oti erhmov estin o topov kai hdh wra pollh
6.36: apoluson autouv ina apelyontev eiv touv kuklw agrouv kai kwmav agoraswsin eautoiv ti fagwsin
6.37: o de apokriyeiv eipen autoiv dote autoiv umeiv fagein kai legousin autw apelyontev agoraswmen dhnariwn diakosiwn artouv kai dwsomen autoiv fagein
6.38: o de legei autoiv posouv ecete artouv upagete idete kai gnontev legousin pente kai duo icyuav
6.39: kai epetaxen autoiv anakliyhnai pantav sumposia sumposia epi tw clwrw cortw
6.40: kai anepesan prasiai prasiai kata ekaton kai kata penthkonta
6.41: kai labwn touv pente artouv kai touv duo icyuav anableqav eiv ton ouranon euloghsen kai kateklasen touv artouv kai edidou toiv mayhtaiv ina paratiywsin autoiv kai touv duo icyuav emerisen pasin
6.43: kai hran klasmata dwdeka kofinwn plhrwmata kai apo twn icyuwn
6.44: kai hsan oi fagontev touv artouv pentakiscilioi andrev
6.45: kai euyuv hnagkasen touv mayhtav autou embhnai eiv to ploion kai proagein eiv to peran prov bhysaidan ewv autov apoluei ton oclon
6.46: kai apotaxamenov autoiv aphlyen eiv to orov proseuxasyai
6.47: kai oqiav genomenhv hn to ploion en mesw thv yalasshv kai autov monov epi thv ghv
6.48: kai idwn autouv basanizomenouv en tw elaunein hn gar o anemov enantiov autoiv peri tetarthn fulakhn thv nuktov ercetai prov autouv peripatwn epi thv yalasshv kai hyelen parelyein autouv
6.49: oi de idontev auton epi thv yalasshv peripatounta edoxan oti fantasma estin kai anekraxan
6.50: pantev gar auton eidan kai etaracyhsan o de euyuv elalhsen met autwn kai legei autoiv yarseite egw eimi mh fobeisye
6.51: kai anebh prov autouv eiv to ploion kai ekopasen o anemov kai lian en eautoiv existanto
6.52: ou gar sunhkan epi toiv artoiv all hn autwn h kardia pepwrwmenh
6.53: kai diaperasantev epi thn ghn hlyon eiv gennhsaret kai proswrmisyhsan
6.54: kai exelyontwn autwn ek tou ploiou euyuv epignontev auton
6.55: periedramon olhn thn cwran ekeinhn kai hrxanto epi toiv krabattoiv touv kakwv econtav periferein opou hkouon oti estin
6.56: kai opou an eiseporeueto eiv kwmav h eiv poleiv h eiv agrouv en taiv agoraiv etiyesan touv asyenountav kai parekaloun auton ina kan tou kraspedou tou imatiou autou aqwntai kai osoi an hqanto autou eswzonto

7.1: kai sunagontai prov auton oi farisaioi kai tinev twn grammatewn elyontev apo ierosolumwn
7.2: kai idontev tinav twn mayhtwn autou oti koinaiv cersin tout estin aniptoiv esyiousin touv artouv
7.3: oi gar farisaioi kai pantev oi ioudaioi ean mh pugmh niqwntai tav ceirav ouk esyiousin kratountev thn paradosin twn presbuterwn
7.4: kai ap agorav ean mh rantiswntai ouk esyiousin kai alla polla estin a parelabon kratein baptismouv pothriwn kai xestwn kai calkiwn
7.5: kai eperwtwsin auton oi farisaioi kai oi grammateiv dia ti ou peripatousin oi mayhtai sou kata thn paradosin twn presbuterwn alla koinaiv cersin esyiousin ton arton
7.6: o de eipen autoiv kalwv eprofhteusen hsaiav peri umwn twn upokritwn wv gegraptai oti outov o laov toiv ceilesin me tima h de kardia autwn porrw apecei ap emou
7.7: mathn de sebontai me didaskontev didaskaliav entalmata anyrwpwn
7.8: afentev thn entolhn tou yeou krateite thn paradosin twn anyrwpwn
7.9: kai elegen autoiv kalwv ayeteite thn entolhn tou yeou ina thn paradosin umwn thrhshte
7.10: mwushv gar eipen tima ton patera sou kai thn mhtera sou kai o kakologwn patera h mhtera yanatw teleutatw
7.11: umeiv de legete ean eiph anyrwpov tw patri h th mhtri korban o estin dwron o ean ex emou wfelhyhv
7.12: ouketi afiete auton ouden poihsai tw patri h th mhtri
7.13: akurountev ton logon tou yeou th paradosei umwn h paredwkate kai paromoia toiauta polla poieite
7.14: kai proskalesamenov palin ton oclon elegen autoiv akousate mou pantev kai sunete
7.15: ouden estin exwyen tou anyrwpou eisporeuomenon eiv auton o dunatai koinwsai auton alla ta ek tou anyrwpou ekporeuomena estin ta koinounta ton anyrwpon 7:16
7.17: kai ote eishlyen eiv oikon apo tou oclou ephrwtwn auton oi mayhtai autou thn parabolhn
7.18: kai legei autoiv outwv kai umeiv asunetoi este ou noeite oti pan to exwyen eisporeuomenon eiv ton anyrwpon ou dunatai auton koinwsai
7.19: oti ouk eisporeuetai autou eiv thn kardian all eiv thn koilian kai eiv ton afedrwna ekporeuetai kayarizwn panta ta brwmata
7.20: elegen de oti to ek tou anyrwpou ekporeuomenon ekeino koinoi ton anyrwpon
7.21: eswyen gar ek thv kardiav twn anyrwpwn oi dialogismoi oi kakoi ekporeuontai porneiai klopai fonoi
7.22: moiceiai pleonexiai ponhriai dolov aselgeia ofyalmov ponhrov blasfhmia uperhfania afrosunh
7.23: panta tauta ta ponhra eswyen ekporeuetai kai koinoi ton anyrwpon
7.24: ekeiyen de anastav aphlyen eiv ta oria turou [kai sidwnov] kai eiselywn eiv oikian oudena hyelen gnwnai kai ouk hdunasyh layein
7.25: all euyuv akousasa gunh peri autou hv eicen to yugatrion authv pneuma akayarton elyousa prosepesen prov touv podav autou

8.1: en ekeinaiv taiv hmeraiv palin pollou oclou ontov kai mh econtwn ti fagwsin proskalesamenov touv mayhtav legei autoiv

8.5: kai hrwta autouv posouv ecete artouv oi de eipan epta

8.11: kai exhlyon oi farisaioi kai hrxanto suzhtein autw zhtountev par autou shmeion apo tou ouranou peirazontev auton
8.12: kai anastenaxav tw pneumati autou legei ti h genea auth zhtei shmeion amhn legw ei doyhsetai th genea tauth shmeion
8.13: kai afeiv autouv palin embav aphlyen eiv to peran
8.14: kai epelayonto labein artouv kai ei mh ena arton ouk eicon mey eautwn en tw ploiw
8.15: kai diestelleto autoiv legwn orate blepete apo thv zumhv twn farisaiwn kai thv zumhv hrwdou

8.22: kai ercontai eiv bhysaidan kai ferousin autw tuflon kai parakalousin auton ina autou aqhtai
8.23: kai epilabomenov thv ceirov tou tuflou exhnegken auton exw thv kwmhv kai ptusav eiv ta ommata autou epiyeiv tav ceirav autw ephrwta auton ei ti blepeiv

8.28: oi de eipan autw legontev oti iwannhn ton baptisthn kai alloi hlian alloi de oti eiv twn profhtwn
8.29: kai autov ephrwta autouv umeiv de tina me legete einai apokriyeiv o petrov legei autw su ei o cristov
8.30: kai epetimhsen autoiv ina mhdeni legwsin peri autou
8.31: kai hrxato didaskein autouv oti dei ton uion tou anyrwpou polla payein kai apodokimasyhnai upo twn presbuterwn kai twn arcierewn kai twn grammatewn kai apoktanyhnai kai meta treiv hmerav anasthnai

8.34: kai proskalesamenov ton oclon sun toiv mayhtaiv autou eipen autoiv ei tiv yelei opisw mou elyein aparnhsasyw eauton kai aratw ton stauron autou kai akolouyeitw moi

9.1: kai elegen autoiv amhn legw umin oti eisin tinev wde twn esthkotwn oitinev ou mh geuswntai yanatou ewv an idwsin thn basileian tou yeou elhluyuian en dunamei
9.2: kai meta hmerav ex paralambanei o ihsouv ton petron kai ton iakwbon kai iwannhn kai anaferei autouv eiv orov uqhlon kat idian monouv kai metemorfwyh emprosyen autwn
9.3: kai ta imatia autou egeneto stilbonta leuka lian oia gnafeuv epi thv ghv ou dunatai outwv leukanai
9.4: kai wfyh autoiv hliav sun mwusei kai hsan sullalountev tw ihsou
9.5: kai apokriyeiv o petrov legei tw ihsou rabbi kalon estin hmav wde einai kai poihswmen treiv skhnav soi mian kai mwusei mian kai hlia mian
9.6: ou gar hdei ti apokriyh ekfoboi gar egenonto
9.7: kai egeneto nefelh episkiazousa autoiv kai egeneto fwnh ek thv nefelhv outov estin o uiov mou o agaphtov akouete autou
9.8: kai exapina peribleqamenoi ouketi oudena eidon mey eautwn ei mh ton ihsoun monon
9.9: kai katabainontwn autwn ek tou orouv diesteilato autoiv ina mhdeni a eidon dihghswntai ei mh otan o uiov tou anyrwpou ek nekrwn anasth
9.10: kai ton logon ekrathsan prov eautouv suzhtountev ti estin to ek nekrwn anasthnai
9.11: kai ephrwtwn auton legontev oti legousin oi grammateiv oti hlian dei elyein prwton
9.12: o de efh autoiv hliav men elywn prwton apokatistanei panta kai pwv gegraptai epi ton uion tou anyrwpou ina polla payh kai exoudenhyh
9.13: alla legw umin oti kai hliav elhluyen kai epoihsan autw osa hyelon kaywv gegraptai ep auton
9.14: kai elyontev prov touv mayhtav eidan oclon polun peri autouv kai grammateiv suzhtountav prov autouv
9.15: kai euyuv pav o oclov idontev auton exeyambhyhsan kai prostrecontev hspazonto auton
9.16: kai ephrwthsen autouv ti suzhteite prov autouv
9.17: kai apekriyh autw eiv ek tou oclou didaskale hnegka ton uion mou prov se econta pneuma alalon
9.18: kai opou ean auton katalabh rhssei auton kai afrizei kai trizei touv odontav kai xhrainetai kai eipa toiv mayhtaiv sou ina auto ekbalwsin kai ouk iscusan
9.19: o de apokriyeiv autoiv legei w genea apistov ewv pote prov umav esomai ewv pote anexomai umwn ferete auton prov me
9.20: kai hnegkan auton prov auton kai idwn auton to pneuma euyuv sunesparaxen auton kai peswn epi thv ghv ekulieto afrizwn
9.21: kai ephrwthsen ton patera autou posov cronov estin wv touto gegonen autw o de eipen ek paidioyen

9.24: euyuv kraxav o pathr tou paidiou elegen pisteuw bohyei mou th apistia
9.25: idwn de o ihsouv oti episuntrecei oclov epetimhsen tw pneumati tw akayartw legwn autw to alalon kai kwfon pneuma egw epitassw soi exelye ex autou kai mhketi eiselyhv eiv auton
9.26: kai kraxav kai polla sparaxav exhlyen kai egeneto wsei nekrov wste touv pollouv legein oti apeyanen
9.27: o de ihsouv krathsav thv ceirov autou hgeiren auton kai anesth
9.28: kai eiselyontov autou eiv oikon oi mayhtai autou kat idian ephrwtwn auton oti hmeiv ouk hdunhyhmen ekbalein auto
9.29: kai eipen autoiv touto to genov en oudeni dunatai exelyein ei mh en proseuch
9.30: kakeiyen exelyontev eporeuonto dia thv galilaiav kai ouk hyelen ina tiv gnoi
9.31: edidasken gar touv mayhtav autou kai elegen [autoiv] oti o uiov tou anyrwpou paradidotai eiv ceirav anyrwpwn kai apoktenousin auton kai apoktanyeiv meta treiv hmerav anasthsetai
9.32: oi de hgnooun to rhma kai efobounto auton eperwthsai

10.1: kai ekeiyen anastav ercetai eiv ta oria thv ioudaiav kai peran tou iordanou kai sumporeuontai palin ocloi prov auton kai wv eiwyei palin edidasken autouv

10.12: kai ean auth apolusasa ton andra authv gamhsh allon moicatai
10.13: kai proseferon autw paidia ina autwn aqhtai oi de mayhtai epetimhsan autoiv
10.14: idwn de o ihsouv hganakthsen kai eipen autoiv afete ta paidia ercesyai prov me mh kwluete auta twn gar toioutwn estin h basileia tou yeou
10.15: amhn legw umin ov an mh dexhtai thn basileian tou yeou wv paidion ou mh eiselyh eiv authn
10.16: kai enagkalisamenov auta kateulogei tiyeiv tav ceirav ep auta
10.17: kai ekporeuomenou autou eiv odon prosdramwn eiv kai gonupethsav auton ephrwta auton didaskale agaye ti poihsw ina zwhn aiwnion klhronomhsw
10.18: o de ihsouv eipen autw ti me legeiv agayon oudeiv agayov ei mh eiv o yeov
10.19: tav entolav oidav mh foneushv mh moiceushv mh kleqhv mh qeudomarturhshv mh aposterhshv tima ton patera sou kai thn mhtera

10.29: efh o ihsouv amhn legw umin oudeiv estin ov afhken oikian h adelfouv h adelfav h mhtera h patera h tekna h agrouv eneken emou kai [eneken] tou euaggeliou

10.31: polloi de esontai prwtoi escatoi kai [oi] escatoi prwtoi

10.33: oti idou anabainomen eiv ierosoluma kai o uiov tou anyrwpou paradoyhsetai toiv arciereusin kai toiv grammateusin kai katakrinousin auton yanatw kai paradwsousin auton toiv eynesin

10.43: ouc outwv de estin en umin all ov an yelh megav genesyai en umin estai umwn diakonov
10.44: kai ov an yelh en umin einai prwtov estai pantwn doulov
10.45: kai gar o uiov tou anyrwpou ouk hlyen diakonhyhnai alla diakonhsai kai dounai thn quchn autou lutron anti pollwn
10.46: kai ercontai eiv iericw kai ekporeuomenou autou apo iericw kai twn mayhtwn autou kai oclou ikanou o uiov timaiou bartimaiov tuflov prosaithv ekayhto para thn odon
10.47: kai akousav oti ihsouv o nazarhnov estin hrxato krazein kai legein uie dauid ihsou elehson me
10.48: kai epetimwn autw polloi ina siwphsh o de pollw mallon ekrazen uie dauid elehson me
10.49: kai stav o ihsouv eipen fwnhsate auton kai fwnousin ton tuflon legontev autw yarsei egeire fwnei se
