10.51: kai apokriyeiv autw o ihsouv eipen ti soi yeleiv poihsw o de tuflov eipen autw rabbouni ina anableqw
10.52: kai o ihsouv eipen autw upage h pistiv sou seswken se kai euyuv anebleqen kai hkolouyei autw en th odw

11.1: kai ote eggizousin eiv ierosoluma eiv bhyfagh kai bhyanian prov to orov twn elaiwn apostellei duo twn mayhtwn autou
11.2: kai legei autoiv upagete eiv thn kwmhn thn katenanti umwn kai euyuv eisporeuomenoi eiv authn eurhsete pwlon dedemenon ef on oudeiv oupw anyrwpwn ekayisen lusate auton kai ferete
11.3: kai ean tiv umin eiph ti poieite touto eipate o kuriov autou creian ecei kai euyuv auton apostellei palin wde
11.4: kai aphlyon kai euron pwlon dedemenon prov yuran exw epi tou amfodou kai luousin auton
11.5: kai tinev twn ekei esthkotwn elegon autoiv ti poieite luontev ton pwlon
11.6: oi de eipan autoiv kaywv eipen o ihsouv kai afhkan autouv
11.7: kai ferousin ton pwlon prov ton ihsoun kai epiballousin autw ta imatia autwn kai ekayisen ep auton
11.8: kai polloi ta imatia autwn estrwsan eiv thn odon alloi de stibadav koqantev ek twn agrwn
11.9: kai oi proagontev kai oi akolouyountev ekrazon wsanna euloghmenov o ercomenov en onomati kuriou
11.10: euloghmenh h ercomenh basileia tou patrov hmwn dauid wsanna en toiv uqistoiv
11.11: kai eishlyen eiv ierosoluma eiv to ieron kai peribleqamenov panta oqe hdh oushv thv wrav exhlyen eiv bhyanian meta twn dwdeka
11.12: kai th epaurion exelyontwn autwn apo bhyaniav epeinasen
11.13: kai idwn sukhn apo makroyen ecousan fulla hlyen ei ara ti eurhsei en auth kai elywn ep authn ouden euren ei mh fulla o gar kairov ouk hn sukwn
11.14: kai apokriyeiv eipen auth mhketi eiv ton aiwna ek sou mhdeiv karpon fagoi kai hkouon oi mayhtai autou
11.15: kai ercontai eiv ierosoluma kai eiselywn eiv to ieron hrxato ekballein touv pwlountav kai touv agorazontav en tw ierw kai tav trapezav twn kollubistwn kai tav kayedrav twn pwlountwn tav peristerav katestreqen
11.16: kai ouk hfien ina tiv dienegkh skeuov dia tou ierou
11.17: kai edidasken kai elegen ou gegraptai oti o oikov mou oikov proseuchv klhyhsetai pasin toiv eynesin umeiv de pepoihkate auton sphlaion lhstwn
11.18: kai hkousan oi arciereiv kai oi grammateiv kai ezhtoun pwv auton apoleswsin efobounto gar auton pav gar o oclov exeplhsseto epi th didach autou
11.19: kai otan oqe egeneto exeporeuonto exw thv polewv
11.20: kai paraporeuomenoi prwi eidon thn sukhn exhrammenhn ek rizwn
11.21: kai anamnhsyeiv o petrov legei autw rabbi ide h sukh hn kathrasw exhrantai
11.22: kai apokriyeiv o ihsouv legei autoiv ecete pistin yeou
11.23: amhn legw umin oti ov an eiph tw orei toutw aryhti kai blhyhti eiv thn yalassan kai mh diakriyh en th kardia autou alla pisteuh oti o lalei ginetai estai autw
11.24: dia touto legw umin panta osa proseucesye kai aiteisye pisteuete oti elabete kai estai umin
11.25: kai otan sthkete proseucomenoi afiete ei ti ecete kata tinov ina kai o pathr umwn o en toiv ouranoiv afh umin ta paraptwmata umwn 11:26
11.27: kai ercontai palin eiv ierosoluma kai en tw ierw peripatountov autou ercontai prov auton oi arciereiv kai oi grammateiv kai oi presbuteroi
11.28: kai elegon autw en poia exousia tauta poieiv h tiv soi edwken thn exousian tauthn ina tauta poihv
11.29: o de ihsouv eipen autoiv eperwthsw umav ena logon kai apokriyhte moi kai erw umin en poia exousia tauta poiw
11.30: to baptisma to iwannou ex ouranou hn h ex anyrwpwn apokriyhte moi
11.31: kai dielogizonto prov eautouv legontev ean eipwmen ex ouranou erei dia ti [oun] ouk episteusate autw
11.32: alla eipwmen ex anyrwpwn efobounto ton oclon apantev gar eicon ton iwannhn ontwv oti profhthv hn
11.33: kai apokriyentev tw ihsou legousin ouk oidamen kai o ihsouv legei autoiv oude egw legw umin en poia exousia tauta poiw

12.1: kai hrxato autoiv en parabolaiv lalein ampelwna anyrwpov efuteusen kai perieyhken fragmon kai wruxen upolhnion kai wkodomhsen purgon kai exedeto auton gewrgoiv kai apedhmhsen
12.2: kai apesteilen prov touv gewrgouv tw kairw doulon ina para twn gewrgwn labh apo twn karpwn tou ampelwnov
12.3: kai labontev auton edeiran kai apesteilan kenon
12.4: kai palin apesteilen prov autouv allon doulon kakeinon ekefaliwsan kai htimasan
12.5: kai allon apesteilen kakeinon apekteinan kai pollouv allouv ouv men derontev ouv de apoktennuntev
12.6: eti ena eicen uion agaphton apesteilen auton escaton prov autouv legwn oti entraphsontai ton uion mou
12.7: ekeinoi de oi gewrgoi prov eautouv eipan oti outov estin o klhronomov deute apokteinwmen auton kai hmwn estai h klhronomia
12.8: kai labontev apekteinan auton kai exebalon auton exw tou ampelwnov
12.9: ti poihsei o kuriov tou ampelwnov eleusetai kai apolesei touv gewrgouv kai dwsei ton ampelwna alloiv
12.10: oude thn grafhn tauthn anegnwte liyon on apedokimasan oi oikodomountev outov egenhyh eiv kefalhn gwniav
12.11: para kuriou egeneto auth kai estin yaumasth en ofyalmoiv hmwn
12.12: kai ezhtoun auton krathsai kai efobhyhsan ton oclon egnwsan gar oti prov autouv thn parabolhn eipen kai afentev auton aphlyan
12.13: kai apostellousin prov auton tinav twn farisaiwn kai twn hrwdianwn ina auton agreuswsin logw
12.14: kai elyontev legousin autw didaskale oidamen oti alhyhv ei kai ou melei soi peri oudenov ou gar blepeiv eiv proswpon anyrwpwn all ep alhyeiav thn odon tou yeou didaskeiv exestin dounai khnson kaisari h ou
12.15: dwmen h mh dwmen [12:15] o de eidwv autwn thn upokrisin eipen autoiv ti me peirazete ferete moi dhnarion ina idw
12.16: oi de hnegkan kai legei autoiv tinov h eikwn auth kai h epigrafh oi de eipan autw kaisarov
12.17: o de ihsouv eipen ta kaisarov apodote kaisari kai ta tou yeou tw yew kai exeyaumazon ep autw
12.18: kai ercontai saddoukaioi prov auton oitinev legousin anastasin mh einai kai ephrwtwn auton legontev
12.19: didaskale mwushv egraqen hmin oti ean tinov adelfov apoyanh kai kataliph gunaika kai mh afh teknon ina labh o adelfov autou thn gunaika kai exanasthsh sperma tw adelfw autou
12.20: epta adelfoi hsan kai o prwtov elaben gunaika kai apoynhskwn ouk afhken sperma
12.21: kai o deuterov elaben authn kai apeyanen mh katalipwn sperma kai o tritov wsautwv
12.22: kai oi epta ouk afhkan sperma escaton pantwn kai h gunh apeyanen
12.23: en th anastasei tinov autwn estai gunh oi gar epta escon authn gunaika
12.24: efh autoiv o ihsouv ou dia touto planasye mh eidotev tav grafav mhde thn dunamin tou yeou
12.25: otan gar ek nekrwn anastwsin oute gamousin oute gamizontai all eisin wv aggeloi en toiv ouranoiv
12.26: peri de twn nekrwn oti egeirontai ouk anegnwte en th biblw mwusewv epi tou batou pwv eipen autw o yeov legwn egw o yeov abraam kai yeov isaak kai yeov iakwb
12.27: ouk estin yeov nekrwn alla zwntwn polu planasye
12.28: kai proselywn eiv twn grammatewn akousav autwn suzhtountwn eidwv oti kalwv apekriyh autoiv ephrwthsen auton poia estin entolh prwth pantwn
12.29: apekriyh o ihsouv oti prwth estin akoue israhl kuriov o yeov hmwn kuriov eiv estin
12.30: kai agaphseiv kurion ton yeon sou ex olhv kardiav sou kai ex olhv thv quchv sou kai ex olhv thv dianoiav sou kai ex olhv thv iscuov sou
12.31: deutera auth agaphseiv ton plhsion sou wv seauton meizwn toutwn allh entolh ouk estin
12.32: eipen autw o grammateuv kalwv didaskale ep alhyeiav eipev oti eiv estin kai ouk estin allov plhn autou
12.33: kai to agapan auton ex olhv kardiav kai ex olhv thv sunesewv kai ex olhv thv iscuov kai to agapan ton plhsion wv eauton perissoteron estin pantwn twn olokautwmatwn kai yusiwn
12.34: kai o ihsouv idwn auton oti nounecwv apekriyh eipen autw ou makran [ei] apo thv basileiav tou yeou kai oudeiv ouketi etolma auton eperwthsai
12.35: kai apokriyeiv o ihsouv elegen didaskwn en tw ierw pwv legousin oi grammateiv oti o cristov uiov dauid estin
12.36: autov dauid eipen en tw pneumati tw agiw eipen kuriov tw kuriw mou kayou ek dexiwn mou ewv an yw touv ecyrouv sou upokatw twn podwn sou
12.37: autov dauid legei auton kurion kai poyen autou estin uiov kai o poluv oclov hkouen autou hdewv
12.38: kai en th didach autou elegen blepete apo twn grammatewn twn yelontwn en stolaiv peripatein kai aspasmouv en taiv agoraiv
12.39: kai prwtokayedriav en taiv sunagwgaiv kai prwtoklisiav en toiv deipnoiv
12.40: oi katesyontev tav oikiav twn chrwn kai profasei makra proseucomenoi outoi lhmqontai perissoteron krima
12.41: kai kayisav katenanti tou gazofulakiou eyewrei pwv o oclov ballei calkon eiv to gazofulakion kai polloi plousioi eballon polla
12.42: kai elyousa mia chra ptwch ebalen lepta duo o estin kodranthv
12.43: kai proskalesamenov touv mayhtav autou eipen autoiv amhn legw umin oti h chra auth h ptwch pleion pantwn ebalen twn ballontwn eiv to gazofulakion
12.44: pantev gar ek tou perisseuontov autoiv ebalon auth de ek thv usterhsewv authv panta osa eicen ebalen olon ton bion authv

13.1: kai ekporeuomenou autou ek tou ierou legei autw eiv twn mayhtwn autou didaskale ide potapoi liyoi kai potapai oikodomai
13.2: kai o ihsouv eipen autw blepeiv tautav tav megalav oikodomav ou mh afeyh wde liyov epi liyon ov ou mh kataluyh
13.3: kai kayhmenou autou eiv to orov twn elaiwn katenanti tou ierou ephrwta auton kat idian petrov kai iakwbov kai iwannhv kai andreav
13.4: eipon hmin pote tauta estai kai ti to shmeion otan mellh tauta sunteleisyai panta
13.5: o de ihsouv hrxato legein autoiv blepete mh tiv umav planhsh
13.6: polloi eleusontai epi tw onomati mou legontev oti egw eimi kai pollouv planhsousin
13.7: otan de akoushte polemouv kai akoav polemwn mh yroeisye dei genesyai all oupw to telov
13.8: egeryhsetai gar eynov ep eynov kai basileia epi basileian esontai seismoi kata topouv esontai limoi arch wdinwn tauta
13.9: blepete de umeiv eautouv paradwsousin umav eiv sunedria kai eiv sunagwgav darhsesye kai epi hgemonwn kai basilewn stayhsesye eneken emou eiv marturion autoiv
13.10: kai eiv panta ta eynh prwton dei khrucyhnai to euaggelion
13.11: kai otan agwsin umav paradidontev mh promerimnate ti lalhshte all o ean doyh umin en ekeinh th wra touto laleite ou gar este umeiv oi lalountev alla to pneuma to agion
13.12: kai paradwsei adelfov adelfon eiv yanaton kai pathr teknon kai epanasthsontai tekna epi goneiv kai yanatwsousin autouv
13.13: kai esesye misoumenoi upo pantwn dia to onoma mou o de upomeinav eiv telov outov swyhsetai
13.14: otan de idhte to bdelugma thv erhmwsewv esthkota opou ou dei o anaginwskwn noeitw tote oi en th ioudaia feugetwsan eiv ta orh
13.15: o epi tou dwmatov mh katabatw mhde eiselyatw ti arai ek thv oikiav autou
13.16: kai o eiv ton agron mh epistreqatw eiv ta opisw arai to imation autou
13.17: ouai de taiv en gastri ecousaiv kai taiv yhlazousaiv en ekeinaiv taiv hmeraiv
13.18: proseucesye de ina mh genhtai ceimwnov
13.19: esontai gar ai hmerai ekeinai yliqiv oia ou gegonen toiauth ap archv ktisewv hn ektisen o yeov ewv tou nun kai ou mh genhtai
13.20: kai ei mh ekolobwsen kuriov tav hmerav ouk an eswyh pasa sarx alla dia touv eklektouv ouv exelexato ekolobwsen tav hmerav
13.21: kai tote ean tiv umin eiph ide wde o cristov ide ekei mh pisteuete
13.22: egeryhsontai gar qeudocristoi kai qeudoprofhtai kai dwsousin shmeia kai terata prov to apoplanan ei dunaton touv eklektouv
13.23: umeiv de blepete proeirhka umin panta
13.24: alla en ekeinaiv taiv hmeraiv meta thn yliqin ekeinhn o hliov skotisyhsetai kai h selhnh ou dwsei to feggov authv
13.25: kai oi asterev esontai ek tou ouranou piptontev kai ai dunameiv ai en toiv ouranoiv saleuyhsontai
13.26: kai tote oqontai ton uion tou anyrwpou ercomenon en nefelaiv meta dunamewv pollhv kai doxhv
13.27: kai tote apostelei touv aggelouv kai episunaxei touv eklektouv [autou] ek twn tessarwn anemwn ap akrou ghv ewv akrou ouranou
13.28: apo de thv sukhv mayete thn parabolhn otan hdh o kladov authv apalov genhtai kai ekfuh ta fulla ginwskete oti egguv to yerov estin
13.29: outwv kai umeiv otan idhte tauta ginomena ginwskete oti egguv estin epi yuraiv
13.30: amhn legw umin oti ou mh parelyh h genea auth mecriv ou tauta panta genhtai
13.31: o ouranov kai h gh pareleusontai oi de logoi mou ou pareleusontai
13.32: peri de thv hmerav ekeinhv h thv wrav oudeiv oiden oude oi aggeloi en ouranw oude o uiov ei mh o pathr
13.33: blepete agrupneite ouk oidate gar pote o kairov [estin]
13.34: wv anyrwpov apodhmov afeiv thn oikian autou kai douv toiv douloiv autou thn exousian ekastw to ergon autou kai tw yurwrw eneteilato ina grhgorh
13.35: grhgoreite oun ouk oidate gar pote o kuriov thv oikiav ercetai h oqe h mesonuktion h alektorofwniav h prwi
13.36: mh elywn exaifnhv eurh umav kayeudontav
13.37: o de umin legw pasin legw grhgoreite

14.1: hn de to pasca kai ta azuma meta duo hmerav kai ezhtoun oi arciereiv kai oi grammateiv pwv auton en dolw krathsantev apokteinwsin
14.2: elegon gar mh en th eorth mhpote estai yorubov tou laou
14.3: kai ontov autou en bhyania en th oikia simwnov tou leprou katakeimenou autou hlyen gunh ecousa alabastron murou nardou pistikhv polutelouv suntriqasa thn alabastron kateceen autou thv kefalhv
14.4: hsan de tinev aganaktountev prov eautouv eiv ti h apwleia auth tou murou gegonen
14.5: hdunato gar touto to muron prayhnai epanw dhnariwn triakosiwn kai doyhnai toiv ptwcoiv kai enebrimwnto auth
14.6: o de ihsouv eipen afete authn ti auth kopouv parecete kalon ergon hrgasato en emoi
14.7: pantote gar touv ptwcouv ecete mey eautwn kai otan yelhte dunasye autoiv [pantote] eu poihsai eme de ou pantote ecete
14.8: o escen epoihsen proelaben murisai to swma mou eiv ton entafiasmon
14.9: amhn de legw umin opou ean khrucyh to euaggelion eiv olon ton kosmon kai o epoihsen auth lalhyhsetai eiv mnhmosunon authv
14.10: kai ioudav iskariwy o eiv twn dwdeka aphlyen prov touv arciereiv ina auton paradoi autoiv
14.11: oi de akousantev ecarhsan kai ephggeilanto autw argurion dounai kai ezhtei pwv auton eukairwv paradoi
14.12: kai th prwth hmera twn azumwn ote to pasca eyuon legousin autw oi mayhtai autou pou yeleiv apelyontev etoimaswmen ina faghv to pasca
14.13: kai apostellei duo twn mayhtwn autou kai legei autoiv upagete eiv thn polin kai apanthsei umin anyrwpov keramion udatov bastazwn akolouyhsate autw
14.14: kai opou ean eiselyh eipate tw oikodespoth oti o didaskalov legei pou estin to kataluma mou opou to pasca meta twn mayhtwn mou fagw
14.15: kai autov umin deixei anagaion mega estrwmenon etoimon kai ekei etoimasate hmin
14.16: kai exhlyon oi mayhtai kai hlyon eiv thn polin kai euron kaywv eipen autoiv kai htoimasan to pasca
14.17: kai oqiav genomenhv ercetai meta twn dwdeka
14.18: kai anakeimenwn autwn kai esyiontwn o ihsouv eipen amhn legw umin oti eiv ex umwn paradwsei me o esyiwn met emou
14.19: hrxanto lupeisyai kai legein autw eiv kata eiv mhti egw
14.20: o de eipen autoiv eiv twn dwdeka o embaptomenov met emou eiv to [en] trublion
14.21: oti o men uiov tou anyrwpou upagei kaywv gegraptai peri autou ouai de tw anyrwpw ekeinw di ou o uiov tou anyrwpou paradidotai kalon autw ei ouk egennhyh o anyrwpov ekeinov
14.22: kai esyiontwn autwn labwn arton euloghsav eklasen kai edwken autoiv kai eipen labete touto estin to swma mou
14.23: kai labwn pothrion eucaristhsav edwken autoiv kai epion ex autou pantev
14.24: kai eipen autoiv touto estin to aima mou thv diayhkhv to ekcunnomenon uper pollwn
14.25: amhn legw umin oti ouketi ou mh piw ek tou genhmatov thv ampelou ewv thv hmerav ekeinhv otan auto pinw kainon en th basileia tou yeou
14.26: kai umnhsantev exhlyon eiv to orov twn elaiwn
14.27: kai legei autoiv o ihsouv oti pantev skandalisyhsesye oti gegraptai pataxw ton poimena kai ta probata diaskorpisyhsontai
14.28: alla meta to egeryhnai me proaxw umav eiv thn galilaian
14.29: o de petrov efh autw ei kai pantev skandalisyhsontai all ouk egw
14.30: kai legei autw o ihsouv amhn legw soi oti su shmeron tauth th nukti prin h div alektora fwnhsai triv me aparnhsh
14.31: o de ekperisswv elalei ean deh me sunapoyanein soi ou mh se aparnhsomai wsautwv [de] kai pantev elegon
14.32: kai ercontai eiv cwrion ou to onoma geyshmani kai legei toiv mayhtaiv autou kayisate wde ewv proseuxwmai
14.33: kai paralambanei ton petron kai ton iakwbon kai ton iwannhn met autou kai hrxato ekyambeisyai kai adhmonein
14.34: kai legei autoiv perilupov estin h quch mou ewv yanatou meinate wde kai grhgoreite
14.35: kai proelywn mikron epipten epi thv ghv kai proshuceto ina ei dunaton estin parelyh ap autou h wra
14.36: kai elegen abba o pathr panta dunata soi parenegke to pothrion touto ap emou all ou ti egw yelw alla ti su
14.37: kai ercetai kai euriskei autouv kayeudontav kai legei tw petrw simwn kayeudeiv ouk iscusav mian wran grhgorhsai
14.38: grhgoreite kai proseucesye ina mh elyhte eiv peirasmon to men pneuma proyumon h de sarx asyenhv
14.39: kai palin apelywn proshuxato [ton auton logon eipwn]
14.40: kai palin elywn euren autouv kayeudontav hsan gar autwn oi ofyalmoi katabarunomenoi kai ouk hdeisan ti apokriywsin autw
14.41: kai ercetai to triton kai legei autoiv kayeudete [to] loipon kai anapauesye apecei hlyen h wra idou paradidotai o uiov tou anyrwpou eiv tav ceirav twn amartwlwn
14.42: egeiresye agwmen idou o paradidouv me hggiken
14.43: kai euyuv eti autou lalountov paraginetai [o] ioudav eiv twn dwdeka kai met autou oclov meta macairwn kai xulwn para twn arcierewn kai twn grammatewn kai twn presbuterwn
14.44: dedwkei de o paradidouv auton susshmon autoiv legwn on an filhsw autov estin krathsate auton kai apagete asfalwv
14.45: kai elywn euyuv proselywn autw legei rabbi kai katefilhsen auton
14.46: oi de epebalan tav ceirav autw kai ekrathsan auton
14.47: eiv de [tiv] twn paresthkotwn spasamenov thn macairan epaisen ton doulon tou arcierewv kai afeilen autou to wtarion
14.48: kai apokriyeiv o ihsouv eipen autoiv wv epi lhsthn exhlyate meta macairwn kai xulwn sullabein me
14.49: kay hmeran hmhn prov umav en tw ierw didaskwn kai ouk ekrathsate me all ina plhrwywsin ai grafai
14.51: kai neaniskov tiv sunhkolouyei autw peribeblhmenov sindona epi gumnou kai kratousin auton
14.52: o de katalipwn thn sindona gumnov efugen
14.53: kai aphgagon ton ihsoun prov ton arcierea kai sunercontai pantev oi arciereiv kai oi presbuteroi kai oi grammateiv
14.54: kai o petrov apo makroyen hkolouyhsen autw ewv esw eiv thn aulhn tou arcierewv kai hn sugkayhmenov meta twn uphretwn kai yermainomenov prov to fwv
14.55: oi de arciereiv kai olon to sunedrion ezhtoun kata tou ihsou marturian eiv to yanatwsai auton kai ouc huriskon
14.56: polloi gar eqeudomarturoun kat autou kai isai ai marturiai ouk hsan
14.57: kai tinev anastantev eqeudomarturoun kat autou legontev
14.58: oti hmeiv hkousamen autou legontov oti egw katalusw ton naon touton ton ceiropoihton kai dia triwn hmerwn allon aceiropoihton oikodomhsw
14.59: kai oude outwv ish hn h marturia autwn
14.60: kai anastav o arciereuv eiv meson ephrwthsen ton ihsoun legwn ouk apokrinh ouden ti outoi sou katamarturousin
14.61: o de esiwpa kai ouk apekrinato ouden palin o arciereuv ephrwta auton kai legei autw su ei o cristov o uiov tou euloghtou
14.62: o de ihsouv eipen egw eimi kai oqesye ton uion tou anyrwpou ek dexiwn kayhmenon thv dunamewv kai ercomenon meta twn nefelwn tou ouranou
14.63: o de arciereuv diarrhxav touv citwnav autou legei ti eti creian ecomen marturwn
14.64: hkousate thv blasfhmiav ti umin fainetai oi de pantev katekrinan auton enocon einai yanatou
14.65: kai hrxanto tinev emptuein autw kai perikaluptein autou to proswpon kai kolafizein auton kai legein autw profhteuson kai oi uphretai rapismasin auton elabon
14.66: kai ontov tou petrou katw en th aulh ercetai mia twn paidiskwn tou arcierewv
14.67: kai idousa ton petron yermainomenon embleqasa autw legei kai su meta tou nazarhnou hsya tou ihsou
14.68: o de hrnhsato legwn oute oida oute epistamai su ti legeiv kai exhlyen exw eiv to proaulion
14.69: kai h paidiskh idousa auton hrxato palin legein toiv parestwsin oti outov ex autwn estin
14.70: o de palin hrneito kai meta mikron palin oi parestwtev elegon tw petrw alhywv ex autwn ei kai gar galilaiov ei
14.71: o de hrxato anayematizein kai omnunai oti ouk oida ton anyrwpon touton on legete
14.72: kai euyuv ek deuterou alektwr efwnhsen kai anemnhsyh o petrov to rhma wv eipen autw o ihsouv oti prin alektora div fwnhsai triv me aparnhsh kai epibalwn eklaien

15.1: kai euyuv prwi sumboulion poihsantev oi arciereiv meta twn presbuterwn kai grammatewn kai olon to sunedrion dhsantev ton ihsoun aphnegkan kai paredwkan pilatw
15.2: kai ephrwthsen auton o pilatov su ei o basileuv twn ioudaiwn o de apokriyeiv autw legei su legeiv
15.3: kai kathgoroun autou oi arciereiv polla
15.4: o de pilatov palin ephrwta auton [legwn] ouk apokrinh ouden ide posa sou kathgorousin
15.5: o de ihsouv ouketi ouden apekriyh wste yaumazein ton pilaton
15.6: kata de eorthn apeluen autoiv ena desmion on parhtounto
15.7: hn de o legomenov barabbav meta twn stasiastwn dedemenov oitinev en th stasei fonon pepoihkeisan
15.8: kai anabav o oclov hrxato aiteisyai kaywv epoiei autoiv
15.9: o de pilatov apekriyh autoiv legwn yelete apolusw umin ton basilea twn ioudaiwn
15.10: eginwsken gar oti dia fyonon paradedwkeisan auton [oi arciereiv]
15.11: oi de arciereiv aneseisan ton oclon ina mallon ton barabban apolush autoiv
15.12: o de pilatov palin apokriyeiv elegen autoiv ti oun poihsw [on] legete ton basilea twn ioudaiwn
15.13: oi de palin ekraxan staurwson auton
15.14: o de pilatov elegen autoiv ti gar epoihsen kakon oi de perisswv ekraxan staurwson auton
15.15: o de pilatov boulomenov tw oclw to ikanon poihsai apelusen autoiv ton barabban kai paredwken ton ihsoun fragellwsav ina staurwyh
15.16: oi de stratiwtai aphgagon auton esw thv aulhv o estin praitwrion kai sugkalousin olhn thn speiran
15.17: kai endiduskousin auton porfuran kai peritiyeasin autw plexantev akanyinon stefanon
15.18: kai hrxanto aspazesyai auton caire basileu twn ioudaiwn
15.19: kai etupton autou thn kefalhn kalamw kai eneptuon autw kai tiyentev ta gonata prosekunoun autw
15.20: kai ote enepaixan autw exedusan auton thn porfuran kai enedusan auton ta imatia autou kai exagousin auton ina staurwswsin auton
15.21: kai aggareuousin paragonta tina simwna kurhnaion ercomenon ap agrou ton patera alexandrou kai roufou ina arh ton stauron autou
15.22: kai ferousin auton epi ton golgoyan topon o estin meyermhneuomenov kraniou topov
15.23: kai edidoun autw esmurnismenon oinon ov de ouk elaben
15.24: kai staurousin auton kai diamerizontai ta imatia autou ballontev klhron ep auta tiv ti arh
15.25: hn de wra trith kai estaurwsan auton
15.26: kai hn h epigrafh thv aitiav autou epigegrammenh o basileuv twn ioudaiwn
15.27: kai sun autw staurousin duo lhstav ena ek dexiwn kai ena ex euwnumwn autou 15:28
15.29: kai oi paraporeuomenoi eblasfhmoun auton kinountev tav kefalav autwn kai legontev oua o kataluwn ton naon kai oikodomwn [en] trisin hmeraiv
15.30: swson seauton katabav apo tou staurou
15.31: omoiwv kai oi arciereiv empaizontev prov allhlouv meta twn grammatewn elegon allouv eswsen eauton ou dunatai swsai
15.32: o cristov o basileuv israhl katabatw nun apo tou staurou ina idwmen kai pisteuswmen kai oi sunestaurwmenoi sun autw wneidizon auton
15.33: kai genomenhv wrav ekthv skotov egeneto ef olhn thn ghn ewv wrav enathv
15.34: kai th enath wra ebohsen o ihsouv fwnh megalh elwi elwi lama sabacyani o estin meyermhneuomenon o yeov mou [o yeov mou] eiv ti egkatelipev me
15.35: kai tinev twn paresthkotwn akousantev elegon ide hlian fwnei
15.36: dramwn de tiv gemisav spoggon oxouv periyeiv kalamw epotizen auton legwn afete idwmen ei ercetai hliav kayelein auton
15.37: o de ihsouv afeiv fwnhn megalhn exepneusen
15.38: kai to katapetasma tou naou escisyh eiv duo ap anwyen ewv katw
15.39: idwn de o kenturiwn o paresthkwv ex enantiav autou oti outwv exepneusen eipen alhywv outov o anyrwpov uiov yeou hn
15.40: hsan de kai gunaikev apo makroyen yewrousai en aiv kai mariam h magdalhnh kai maria h iakwbou tou mikrou kai iwshtov mhthr kai salwmh
15.41: ai ote hn en th galilaia hkolouyoun autw kai dihkonoun autw kai allai pollai ai sunanabasai autw eiv ierosoluma
15.42: kai hdh oqiav genomenhv epei hn paraskeuh o estin prosabbaton
15.43: elywn iwshf apo arimayaiav euschmwn bouleuthv ov kai autov hn prosdecomenov thn basileian tou yeou tolmhsav eishlyen prov ton pilaton kai hthsato to swma tou ihsou
15.44: o de pilatov eyaumasen ei hdh teynhken kai proskalesamenov ton kenturiwna ephrwthsen auton ei hdh apeyanen
15.45: kai gnouv apo tou kenturiwnov edwrhsato to ptwma tw iwshf
15.46: kai agorasav sindona kayelwn auton eneilhsen th sindoni kai eyhken auton en mnhmati o hn lelatomhmenon ek petrav kai prosekulisen liyon epi thn yuran tou mnhmeiou
15.47: h de maria h magdalhnh kai maria h iwshtov eyewroun pou teyeitai

16.1: kai diagenomenou tou sabbatou [h] maria h magdalhnh kai maria h [tou] iakwbou kai salwmh hgorasan arwmata ina elyousai aleiqwsin auton
16.2: kai lian prwi [th] mia twn sabbatwn ercontai epi to mnhmeion anateilantov tou hliou
16.3: kai elegon prov eautav tiv apokulisei hmin ton liyon ek thv yurav tou mnhmeiou
16.4: kai anableqasai yewrousin oti anakekulistai o liyov hn gar megav sfodra
16.5: kai eiselyousai eiv to mnhmeion eidon neaniskon kayhmenon en toiv dexioiv peribeblhmenon stolhn leukhn kai exeyambhyhsan
16.6: o de legei autaiv mh ekyambeisye ihsoun zhteite ton nazarhnon ton estaurwmenon hgeryh ouk estin wde ide o topov opou eyhkan auton
16.7: alla upagete eipate toiv mayhtaiv autou kai tw petrw oti proagei umav eiv thn galilaian ekei auton oqesye kaywv eipen umin
16.8: kai exelyousai efugon apo tou mnhmeiou eicen gar autav tromov kai ekstasiv kai oudeni ouden eipan efobounto gar
16.9: [[anastav de prwi prwth sabbatou efanh prwton maria th magdalhnh par hv ekbeblhkei epta daimonia
16.10: ekeinh poreuyeisa aphggeilen toiv met autou genomenoiv penyousin kai klaiousin
16.11: kakeinoi akousantev oti zh kai eyeayh up authv hpisthsan
16.12: meta de tauta dusin ex autwn peripatousin efanerwyh en etera morfh poreuomenoiv eiv agron
16.13: kakeinoi apelyontev aphggeilan toiv loipoiv oude ekeinoiv episteusan
16.14: usteron [de] anakeimenoiv autoiv toiv endeka efanerwyh kai wneidisen thn apistian autwn kai sklhrokardian oti toiv yeasamenoiv auton eghgermenon [ek nekrwn] ouk episteusan
16.15: kai eipen autoiv poreuyentev eiv ton kosmon apanta khruxate to euaggelion pash th ktisei
16.16: o pisteusav kai baptisyeiv swyhsetai o de apisthsav katakriyhsetai
16.17: shmeia de toiv pisteusasin akolouyhsei tauta en tw onomati mou daimonia ekbalousin glwssaiv lalhsousin
16.18: [kai en taiv cersin] ofeiv arousin kan yanasimon ti piwsin ou mh autouv blaqh epi arrwstouv ceirav epiyhsousin kai kalwv exousin
16.19: o men oun kuriov [ihsouv] meta to lalhsai autoiv anelhmfyh eiv ton ouranon kai ekayisen ek dexiwn tou yeou
16.20: ekeinoi de exelyontev ekhruxan pantacou tou kuriou sunergountov kai ton logon bebaiountov dia twn epakolouyountwn shmeiwn]] [[panta de ta parhggelmena toiv peri ton petron suntomwv exhggeilan meta de tauta kai autov o ihsouv apo anatolhv kai acri dusewv exapesteilen di autwn to ieron kai afyarton khrugma thv aiwniou swthriav]]

1.1: biblov genesewv ihsou cristou uiou dauid uiou abraam
1.2: abraam egennhsen ton isaak isaak de egennhsen ton iakwb iakwb de egennhsen ton ioudan kai touv adelfouv autou
1.3: ioudav de egennhsen ton farev kai ton zara ek thv yamar farev de egennhsen ton esrwm esrwm de egennhsen ton aram
1.4: aram de egennhsen ton aminadab aminadab de egennhsen ton naasswn naasswn de egennhsen ton salmwn
1.5: salmwn de egennhsen ton boev ek thv racab boev de egennhsen ton iwbhd ek thv rouy iwbhd de egennhsen ton iessai
1.6: iessai de egennhsen ton dauid ton basilea dauid de egennhsen ton solomwna ek thv tou ouriou
1.7: solomwn de egennhsen ton roboam roboam de egennhsen ton abia abia de egennhsen ton asaf
1.8: asaf de egennhsen ton iwsafat iwsafat de egennhsen ton iwram iwram de egennhsen ton ozian
1.9: oziav de egennhsen ton iwayam iwayam de egennhsen ton acav acav de egennhsen ton ezekian
1.10: ezekiav de egennhsen ton manassh manasshv de egennhsen ton amwv amwv de egennhsen ton iwsian
1.11: iwsiav de egennhsen ton ieconian kai touv adelfouv autou epi thv metoikesiav babulwnov
1.12: meta de thn metoikesian babulwnov ieconiav egennhsen ton salayihl salayihl de egennhsen ton zorobabel
1.13: zorobabel de egennhsen ton abioud abioud de egennhsen ton eliakim eliakim de egennhsen ton azwr
1.14: azwr de egennhsen ton sadwk sadwk de egennhsen ton acim acim de egennhsen ton elioud
1.15: elioud de egennhsen ton eleazar eleazar de egennhsen ton matyan matyan de egennhsen ton iakwb
1.16: iakwb de egennhsen ton iwshf ton andra mariav ex hv egennhyh ihsouv o legomenov cristov
1.17: pasai oun ai geneai apo abraam ewv dauid geneai dekatessarev kai apo dauid ewv thv metoikesiav babulwnov geneai dekatessarev kai apo thv metoikesiav babulwnov ewv tou cristou geneai dekatessarev
1.18: tou de [ihsou] cristou h genesiv outwv hn mnhsteuyeishv thv mhtrov autou mariav tw iwshf prin h sunelyein autouv eureyh en gastri ecousa ek pneumatov agiou
1.19: iwshf de o anhr authv dikaiov wn kai mh yelwn authn deigmatisai eboulhyh layra apolusai authn
1.20: tauta de autou enyumhyentov idou aggelov kuriou kat onar efanh autw legwn iwshf uiov dauid mh fobhyhv paralabein marian thn gunaika sou to gar en auth gennhyen ek pneumatov estin agiou
1.21: texetai de uion kai kaleseiv to onoma autou ihsoun autov gar swsei ton laon autou apo twn amartiwn autwn
1.22: touto de olon gegonen ina plhrwyh to rhyen upo kuriou dia tou profhtou legontov
1.23: idou h paryenov en gastri exei kai texetai uion kai kalesousin to onoma autou emmanouhl o estin meyermhneuomenon mey hmwn o yeov
1.24: egeryeiv de [o] iwshf apo tou upnou epoihsen wv prosetaxen autw o aggelov kuriou kai parelaben thn gunaika autou
1.25: kai ouk eginwsken authn ewv [ou] eteken uion kai ekalesen to onoma autou ihsoun

2.1: tou de ihsou gennhyentov en bhyleem thv ioudaiav en hmeraiv hrwdou tou basilewv idou magoi apo anatolwn paregenonto eiv ierosoluma
2.2: legontev pou estin o tecyeiv basileuv twn ioudaiwn eidomen gar autou ton astera en th anatolh kai hlyomen proskunhsai autw
2.3: akousav de o basileuv hrwdhv etaracyh kai pasa ierosoluma met autou
2.4: kai sunagagwn pantav touv arciereiv kai grammateiv tou laou epunyaneto par autwn pou o cristov gennatai
2.5: oi de eipan autw en bhyleem thv ioudaiav outwv gar gegraptai dia tou profhtou
2.6: kai su bhyleem gh iouda oudamwv elacisth ei en toiv hgemosin iouda ek sou gar exeleusetai hgoumenov ostiv poimanei ton laon mou ton israhl
2.7: tote hrwdhv layra kalesav touv magouv hkribwsen par autwn ton cronon tou fainomenou asterov
2.8: kai pemqav autouv eiv bhyleem eipen poreuyentev exetasate akribwv peri tou paidiou epan de eurhte apaggeilate moi opwv kagw elywn proskunhsw autw
2.9: oi de akousantev tou basilewv eporeuyhsan kai idou o asthr on eidon en th anatolh prohgen autouv ewv elywn estayh epanw ou hn to paidion
2.10: idontev de ton astera ecarhsan caran megalhn sfodra
2.11: kai elyontev eiv thn oikian eidon to paidion meta mariav thv mhtrov autou kai pesontev prosekunhsan autw kai anoixantev touv yhsaurouv autwn proshnegkan autw dwra cruson kai libanon kai smurnan
2.12: kai crhmatisyentev kat onar mh anakamqai prov hrwdhn di allhv odou anecwrhsan eiv thn cwran autwn
2.13: anacwrhsantwn de autwn idou aggelov kuriou fainetai kat onar tw iwshf legwn egeryeiv paralabe to paidion kai thn mhtera autou kai feuge eiv aigupton kai isyi ekei ewv an eipw soi mellei gar hrwdhv zhtein to paidion tou apolesai auto
2.14: o de egeryeiv parelaben to paidion kai thn mhtera autou nuktov kai anecwrhsen eiv aigupton
2.15: kai hn ekei ewv thv teleuthv hrwdou ina plhrwyh to rhyen upo kuriou dia tou profhtou legontov ex aiguptou ekalesa ton uion mou
2.16: tote hrwdhv idwn oti enepaicyh upo twn magwn eyumwyh lian kai aposteilav aneilen pantav touv paidav touv en bhyleem kai en pasin toiv orioiv authv apo dietouv kai katwterw kata ton cronon on hkribwsen para twn magwn
2.17: tote eplhrwyh to rhyen dia ieremiou tou profhtou legontov
2.18: fwnh en rama hkousyh klauymov kai odurmov poluv rachl klaiousa ta tekna authv kai ouk hyelen paraklhyhnai oti ouk eisin
2.19: teleuthsantov de tou hrwdou idou aggelov kuriou fainetai kat onar tw iwshf en aiguptw
2.20: legwn egeryeiv paralabe to paidion kai thn mhtera autou kai poreuou eiv ghn israhl teynhkasin gar oi zhtountev thn quchn tou paidiou
2.21: o de egeryeiv parelaben to paidion kai thn mhtera autou kai eishlyen eiv ghn israhl
2.22: akousav de oti arcelaov basileuei thv ioudaiav anti tou patrov autou hrwdou efobhyh ekei apelyein crhmatisyeiv de kat onar anecwrhsen eiv ta merh thv galilaiav
2.23: kai elywn katwkhsen eiv polin legomenhn nazaret opwv plhrwyh to rhyen dia twn profhtwn oti nazwraiov klhyhsetai

3.1: en de taiv hmeraiv ekeinaiv paraginetai iwannhv o baptisthv khrusswn en th erhmw thv ioudaiav
3.2: legwn metanoeite hggiken gar h basileia twn ouranwn
3.3: outov gar estin o rhyeiv dia hsaiou tou profhtou legontov fwnh bowntov en th erhmw etoimasate thn odon kuriou euyeiav poieite tav tribouv autou
3.4: autov de o iwannhv eicen to enduma autou apo tricwn kamhlou kai zwnhn dermatinhn peri thn osfun autou h de trofh hn autou akridev kai meli agrion
3.5: tote exeporeueto prov auton ierosoluma kai pasa h ioudaia kai pasa h pericwrov tou iordanou
3.6: kai ebaptizonto en tw iordanh potamw up autou exomologoumenoi tav amartiav autwn
3.7: idwn de pollouv twn farisaiwn kai saddoukaiwn ercomenouv epi to baptisma eipen autoiv gennhmata ecidnwn tiv upedeixen umin fugein apo thv melloushv orghv
3.8: poihsate oun karpon axion thv metanoiav
3.9: kai mh doxhte legein en eautoiv patera ecomen ton abraam legw gar umin oti dunatai o yeov ek twn liywn toutwn egeirai tekna tw abraam
3.10: hdh de h axinh prov thn rizan twn dendrwn keitai pan oun dendron mh poioun karpon kalon ekkoptetai kai eiv pur balletai
3.11: egw men umav baptizw en udati eiv metanoian o de opisw mou ercomenov iscuroterov mou estin ou ouk eimi ikanov ta upodhmata bastasai autov umav baptisei en pneumati agiw kai puri
3.12: ou to ptuon en th ceiri autou kai diakayariei thn alwna autou kai sunaxei ton siton autou eiv thn apoyhkhn to de acuron katakausei puri asbestw
3.13: tote paraginetai o ihsouv apo thv galilaiav epi ton iordanhn prov ton iwannhn tou baptisyhnai up autou
3.14: o de diekwluen auton legwn egw creian ecw upo sou baptisyhnai kai su erch prov me
3.15: apokriyeiv de o ihsouv eipen autw afev arti outwv gar prepon estin hmin plhrwsai pasan dikaiosunhn tote afihsin auton
3.16: baptisyeiv de o ihsouv euyuv anebh apo tou udatov kai idou hnewcyhsan oi ouranoi kai eiden pneuma yeou katabainon wsei peristeran ercomenon ep auton
3.17: kai idou fwnh ek twn ouranwn legousa outov estin o uiov mou o agaphtov en w eudokhsa

4.1: tote [o] ihsouv anhcyh eiv thn erhmon upo tou pneumatov peirasyhnai upo tou diabolou
4.2: kai nhsteusav hmerav tesserakonta kai nuktav tesserakonta usteron epeinasen
4.3: kai proselywn o peirazwn eipen autw ei uiov ei tou yeou eipon ina oi liyoi outoi artoi genwntai
4.4: o de apokriyeiv eipen gegraptai ouk ep artw monw zhsetai o anyrwpov all epi panti rhmati ekporeuomenw dia stomatov yeou
4.5: tote paralambanei auton o diabolov eiv thn agian polin kai esthsen auton epi to pterugion tou ierou
4.6: kai legei autw ei uiov ei tou yeou bale seauton katw gegraptai gar oti toiv aggeloiv autou enteleitai peri sou kai epi ceirwn arousin se mhpote proskoqhv prov liyon ton poda sou
4.7: efh autw o ihsouv palin gegraptai ouk ekpeiraseiv kurion ton yeon sou
4.8: palin paralambanei auton o diabolov eiv orov uqhlon lian kai deiknusin autw pasav tav basileiav tou kosmou kai thn doxan autwn
4.9: kai eipen autw tauta soi panta dwsw ean peswn proskunhshv moi
4.10: tote legei autw o ihsouv upage satana gegraptai gar kurion ton yeon sou proskunhseiv kai autw monw latreuseiv
4.11: tote afihsin auton o diabolov kai idou aggeloi proshlyon kai dihkonoun autw
4.12: akousav de oti iwannhv paredoyh anecwrhsen eiv thn galilaian
4.13: kai katalipwn thn nazara elywn katwkhsen eiv kafarnaoum thn parayalassian en orioiv zaboulwn kai nefyalim
4.14: ina plhrwyh to rhyen dia hsaiou tou profhtou legontov
4.15: gh zaboulwn kai gh nefyalim odon yalasshv peran tou iordanou galilaia twn eynwn
4.16: o laov o kayhmenov en skotia fwv eiden mega kai toiv kayhmenoiv en cwra kai skia yanatou fwv aneteilen autoiv
4.17: apo tote hrxato o ihsouv khrussein kai legein metanoeite hggiken gar h basileia twn ouranwn
4.18: peripatwn de para thn yalassan thv galilaiav eiden duo adelfouv simwna ton legomenon petron kai andrean ton adelfon autou ballontav amfiblhstron eiv thn yalassan hsan gar alieiv
4.19: kai legei autoiv deute opisw mou kai poihsw umav alieiv anyrwpwn
4.20: oi de euyewv afentev ta diktua hkolouyhsan autw
4.21: kai probav ekeiyen eiden allouv duo adelfouv iakwbon ton tou zebedaiou kai iwannhn ton adelfon autou en tw ploiw meta zebedaiou tou patrov autwn katartizontav ta diktua autwn kai ekalesen autouv
4.22: oi de euyewv afentev to ploion kai ton patera autwn hkolouyhsan autw
4.23: kai perihgen en olh th galilaia didaskwn en taiv sunagwgaiv autwn kai khrusswn to euaggelion thv basileiav kai yerapeuwn pasan noson kai pasan malakian en tw law
4.24: kai aphlyen h akoh autou eiv olhn thn surian kai proshnegkan autw pantav touv kakwv econtav poikilaiv nosoiv kai basanoiv sunecomenouv daimonizomenouv kai selhniazomenouv kai paralutikouv kai eyerapeusen autouv
4.25: kai hkolouyhsan autw ocloi polloi apo thv galilaiav kai dekapolewv kai ierosolumwn kai ioudaiav kai peran tou iordanou

5.1: idwn de touv oclouv anebh eiv to orov kai kayisantov autou proshlyan [autw] oi mayhtai autou
5.2: kai anoixav to stoma autou edidasken autouv legwn
5.3: makarioi oi ptwcoi tw pneumati oti autwn estin h basileia twn ouranwn
5.4: makarioi oi penyountev oti autoi paraklhyhsontai
5.5: makarioi oi praeiv oti autoi klhronomhsousin thn ghn
5.6: makarioi oi peinwntev kai diqwntev thn dikaiosunhn oti autoi cortasyhsontai
5.7: makarioi oi elehmonev oti autoi elehyhsontai
5.8: makarioi oi kayaroi th kardia oti autoi ton yeon oqontai
5.9: makarioi oi eirhnopoioi oti [autoi] uioi yeou klhyhsontai
5.10: makarioi oi dediwgmenoi eneken dikaiosunhv oti autwn estin h basileia twn ouranwn
5.11: makarioi este otan oneidiswsin umav kai diwxwsin kai eipwsin pan ponhron kay umwn qeudomenoi eneken emou
5.12: cairete kai agalliasye oti o misyov umwn poluv en toiv ouranoiv outwv gar ediwxan touv profhtav touv pro umwn
5.13: umeiv este to alav thv ghv ean de to alav mwranyh en tini alisyhsetai eiv ouden iscuei eti ei mh blhyen exw katapateisyai upo twn anyrwpwn
5.14: umeiv este to fwv tou kosmou ou dunatai poliv krubhnai epanw orouv keimenh
5.15: oude kaiousin lucnon kai tiyeasin auton upo ton modion all epi thn lucnian kai lampei pasin toiv en th oikia
5.16: outwv lamqatw to fwv umwn emprosyen twn anyrwpwn opwv idwsin umwn ta kala erga kai doxaswsin ton patera umwn ton en toiv ouranoiv
5.17: mh nomishte oti hlyon katalusai ton nomon h touv profhtav ouk hlyon katalusai alla plhrwsai
5.18: amhn gar legw umin ewv an parelyh o ouranov kai h gh iwta en h mia keraia ou mh parelyh apo tou nomou ewv [an] panta genhtai
5.19: ov ean oun lush mian twn entolwn toutwn twn elacistwn kai didaxh outwv touv anyrwpouv elacistov klhyhsetai en th basileia twn ouranwn ov d an poihsh kai didaxh outov megav klhyhsetai en th basileia twn ouranwn
5.20: legw gar umin oti ean mh perisseush umwn h dikaiosunh pleion twn grammatewn kai farisaiwn ou mh eiselyhte eiv thn basileian twn ouranwn
5.21: hkousate oti erreyh toiv arcaioiv ou foneuseiv ov d an foneush enocov estai th krisei
5.22: egw de legw umin oti pav o orgizomenov tw adelfw autou enocov estai th krisei ov d an eiph tw adelfw autou raka enocov estai tw sunedriw ov d an eiph mwre enocov estai eiv thn geennan tou purov
5.23: ean oun prosferhv to dwron sou epi to yusiasthrion kakei mnhsyhv oti o adelfov sou ecei ti kata sou
5.24: afev ekei to dwron sou emprosyen tou yusiasthriou kai upage prwton diallaghyi tw adelfw sou kai tote elywn prosfere to dwron sou
5.25: isyi eunown tw antidikw sou tacu ewv otou ei met autou en th odw mhpote se paradw o antidikov tw krith kai o krithv tw uphreth kai eiv fulakhn blhyhsh
5.26: amhn legw soi ou mh exelyhv ekeiyen ewv an apodwv ton escaton kodranthn
5.28: egw de legw umin oti pav o blepwn gunaika prov to epiyumhsai [authn] hdh emoiceusen authn en th kardia autou
5.29: ei de o ofyalmov sou o dexiov skandalizei se exele auton kai bale apo sou sumferei gar soi ina apolhtai en twn melwn sou kai mh olon to swma sou blhyh eiv geennan
5.30: kai ei h dexia sou ceir skandalizei se ekkoqon authn kai bale apo sou sumferei gar soi ina apolhtai en twn melwn sou kai mh olon to swma sou eiv geennan apelyh
5.31: erreyh de ov an apolush thn gunaika autou dotw auth apostasion
5.32: egw de legw umin oti pav o apoluwn thn gunaika autou parektov logou porneiav poiei authn moiceuyhnai [kai ov ean apolelumenhn gamhsh moicatai]
5.33: palin hkousate oti erreyh toiv arcaioiv ouk epiorkhseiv apodwseiv de tw kuriw touv orkouv sou
5.34: egw de legw umin mh omosai olwv mhte en tw ouranw oti yronov estin tou yeou
5.35: mhte en th gh oti upopodion estin twn podwn autou mhte eiv ierosoluma oti poliv estin tou megalou basilewv
5.36: mhte en th kefalh sou omoshv oti ou dunasai mian trica leukhn poihsai h melainan
5.37: estw de o logov umwn nai nai ou ou to de perisson toutwn ek tou ponhrou estin
5.38: hkousate oti erreyh ofyalmon anti ofyalmou kai odonta anti odontov
5.39: egw de legw umin mh antisthnai tw ponhrw all ostiv se rapizei eiv thn dexian siagona [sou] streqon autw kai thn allhn
5.40: kai tw yelonti soi kriyhnai kai ton citwna sou labein afev autw kai to imation
5.41: kai ostiv se aggareusei milion en upage met autou duo
5.42: tw aitounti se dov kai ton yelonta apo sou danisasyai mh apostrafhv
5.43: hkousate oti erreyh agaphseiv ton plhsion sou kai mishseiv ton ecyron sou
5.44: egw de legw umin agapate touv ecyrouv umwn kai proseucesye uper twn diwkontwn umav
5.45: opwv genhsye uioi tou patrov umwn tou en ouranoiv oti ton hlion autou anatellei epi ponhrouv kai agayouv kai brecei epi dikaiouv kai adikouv
5.46: ean gar agaphshte touv agapwntav umav tina misyon ecete ouci kai oi telwnai to auto poiousin
5.47: kai ean aspashsye touv adelfouv umwn monon ti perisson poieite ouci kai oi eynikoi to auto poiousin
5.48: esesye oun umeiv teleioi wv o pathr umwn o ouraniov teleiov estin

6.1: prosecete [de] thn dikaiosunhn umwn mh poiein emprosyen twn anyrwpwn prov to yeayhnai autoiv ei de mhge misyon ouk ecete para tw patri umwn tw en toiv ouranoiv
6.2: otan oun poihv elehmosunhn mh salpishv emprosyen sou wsper oi upokritai poiousin en taiv sunagwgaiv kai en taiv rumaiv opwv doxasywsin upo twn anyrwpwn amhn legw umin apecousin ton misyon autwn
6.3: sou de poiountov elehmosunhn mh gnwtw h aristera sou ti poiei h dexia sou
6.4: opwv h sou h elehmosunh en tw kruptw kai o pathr sou o blepwn en tw kruptw apodwsei soi
6.5: kai otan proseuchsye ouk esesye wv oi upokritai oti filousin en taiv sunagwgaiv kai en taiv gwniaiv twn plateiwn estwtev proseucesyai opwv fanwsin toiv anyrwpoiv amhn legw umin apecousin ton misyon autwn
6.6: su de otan proseuch eiselye eiv to tameion sou kai kleisav thn yuran sou proseuxai tw patri sou tw en tw kruptw kai o pathr sou o blepwn en tw kruptw apodwsei soi
6.7: proseucomenoi de mh battaloghshte wsper oi eynikoi dokousin gar oti en th polulogia autwn eisakousyhsontai
6.8: mh oun omoiwyhte autoiv oiden gar [o yeov] o pathr umwn wn creian ecete pro tou umav aithsai auton
6.9: outwv oun proseucesye umeiv pater hmwn o en toiv ouranoiv agiasyhtw to onoma sou
6.10: elyatw h basileia sou genhyhtw to yelhma sou wv en ouranw kai epi ghv
6.11: ton arton hmwn ton epiousion dov hmin shmeron
6.12: kai afev hmin ta ofeilhmata hmwn wv kai hmeiv afhkamen toiv ofeiletaiv hmwn
6.13: kai mh eisenegkhv hmav eiv peirasmon alla rusai hmav apo tou ponhrou
6.14: ean gar afhte toiv anyrwpoiv ta paraptwmata autwn afhsei kai umin o pathr umwn o ouraniov
6.15: ean de mh afhte toiv anyrwpoiv [ta paraptwmata autwn] oude o pathr umwn afhsei ta paraptwmata umwn
6.16: otan de nhsteuhte mh ginesye wv oi upokritai skuyrwpoi afanizousin gar ta proswpa autwn opwv fanwsin toiv anyrwpoiv nhsteuontev amhn legw umin apecousin ton misyon autwn
6.17: su de nhsteuwn aleiqai sou thn kefalhn kai to proswpon sou niqai
6.18: opwv mh fanhv toiv anyrwpoiv nhsteuwn alla tw patri sou tw en tw krufaiw kai o pathr sou o blepwn en tw krufaiw apodwsei soi
6.19: mh yhsaurizete umin yhsaurouv epi thv ghv opou shv kai brwsiv afanizei kai opou kleptai diorussousin kai kleptousin
6.20: yhsaurizete de umin yhsaurouv en ouranw opou oute shv oute brwsiv afanizei kai opou kleptai ou diorussousin oude kleptousin
6.21: opou gar estin o yhsaurov sou ekei estai [kai] h kardia sou
6.22: o lucnov tou swmatov estin o ofyalmov ean oun h o ofyalmov sou aplouv olon to swma sou fwteinon estai
6.23: ean de o ofyalmov sou ponhrov h olon to swma sou skoteinon estai ei oun to fwv to en soi skotov estin to skotov poson
6.24: oudeiv dunatai dusin kurioiv douleuein h gar ton ena mishsei kai ton eteron agaphsei h enov anyexetai kai tou eterou katafronhsei ou dunasye yew douleuein kai mamwna
6.25: dia touto legw umin mh merimnate th quch umwn ti faghte [h ti pihte] mhde tw swmati umwn ti endushsye ouci h quch pleion estin thv trofhv kai to swma tou endumatov
6.26: embleqate eiv ta peteina tou ouranou oti ou speirousin oude yerizousin oude sunagousin eiv apoyhkav kai o pathr umwn o ouraniov trefei auta ouc umeiv mallon diaferete autwn
6.27: tiv de ex umwn merimnwn dunatai prosyeinai epi thn hlikian autou phcun ena
6.28: kai peri endumatov ti merimnate katamayete ta krina tou agrou pwv auxanousin ou kopiwsin oude nhyousin
6.29: legw de umin oti oude solomwn en pash th doxh autou periebaleto wv en toutwn
6.30: ei de ton corton tou agrou shmeron onta kai aurion eiv klibanon ballomenon o yeov outwv amfiennusin ou pollw mallon umav oligopistoi
6.31: mh oun merimnhshte legontev ti fagwmen h ti piwmen h ti peribalwmeya
6.32: panta gar tauta ta eynh epizhtousin oiden gar o pathr umwn o ouraniov oti crhzete toutwn apantwn
6.33: zhteite de prwton thn basileian kai thn dikaiosunhn autou kai tauta panta prosteyhsetai umin
6.34: mh oun merimnhshte eiv thn aurion h gar aurion merimnhsei authv arketon th hmera h kakia authv

7.2: en w gar krimati krinete kriyhsesye kai en w metrw metreite metrhyhsetai umin
7.3: ti de blepeiv to karfov to en tw ofyalmw tou adelfou sou thn de en tw sw ofyalmw dokon ou katanoeiv
7.4: h pwv ereiv tw adelfw sou afev ekbalw to karfov ek tou ofyalmou sou kai idou h dokov en tw ofyalmw sou
7.5: upokrita ekbale prwton ek tou ofyalmou sou thn dokon kai tote diableqeiv ekbalein to karfov ek tou ofyalmou tou adelfou sou
7.6: mh dwte to agion toiv kusin mhde balhte touv margaritav umwn emprosyen twn coirwn mhpote katapathsousin autouv en toiv posin autwn kai strafentev rhxwsin umav
7.7: aiteite kai doyhsetai umin zhteite kai eurhsete krouete kai anoighsetai umin
7.8: pav gar o aitwn lambanei kai o zhtwn euriskei kai tw krouonti anoighsetai
7.9: h tiv ex umwn anyrwpov on aithsei o uiov autou arton mh liyon epidwsei autw
7.10: h kai icyun aithsei mh ofin epidwsei autw
7.11: ei oun umeiv ponhroi ontev oidate domata agaya didonai toiv teknoiv umwn posw mallon o pathr umwn o en toiv ouranoiv dwsei agaya toiv aitousin auton
7.12: panta oun osa ean yelhte ina poiwsin umin oi anyrwpoi outwv kai umeiv poieite autoiv outov gar estin o nomov kai oi profhtai
7.13: eiselyate dia thv stenhv pulhv oti plateia kai eurucwrov h odov h apagousa eiv thn apwleian kai polloi eisin oi eisercomenoi di authv
7.14: oti stenh h pulh kai teylimmenh h odov h apagousa eiv thn zwhn kai oligoi eisin oi euriskontev authn
7.15: prosecete apo twn qeudoprofhtwn oitinev ercontai prov umav en endumasin probatwn eswyen de eisin lukoi arpagev
7.16: apo twn karpwn autwn epignwsesye autouv mhti sullegousin apo akanywn stafulav h apo tribolwn suka
7.17: outwv pan dendron agayon karpouv kalouv poiei to de sapron dendron karpouv ponhrouv poiei
7.18: ou dunatai dendron agayon karpouv ponhrouv enegkein oude dendron sapron karpouv kalouv poiein
7.19: pan dendron mh poioun karpon kalon ekkoptetai kai eiv pur balletai
7.20: arage apo twn karpwn autwn epignwsesye autouv
7.21: ou pav o legwn moi kurie kurie eiseleusetai eiv thn basileian twn ouranwn all o poiwn to yelhma tou patrov mou tou en toiv ouranoiv
7.22: polloi erousin moi en ekeinh th hmera kurie kurie ou tw sw onomati eprofhteusamen kai tw sw onomati daimonia exebalomen kai tw sw onomati dunameiv pollav epoihsamen
7.23: kai tote omologhsw autoiv oti oudepote egnwn umav apocwreite ap emou oi ergazomenoi thn anomian
7.24: pav oun ostiv akouei mou touv logouv [toutouv] kai poiei autouv omoiwyhsetai andri fronimw ostiv wkodomhsen autou thn oikian epi thn petran
7.25: kai katebh h broch kai hlyan oi potamoi kai epneusan oi anemoi kai prosepesan th oikia ekeinh kai ouk epesen teyemeliwto gar epi thn petran
7.26: kai pav o akouwn mou touv logouv toutouv kai mh poiwn autouv omoiwyhsetai andri mwrw ostiv wkodomhsen autou thn oikian epi thn ammon
7.27: kai katebh h broch kai hlyan oi potamoi kai epneusan oi anemoi kai prosekoqan th oikia ekeinh kai epesen kai hn h ptwsiv authv megalh
7.28: kai egeneto ote etelesen o ihsouv touv logouv toutouv exeplhssonto oi ocloi epi th didach autou
7.29: hn gar didaskwn autouv wv exousian ecwn kai ouc wv oi grammateiv autwn

8.1: katabantov de autou apo tou orouv hkolouyhsan autw ocloi polloi
8.2: kai idou leprov proselywn prosekunei autw legwn kurie ean yelhv dunasai me kayarisai
8.3: kai ekteinav thn ceira hqato autou legwn yelw kayarisyhti kai euyewv ekayarisyh autou h lepra
8.4: kai legei autw o ihsouv ora mhdeni eiphv alla upage seauton deixon tw ierei kai prosenegkon to dwron o prosetaxen mwushv eiv marturion autoiv
8.5: eiselyontov de autou eiv kafarnaoum proshlyen autw ekatontarcov parakalwn auton
8.6: kai legwn kurie o paiv mou beblhtai en th oikia paralutikov deinwv basanizomenov
8.7: legei autw egw elywn yerapeusw auton
8.8: apokriyeiv de o ekatontarcov efh kurie ouk eimi ikanov ina mou upo thn steghn eiselyhv alla monon eipe logw kai iayhsetai o paiv mou
8.9: kai gar egw anyrwpov eimi upo exousian [tassomenov] ecwn up emauton stratiwtav kai legw toutw poreuyhti kai poreuetai kai allw ercou kai ercetai kai tw doulw mou poihson touto kai poiei
8.10: akousav de o ihsouv eyaumasen kai eipen toiv akolouyousin amhn legw umin par oudeni tosauthn pistin en tw israhl euron
8.11: legw de umin oti polloi apo anatolwn kai dusmwn hxousin kai anakliyhsontai meta abraam kai isaak kai iakwb en th basileia twn ouranwn
8.12: oi de uioi thv basileiav ekblhyhsontai eiv to skotov to exwteron ekei estai o klauymov kai o brugmov twn odontwn
8.13: kai eipen o ihsouv tw ekatontarch upage wv episteusav genhyhtw soi kai iayh o paiv en th wra ekeinh
8.14: kai elywn o ihsouv eiv thn oikian petrou eiden thn penyeran autou beblhmenhn kai puressousan
8.15: kai hqato thv ceirov authv kai afhken authn o puretov kai hgeryh kai dihkonei autw
8.16: oqiav de genomenhv proshnegkan autw daimonizomenouv pollouv kai exebalen ta pneumata logw kai pantav touv kakwv econtav eyerapeusen
8.17: opwv plhrwyh to rhyen dia hsaiou tou profhtou legontov autov tav asyeneiav hmwn elaben kai tav nosouv ebastasen
8.18: idwn de o ihsouv oclon peri auton ekeleusen apelyein eiv to peran
8.19: kai proselywn eiv grammateuv eipen autw didaskale akolouyhsw soi opou ean aperch
8.20: kai legei autw o ihsouv ai alwpekev fwleouv ecousin kai ta peteina tou ouranou kataskhnwseiv o de uiov tou anyrwpou ouk ecei pou thn kefalhn klinh
8.21: eterov de twn mayhtwn eipen autw kurie epitreqon moi prwton apelyein kai yaqai ton patera mou
8.22: o de ihsouv legei autw akolouyei moi kai afev touv nekrouv yaqai touv eautwn nekrouv
8.23: kai embanti autw eiv ploion hkolouyhsan autw oi mayhtai autou
8.24: kai idou seismov megav egeneto en th yalassh wste to ploion kaluptesyai upo twn kumatwn autov de ekayeuden
8.25: kai proselyontev hgeiran auton legontev kurie swson apollumeya
8.26: kai legei autoiv ti deiloi este oligopistoi tote egeryeiv epetimhsen toiv anemoiv kai th yalassh kai egeneto galhnh megalh
8.27: oi de anyrwpoi eyaumasan legontev potapov estin outov oti kai oi anemoi kai h yalassa autw upakouousin
8.28: kai elyontov autou eiv to peran eiv thn cwran twn gadarhnwn uphnthsan autw duo daimonizomenoi ek twn mnhmeiwn exercomenoi calepoi lian wste mh iscuein tina parelyein dia thv odou ekeinhv
8.29: kai idou ekraxan legontev ti hmin kai soi uie tou yeou hlyev wde pro kairou basanisai hmav
8.30: hn de makran ap autwn agelh coirwn pollwn boskomenh
8.31: oi de daimonev parekaloun auton legontev ei ekballeiv hmav aposteilon hmav eiv thn agelhn twn coirwn
8.32: kai eipen autoiv upagete oi de exelyontev aphlyan eiv touv coirouv kai idou wrmhsen pasa h agelh kata tou krhmnou eiv thn yalassan kai apeyanon en toiv udasin
8.33: oi de boskontev efugon kai apelyontev eiv thn polin aphggeilan panta kai ta twn daimonizomenwn
8.34: kai idou pasa h poliv exhlyen eiv upanthsin tw ihsou kai idontev auton parekalesan opwv metabh apo twn oriwn autwn

9.1: kai embav eiv ploion dieperasen kai hlyen eiv thn idian polin
9.2: kai idou proseferon autw paralutikon epi klinhv beblhmenon kai idwn o ihsouv thn pistin autwn eipen tw paralutikw yarsei teknon afientai sou ai amartiai
9.3: kai idou tinev twn grammatewn eipan en eautoiv outov blasfhmei
9.4: kai eidwv o ihsouv tav enyumhseiv autwn eipen ina ti enyumeisye ponhra en taiv kardiaiv umwn
9.5: ti gar estin eukopwteron eipein afientai sou ai amartiai h eipein egeire kai peripatei
9.6: ina de eidhte oti exousian ecei o uiov tou anyrwpou epi thv ghv afienai amartiav tote legei tw paralutikw egeire aron sou thn klinhn kai upage eiv ton oikon sou
9.7: kai egeryeiv aphlyen eiv ton oikon autou
9.8: idontev de oi ocloi efobhyhsan kai edoxasan ton yeon ton donta exousian toiauthn toiv anyrwpoiv
9.9: kai paragwn o ihsouv ekeiyen eiden anyrwpon kayhmenon epi to telwnion mayyaion legomenon kai legei autw akolouyei moi kai anastav hkolouyhsen autw
9.10: kai egeneto autou anakeimenou en th oikia kai idou polloi telwnai kai amartwloi elyontev sunanekeinto tw ihsou kai toiv mayhtaiv autou
9.11: kai idontev oi farisaioi elegon toiv mayhtaiv autou dia ti meta twn telwnwn kai amartwlwn esyiei o didaskalov umwn
9.12: o de akousav eipen ou creian ecousin oi iscuontev iatrou alla oi kakwv econtev
9.13: poreuyentev de mayete ti estin eleov yelw kai ou yusian ou gar hlyon kalesai dikaiouv alla amartwlouv
9.14: tote prosercontai autw oi mayhtai iwannou legontev dia ti hmeiv kai oi farisaioi nhsteuomen oi de mayhtai sou ou nhsteuousin
9.15: kai eipen autoiv o ihsouv mh dunantai oi uioi tou numfwnov penyein ef oson met autwn estin o numfiov eleusontai de hmerai otan aparyh ap autwn o numfiov kai tote nhsteusousin
9.16: oudeiv de epiballei epiblhma rakouv agnafou epi imatiw palaiw airei gar to plhrwma autou apo tou imatiou kai ceiron scisma ginetai
9.17: oude ballousin oinon neon eiv askouv palaiouv ei de mhge rhgnuntai oi askoi kai o oinov ekceitai kai oi askoi apolluntai alla ballousin oinon neon eiv askouv kainouv kai amfoteroi sunthrountai
9.18: tauta autou lalountov autoiv idou arcwn [eiv] proselywn prosekunei autw legwn oti h yugathr mou arti eteleuthsen alla elywn epiyev thn ceira sou ep authn kai zhsetai
9.19: kai egeryeiv o ihsouv hkolouyei autw kai oi mayhtai autou
9.20: kai idou gunh aimorroousa dwdeka eth proselyousa opisyen hqato tou kraspedou tou imatiou autou
9.21: elegen gar en eauth ean monon aqwmai tou imatiou autou swyhsomai
9.22: o de ihsouv strafeiv kai idwn authn eipen yarsei yugater h pistiv sou seswken se kai eswyh h gunh apo thv wrav ekeinhv
9.23: kai elywn o ihsouv eiv thn oikian tou arcontov kai idwn touv aulhtav kai ton oclon yoruboumenon
9.24: elegen anacwreite ou gar apeyanen to korasion alla kayeudei kai kategelwn autou
9.25: ote de exeblhyh o oclov eiselywn ekrathsen thv ceirov authv kai hgeryh to korasion
9.26: kai exhlyen h fhmh auth eiv olhn thn ghn ekeinhn
9.27: kai paragonti ekeiyen tw ihsou hkolouyhsan duo tufloi krazontev kai legontev elehson hmav uie dauid
9.28: elyonti de eiv thn oikian proshlyan autw oi tufloi kai legei autoiv o ihsouv pisteuete oti dunamai touto poihsai legousin autw nai kurie
9.29: tote hqato twn ofyalmwn autwn legwn kata thn pistin umwn genhyhtw umin
9.30: kai hnewcyhsan autwn oi ofyalmoi kai enebrimhyh autoiv o ihsouv legwn orate mhdeiv ginwsketw
9.31: oi de exelyontev diefhmisan auton en olh th gh ekeinh
9.32: autwn de exercomenwn idou proshnegkan autw kwfon daimonizomenon
9.33: kai ekblhyentov tou daimoniou elalhsen o kwfov kai eyaumasan oi ocloi legontev oudepote efanh outwv en tw israhl
9.34: [oi de farisaioi elegon en tw arconti twn daimoniwn ekballei ta daimonia]
9.35: kai perihgen o ihsouv tav poleiv pasav kai tav kwmav didaskwn en taiv sunagwgaiv autwn kai khrusswn to euaggelion thv basileiav kai yerapeuwn pasan noson kai pasan malakian
9.36: idwn de touv oclouv esplagcnisyh peri autwn oti hsan eskulmenoi kai errimmenoi wsei probata mh econta poimena
9.37: tote legei toiv mayhtaiv autou o men yerismov poluv oi de ergatai oligoi
9.38: dehyhte oun tou kuriou tou yerismou opwv ekbalh ergatav eiv ton yerismon autou

10.1: kai proskalesamenov touv dwdeka mayhtav autou edwken autoiv exousian pneumatwn akayartwn wste ekballein auta kai yerapeuein pasan noson kai pasan malakian

13.1: en th hmera ekeinh exelywn o ihsouv thv oikiav ekayhto para thn yalassan
13.2: kai sunhcyhsan prov auton ocloi polloi wste auton eiv ploion embanta kayhsyai kai pav o oclov epi ton aigialon isthkei
13.3: kai elalhsen autoiv polla en parabolaiv legwn idou exhlyen o speirwn tou speirein
13.4: kai en tw speirein auton a men epesen para thn odon kai elyonta ta peteina katefagen auta

13.7: alla de epesen epi tav akanyav kai anebhsan ai akanyai kai apepnixan auta

13.10: kai proselyontev oi mayhtai eipan autw dia ti en parabolaiv laleiv autoiv
13.11: o de apokriyeiv eipen oti umin dedotai gnwnai ta musthria thv basileiav twn ouranwn ekeinoiv de ou dedotai

13.13: dia touto en parabolaiv autoiv lalw oti blepontev ou blepousin kai akouontev ouk akouousin oude suniousin
13.14: kai anaplhroutai autoiv h profhteia hsaiou h legousa akoh akousete kai ou mh sunhte kai blepontev bleqete kai ou mh idhte
13.15: epacunyh gar h kardia tou laou toutou kai toiv wsin barewv hkousan kai touv ofyalmouv autwn ekammusan mhpote idwsin toiv ofyalmoiv kai toiv wsin akouswsin kai th kardia sunwsin kai epistreqwsin kai iasomai autouv
13.16: umwn de makarioi oi ofyalmoi oti blepousin kai ta wta [umwn] oti akouousin
13.17: amhn gar legw umin oti polloi profhtai kai dikaioi epeyumhsan idein a blepete kai ouk eidan kai akousai a akouete kai ouk hkousan

13.19: pantov akouontov ton logon thv basileiav kai mh sunientov ercetai o ponhrov kai arpazei to esparmenon en th kardia autou outov estin o para thn odon spareiv
13.20: o de epi ta petrwdh spareiv outov estin o ton logon akouwn kai euyuv meta carav lambanwn auton
13.21: ouk ecei de rizan en eautw alla proskairov estin genomenhv de yliqewv h diwgmou dia ton logon euyuv skandalizetai
13.22: o de eiv tav akanyav spareiv outov estin o ton logon akouwn kai h merimna tou aiwnov kai h apath tou ploutou sumpnigei ton logon kai akarpov ginetai
13.23: o de epi thn kalhn ghn spareiv outov estin o ton logon akouwn kai sunieiv ov dh karpoforei kai poiei o men ekaton o de exhkonta o de triakonta
13.24: allhn parabolhn pareyhken autoiv legwn wmoiwyh h basileia twn ouranwn anyrwpw speiranti kalon sperma en tw agrw autou
13.25: en de tw kayeudein touv anyrwpouv hlyen autou o ecyrov kai epespeiren zizania ana meson tou sitou kai aphlyen
13.26: ote de eblasthsen o cortov kai karpon epoihsen tote efanh kai ta zizania
13.27: proselyontev de oi douloi tou oikodespotou eipon autw kurie ouci kalon sperma espeirav en tw sw agrw poyen oun ecei zizania
13.28: o de efh autoiv ecyrov anyrwpov touto epoihsen oi de autw legousin yeleiv oun apelyontev sullexwmen auta
13.29: o de fhsin ou mhpote sullegontev ta zizania ekrizwshte ama autoiv ton siton
13.30: afete sunauxanesyai amfotera ewv tou yerismou kai en kairw tou yerismou erw toiv yeristaiv sullexate prwton ta zizania kai dhsate auta [eiv] desmav prov to katakausai auta ton de siton sunagete eiv thn apoyhkhn mou
13.31: allhn parabolhn pareyhken autoiv legwn omoia estin h basileia twn ouranwn kokkw sinapewv on labwn anyrwpov espeiren en tw agrw autou
13.32: o mikroteron men estin pantwn twn spermatwn otan de auxhyh meizon twn lacanwn estin kai ginetai dendron wste elyein ta peteina tou ouranou kai kataskhnoin en toiv kladoiv autou
13.33: allhn parabolhn [elalhsen autoiv] omoia estin h basileia twn ouranwn zumh hn labousa gunh enekruqen eiv aleurou sata tria ewv ou ezumwyh olon
13.34: tauta panta elalhsen o ihsouv en parabolaiv toiv ocloiv kai cwriv parabolhv ouden elalei autoiv
13.35: opwv plhrwyh to rhyen dia tou profhtou legontov anoixw en parabolaiv to stoma mou ereuxomai kekrummena apo katabolhv

13.37: o de apokriyeiv eipen o speirwn to kalon sperma estin o uiov tou anyrwpou
13.38: o de agrov estin o kosmov to de kalon sperma outoi eisin oi uioi thv basileiav ta de zizania eisin oi uioi tou ponhrou
13.39: o de ecyrov o speirav auta estin o diabolov o de yerismov sunteleia aiwnov estin oi de yeristai aggeloi eisin
13.40: wsper oun sullegetai ta zizania kai puri katakaietai outwv estai en th sunteleia tou aiwnov
13.41: apostelei o uiov tou anyrwpou touv aggelouv autou kai sullexousin ek thv basileiav autou panta ta skandala kai touv poiountav thn anomian
13.42: kai balousin autouv eiv thn kaminon tou purov ekei estai o klauymov kai o brugmov twn odontwn
13.43: tote oi dikaioi eklamqousin wv o hliov en th basileia tou patrov autwn o ecwn wta akouetw
13.44: omoia estin h basileia twn ouranwn yhsaurw kekrummenw en tw agrw on eurwn anyrwpov ekruqen kai apo thv carav autou upagei kai pwlei osa ecei kai agorazei ton agron ekeinon
13.45: palin omoia estin h basileia twn ouranwn emporw zhtounti kalouv margaritav
13.46: eurwn de ena polutimon margarithn apelywn pepraken panta osa eicen kai hgorasen auton
13.47: palin omoia estin h basileia twn ouranwn saghnh blhyeish eiv thn yalassan kai ek pantov genouv sunagagoush
13.48: hn ote eplhrwyh anabibasantev epi ton aigialon kai kayisantev sunelexan ta kala eiv aggh ta de sapra exw ebalon
13.49: outwv estai en th sunteleia tou aiwnov exeleusontai oi aggeloi kai aforiousin touv ponhrouv ek mesou twn dikaiwn
13.50: kai balousin autouv eiv thn kaminon tou purov ekei estai o klauymov kai o brugmov twn odontwn
13.51: sunhkate tauta panta legousin autw nai
13.52: o de eipen autoiv dia touto pav grammateuv mayhteuyeiv th basileia twn ouranwn omoiov estin anyrwpw oikodespoth ostiv ekballei ek tou yhsaurou autou kaina kai palaia
13.53: kai egeneto ote etelesen o ihsouv tav parabolav tautav methren ekeiyen
13.54: kai elywn eiv thn patrida autou edidasken autouv en th sunagwgh autwn wste ekplhssesyai autouv kai legein poyen toutw h sofia auth kai ai dunameiv
13.55: ouc outov estin o tou tektonov uiov ouc h mhthr autou legetai mariam kai oi adelfoi autou iakwbov kai iwshf kai simwn kai ioudav
13.56: kai ai adelfai autou ouci pasai prov hmav eisin poyen oun toutw tauta panta
13.57: kai eskandalizonto en autw o de ihsouv eipen autoiv ouk estin profhthv atimov ei mh en th patridi kai en th oikia autou
13.58: kai ouk epoihsen ekei dunameiv pollav dia thn apistian autwn

14.1: en ekeinw tw kairw hkousen hrwdhv o tetraarchv thn akohn ihsou
14.2: kai eipen toiv paisin autou outov estin iwannhv o baptisthv autov hgeryh apo twn nekrwn kai dia touto ai dunameiv energousin en autw
14.3: o gar hrwdhv krathsav ton iwannhn edhsen kai en fulakh apeyeto dia hrwdiada thn gunaika filippou tou adelfou autou
14.4: elegen gar o iwannhv autw ouk exestin soi ecein authn
14.5: kai yelwn auton apokteinai efobhyh ton oclon oti wv profhthn auton eicon
14.6: genesioiv de genomenoiv tou hrwdou wrchsato h yugathr thv hrwdiadov en tw mesw kai hresen tw hrwdh
14.7: oyen meta orkou wmologhsen auth dounai o ean aithshtai
14.8: h de probibasyeisa upo thv mhtrov authv dov moi fhsin wde epi pinaki thn kefalhn iwannou tou baptistou
14.9: kai luphyeiv o basileuv dia touv orkouv kai touv sunanakeimenouv ekeleusen doyhnai
14.10: kai pemqav apekefalisen iwannhn en th fulakh
14.11: kai hnecyh h kefalh autou epi pinaki kai edoyh tw korasiw kai hnegken th mhtri authv
14.12: kai proselyontev oi mayhtai autou hran to ptwma kai eyaqan auton kai elyontev aphggeilan tw ihsou
14.13: akousav de o ihsouv anecwrhsen ekeiyen en ploiw eiv erhmon topon kat idian kai akousantev oi ocloi hkolouyhsan autw pezh apo twn polewn
14.14: kai exelywn eiden polun oclon kai esplagcnisyh ep autoiv kai eyerapeusen touv arrwstouv autwn
14.15: oqiav de genomenhv proshlyan autw oi mayhtai legontev erhmov estin o topov kai h wra hdh parhlyen apoluson touv oclouv ina apelyontev eiv tav kwmav agoraswsin eautoiv brwmata
14.16: o de ihsouv eipen autoiv ou creian ecousin apelyein dote autoiv umeiv fagein
14.17: oi de legousin autw ouk ecomen wde ei mh pente artouv kai duo icyuav
14.18: o de eipen ferete moi wde autouv
14.19: kai keleusav touv oclouv anakliyhnai epi tou cortou labwn touv pente artouv kai touv duo icyuav anableqav eiv ton ouranon euloghsen kai klasav edwken toiv mayhtaiv touv artouv oi de mayhtai toiv ocloiv
14.20: kai efagon pantev kai ecortasyhsan kai hran to perisseuon twn klasmatwn dwdeka kofinouv plhreiv
14.21: oi de esyiontev hsan andrev wsei pentakiscilioi cwriv gunaikwn kai paidiwn
14.22: kai [euyewv] hnagkasen touv mayhtav embhnai eiv ploion kai proagein auton eiv to peran ewv ou apolush touv oclouv
14.23: kai apolusav touv oclouv anebh eiv to orov kat idian proseuxasyai oqiav de genomenhv monov hn ekei
14.24: to de ploion hdh stadiouv pollouv apo thv ghv apeicen basanizomenon upo twn kumatwn hn gar enantiov o anemov
14.25: tetarth de fulakh thv nuktov hlyen prov autouv peripatwn epi thn yalassan
14.26: oi de mayhtai idontev auton epi thv yalasshv peripatounta etaracyhsan legontev oti fantasma estin kai apo tou fobou ekraxan
14.27: euyuv de elalhsen [o ihsouv] autoiv legwn yarseite egw eimi mh fobeisye
14.28: apokriyeiv de o petrov eipen autw kurie ei su ei keleuson me elyein prov se epi ta udata
14.29: o de eipen elye kai katabav apo tou ploiou petrov periepathsen epi ta udata kai hlyen prov ton ihsoun
14.30: blepwn de ton anemon efobhyh kai arxamenov katapontizesyai ekraxen legwn kurie swson me
14.31: euyewv de o ihsouv ekteinav thn ceira epelabeto autou kai legei autw oligopiste eiv ti edistasav
14.32: kai anabantwn autwn eiv to ploion ekopasen o anemov
14.33: oi de en tw ploiw prosekunhsan autw legontev alhywv yeou uiov ei
14.34: kai diaperasantev hlyan epi thn ghn eiv gennhsaret
14.35: kai epignontev auton oi andrev tou topou ekeinou apesteilan eiv olhn thn pericwron ekeinhn kai proshnegkan autw pantav touv kakwv econtav
14.36: kai parekaloun [auton] ina monon aqwntai tou kraspedou tou imatiou autou kai osoi hqanto dieswyhsan

15.1: tote prosercontai tw ihsou apo ierosolumwn farisaioi kai grammateiv legontev
15.2: dia ti oi mayhtai sou parabainousin thn paradosin twn presbuterwn ou gar niptontai tav ceirav otan arton esyiwsin
15.3: o de apokriyeiv eipen autoiv dia ti kai umeiv parabainete thn entolhn tou yeou dia thn paradosin umwn
15.4: o gar yeov eipen tima ton patera kai thn mhtera kai o kakologwn patera h mhtera yanatw teleutatw
15.5: umeiv de legete ov an eiph tw patri h th mhtri dwron o ean ex emou wfelhyhv ou mh timhsei ton patera autou
15.6: kai hkurwsate ton logon tou yeou dia thn paradosin umwn
15.7: upokritai kalwv eprofhteusen peri umwn hsaiav legwn
15.8: o laov outov toiv ceilesin me tima h de kardia autwn porrw apecei ap emou
15.9: mathn de sebontai me didaskontev didaskaliav entalmata anyrwpwn
15.10: kai proskalesamenov ton oclon eipen autoiv akouete kai suniete
15.11: ou to eisercomenon eiv to stoma koinoi ton anyrwpon alla to ekporeuomenon ek tou stomatov touto koinoi ton anyrwpon
15.12: tote proselyontev oi mayhtai legousin autw oidav oti oi farisaioi akousantev ton logon eskandalisyhsan
15.13: o de apokriyeiv eipen pasa futeia hn ouk efuteusen o pathr mou o ouraniov ekrizwyhsetai
15.14: afete autouv tufloi eisin odhgoi tuflov de tuflon ean odhgh amfoteroi eiv boyunon pesountai
15.15: apokriyeiv de o petrov eipen autw frason hmin thn parabolhn
15.16: o de eipen akmhn kai umeiv asunetoi este
15.17: ou noeite oti pan to eisporeuomenon eiv to stoma eiv thn koilian cwrei kai eiv afedrwna ekballetai
15.18: ta de ekporeuomena ek tou stomatov ek thv kardiav exercetai kakeina koinoi ton anyrwpon
15.19: ek gar thv kardiav exercontai dialogismoi ponhroi fonoi moiceiai porneiai klopai qeudomarturiai blasfhmiai
15.20: tauta estin ta koinounta ton anyrwpon to de aniptoiv cersin fagein ou koinoi ton anyrwpon
15.21: kai exelywn ekeiyen o ihsouv anecwrhsen eiv ta merh turou kai sidwnov
15.22: kai idou gunh cananaia apo twn oriwn ekeinwn exelyousa ekrazen legousa elehson me kurie uiov dauid h yugathr mou kakwv daimonizetai
15.23: o de ouk apekriyh auth logon kai proselyontev oi mayhtai autou hrwtoun auton legontev apoluson authn oti krazei opisyen hmwn
15.24: o de apokriyeiv eipen ouk apestalhn ei mh eiv ta probata ta apolwlota oikou israhl
15.25: h de elyousa prosekunei autw legousa kurie bohyei moi
15.26: o de apokriyeiv eipen ouk estin kalon labein ton arton twn teknwn kai balein toiv kunarioiv
15.27: h de eipen nai kurie kai [gar] ta kunaria esyiei apo twn qiciwn twn piptontwn apo thv trapezhv twn kuriwn autwn
15.28: tote apokriyeiv o ihsouv eipen auth w gunai megalh sou h pistiv genhyhtw soi wv yeleiv kai iayh h yugathr authv apo thv wrav ekeinhv
15.29: kai metabav ekeiyen o ihsouv hlyen para thn yalassan thv galilaiav kai anabav eiv to orov ekayhto ekei
15.30: kai proshlyon autw ocloi polloi econtev mey eautwn cwlouv kullouv tuflouv kwfouv kai eterouv pollouv kai erriqan autouv para touv podav autou kai eyerapeusen autouv
15.31: wste ton oclon yaumasai blepontav kwfouv lalountav kai cwlouv peripatountav kai tuflouv blepontav kai edoxasan ton yeon israhl
15.32: o de ihsouv proskalesamenov touv mayhtav autou eipen splagcnizomai epi ton oclon oti [hdh] hmerai treiv prosmenousin moi kai ouk ecousin ti fagwsin kai apolusai autouv nhsteiv ou yelw mhpote ekluywsin en th odw
15.33: kai legousin autw oi mayhtai poyen hmin en erhmia artoi tosoutoi wste cortasai oclon tosouton
15.34: kai legei autoiv o ihsouv posouv artouv ecete oi de eipan epta kai oliga icyudia
15.35: kai paraggeilav tw oclw anapesein epi thn ghn
15.36: elaben touv epta artouv kai touv icyuav kai eucaristhsav eklasen kai edidou toiv mayhtaiv oi de mayhtai toiv ocloiv
15.37: kai efagon pantev kai ecortasyhsan kai to perisseuon twn klasmatwn hran epta sfuridav plhreiv
15.38: oi de esyiontev hsan tetrakiscilioi andrev cwriv gunaikwn kai paidiwn
15.39: kai apolusav touv oclouv enebh eiv to ploion kai hlyen eiv ta oria magadan

16.1: kai proselyontev [oi] farisaioi kai saddoukaioi peirazontev ephrwthsan auton shmeion ek tou ouranou epideixai autoiv
16.2: o de apokriyeiv eipen autoiv [[oqiav genomenhv legete eudia purrazei gar o ouranov
16.3: kai prwi shmeron ceimwn purrazei gar stugnazwn o ouranov to men proswpon tou ouranou ginwskete diakrinein ta de shmeia twn kairwn ou dunasye]]
16.4: genea ponhra kai moicaliv shmeion epizhtei kai shmeion ou doyhsetai auth ei mh to shmeion iwna kai katalipwn autouv aphlyen
16.5: kai elyontev oi mayhtai eiv to peran epelayonto artouv labein
16.6: o de ihsouv eipen autoiv orate kai prosecete apo thv zumhv twn farisaiwn kai saddoukaiwn
16.7: oi de dielogizonto en eautoiv legontev oti artouv ouk elabomen
16.8: gnouv de o ihsouv eipen ti dialogizesye en eautoiv oligopistoi oti artouv ouk ecete
16.9: oupw noeite oude mnhmoneuete touv pente artouv twn pentakisciliwn kai posouv kofinouv elabete
16.10: oude touv epta artouv twn tetrakisciliwn kai posav sfuridav elabete
16.11: pwv ou noeite oti ou peri artwn eipon umin prosecete de apo thv zumhv twn farisaiwn kai saddoukaiwn
16.12: tote sunhkan oti ouk eipen prosecein apo thv zumhv [twn artwn] alla apo thv didachv twn farisaiwn kai saddoukaiwn
16.13: elywn de o ihsouv eiv ta merh kaisariav thv filippou hrwta touv mayhtav autou legwn tina legousin oi anyrwpoi einai ton uion tou anyrwpou
16.14: oi de eipan oi men iwannhn ton baptisthn alloi de hlian eteroi de ieremian h ena twn profhtwn
16.15: legei autoiv umeiv de tina me legete einai
16.16: apokriyeiv de simwn petrov eipen su ei o cristov o uiov tou yeou tou zwntov
16.17: apokriyeiv de o ihsouv eipen autw makariov ei simwn bariwna oti sarx kai aima ouk apekaluqen soi all o pathr mou o en [toiv] ouranoiv
16.18: kagw de soi legw oti su ei petrov kai epi tauth th petra oikodomhsw mou thn ekklhsian kai pulai adou ou katiscusousin authv
16.19: dwsw soi tav kleidav thv basileiav twn ouranwn kai o ean dhshv epi thv ghv estai dedemenon en toiv ouranoiv kai o ean lushv epi thv ghv estai lelumenon en toiv ouranoiv
16.20: tote epetimhsen toiv mayhtaiv ina mhdeni eipwsin oti autov estin o cristov
16.21: apo tote hrxato ihsouv cristov deiknuein toiv mayhtaiv autou oti dei auton eiv ierosoluma apelyein kai polla payein apo twn presbuterwn kai arcierewn kai grammatewn kai apoktanyhnai kai th trith hmera egeryhnai
16.22: kai proslabomenov auton o petrov hrxato epitiman autw legwn ilewv soi kurie ou mh estai soi touto
16.23: o de strafeiv eipen tw petrw upage opisw mou satana skandalon ei emou oti ou froneiv ta tou yeou alla ta twn anyrwpwn
16.24: tote [o] ihsouv eipen toiv mayhtaiv autou ei tiv yelei opisw mou elyein aparnhsasyw eauton kai aratw ton stauron autou kai akolouyeitw moi
16.25: ov gar ean yelh thn quchn autou swsai apolesei authn ov d an apolesh thn quchn autou eneken emou eurhsei authn
16.26: ti gar wfelhyhsetai anyrwpov ean ton kosmon olon kerdhsh thn de quchn autou zhmiwyh h ti dwsei anyrwpov antallagma thv quchv autou
16.27: mellei gar o uiov tou anyrwpou ercesyai en th doxh tou patrov autou meta twn aggelwn autou kai tote apodwsei ekastw kata thn praxin autou
16.28: amhn legw umin oti eisin tinev twn wde estwtwn oitinev ou mh geuswntai yanatou ewv an idwsin ton uion tou anyrwpou ercomenon en th basileia autou

17.1: kai mey hmerav ex paralambanei o ihsouv ton petron kai iakwbon kai iwannhn ton adelfon autou kai anaferei autouv eiv orov uqhlon kat idian
17.2: kai metemorfwyh emprosyen autwn kai elamqen to proswpon autou wv o hliov ta de imatia autou egeneto leuka wv to fwv
17.3: kai idou wfyh autoiv mwushv kai hliav sullalountev met autou
17.4: apokriyeiv de o petrov eipen tw ihsou kurie kalon estin hmav wde einai ei yeleiv poihsw wde treiv skhnav soi mian kai mwusei mian kai hlia mian
17.5: eti autou lalountov idou nefelh fwteinh epeskiasen autouv kai idou fwnh ek thv nefelhv legousa outov estin o uiov mou o agaphtov en w eudokhsa akouete autou
17.6: kai akousantev oi mayhtai epesan epi proswpon autwn kai efobhyhsan sfodra
17.7: kai proshlyen o ihsouv kai aqamenov autwn eipen egeryhte kai mh fobeisye
17.8: eparantev de touv ofyalmouv autwn oudena eidon ei mh auton ihsoun monon
17.9: kai katabainontwn autwn ek tou orouv eneteilato autoiv o ihsouv legwn mhdeni eiphte to orama ewv ou o uiov tou anyrwpou ek nekrwn egeryh
17.10: kai ephrwthsan auton oi mayhtai legontev ti oun oi grammateiv legousin oti hlian dei elyein prwton
17.11: o de apokriyeiv eipen hliav men ercetai kai apokatasthsei panta
17.12: legw de umin oti hliav hdh hlyen kai ouk epegnwsan auton alla epoihsan en autw osa hyelhsan outwv kai o uiov tou anyrwpou mellei pascein up autwn
17.13: tote sunhkan oi mayhtai oti peri iwannou tou baptistou eipen autoiv
17.14: kai elyontwn prov ton oclon proshlyen autw anyrwpov gonupetwn auton
17.15: kai legwn kurie elehson mou ton uion oti selhniazetai kai kakwv ecei pollakiv gar piptei eiv to pur kai pollakiv eiv to udwr
17.16: kai proshnegka auton toiv mayhtaiv sou kai ouk hdunhyhsan auton yerapeusai
17.17: apokriyeiv de o ihsouv eipen w genea apistov kai diestrammenh ewv pote mey umwn esomai ewv pote anexomai umwn ferete moi auton wde
17.18: kai epetimhsen autw o ihsouv kai exhlyen ap autou to daimonion kai eyerapeuyh o paiv apo thv wrav ekeinhv
17.19: tote proselyontev oi mayhtai tw ihsou kat idian eipan dia ti hmeiv ouk hdunhyhmen ekbalein auto
17.20: o de legei autoiv dia thn oligopistian umwn amhn gar legw umin ean echte pistin wv kokkon sinapewv ereite tw orei toutw metaba enyen ekei kai metabhsetai kai ouden adunathsei umin 17:21
17.22: sustrefomenwn de autwn en th galilaia eipen autoiv o ihsouv mellei o uiov tou anyrwpou paradidosyai eiv ceirav anyrwpwn
17.23: kai apoktenousin auton kai th trith hmera egeryhsetai kai eluphyhsan sfodra
17.24: elyontwn de autwn eiv kafarnaoum proshlyon oi ta didracma lambanontev tw petrw kai eipan o didaskalov umwn ou telei ta didracma
17.25: legei nai kai elyonta eiv thn oikian proefyasen auton o ihsouv legwn ti soi dokei simwn oi basileiv thv ghv apo tinwn lambanousin telh h khnson apo twn uiwn autwn h apo twn allotriwn
17.26: eipontov de apo twn allotriwn efh autw o ihsouv arage eleuyeroi eisin oi uioi
17.27: ina de mh skandaliswmen autouv poreuyeiv eiv yalassan bale agkistron kai ton anabanta prwton icyun aron kai anoixav to stoma autou eurhseiv stathra ekeinon labwn dov autoiv anti emou kai sou

18.1: en ekeinh th wra proshlyon oi mayhtai tw ihsou legontev tiv ara meizwn estin en th basileia twn ouranwn
18.2: kai proskalesamenov paidion esthsen auto en mesw autwn
18.3: kai eipen amhn legw umin ean mh strafhte kai genhsye wv ta paidia ou mh eiselyhte eiv thn basileian twn ouranwn
18.4: ostiv oun tapeinwsei eauton wv to paidion touto outov estin o meizwn en th basileia twn ouranwn
18.5: kai ov ean dexhtai en paidion toiouto epi tw onomati mou eme decetai
18.6: ov d an skandalish ena twn mikrwn toutwn twn pisteuontwn eiv eme sumferei autw ina kremasyh mulov onikov peri ton trachlon autou kai katapontisyh en tw pelagei thv yalasshv
18.7: ouai tw kosmw apo twn skandalwn anagkh gar elyein ta skandala plhn ouai tw anyrwpw di ou to skandalon ercetai
18.8: ei de h ceir sou h o pouv sou skandalizei se ekkoqon auton kai bale apo sou kalon soi estin eiselyein eiv thn zwhn kullon h cwlon h duo ceirav h duo podav econta blhyhnai eiv to pur to aiwnion
18.9: kai ei o ofyalmov sou skandalizei se exele auton kai bale apo sou kalon soi estin monofyalmon eiv thn zwhn eiselyein h duo ofyalmouv econta blhyhnai eiv thn geennan tou purov
18.10: orate mh katafronhshte enov twn mikrwn toutwn legw gar umin oti oi aggeloi autwn en ouranoiv dia pantov blepousin to proswpon tou patrov mou tou en ouranoiv 18:11
18.12: ti umin dokei ean genhtai tini anyrwpw ekaton probata kai planhyh en ex autwn ouci afhsei ta enenhkonta ennea epi ta orh kai poreuyeiv zhtei to planwmenon
18.13: kai ean genhtai eurein auto amhn legw umin oti cairei ep autw mallon h epi toiv enenhkonta ennea toiv mh peplanhmenoiv
18.14: outwv ouk estin yelhma emprosyen tou patrov mou tou en ouranoiv ina apolhtai en twn mikrwn toutwn
18.15: ean de amarthsh o adelfov sou upage elegxon auton metaxu sou kai autou monou ean sou akoush ekerdhsav ton adelfon sou
18.16: ean de mh akoush paralabe meta sou eti ena h duo ina epi stomatov duo marturwn h triwn stayh pan rhma
18.17: ean de parakoush autwn eipon th ekklhsia ean de kai thv ekklhsiav parakoush estw soi wsper o eynikov kai o telwnhv
18.18: amhn legw umin osa ean dhshte epi thv ghv estai dedemena en ouranw kai osa ean lushte epi thv ghv estai lelumena en ouranw
18.19: palin [amhn] legw umin oti ean duo sumfwnhswsin ex umwn epi thv ghv peri pantov pragmatov ou ean aithswntai genhsetai autoiv para tou patrov mou tou en ouranoiv
18.20: ou gar eisin duo h treiv sunhgmenoi eiv to emon onoma ekei eimi en mesw autwn
18.21: tote proselywn o petrov eipen [autw] kurie posakiv amarthsei eiv eme o adelfov mou kai afhsw autw ewv eptakiv
18.22: legei autw o ihsouv ou legw soi ewv eptakiv alla ewv ebdomhkontakiv epta
