15.30: parakalw de umav [adelfoi] dia tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou kai dia thv agaphv tou pneumatov sunagwnisasyai moi en taiv proseucaiv uper emou prov ton yeon
15.31: ina rusyw apo twn apeiyountwn en th ioudaia kai h diakonia mou h eiv ierousalhm euprosdektov toiv agioiv genhtai
15.32: ina en cara elywn prov umav dia yelhmatov yeou sunanapauswmai umin
15.33: o de yeov thv eirhnhv meta pantwn umwn amhn

16.1: sunisthmi de umin foibhn thn adelfhn hmwn ousan [kai] diakonon thv ekklhsiav thv en kegcreaiv
16.2: ina prosdexhsye authn en kuriw axiwv twn agiwn kai parasthte auth en w an umwn crhzh pragmati kai gar auth prostativ pollwn egenhyh kai emou autou
16.3: aspasasye priskan kai akulan touv sunergouv mou en cristw ihsou
16.4: oitinev uper thv quchv mou ton eautwn trachlon upeyhkan oiv ouk egw monov eucaristw alla kai pasai ai ekklhsiai twn eynwn
16.5: kai thn kat oikon autwn ekklhsian aspasasye epaineton ton agaphton mou ov estin aparch thv asiav eiv criston
16.6: aspasasye marian htiv polla ekopiasen eiv umav
16.7: aspasasye andronikon kai iounian touv suggeneiv mou kai sunaicmalwtouv mou oitinev eisin epishmoi en toiv apostoloiv oi kai pro emou gegonan en cristw
16.8: aspasasye ampliaton ton agaphton mou en kuriw
16.9: aspasasye ourbanon ton sunergon hmwn en cristw kai stacun ton agaphton mou
16.10: aspasasye apellhn ton dokimon en cristw aspasasye touv ek twn aristoboulou
16.11: aspasasye hrwdiwna ton suggenh mou aspasasye touv ek twn narkissou touv ontav en kuriw
16.12: aspasasye trufainan kai trufwsan tav kopiwsav en kuriw aspasasye persida thn agaphthn htiv polla ekopiasen en kuriw
16.13: aspasasye roufon ton eklekton en kuriw kai thn mhtera autou kai emou
16.14: aspasasye asugkriton flegonta ermhn patroban erman kai touv sun autoiv adelfouv
16.15: aspasasye filologon kai ioulian nhrea kai thn adelfhn autou kai olumpan kai touv sun autoiv pantav agiouv
16.16: aspasasye allhlouv en filhmati agiw aspazontai umav ai ekklhsiai pasai tou cristou
16.17: parakalw de umav adelfoi skopein touv tav dicostasiav kai ta skandala para thn didachn hn umeiv emayete poiountav kai ekklinete ap autwn
16.18: oi gar toioutoi tw kuriw hmwn cristw ou douleuousin alla th eautwn koilia kai dia thv crhstologiav kai eulogiav exapatwsin tav kardiav twn akakwn
16.19: h gar umwn upakoh eiv pantav afiketo ef umin oun cairw yelw de umav sofouv [men] einai eiv to agayon akeraiouv de eiv to kakon
16.20: o de yeov thv eirhnhv suntriqei ton satanan upo touv podav umwn en tacei h cariv tou kuriou hmwn ihsou mey umwn
16.21: aspazetai umav timoyeov o sunergov [mou] kai loukiov kai iaswn kai swsipatrov oi suggeneiv mou
16.22: aspazomai umav egw tertiov o graqav thn epistolhn en kuriw
16.23: aspazetai umav gaiov o xenov mou kai olhv thv ekklhsiav aspazetai umav erastov o oikonomov thv polewv kai kouartov o adelfov 16:24
16.25: tw de dunamenw umav sthrixai kata to euaggelion mou kai to khrugma ihsou cristou kata apokaluqin musthriou cronoiv aiwnioiv sesighmenou
16.26: fanerwyentov de nun dia te grafwn profhtikwn kat epitaghn tou aiwniou yeou eiv upakohn pistewv eiv panta ta eynh gnwrisyentov
16.27: monw sofw yew dia ihsou cristou [w] h doxa eiv touv aiwnav amhn

1.1: paulov doulov yeou apostolov de ihsou cristou kata pistin eklektwn yeou kai epignwsin alhyeiav thv kat eusebeian
1.2: ep elpidi zwhv aiwniou hn ephggeilato o aqeudhv yeov pro cronwn aiwniwn
1.3: efanerwsen de kairoiv idioiv ton logon autou en khrugmati o episteuyhn egw kat epitaghn tou swthrov hmwn yeou
1.4: titw gnhsiw teknw kata koinhn pistin cariv kai eirhnh apo yeou patrov kai cristou ihsou tou swthrov hmwn
1.5: toutou carin apeleipon se en krhth ina ta leiponta epidiorywsh kai katasthshv kata polin presbuterouv wv egw soi dietaxamhn
1.6: ei tiv estin anegklhtov miav gunaikov anhr tekna ecwn pista mh en kathgoria aswtiav h anupotakta
1.7: dei gar ton episkopon anegklhton einai wv yeou oikonomon mh auyadh mh orgilon mh paroinon mh plhkthn mh aiscrokerdh
1.8: alla filoxenon filagayon swfrona dikaion osion egkrath
1.9: antecomenon tou kata thn didachn pistou logou ina dunatov h kai parakalein en th didaskalia th ugiainoush kai touv antilegontav elegcein
1.10: eisin gar polloi anupotaktoi mataiologoi kai frenapatai malista oi ek thv peritomhv
1.11: ouv dei epistomizein oitinev olouv oikouv anatrepousin didaskontev a mh dei aiscrou kerdouv carin
1.12: eipen tiv ex autwn idiov autwn profhthv krhtev aei qeustai kaka yhria gasterev argai
1.13: h marturia auth estin alhyhv di hn aitian elegce autouv apotomwv ina ugiainwsin [en] th pistei
1.14: mh prosecontev ioudaikoiv muyoiv kai entolaiv anyrwpwn apostrefomenwn thn alhyeian
1.15: panta kayara toiv kayaroiv toiv de memiammenoiv kai apistoiv ouden kayaron alla memiantai autwn kai o nouv kai h suneidhsiv
1.16: yeon omologousin eidenai toiv de ergoiv arnountai bdeluktoi ontev kai apeiyeiv kai prov pan ergon agayon adokimoi

2.1: su de lalei a prepei th ugiainoush didaskalia
2.2: presbutav nhfaliouv einai semnouv swfronav ugiainontav th pistei th agaph th upomonh
2.3: presbutidav wsautwv en katasthmati ieroprepeiv mh diabolouv mhde oinw pollw dedoulwmenav kalodidaskalouv
2.4: ina swfronizwsin tav neav filandrouv einai filoteknouv
2.5: swfronav agnav oikourgouv agayav upotassomenav toiv idioiv andrasin ina mh o logov tou yeou blasfhmhtai
2.6: touv newterouv wsautwv parakalei swfronein
2.7: peri panta seauton parecomenov tupon kalwn ergwn en th didaskalia afyorian semnothta
2.8: logon ugih akatagnwston ina o ex enantiav entraph mhden ecwn legein peri hmwn faulon
2.9: doulouv idioiv despotaiv upotassesyai en pasin euarestouv einai mh antilegontav
2.10: mh nosfizomenouv alla pasan pistin endeiknumenouv agayhn ina thn didaskalian thn tou swthrov hmwn yeou kosmwsin en pasin
2.11: epefanh gar h cariv tou yeou swthriov pasin anyrwpoiv
2.12: paideuousa hmav ina arnhsamenoi thn asebeian kai tav kosmikav epiyumiav swfronwv kai dikaiwv kai eusebwv zhswmen en tw nun aiwni
2.13: prosdecomenoi thn makarian elpida kai epifaneian thv doxhv tou megalou yeou kai swthrov hmwn cristou ihsou
2.14: ov edwken eauton uper hmwn ina lutrwshtai hmav apo pashv anomiav kai kayarish eautw laon periousion zhlwthn kalwn ergwn
2.15: tauta lalei kai parakalei kai elegce meta pashv epitaghv mhdeiv sou perifroneitw

3.1: upomimnhske autouv arcaiv exousiaiv upotassesyai peiyarcein prov pan ergon agayon etoimouv einai
3.2: mhdena blasfhmein amacouv einai epieikeiv pasan endeiknumenouv prauthta prov pantav anyrwpouv
3.3: hmen gar pote kai hmeiv anohtoi apeiyeiv planwmenoi douleuontev epiyumiaiv kai hdonaiv poikilaiv en kakia kai fyonw diagontev stughtoi misountev allhlouv
3.4: ote de h crhstothv kai h filanyrwpia epefanh tou swthrov hmwn yeou
3.5: ouk ex ergwn twn en dikaiosunh a epoihsamen hmeiv alla kata to autou eleov eswsen hmav dia loutrou paliggenesiav kai anakainwsewv pneumatov agiou
3.6: ou execeen ef hmav plousiwv dia ihsou cristou tou swthrov hmwn
3.7: ina dikaiwyentev th ekeinou cariti klhronomoi genhywmen kat elpida zwhv aiwniou
3.8: pistov o logov kai peri toutwn boulomai se diabebaiousyai ina frontizwsin kalwn ergwn proistasyai oi pepisteukotev yew tauta estin kala kai wfelima toiv anyrwpoiv
3.9: mwrav de zhthseiv kai genealogiav kai erin kai macav nomikav periistaso eisin gar anwfeleiv kai mataioi
3.10: airetikon anyrwpon meta mian kai deuteran nouyesian paraitou
3.11: eidwv oti exestraptai o toioutov kai amartanei wn autokatakritov
3.12: otan pemqw arteman prov se h tucikon spoudason elyein prov me eiv nikopolin ekei gar kekrika paraceimasai
3.13: zhnan ton nomikon kai apollwn spoudaiwv propemqon ina mhden autoiv leiph
3.14: manyanetwsan de kai oi hmeteroi kalwn ergwn proistasyai eiv tav anagkaiav creiav ina mh wsin akarpoi
3.15: aspazontai se oi met emou pantev aspasai touv filountav hmav en pistei h cariv meta pantwn umwn
